column2: Igioroni jio abuk ana afureta hohonyiok Yesu Kristo to woyo ba Dafide, lonyi Abramo.
Ara Abramo monye Isako, Isako monye Yakobo, Yakobo monye Yuda iko illarak honyi;
ara Yuda monye Peres iko Sera (huttolo ŋoruoi honyi Tamar), Peres monye Heseron, Heseron monye Ram,
Ram monye Aminadab, Aminadab monye Nason, Nason monye Salmon,
Salmon monye Bowas, (jio ŋoruoi honyi Rahab), Boas monye Obed (huttolo ŋoruoi honyi Rus), Obed monye Yese,
Yese monye hobu Dafide.
Ara nyia Dafide monye Solomon tottolo ŋoruoi honyi ninyia ara 'to aŋoruoi Uriya;
Solomon monye Rehobuwam, Rehobuwam monye Abiya, Abiya monye Asa,
Asa monye Yehosafat, Yehosafat monye Yoram, Yoram monye Usiya,
Usiya monye Yotam, Yotam monye Ahas, Ahas monye Hesekiya,
Hesekiya monye Manase, Manase monye Amon, Amon monye Josiya,
Josiya monye Yekoniya iko illarak honyi to ninyia anyarik isi ifau Babilonia.
Ihalu anyaru hosi Babilonia, Yehoyakin monye Salatiel, Salatiel monye Serubabel,
Serubabel monye Abiud, Abiud monye Elayakim, Elayakim monye Asor,
Asor monye Sadok, Sadok monye Akim monye Eliud,
Eliud monye Eliasar, Elasar monye Mattan, Mattan monye Yakobo,
Yakobo monye Yosefu, Yosefu habi Maria, honye Yesu, Yesu elle iloŋoi

Tania itterio jio Abramo many jio Dafide, arai nyia asik 'tomon haŋuan, buo fe jio Dafide many iholoŋ ninyia anyarik isi Babilonia arai nyia buo fe asik 'tomon haŋuan. Attati teya many jio oloŋ ninyia isiorik
Attati habi honyi Yosefu, jiaran apiaharu jihonyi dee nyio, ara nyia inyi atulo ollo obis 'to buo fe obeŋ awak itanyahina inyi ariri ihosiere waati.

Ati ninyia hègigilo Yosefu erre hunia, oleyehino nyia ajilo olo Lamonye jihonyi ta arigia, ette jiaran, “Yosefu, otto woyo Dafide, hèbaŋ ayemuna Maria aŋoruoi hoi, nyio oyedu inyi ta aduaran ono Loholio Olibo.
Isiu adi inyi leto, buo ifurak adi iyye inyi Yesu, nyio italahu adi inyi aati honyi te iyyata hosi.”
Iduoŋi nyia erre huna 'daŋ, itasiruniere ekiana ono Lamonye ninyia ikianari inyi te etuk ekianani honyi jio,
“Oyedu adi obo oduoti onno hobeŋ ottironie iko obo alle. Ottu adi inyi isiuna eto 'le. Ifurani adi inyi Imanuele,” (onno ojio 'to, “Owon Hollum ikohoi”).
Ninyia ahenyu Yosefu, ette inyi ihanio ihuo ifak ajilo olo Lamonye inyi, ette iyemuna Maria.
Isiu nyia Maria lonyi honyi hobeŋ Yosefu ottironie ikonyi; buo Yosefu ette ifurana leto alia Yesu.
Isiuni nyia Yesu ibore gala Betelehem atta fau Yudea, to oŋitek hunyia arari Erode Ahobu. Teya, ofuonni nyia omuk alofiorojok tetteduoŋi holoŋ many Yerusalem, ette ifiyo jiojio,
“Tali olodole elle isiuni ahobu Yudei? Nyio, egonyu nyia hohoi elelef honyi ottu teduoŋi holoŋ; ania, efuanari hohoi itahabuyere inyi.”
Ninyia itaniŋu hobu Erode erre hunia, ette inyi iko aati 'daŋ hutto Yerusalem ihawwa.
Illilloŋu nyia inyi ehumak elettaha arabotie 'daŋ iko ettiyanak Ifahita, ette ifiyo isi jiojio, “Isioi adi
Itarraŋi nyia isi jiojio, “Ibore gala Betelehem ifau Yudea; ihuo ninyia igioroniere ekianani Hollum jio,
‘Iyye Betelehem, atta fau Yuda,
obiaŋara iyye emuta jio aborejin gala Yuda hunne ettaha 'to;
nyio, tehiji hoi odetuno adi elettok
ollo ottu 'to iyyahatio aati hoŋ, Israele.’ ”
Attati Erode iloŋuna alofiorojok hia jio ewwaha onno obeŋ tulo omijak, ette ihum ittittifuna jihosi jio, nyia baya oleyo elelef ania.
Attati inyi ifahina isi Betelehem, buo ihum iramana isi jiojio, “Ifuatta, ihumata ittittifuna leto lia. Elle inyurana itai inyi, ifuanna iramana nani, oŋida buo fe nani alo itahabuyere inyi.”

Ninyia itaniŋuni isi ekiana hobu, ette isi ifuatan. Ojio ihiji ikoi, igonyuni nyia isi ahuan elelef ninyia igonyuni isi teduoŋi holoŋ, ette isi imuno bebe. Olo nyia elelef ania to osiere hosi duurr, many owotiari totto hide maji ninyia awanari olodole lia.

Ninyia ajiŋani isi attua haji, ette isi igonyuna leto iko honyonyi Maria; ania, ette isi irigoŋi ifau itahabuyere inyi. Attati isi iŋanyuna esiorita hosi, ette isiarana jihonyi ayyel, ottogoŋ iko obo aŋallai onno oŋuo gir gir.
Attati isi icaharu ifau hosi to obo ekoi hama; nyio, iramak nyia Hollum jihosi ta arigiai jio, hèlaha isi acaharai jio Erode.

Ninyia afuoi isi, oleyehino nyia ajilo olo Lamonye jio Yosefu, ette jiaran, “Odiotoi, ofuhorori leto alia iko honyonyi ifau Masir. Itoŋoi diya many eramaniere ni iyye; nyio, ottifia adi Erode leto alia ittohori inyi.”
Attati Yosefu idioto nyia 'tari, ette iyaru leto alia iko honyonyi ifau Masir,
ette itoŋo diya many oyeri Erode. Ara nyia eram ania ihuo nyia, itasiruniere ekiana ono Lamonye ninyia ikiana inyi te etuk ekianani honyi jio, “To Masir, eloŋ ni Lonyi hoŋ.”

Ninyia amijak Erode jio, inyobi alofiorojok hia inyi, ette ataji honyi isuaharu, ette inyi ifahina eram oŋida ottohori aduri liawa hulla arai aŋasi hosi arrihai iko hullo homutari 'to 'daŋ, hutto Betelehem iko hutto onyihari honyi 'daŋ. Ihani nyia ihuo nyia, nyio, itaniŋu nyia inyi jio alofiorojok jio, aremehini aŋasi ihuo arrihai many to ninyia igonyunierek isi elelef.
Ania, itasiruno ekiana ninyia ikiana Yeremia ekianani Hollum jio,
“Itaniŋuno aturuk to Rama,
aturuk ono atuari onno omi 'to bebe.
Oyyoo Rakele aduri honyi;
iha ikoddaŋ etadua,
nyio, atuhoroi isi.”
Ninyia aye Erode, oleyehino nyia ajilo olo Lamonye jio Yosefu ta arigia ninyia howon inyi ifau Masir, ette jiaran,
“Odiotoi, iyaru leto alia iko honyonyi; acahatti ifau Israele nyio, ayei aati hinyia awahi 'to ittohoro inyi.”
Ania, odiotori Yosefu, ette inyiaharu leto alia iko honyonyi many Israele.
Ati abaŋ nyia Yosefu icahari Yudea nyio, itaniŋu nyia inyi jio arutak Arkelos ahobu olo Yudea imaji monyonyi. Ania, ette inyi leten ifau Galilea ihuo inyiahi nyia iramana jihonyi ta arigiai;
ette imanya ibore gala anna anya 'to Nasaret. Ania, itasirunierek erre hunyia ojiori ekianak Hollum jio, “Iloŋoi adi inyi a Nasaretanani.”
Ihalu oŋitek hua, ottu nyia Yoane Etifuotoni Batisimo ihidiofo Yudea, ette ittittoyo jio,
“Idehina eyyata hatai; nyio, iliaha Olobie ettedou.”
Yoane nyia linyia ojio Isaya ekianani Hollum jio,
“Obo latulo elle iwuwoŋita ihidiofo jio,
‘Ihuhumana ekoi ono Lamonye,
itabisana alori honyi!’ ”
Ofuonni nyia aati jihonyi to Yerusalem, ta fau Yudea, iko jio aŋacio 'daŋ hutteger owore Yordano.
Opuloni nyia isi eyyata hosi, buo inyi ette itifuotonia isi batisimo itua owore Yordano.
Ihuo ayyani onno oŋijak 'to eŋijiti, ihaniete egemita hunne itahutani 'to jio ibusana itai eyyata hatai.
Hègigiloti jio irisata adi itai ettigemio ta ajiaran jio ara Abramo ahohonyi hatai, nyio, eramak ni itai, oremik Hollum iduhuna amoruoi huna, ette iyyeuna aduri hutto woyo Abramo.
Ihuania accio atolu ihadde 'yani. Ayyani onno obeŋ 'to oŋijak eŋija hunno oyiji 'to, olloŋori adi inyi addi, ette ibironia ihima.

Etifuocio ni itai batisimo ta aari itahutaniere jio ibusana itai eyyata hatai. Ati obo alla agalik ani ollo ottu te ehalu hoŋ, abeŋ ni luŋa aremik iŋok amuha honyi. Itifuocio adi inyi itai batisimo to Loholio Olibo iko te eema.
Awon egilli honyi ihani, igilliyere emma hunne igis inyi. Ififieu adi inyi emma 'daŋ ette ihanana imugu honyi, buo ette isuahina acono 'daŋ ihima onno obeŋ 'to odunya.”
To ninyia tonyia, ottu nyia Yesu to Galilea, ette leten jio Yoane itua owore Yordano ifuotuniere batisimo jihonyi.
Ati awak nyia Yoane itik inyi, ette jiaran, “Awak duo ni ifuotuna batisimo jihoi, inyiak buo fe iyye ittuna jihoŋ!”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ojio, “Ijiara do hétera ihuo nyia, oŋida itasiru awahan Hollum.” Ette Yoane iruk ihaniere ihuo nyia.
Teya teya, ninyia ifuotu Yesu batisimo, ette ittuna addi to tua hari; aŋa nyia edou, attati inyi igonyuna Oloholio Hollum osuu ihuo awolo, ette isuronia jihonyi.
Attati ekiana ittuna tedou onno ojio, “Lonyi hoŋ olo luŋa, ollo obuor ataji hoŋ bebe.”
Oferu nyia Yesu oloŋi atomuana aŋuan iko aruejin atomuana aŋuan, teya, ette inyi iniama.
Attati Sittan ittuna, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Elle ira iyye Lonyi Hollum, iramak amoruoi huna ijiara oyitoi emunio.”
Attati Sittan iyaru Yesu Yerusalem, Abore Gala Elibo, ette itawojihina inyi isihidi Haji Emojit enne ittokon,
ette jiaran jihonyi, “Elle ira iyye Lonyi Hollum, orruaŋai ahuan hoi ifau; nyio, igioroni ibuk Hollum jio,
‘Ifak adi Hollum ajilohien honyi irririari iyye;
Ittarrauni adi isi iyye ta ahas hosi,
oŋida obo amoruo obeŋ iriafu
ara duadi bu eeju hoi.’ ”
Attati Sittan iyaru Yesu ihide doŋe onno ohodo 'to bebe, ette itahutana inyi olobiehien 'daŋ hutta fau iko olohuo hosi 'daŋ,
ette jiaran jihonyi, “Esiarak adi ni iyye erre hunia 'daŋ elle irigoŋo iyye ifau itahabuyere nani.”
Attati Sittan idiaharu inyi, teya ette ajilohien ifuanna, ette iluahio inyi.
Iwot nyia inyi to Nasaret, ette leten imanya Kapernaum abore gala etteger tafar enne ittokon anna anya 'to Galilea, atta fau Sebulun iko Naftali.
Ihani nyia ihuo nyia, itasiruniere ekiana ninyia ojio Isaya ekianani Hollum jio,
“Afau Sebulun iko afau Naftali,
huttekoi hari enne ittokon, afohor owore Yordano tole,
Galilea, afau Lufajak!
Igonyuni adi aati hulla amanyai 'to idumele
afaŋan onno obolo.
Afaŋ adi inyi jio hia,
hulla amanyai 'to ifau ette idumele ono naye.”
To ninyia adahari Yesu ilotifor tafar Galilea, igonyu nyia inyi ayafohok arrihai, hulla arai ellarak; Simone (alla anya 'to Petro) iko illanyi Andrea. Ayafohoi nyia isi aham ta aboyo itua tafar.
Attati Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Ijifuniete ani, ettiyanak adi ni itai iloŋuttari aati jihoŋ.”
Teya teya, idiaharai nyia isi aboyo hosi ette ijifaru inyi.
Ninyia holo inyi kai ahosiere, ette inyi igonyuna omuk ellarak arrihai, Yakobo iko Yoane lonyirok Sebedeyo. Owoni nyia isi itogol iko monyosi Sebedeyo, hullo orifie aboyo hosi, ette Yesu iloŋuna isi.
Teya teya, ette isi idiaharu atogol iko monyosi ette ijifaru Yesu.
Ilur nyia Yesu Galilea 'daŋ, buo ittiyenio buo fe ittittoyo Asayyo Ayijok huno Olobie itua hasik imojiti. Itaŋidario nyia buo fe inyi aati jio eŋuati 'daŋ gele gele.

Itaniŋoroi nyia asayyo honyi afau Siria 'daŋ; ania, ette aati iyaŋuno jihonyi aati 'daŋ hullo owoni 'to iko eŋuati gele gele, iko omuk hullo orrohojari 'to: hullo owoni 'to iko aminiaŋa, ahue, buo hullo oye aŋacio huattek, buo inyi ette itaŋida isi 'daŋ.
Ijifarai nyia inyi eluluŋi hunne ittaha 'to to Galilea iko jio Aborejin Gala huna 'Tomon, to Yerusalem iko to Yudea buo fe ta fau onno owon 'to ifohor owore Yordano tole.
Igonyu nyia Yesu eluluŋ waati, ette idahina jio obo adoŋe ollo odiha ette itoŋo. Okudani nyia ejifak honyi inyi,
buo inyi ette itterio ettiyenio isi.
“Hotomunohi hia, hulle ilociaŋi 'to to hosiere Hollum;
ara Olobie ettedou ahonosi!
Hotomunohi hia, hulla atarihai 'to,
itilik adi Hollum atajia hosi!
Hotomunohi hia, hulla anyalami 'to,
ifuotuni adi isi ecoriti Hollum!
Hotomunohi hia, hulla awahi 'to bebe abisan,
isio adi Hollum erre 'daŋ jihosi!
Hotomunohi hia, hullo owoni 'to iko amehino jio aati hullomuk,
omehino adi Hollum jihosi!
Hotomunohi hia, hullo olibori tajia,
igonyuni adi isi Hollum!
Hotomunohi etumuarak waati,
iloŋoi adi isi aduri Hollum!
ara Nolobie ettedou ahonosi!
“Omunoti alla amorie aati itai, ittigemie itai, buo fe ikianai tetai erre hunno orrohoji 'to ta agesemi ta arahan hatai a huloŋ.
Omunoti buo fe isahuttati; nyio, obolo adi esiorio jihatai idou. Nyio, ittigemie nyia isi ekianak Hollum hunyia berien ihuo nyia.
“Irata itai ihuo amile jio aati 'daŋ. Ati elle ilik amile, inyiahini adi eduarit honyi aŋai? Abeŋ inyi inyiak iyiji; tania, oruasari adi inyi addi, ette aati irrirrieyo inyi.
“Irata itai ihuo afaŋan jio aati 'daŋ hutta fau. Obeŋ abore gala onno oduhoni ihide doŋe oremik idima.
Obeŋ tulo itawulohi allomo, ette imuhonia ta arrany. Ati oyihak adi inyi allomo ania ihide fillili, oŋida afaŋ jio aati 'daŋ hutto tua haji.
Ijiara afaŋan hatai hatafaŋa jio aati, oŋida isi igonyuni ehanita hatai hunno oyiji 'to, ette itahabuyo Monyatai ollo owon 'to idou.
“Hègigiloti jio, attu ni itapuahiere efahita Mose iko ettiyenita huno ekianak Hollum. Abeŋ ni attu itapuahiere isi, ati attu ni itasiruniere isi.
Hode, eramak ni itai jio, many iholoŋ ono esidi idou iko afau, obeŋi adi iyari addi obo ekiana jio efahita, ara duadi bu egieri ollo odiha 'to, many itasirunierek isi 'daŋ.

Lia, ollo omesio 'to efahi abotie duadi bu ollo omuta 'to buo fe ittiyenio aati ihuo nyia, ofiaha adi inyi Ilobie ettedou. Ati lia, elle ijifatio 'to efahita buo fe ittiyenio isi jio aati, ara adi inyi elettok Ilobie ettedou.
Tania, eramak ni itai jio, alla abeŋ abisan hatai agalik ayiji ono ettiyanak ifahita iko ono
Ati eramak ni itai jio, lia, elle iloŋojita 'to
Tania, elle ilo iyye ititiek ehumi isioriere esiori hoi jio Hollum, buo diya itte iyiyiuna jio iloŋojita illahoi jihoi to obo eram,
idiaharu esiorio hoi ihosiere ititiek ehumi; ilo do itabisaniere eram hoi iko illahoi. Ojio teya, ocohunie yo isioriere esiorio hoi jio Hollum.

“Itimuoru atulo alla awak 'to iyaru iyye ilokikoi, hèbiaŋata itai ifanyata diya. Alla abociere inyi iyye many ihosiere aŋotoni hirre, isiarak adi aŋotoni hirre iyye jio oseŋer; buo isi ette ifitana iyye ibabus.
Hode, eramak ni iyye jio, ibeŋ adi iyye ihouno many idumari iyye edumiti 'daŋ, hunno oŋotoni jihoi.
“Itaniŋuna nyia itai ojiori jio, ‘Hèrototi.’
Ati eramak ni itai jio, atulo alla adaya 'to obo aŋotte; aroto inyi luŋa ta ataji honyi.
Elle iyaru onyek iŋet iyye iyyau, ogolotu inyi, ibiroi addi! Nyio, iyyak iŋotik iyye aŋati huan hoi, buo ahuan hoi 'daŋ obeŋ ibironio iferno.
Buo fe elle iyaru aani iŋet hoi iyye iyyau, oŋutu inyi tub itte ibiroro addi! Nyio, iyyak iŋotik iyye aani, buo ahuan hoi 'daŋ obeŋ ibironio iferno.

Ati eramak ni itai jio, lia, elle ifuhak 'to ŋoruoi honyi obojiai, buo obiaŋara te eram silara, itaroto inyi ŋoruoi honyi; buo alla ayemu obo atulo aŋotte onno opiahai 'to iko habi, oroto buo fe alle alia 'daŋ.
“Itaniŋuna nyia buo fe itai jio, iramani nyia jio aati hunyia berien jio, ‘Hètapuahata ettuŋo hatai, ihanata jio Lamonye ihuo ittuŋotti nyia itai.’
Ati ihuania eramak ni itai jio, hèttuŋoti luŋa. Hèttuŋoti te nedou nyio, ara inyi aseger ilohittok ono Hollum.
Hèttuŋoti buo fe ta afau; nyio, ara inyi amaji ebalori hejek honyi. Hèttuŋoti to Yerusalem, nyio, abore gala ono Loobu elle ittokon ania.
Hèttuŋoti to ossi hatai; nyio, ittallihoto itai ihan obo ofitti aboŋ kuyya emoli.
Elle ijiatta itai ‘Aafe’, ijiara luŋa ara Aafe; buo fe elle ijiatta itai ‘Obeŋ’, ijiara luŋa ara obeŋ. Obo ariŋ enne inyiahata itai ifunnihina, ottu nyia jio Sittan.
“Itaniŋuna nyia itai ojiori jio, ‘Alla agolotu obo onyek hoi, ogolotu buo fe ononyi; buo fe elle isiahu obo aalai hoi isiahu buo fe ononyi.’
Ati eramak ni itai jio, hènienu lia, elle ihan 'to onno orroho jihatai. Alla annaŋ obo amahalio hoi etteŋet, ijiara buo fe inyi annaŋ ebotie.
Elle iyaru obo atulo iyye ilokikoi iyari agamis hoi, isiarak buo fe jihonyi akout hoi.
Alla arrosok obo iyye iwwahari erre honyi many amail abotie, akafaru isi amaili arrihai.
Isiatta erre jio lia, ollo omojo 'to; hèyimoti buo fe lia, alla awak 'to ohuroni jihonyi obo ariŋ.
“Itaniŋuna nyia itai ojiori jio, ‘Itabuarata atajia jio mottiarak hatai buo iliwati amiorok hatai.’
Ati eramak ni itai jio, itabuarata atajia hatai jio amiorok hatai buo fe imojoti to hia, hulle ittigemie 'to itai.
Oŋida bati irata olonyirok Monyatai ettedou. Nyio, itafaŋak inyi oloŋ honyi buo fe itasahi ahide honyi jio ayijok iko jio arrohojak 'daŋ arabotie.
Alla abuori atajia hatai ijiai hia, hullo obuori atajia hosi itai; anyio 'tadi enne inyiahata itai irumana? Ara duadi bu eddudduhak musuru, obeŋi soho isi ihanie ihuo nyia?
Elle ifonyati itai mottiarak hatai ijiai, owon ti obo ariŋ anna agalik 'to ottoloŋi? Obeŋi soho Alufajak ihanie ihuo nyia?
Oyijoto, ihuo onno oyijori Monyatai ettedou.

“Elle isio iyye aluahio jio olociaŋ, hèhut amohuo jio oŋida aati igonyuni iyye, ihuo enne ihanierek etihanak huattek itua hasik emojiti iko ilofirihi. Ihanie isi ihuo nyia jio, oŋida aati itahuye isi. Hode hode, eramak ni itai jio, arumani isi esiorita hosi.
Ati elle isio iyye aluahio jio olociaŋ, isiarak ollokuai, hèlaha obo atulo omijak, ara duadi bu motte hoi.
Buo Monyohoi elle igonyu 'to erre hunne ihanio iyye edimai, ette isiarana adi jihoi esiorio.
Ati elle imojo iyye, ojiŋak itua haji, ihianak ekat, itte mojo jio Monyohoi ollo obeŋ tulo igonyu. Buo Monyohoi elle igonyu 'to erre hunne ihanio iyye edimai, ette isiarana adi esiorio jihoi.
“Elle imojo iyye, hètabolorio ekiana asai ihuo Alufajak, hulle igigiloi 'to jio itaniŋu adi Hollum isi te emojiti hosi hunno ohodori 'to.
Hèra ihuo isi; nyio, omijak Monyohoi ariŋ enne iwak iyye many hèbeŋ iyye ikoddaŋ ifiyo inyi.
Ati omojoi ihuo ana:
‘Monye hohoi ollo owon idou,
Ijiara abaŋi afure hoi onno olibo 'to
Hetettu Nolobie hoi.
Ijiara awahan hoi hétera ifau ihuo anna arari inyi idou.
Isiarak jihohoi ahana aŋiyo hohoi ottoloŋi.
Obusak epalita hohoi
ihuo enne ebusaniere hohoi epalita waati hulle ihanie 'to onno orroho jihohoi.
Hèyaru hohoi jio ekemiti hunno ogoli 'to
Ati itahoru hohoi jio Olorroho’
Ati elle ibiaŋata itai ibusana epalita waati hullomuk, obeŋ adi buo fe Monyatai obusak epalita hatai.
“Elle iferuna itai, hètumuroto omomite ihuo etihanak huattek. Ibasani isi ahuattek hosi oŋida aati omijani aferuna hosi. Hode, eramak ni itai jio, arumani isi esiorita hosi.
Ati elle iferuna itai, imujulati buo fe igugurutata oofir,
oŋida aati obeŋi omijani aferuna hatai…arari fe Monyatai hama, ollo obeŋ tulo igonyu, omijak. Buo Monyohoi, elle igonyu 'to erre hunne ihanio iyye edimai, ette adi isiarana jihoi esiorio.
“Hèttunana esamiti hatai jio afau ana, ŋadi eŋenyu iko oloŋoruo otuhi isi; buo fe ahahalak oremehini ihahalaru.
Ati, ottunana esamiti hatai idou; amaji onno obiaŋari eŋenyu iko oloŋoruo oremehini ituk isi; buo fe ahahalak ittallihi ihahalaru isi.
Nyio, odulo adi ataji hoi jio amaji onno ottunarik esamiti hoi.
“Arai oŋite ihuo allomo ihuan. Alla ayiji oŋite hoi, afaŋ adi ahuan hoi 'daŋ.
Buo alla arrohoji oŋite hoi, owon adi ahuan hoi 'daŋ idumele enne iriok 'to bebe. Alla ara afaŋan ottonohoi edumele, orroho adi eriohi honyi bebe!

“Obeŋ obo atulo oremik igiama jio elettaha arrihai; nyio, oliwari adi inyi abotie, buo ataji honyi obuor obotie; oniŋio adi inyi abotie, buo iyasio obotie. Ittallik iyye irahan a hegiamani Hollum buo fe a holo esamiti.

“Tania, eramak ni itai, hèhawwati te nesu hatai; ta anyio adi enne iŋiyete itai, ta anyio adi enne imatati itai; kuyya buo fe ta aboŋojin hunne iyyafana itai ihuattek. Obeŋ soho nesu hatai agalik aŋiyo? Obeŋi soho ahuattek hatai agalihini aboŋojin?
Ike imijata aheny; obeŋi isi oyehini hinyomoti, kuyya odeŋuni himmai, buo fe obeŋi ottunani riŋ imuguo; ati itaŋiyo Monyatai ettedou isi. Ibiaŋata soho itai igalihina aheny?
Ŋai jihatai ollo oremik 'to ifonihina nesu honyi obo kai
“Nyioti ihawwati itai te eram boŋojin? Ike imijata obolori ayaburita hutto mur aŋai? Obeŋi isi igiamai buo fe obeŋi ihuhumuni aboŋojin hosi.
Ati, eramak ni itai jio, ara duadi bu Solomon hobu iko esamiti honyi 'daŋ, obeŋi nyia aboŋojin honyi ilamani ihuo obo jio ayaburita hunia.
Ati, elle itiyyefio Hollum amiyaŋ otto mur, onno owon 'to ahana buo motie osuahini iyali, obeŋ 'tadi inyi itiyyef itai agalik 'daŋ? Aii, itai aati hullo omuta neruk!
“Tania, hèhawwati jio, ‘Eŋiyo adi hohoi anyio? Kuyya emata adi hohoi anyio? kuyya eyyafatio adi hohoi anyio?’
(Erre hunia, hunno ottifiai aati
Ati ottifiati do Olobie Hollum iko erre hunna awak inyi; buo adi inyi ette isiarana jihatai erre hunnomuk hunia 'daŋ.
Tania, hèhawwati te erre huno motie; nyio, owoni adi ehawwata huno motie hama. Ijiara ettigemita huno oloŋ abotie, oremehini to oloŋ ania hama.
“Hèŋototo eram omuk, oŋida buo fe Hollum obeŋ oŋot eram hatai.
Nyio, oŋot adi Hollum eram hatai ihuo enne iŋociette itai eram hullomuk. Ekoi enne iŋociette itai eram omuk, inyi adi buo fe onno oŋocierek eram hatai.
Nyio igonyu iyye aboroti to honyek illahoi, buo ibeŋ igonyu abeleri otto honyek hoi?
Kuyya aŋai irinyak iyye ajiaran jio illahoi, ‘Illa, hadi eduhu ni addi aboroti otto honyek hoi ania,’ buo abeleri owon ihonyek hoi?
Jai! Iyye etihanani huan olo, iduhu do addi abeleri otto honyek hoi; buo diya, iremik adi iyye ihum igonyuna buo fe iduhuna addi aboroti otto honyek illahoi.
“Hèsiatta aŋohe ariŋ elibo; nyio, oyitonie adi isi itai, ette ihony itai; hèsiatta buo fe asihira hatai jio abataha, nyio, irrirriei adi isi asihira hunia.
“Ifiyete, buo isiori adi jihatai; ottifiati, buo inyurana adi itai; ikukuhoto, buo aŋahini adi ekat jihatai.
Nyio, lia, elle ifiyo 'to, ifuotu adi; buo fe lia, ollo ottifia 'to, onyurak adi; buo fe lia, elle ikukuho 'to aŋahini adi jihonyi.
Jihatai monyie, elle ifiyo lonyi hoi iyye emune, isio adi iyye inyi amoruo?
Kuyya alla amojo inyi ahami, isio adi iyye inyi amunu?
Elle imijana itai, hulle irrohojata 'to, esiorio hirre hunno oyiji 'to jio aduri hatai, aŋai 'tadi Monyatai ettedou, obeŋ 'tadi esiorio honyi erre ayijok jio hia hulle omojoi 'to jihonyi, agalik!
“Ojiŋara ta akol ollo ottida 'to; nyio, alat akol onno ojiŋarik iferno. Iliaha ekoi onno ofuarik diya, buo fe aati hullo ojiŋari 'to tenyi, oluaji.
Ati ottida akol maji ono nesu. Ogol ekoi onno ojiŋarik diya; omutari buo fe aati hullo onyurani 'to inyi.
“Ihumata mijio ekianak enyabak, hullo ojiori 'to jio ekiana isi eram Hollum. Itanyalami isi ahuattek ihuo akioro, buo to tuajin hosi arai luŋa ihuo elewoo.
Imijana adi itai isi te ehanita hosi. Obeŋi aŋarria oŋijani eŋijiti fino, buo fe ekua obeŋi oŋijani aŋabolo.
Oŋijak ayyani onno oyyu 'to eŋijiti hunno oyiji 'to, buo ayyani onno orroho 'to oŋijak eŋijiti hunno orrohoji 'to.
Ati, ittallik ayyani onno oyyu 'to iŋijana eŋijiti hunno orrohoji 'to, buo fe ayyani onno orroho 'to ittallik iŋijana eŋijiti hunno oyiji 'to.
Buo ayyani, onno obeŋ 'to oŋijak eŋijiti hunno oyiji 'to, olloŋori adi inyi addi, ette ibironia ihima.
Tania, imijana adi itai ekianak enyabak hullo ojiori 'to ekiana isi eram Hollum, te ehanita hosi.
“Obiaŋara adi aati 'daŋ, hulle iloŋoi 'to ani jio, ‘Lamonye, Lamonye,’ ojiŋari Ilobie ono Hollum; arari fe hia hama, hulle ihanie 'to erre hunna awak Monyoŋ ettedou.

Iholoŋ ono Aŋacio Hiram, ofuonni adi aati arriai jiaran jihoŋ, ‘Lamonye, Lamonye! Ettittoyo nyia hohoi asayyo Hollum ta afure hoi. Efuhatio nyia hohoi aminiaŋa addi, buo fe ehanio eduariti arriai ta afure hoi!’
Ati apulok adi ni jihosi jiojio, ‘Atimo nyia ni itai; ifuatta addi jihoŋ, itai arrohojak hulo!’
“Tania, atulo elle itaniŋio 'to ekenita hoŋ buo fe oniŋio isi, ara adi inyi ihuo atulo elle ilofioro 'to, ollo oduhok 'to aaji honyi imoruoi.
Attati ahide sayo buo aari ette ibuluno, ette buo fe oyyami ihut aaji ania bebe, buo inyi obeŋ oritihoro; nyio, oduhoni nyia inyi imoruoi.
“Buo atulo elle itaniŋio 'to ekenita hoŋ buo omesio isi, ara inyi ihuo atulo ollo obeŋ hou, ollo oduhok 'to aaji honyi isuluŋayo.
Attati ahide sayo buo aari ette ibuluno, ette buo fe oyyami ihut aaji ania bebe, ette inyi iritihoro. Orroho nyia ekuahit honyi bebe.”
Ninyia atuhok Yesu ekiana erre hunia, illilliha nyia eluluŋ waati ekoi enne ittiyeniere inyi.
Nyio, obeŋ nyia inyi ittiyenio ihuo ettiyanak ifahita, ati ittiyenio nyia inyi isi te elohittok.
Ninyia isuru Yesu to doŋe ollo odiha 'to, ijifarai nyia eluluŋi hunne ettaha inyi.
Attati obo atulo, linyia owon 'to iko
Attati Yesu ihalamana aani honyi, ette ittir inyi, ette jiaran, “Awak ni, toliboro!” Teya teya, ette aŋuai atulo lia iŋidari.

Attati Yesu jiaran jihonyi, “Itayirie! Hèramak obo atulo, ati obotik jio ehumani, ijiara inyi ihum imi iyye, attati teya, isiarak ehumi jio Hollum ihuo ojiori efahita huno Mose, itahutaniere jio aati jio, ilibo iyye.”
To ninyia ojiŋaniere Yesu ibore gala Kapernaum, ottu nyia obo ajafit olo Roma, ette ittana inyi
jiojio, “Lettok, apit hoŋ elle ififiata iko aŋuai itua haŋ; odiaha inyi bebe, ittallik ikoddaŋ idioto.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Alo adi ni itaŋida inyi.”
Buo ajafit lia ette itarraŋ ojio, “Lettok, abeŋ ni asiru ifuotuniere iyye ihaŋ hoŋ. Ati ikianai te etuk ijiai, oŋida adi apit hoŋ.

Orriama ihuo anna aniŋiere ni elettaha hoŋ, buo fe oseŋer hoŋ oniŋie ani. Aremik ni jiaran jio obo, ‘Ilo!’ buo inyi ette leten, buo fe jio olobo, ‘Waŋ!’ buo inyi ette ittuna; buo fe ajio jio apit hoŋ, ‘Ihana enyia!’ buo inyi ette ihan.”

Ninyia itaniŋu Yesu eram ania, illilliha nyia inyi bebe, ette jiaran jio aati hunyia ijifatie 'to inyi jio, “Eramak ni itai jio, habeŋ ni anyurak obo eruk onno obolo 'to ihuo ana, ara duadi bu ifau Israele 'daŋ.
Eramak ni itai jio, ofuonni adi aati arriai tetteduoŋi holoŋ iko tettedorroi holoŋ iŋiyere agari iko Abramo, buo Isako, ojio Yakobo, Ilobie ettedou.
Ati irruoŋoni adi idumele, hia, hullo oremehini 'to irahan a hulo olobie. Diya, ituruhoi adi isi buo fe irutai aala hosi.”
Attati Yesu jiaran jio ajafit alia, “Ilo haŋ, ijiara hétera jihoi ihuo iruk iyye.”
Teya teya, ette apit lia iŋidari.
Olo nyia Yesu ihaŋ Petro, ette irumana hamoni Petro ififiata iko anahan huan.
Attati inyi ittir aani aŋotte ania, buo anahan huan nyia, ette iŋatana inyi, ette inyi idioto ahide, ette ihuhumana jio Yesu aŋiyo.
Ninyia ara ollotoriai, iyaŋunie nyia aati jio Yesu, aati miniaŋa arriai. Buo te etuk ijiai, itattur nyia Yesu aminiaŋa, buo aati hunyia oŋuai 'to 'daŋ ette iŋidari.
Ihan nyia inyi ihuo nyia, itasiruniere eram ninyia ikiana Isaya ekianani Hollum jio, “Iduha inyi addi eŋuati iko ediahiti hohoi.”
Ninyia igonyu Yesu eluluŋ waati okudani inyi, ette inyi ihum iramana jio lejifak honyi jio, “Hafatta afohor tafar enne ittokon tole.”
Attati obo ettiyanani olo efahita ittuna jihonyi, ette jiaran, “Hettiyanani, ejifaru adi ni iyye jio amasik 'daŋ hunne ilari iyye.”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ inyi jiojio, “Owoni obeyohi iko ewurio hosi, buo fe aheny owoni iko asik hosi; ati obeŋ obo amaji onno oferiere Lonyi tulo iyiriari.”
Buo obo olo lejifak honyi ette jiaran, “Lettok, ijiara do nani alo inuhana monyoŋ.”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ojio, “Ijifunie ani. Idehi ayaak onuhani ayaak hosi.”
Ninyia ladak Yesu itogol, ijifarai nyia ejifak honyi inyi.
Teya teya, ette addiŋilla idiotonio isi tehiji tafar enne ittokon many ojiari atogol nyia adiori ta apoŋia poŋia hari. Ati ojotoro nyia Yesu,
attati ejifak ifuatan itaheny inyi, ette jiaran jiojio, “Lamonye! Eluak hohoi, attu naye!”
Buo inyi ette jiaran jihosi, “Eii! Anyio baŋi attanatai ania? Itai aati hullo omuta eruk!” Attati inyi idioto, ette iŋerejanio jio addiŋilla iko apoŋia poŋia hari, ette ediofo 'daŋ idua jillili.
Illillihai nyia isi 'daŋ bebe, ette jiaran, “Eii! Anyio tulo olo? Ara duadi bu addiŋilla iko apoŋia poŋia hari, oniŋie isi 'daŋ inyi!”
Ninyia allaŋ Yesu atafar tole, ifau Gerasa, oruaŋanie nyia omuk aati miniaŋa arrihai ikonyi, hullo ofuonni tehiji ilumio, buo iŋereji bebe many abaŋarik aati adaha tolia.
Teya, iwuwoŋitai nyia isi bebe, ette jiaran, “Lonyi Hollum, anyio enne iwak iyye jihohoi? Ittu iyye hohoi ittigemio hobeŋ asaa ottuba?”
Oŋiye nyia abataha arriai alamarai kai teger hosi.
Attati aminiaŋa hunia ittana Yesu jio, “Elle ijio iyye ifuha hohoi addi, ifuhak ati hohoi jio abataha hua.”

Buo inyi ette jiaran jihosi, “Ifuatta.” Attati isi ifuatan ette ijiŋana jio abataha hua, buo eluluŋ bataha hunia 'daŋ ette isuoro attany olotifor hari jio hutu, hutu, hutu, ette ikuahino itua hari, ette ikoddaŋ iye diya.
Ofuhoi nyia eyyahak bataha hunia, ette ijiŋana itua bore gala, ette iramana erre 'daŋ, hoduo iduoŋi 'to jio aati miniaŋa.
Tania, ojiŋuni nyia aati 'daŋ to tua bore gala, ette ifuatan jio Yesu. Ninyia igonyuni isi inyi, ette isi ittana inyi hételo addi ta fau hosi.
Adak nyia Yesu atogol, ette illaŋan atafar many ibore gala Kapernaum anna amanyari inyi.

Ojio teya, iyaŋunie nyia omuk aati jihonyi obo atulo ollo oye aŋati huan, ollo ofer ijotit. Ninyia igonyu Yesu abolori ono eruk hosi, ette inyi jiaran jio atulo ollo oye aŋati huan, “Lonyi hoŋ, itagolo atua! Ahohinie eyyata hoi.”
Attati omuk ettiyanak Ifahita ikiana isi hama jiojio, “Ittarrohojo atulo olo afure Hollum!”
Ati omijak nyia Yesu egigilita hosi, ania ette inyi jiaran, “Anyio owon egigilo onno orroho 'to itajia hatai?
Anani enne iliaha 'to, ajiaran jio, ‘Ahohinie eyyata hoi,’ kuyya ajiaran jio, ‘Totte, adahai’?
Ati, ijiara ani etahutak jihatai jiojio, owon Lonyi Tulo iko elohittok ifau ihohiniere eyyata.” Ania, ette inyi jiaran jio latulo ollo oye aŋati huan, “Totte, iduhu ejotit hoi, ilo haŋ!”
Teya, ette latulo lia idioto, ette leten haŋ hosi.
Ninyia igonyuni aati arriai eram ania, ette isi ibaŋi, ette itahabuyo Hollum te esiarana honyi aati elohittok ihuania.
Ninyia alo Yesu teya, ette inyi igonyuna obo eddudduhani musuru alla anya Matteyo, itoŋo imahatab honyi, ette Yesu jiaran jihonyi, “Ijifunie ani.”
Odioto nyia Matteyo, ette ijifaru inyi.
Ninyia igonyuni omuk hulo
Ati itaniŋu nyia Yesu ekiana hosi, ette jiaran jihosi, “Obeŋi busi aati hullo oŋidari 'to, awahi diktor, arari fe aŋuak hama.
Ifuatta onyurana awoyo hiram enne ikiana Abuk Hollum jio, ‘Awak ni anyalami; obiaŋara erre ehumita.’ Abeŋ ni attu iloŋo abisak, ati attu ni iloŋo eyyak.”
Attati lejifak hulo Yoane Etifuotoni Batisimo ifuanna ette ifiyo Yesu jiojio, “Eferutta hohoi iko
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Oremehini adi atamonok hutto ayamari ijiriŋa buo ayamani howon ikosi? Ati, ofuonni adi oŋitek hunne iyarik ayamani tehiji hosi addi, tania oferuni adi isi.
“Obeŋ tulo attaf ettulit boŋo amaruani ta aboŋo aŋejuk, nyio iruna adi aboŋo aŋejuk ette iguasuno addi, ette tibuo italat ettulit boŋo amaruani.

Obeŋ buo fe obo atulo iturak afino aŋejuk itua ihuloo amaruak, nyio ofudohoi adi ehuloo hunia, ette afino ijuhoro addi buo ehuloo hunia ette irrohoji. Ati iturani afino aŋejuk itua ihuloo aŋejuho. Tania, arasai adi isi 'daŋ hunno oyiji.”
Ninyia hèkiana Yesu jihosi, ottu nyia lobo elettok olo Yudei, ette irigoŋo ihosiere honyi, ette jiaran, “Hetek ŋarri hoŋ iye. Ati, waŋ ilo ottirok ahas hoi jihonyi, isu adi inyi luŋa.”
Ania, ette Yesu idioto, ette ijifaru atulo lia, buo lejifak honyi ette ifuatan 'daŋ ikonyi.
Teya, owon nyia nobo aŋotte ninyia oŋuai 'to iko ayaf yaf onno orroho, aŋasi 'tomon harrihai. Oliliebuno nyia inyi te ehalu Yesu, ette ittir esidi boŋo honyi.
Igigilo nyia inyi ta ahuan honyi hama jiojio, “Alla attir ni aboŋo honyi ijiai, aŋida adi ni.”
Attati Yesu iyito, ette igonyuna inyi, ette jiaran, “Ŋarri hoŋ, itagolo ataji hoi! Itaŋida eruk hoi iyye.” Teya teya, ette aŋotte ania iŋidari.
Attati Yesu leten ihaŋ elettok lia. Ninyia igonyu inyi ahutak ikaŋahien buo aati 'daŋ oyyihinie,
ette inyi jiaran, “Ifuatta 'daŋ allet. Obeŋ neto ania oye, ojoto inyi joto.” Buo isi ette isuhotiere inyi.
Ati ninyia ifuhari aati 'daŋ allet, ette Yesu ijiŋara attua haji, ette inef aani neto nyia, ette inyi idioto.
Attati eram ania isarrahina jio aŋati ono afau ania 'daŋ.
Ninyia alo Yesu teya, ijifarai nyia omuk laŋodok arrihai inyi hulle iwuwoŋitai jihonyi jiojio, “Lonyi Dafide, omehinie jihohoi.”
Ninyia lajiŋak Yesu itua haji, ette laŋodok hia ifuanna jihonyi, buo inyi ette ifiyo isi, “Iruhoto itai jio aremik ni itaŋida itai?”
Itarraŋi nyia isi inyi jiojio, “Aafe, Lettok.”
Attati inyi ittir oŋite hosi, ette jiaran “Hétera eram ania jihatai ihuo iruhoto itai.”
Attati oŋite hosi inyiak mijio. Buo Yesu ette ihum ikiana jihosi jiojio, “Hèramana eram ania jio obo atulo.”
Ati, ofuoi nyia isi, ette itisarrahina asayyo huno Yesu jio aŋati afau nyia 'daŋ.
Ninyia hofuoi aati hia ihuania, iyaŋunie nyia omuk aati jihonyi obo atulo ollo obeŋ ikiana, nyio, owon nyia inyi iko aminiaŋati.
Ati ninyia hèfuhari aminiaŋati nyia ihuania, ette latulo lia itterio ekiana, attati aati 'daŋ illilliha, ette jiaran “Hèbeŋ hohoi egonyu obo ariŋ ihua ana ta fau Israele!”
Ninyia igonyu inyi eluluŋi waati, ette inyi imehino jihosi nyio, ihawwai nyia isi buo fe omehinie ihuo akioro hunno obeŋ eyyahani.
Tania, ikiana nyia inyi jio lejifak honyi jio, “Obolo amana, ati omutari adioŋok.
Omojoti jio Lamonye mana oŋida ifahu adioŋok imana honyi.”
To ninyia tonyia, iloŋu nyia Yesu lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai, ette isiarana jihosi elohittok ifuhatiere aminiaŋa buo fe itaŋidariere eŋuati iko ediahiti 'daŋ.
Afureta lefahat hula 'tomon harrihai isi huna: ahosiere, Simone (alla anya 'to Petro,) iko illanyi Andrea; Yakobo iko illanyi Yoane, lonyirok Sebedeyo;
Filipo, Bartolomeyo, Tomaso, Matteyo eddudduhani musuru, Yakobo lonyi Alfeyo, Tadeyo,
Simone Aselotanani
Ifak nyia Yesu aati hula 'tomon harrihai hulia, ette iramana isi jiojio, “Hèfuatta ifauhien Lufajak, buo fe hèjiŋana obo abore gala waati Samaria.
Ati ifuatta jio aati Israele hulla arai 'to ihuo akioro hunno olitohini 'to.
Ifuatta, ittittoyete jiojio, ‘Iliaha Olobie ettedou attuna.’
Itaŋidarata aŋuak, itubuhuna ayaak, italiboroto aati hullo owoni 'to iko eŋuati belelio, buo fe ifuhara aminiaŋa addi. Ihuo ifuotuna nyia itai asai isiatta buo fe asai.
Hèlutotti omuk agurusi iloboni hatai.
Elle ifuatta itai, hèyatti edee hèmimojok, ara duadi bu agamisi arrihai, kuyya amuha, kuyya atelehi; nyio, osiru jio egiamani ifuotuniere aŋiyo honyi.
Elle ijiŋana itai obo abore gala, kuyya obo amiji, ottifieuna atulo ollo oremik 'to ifuotuna itai. Itoŋoti ikonyi many idiahatti itai amaji nyia.
Elle ijiŋana itai obo ahaŋ, ijiatta, ‘Hatawana nelik taji jihatai.’
Elle ifuotuni aati ahaŋ nyia itai, ijiara efonya hatai ono nelik taji hatawana diya; buo alla abeŋi isi ifuotuni itai, ijiara inyi hotocohunie jihatai.
Buo elle iha obo ahaŋ kuyya abore gala efuotuna itai, kuyya etaniŋio jihatai, idiahatti amaji ania, ipipuahara attuduha to hejek hatai.
Ahode, eramak ni jihatai jio, Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, obolo adi amehino Hollum jio Sodom iko Gomora agalik amehino honyi jio abore gala ania.
Ihumata mijio, owoni adi aati hullo ofuonni 'to iniafaru itai ilokikoi. Ofodohie adi is itai ihasik imojiti.
Te eram hoŋ, ipihoroi adi itai ihosiere mondiri iko hobuok iramaniere Asayyo Ayijok jihosi iko jio Alufajak.
Elle ipihoroi isi itai ilokikoi, hèlafuhoti anyio adi enne ifuatta itai ikiana kuyya ifuatta adi itai ikiana aŋai? Nyio, ta asaa nyia, iramani adi jihatai anyio enne ifuatta itai ikiana.
Nyio, obiaŋara adi itai ikianati ta ahuattek hatai; ati, Oloholio olo Monyatai adi ikiana te etuhe hatai.
Itinefuni adi ellarak illarak oŋida ottohori, buo fe monyie itinefuni aduri hosi oŋida ottohori. Oyitonie adi aduri esiok hosi, ette itattohoro.
Oliwarik adi aati 'daŋ itai te eram hoŋ; ati italuahuno adi lia ollo odihu 'to many isidi.
Elle ittigemie itai jio obo abore gala, ofuhoti jio obo hama. Nyio, eramak ni itai hode jio, ibiaŋata adi itai ituhonia egiama hatai jio aborejin gala hutto Israele hobeŋ Lonyi Tulo ottu.
Obeŋ obo eyiyanani agalik ettiyanani honyi, buo fe obo egiamani obeŋ agalik elettok.

Oremik jio eyiyanani irari ihuo ettiyanani honyi, buo fe egiamani irari ihuo elettok honyi. Elle ifurani isi amonye haŋ Belsebul, ifurani adi buo fe aati hutta haŋ honyi afureta hunno orrohoji 'to bebe.
Erre hunne eramak ni jihatai te edumele, inyiahata luŋa iramuna alla afaŋ; buo fe erre hunne itaniŋuna itai ahahayai, itawoloŋoto to sihidihien hasik.
Hèbaŋata attok huan buo ittallihi ittohoro oloholio. Ati abaŋata Hollum ollo oremik 'to itamuhina ahuan iko oloholio 'daŋ Iferno.
Obeŋi soho inyiaŋai olodili arrihai ta amillim? Ati obeŋ obo olodil okuahino ifau alla abeŋ Monyatai awak.
Ara duadi bu oofir hutto hossi hatai, iheni isi 'daŋ.
Tania, hèbaŋata, nyio, agalik ayiji hatai ono olodili arriai.
“Lia, elle iruhok 'to ani to hosiere waati, eruhok adi buo fe ni inyi to hosiere Monyoŋ ettedou.
Ati lia, ollo orisa 'to ani to hosiere waati, arisa adi buo fe ni inyi to hosiere Monyoŋ ettedou.
“Hègigiloti jio attu ni iyaŋuniere nelik ifau. Abeŋ nyia ni attu iyaŋuniere nelik fau, ati eyaŋuno ni afere.
Attu ni italiwahiniere lonyi iko monye, buo ŋarri iko honye, buo hamoni iko hamoni;
Arai adi aati hutta haŋ hatai amiorok hoi.
“Lia, ollo omuno 'to monyonyi kuyya honyonyi agalik onno omunori inyi ani, obeŋ osiru ahejifani hoŋ; buo fe ollo omuno 'to lonyi kuyya ŋarri agalik onno omunori inyi ani, obeŋ osiru ahejifani hoŋ.
Lia, ollo obeŋ 'to olor akruce honyi ette ijifuno ani, obeŋ inyi osiru ahejifani hoŋ.
Lia, alla awak 'to italuahuna nesu honyi, italitohi adi inyi, buo fe lia, elle italitohi 'to nesu honyi te eram hoŋ, italuahu adi inyi.

Lia, elle ifuotu 'to ekianani Hollum nyio ara inyi ahekianani Hollum, ifuotu adi inyi esiorio ono ekianani Hollum. Buo fe lia, elle ifuotu 'to oloyijio ta arahan honyi oloyijio, ifuotu adi esiorio arabotie iko oloyijio.
Ahode, eramak ni itai jio, lia elle isio 'to omuk aari amatat hunne ilihi 'to jio obo olofiaha tehiji hejifak hoŋ hulo nyio, ara inyi ahejifani hoŋ, obeŋ adi esiorio honyi opuak.
Ninyia atuhok Yesu eramana ettiyenita hunia jio lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai, ette inyi idiaharu amaji nyia, ette leten ittiyenio buo fe ittittoyo iborejin gala hunnomuk hutto Yudea.
Ninyia itaniŋu Yoane Etifuotini Batisimo to babus erre hunyia ihanio Kristo, ette inyi ifahina omuk lejifak honyi,
ifiyere inyi jiojio, “Eramak hohoi, iyye soho alia linyia ojio Yoane jio olo adi ittuna, kuyya etila 'tadi hohoi obo atulo hama?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu jihosi, “Acahatti, ifuatta iramana Yoane erre hunne itaniŋuna itai buo fe igonyuna:
amijie aŋodok, adahai aŋurak, italibori aati hullo owoni 'to iko
Hotomunohi hia hullo obeŋi 'to okuayai eram hoŋ.”
Ninyia acaharai lejifak Yoane, ette Yesu ikiana jio eluluŋ waati te eram Yoane jio: “To ninyia ifuatti itai jio Yoane ihidiofo, iwahata nyia itai igonyuna anyio? Afarawati onno ohucio oyyami?
Ifuatta nyia itai imijio anyio? Atulo elle ihum 'to iŋata? Aati hulla aŋatai 'to ihuo nyia, itoŋoi ihaŋitek hobuok!
Eramana ani, ifuatta nyia itai imijio anyio? Ekianani Hollum? Aafe hode, ati igonyuna itai atulo alla agalik 'to ekianani Hollum.
Yoane ollo ojio abuk Hollum jiojio, ‘Ojio Hollum, efak adi ni eyani sayyo hoŋ to osiere hoi, oŋida ihuhumak ekoi hoi.’
Hode, eramak ni itai jio, jio aati hutta fau 'daŋ, hobeŋ obo odetuno alla agalik Yoane etifuotoni Batisimo. Ati Ilobie ettedou, inyiak atulo asai igalihina Yoane.
Itterio jio oŋitek hunyia ittittoyere Yoane etifuotoni Batisimo many iko ahana, ittigemie Olobie ettedou onno orroho, buo aŋerejak awahi ihoruna inyi ta agolon.
Many to oŋitek huno Yoane, ikianai nyia ekianak Hollum iko efahita Mose 'daŋ te eram ono Nolobie.
Buo elle iruhoto itai eram ania, ara Yoane luŋa Elija inyia ojiori ottu adi.
Itayiriete, ollo owoni ayyaha jihatai!
“Etarrijohi adi ni aati hula ahana iko anyio? Arai isi ihuo aduri hulla abalai 'to isuk buo illilloŋoi ahuattek hosi jiojio,
‘Ehutak hohoi aatar jihatai, ati ibiaŋata itai ihiati. Edol hohoi afureta tuari buo itai ibiaŋata iyyooti!’
Ottu nyia Yoane ollo oferutta buo fe obeŋ amata afino, buo isi ojiori, ‘Owon inyi iko aminiaŋati!’

Ninyia attu Lonyi Tulo ollo oŋiyo buo fe amata, buo fe isi 'daŋ ojiori, ‘Ike imijata atulo alia, ara alaŋaru buo fe aharumani, amotte hèddudduhak musuru iko eyyak!’ Ati omijani aati jio obisi ofioro Hollum te erre hunne ihanie to ofioro honyi.”
Attati Yesu ikiana onno ogol jio aati hutto borejin gala hunyia ihaniere inyi eduariti honyi arriai, nyio obeŋi nyia isi idehini eyyata hosi, ette iŋerejianio jihosi ette jiaran,

“Orroho adi bebe jihoye Korasin! Orroho adi bebe jihoye Besseyida, nyio hara nyia ihanie eduariti, hunyia ihanie jihatai, iborejin gala Taya iko Sidon, ŋa nyia isi idehini eyyata hosi berien, ette iyyafana asuwali buo fe opuri ahuattek te enuara itahutaniere jio eha isi eyyata hosi!
Ati, eramak ni itai jio, to Oloŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, obolo adi amehino Hollum jio Taya iko Sidon agalik amehino honyi jihatai.
Buo jihoye Kapernaum! Iwak iyye ikaf ahuan hoi many idou? Ati ibirori adi iyye many Imaji Hayak! Hara nyia ihanie eduariti hunyia ihanie jihoi, ibore gala Sodom, ŋaduo inyi hodulo many iko ahana.
Ati eramak ni itai jio, Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, obolo adi amehino Hollum jio Sodom agalik amehino honyi jihoi!”
Teya, ette Yesu jiaran, “Monye, Lamonye olo edou iko olo afau! Ajio ni jihoi humo te edimana hoi erre hunia jio alofiorojok iko jio hulle iheni 'to, buo iyye itte itahutana jio aati asai.
Aafe, Monye, ara inyi ihuo iwak nyia iyye.
“Ifuanna jihoŋ, itai 'daŋ hulle ifutoti 'to iko egemita hunno oddiŋi 'to, esio adi ni itai ayiri.
Atarana eyeni hoŋ, ittiyenuna jihoŋ; nyio anyalam ni buo fe atua hoŋ obi. Tania, inyurana adi itai ayiri.
Nyio, ofiaha eyeni enne esio ni jihatai, buo fe egemita hunne esio adi ni jihatai itawahai.”
Ojio ihalu kai, ababalaru nyia Yesu totto tua matta to oloŋ Sabatto.
Ninyia igonyuni
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Hèbiaŋata itai ihenuna erre hunyia ihan Dafide iko aati honyi, ninyia aniamai isi?
Ojiŋak nyia inyi ihaji Hollum, ette inyi iko aati honyi iŋiyo emunio hunyia isiori jio Hollum. Itihotie nyia efahita isi iŋiyere emunio hua arari fe ehumak hama oŋiyei isi.
Kuyya hèbiaŋata buo fe itai ihenuna to tua ifahita huno Mose jio, itafayacie ehumak efahita to oloŋ Sabatto, te egiama hosi itua Haji emojit enne ittokon, ati, obeŋi isi owoni iko epali.
Eramak ni itai jio, owon obo ariŋ anna agalik Aaji emojit enne ittokon.
Imijana duo itai awoyo hiram ono ekiana onno ojio 'to, ‘Awak ni amehino, obiaŋara aciaŋi ehumita,’ ibiaŋata duo itai iŋotonia epali jio hullo obeŋi 'to ipali.
Nyio, ara Lonyi Tulo Lamonye olo Sabatto.”
Olo nyia Yesu teya, ette ijiŋana jio obo aaji emojit,
ninyia awanari obo atulo ollo oye hani. Owoni nyia omuk aati diya hunyia awahi 'to itisiahina inyi. Ania, ette isi ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Aŋatani soho efahita hohoi itaŋidariere to oloŋ Sabatto?”
Oyyu atulo agalik aker! Tania, aŋatani efahita hohoi iluahiere atulo to oloŋ Sabatto.”
Attati inyi jiaran jio latulo lia, “Itabisak aani hoi.”
Ette inyi itabisana, buo aani honyi ette inyiak ŋidari ihuo ebotie hani.
Attati
Ninyia itayiru Yesu ewwahuna hosi ittohori inyi, ette inyi leten addi teya, buo eluluŋ waati enne ittok ette ijifaru inyi. Buo inyi ette itaŋida aŋuak hosi 'daŋ,
ette ihum iramana isi hèlaha isi itisarrahini eram honyi jio aati hullomuk.
Ihan nyia inyi ihuo nyia oŋida itasiruni ekiana Hollum ninyia ikianari inyi te etuk Isaya Ekianani Honyi jio:
“Imijata egiamani hoŋ olo alla anyimu ni,
inyi alia ollo obuor ataji hoŋ.
Inyi buo fe alia alla amuno ni bebe.
Esiarak adi ni Oloholio hoŋ jihonyi
buo inyi adi ette iramana jio aati hutta fau 'daŋ,
aleten hoŋ iŋocio eram onno obis.
Obeŋ adi inyi ilorisa kuyya ohosohita,
Obeŋ adi tulo itayiru inyi iwuwoŋita ilofirihi.
Obeŋ adi inyi isohu osiholoti onno oboina 'to,
kuyya itaduny allomo enne iliaha 'to adunyari.
Odulo adi inyi many iyaŋuniere inyi
aŋocio hiram onno obis 'to jio aati.
Buo aati 'daŋ ette adi iyihina ta afure honyi.”
Attati omuk aati iyaŋuno jihonyi obo oloŋodo elle ittallik ikiana nyio, owon nyia aminiaŋati jihonyi. Buo Yesu ette itaŋida atulo lia many oremik inyi inyiak ikiana buo fe omijio.
Illillihai nyia eluluŋi waati 'daŋ ette ifiyo jiojio, “Lonyi Dafide 'tadi olo?”

Ati omijak nyia Yesu egigilita hosi, ette inyi jiaran jihosi jio, “Elle ibubuanya obo afau eluluŋi eluluŋi hunno orriomonie isi hama, otturo adi inyi. Elle ibubuanya buo fe obo abore gala kuyya obo ahaŋ eluluŋi eluluŋi hunna aŋalafai, otturo adi inyi.
Alla aŋalafarai eluluŋi hutto lobie Sittan isi hama itahutak inyi jio ibubuanya olobie ania. Tania, otturo adi inyi kuak.
Elle efuhatio ni aminiaŋa ta aduaran Belsebul, buo lejifak hatai ifuhatie isi ta aduaran ŋai? Tania, arai adi lejifak hatai ahaŋotok hiram hatai.
Ati, elle efuhatio ni aminiaŋa ta aluahio ono Oloholio Hollum, itahutak ania jio alum Olobie Hollum ihiji hatai.
“Ittallik obo atulo ijiŋara ihaŋ olottir ihorori asaŋ honyi, arari fe elle ifit inyi olottir alia do, ŋa ti inyi oremik ibialaru asaŋ honyi.
Tania, eramak ni itai jio, oremehini adi ihohina eyyata waati 'daŋ iko etarrohojita hosi afure Hollum, ati ittallihi adi ihohina eyyata lia elle ittarrohojio 'to afure Loholio Olibo.
Lia, elle ittarrohojio 'to afure Lonyi Tulo oremehini adi ihohina eyyata honyi. Ati lia, elle ittarrohojio 'to afure Loholio Olibo ittallihi adi ihohina eyyata honyi ihuania…ara duadi bu moi.
Itai amunuok hulo! Aŋai iremehina itai ikiana erre hunno oyiji 'to buo itai isata arrohojak? Nyio, ikiana etuk erre hunne ifuti 'to itua taji.
Iyaŋuno oloyijio erre ayijok to hirre ayijok hunno owoni 'to jihonyi; buo olorroho iyaŋuno arrohojak to hirre arrohojak hunno owoni 'to jihonyi.
“Eramak ni itai jio, Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, ofuoi adi aati 'daŋ ababo iramuna awoyo hirre huno ekenita 'daŋ hunyia ikianai isi asai asai.
Nyio, ekenita hunne ikianati itai isi adi hunno oŋotonierek jihatai epali kuyya abiaŋan ipali.”
Nyio, ihuo ninyia otuhori Yona oŋitek iko aruejin hunihoi to tua hami enne ittok, otuk adi buo fe Lonyi Tulo oŋitek iko aruejin hunihoi to tua fau.
Odiotoi adi aati Ninife Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, ette itisiahina itai. Nyio, ihari nyia isi eyyata hosi ninyia itayiruni isi ettittoyo ono Yona. Eramak ni itai, owon obo ariŋ dini anna agalik Yona!

Odioto adi noobu ono Seba Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, ette itisiahina aati hula ahana. Nyio, ottu nyia inyi ta fau honyi anna alama 'to itayiruniere olofioro huno Solomon Hobu. Eramak ni itai owon obo ariŋ dini anna agalik Solomon!
“Alla ajiŋu aminiaŋati jio obo atulo, ilor inyi ta amaji onno oyoho 'to, ittifiari amaji eyirit, ati obeŋ inyi onyurak obo.
Attati inyi jiaran, ‘Acaharu adi ni ihaji hoŋ noduo ediehuno ni.’ Ninyia acohuno inyi, onyurak nyia inyi aaji honyi oyur, alibo, buo fe ilaman.

Attati inyi leten, ette iloŋuno omuk aminiaŋa hattarik hunno orrohoji 'to agalihini inyi, ette isi ijiŋana, ette imanya diya. Ania, ninyia atuho 'daŋ, orroho nyia jio latulo alia agalik ninyia tetteri. Ara adi buo fe inyi ihuo nyia jio aati arrohojak hula ahana.”
Ninyia hèkiana Yesu jio aati hia, afanyi nyia bo honyonyi iko illarak honyi, ette iwotia illet. Awahi nyia isi ikiana jihonyi. [
Ania, ette obo atulo tehiji waati iramana inyi jio, “Imijie, honyohoi onno owotia illet iko illarak hoi. Awahi isi ikiana jihoi.”]
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu jio, “Ŋai iyaŋ? Haŋai illarak hoŋ?”
Attati inyi ihut ajio lejifak honyi, ette jiaran, “Imijiete, iyaŋ ana iko illarak hoŋ!
Lia, elle ihanio 'to erre hunna awak Monyoŋ ettedou, inyi ara illaŋ iko haniyoŋ buo iyaŋ.”
To oloŋ nyia, olo nyia Yesu allet ta haji, ette itoŋo ilotifor tafar enne ittokon ittiyeniere.
Okudak nyia eluluŋ waati enne ittok inyi many adahiniere inyi atagol, ette itoŋo itua honyi, buo eluluŋ waati owotia ilotifor.
Ittiyenio nyia inyi isi erre arriai te etarriamata.
“Olo nyia obo aromoni iyehina enyomo himma.
Ninyia oyere inyi enyomo itua mana, ofodoŋonie nyia omuk ihiji ikoi, ette aheny ikukubuna isi.
Ofodoŋonie nyia omuk ihiji moruoi, amaji anna ahaharaŋi aboro. Ania, ette isi isuruna kokuak, nyio, ahaharaŋi aboro diya.
Ati ninyia anok oloŋ, osuak inyi ayyalaŋa himma nyio, hobeŋi nyia isi ihum irriomonia aadde, ette isi iyohojoro.
Ofodoŋonie nyia omuk itua hikua, ette eekua ibolori, ette itabunara isi.
Ati imohi nyia enyomo hunnomuk iboro hunno oyiji 'to, ette isuaru emma esiha abotie, buo omuk atomuana ille, buo fe omuk atomuana hunihoi.”
Attati Yesu itisidonia jiojio, “Itaniŋiete alla awoni ayyaha jihatai.”
Attati lejifak ihutonia jio Yesu, ette ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Nyio ikiana iyye jio aati te etarriamata?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu jio, “Isiarani jihatai olofioro huno amijana hirre huno Olobie ettedou hunno otimoi, ati obiaŋara jihosi.

Nyio, atulo ollo owon 'to iko erre, ofonihini adi jihonyi buo inyi ette iwanan iko erre agalihini; buo atulo ollo obeŋ obo ariŋ jihonyi, iduhuni adi addi jihonyi ara duadi bu ariŋ ollo odiha ollo owon 'to jihonyi.
Inyi enne ekianari ni jihosi te etarriamata jio, oŋida isi omijie, buo obeŋi igonyuni; buo fe itayirie, buo obeŋi itaniŋuni buo fe obeŋi omijani.
Tesi, itasiruni adi ekenita Isaya, ekianani Hollum, hunno ojiori 'to jiojio,
‘Itayiriete adi itai, itayiriete, buo ibiaŋata imijana
imijiete adi itai, imijiete, buo ibiaŋata igonyuna.
Nyio, oddiŋi ossi hosi,
buo fe isi ottuhi ayyaha hosi;
buo fe imuti oŋite hosi.
Ŋaduo oŋite hosi igonyuni,
ŋaduo ayyaha hosi itaniŋie
ŋaduo ossi hosi amijani
ojio Hollum, ette isi iyito ajihoŋ
ette ni itaŋida isi.’

Ahode, eramak ni itai jio, awahi nyia ekianak Hollum iko aati Hollum bebe igonyuna erre hunne igonyuna itai hunia, ati ittallihi nyia isi. Awahi nyia buo fe isi itaniŋuna erre hunne itaniŋuna itai, ati ittallihi nyia isi.
“Itaniŋuna atibuo, buo fe iyiyenuna anyio enne ikiana etarriamai ono ayani hinyomo.
Aati hulle itayirai 'to ekiana ono Nolobie, buo obeŋi omijani, arai isi ihuo enyomo hunno ofodoŋoroi 'to ihiji ikoi. Ottu olorroho ette ikuararu ariŋ ninyia oyehini ituajin hosi.
Enyomo hunno ofodoŋonie 'to ihiji moruoi, arai ihuo aati hulle ifuotuni 'to ekiana ta amuno hètaniŋuni do.
Ati obeŋ inyi ihum idioro itajia hosi, buo fe obeŋ itoŋo diya fur. Ojiori ettigemita kuyya ehawwata ofuonni te eram ono ekiana ono Hollum, teya teya, ette isi ihara.
Enyomo hunno oyehini ihiji hikua, arai ihuo aati hulle itaniŋuni 'to ekiana. Ati obunarai isi te ehawwata hutta fau buo amuno ono esamiti, ania, obiaŋarik isi oŋijarik.

Ati, enyomo hunne imohi 'to iboro hunno oyiji 'to arai isi ihuo aati hulle itaniŋuni 'to ekiana, ette imijana ojio anyio, ette isi ŋijana aaŋer, omuk esiha abotie, buo omuk atomuana ille, buo fe omuk atomuana hunihoi.”
Inyiak Yesu iramana jihosi obo etarriamai jiojio, “Ara Olobie ono Hollum ihua ana: Oyehi nyia obo atulo enyomo hunno oyiji imana honyi.
Ati ninyia ajotoroi aati 'daŋ, ottu nyia obo amiottononi, ette iyehina alabali ihiji himma ette leten addi.
Ninyia isuruni emma, itterie ossi hosi abuturi, attati alabali leyo.
Ofuonni nyia egiamak honyi, ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Lettok, oyiji nyia bu enyomo hunyia iyehi iyye, ottu ati alabali ana tai?’
Itarraŋ nyia inyi jiojio, ‘Obo amiottononi elle ihan 'to ariŋ ania.’ Buo isi ette ifiyo inyi jio, ‘Iwak iyye hohoi efuo irutoro alabali addi?’
Itarraŋ nyia inyi isi jiojio, ‘Obeŋ. Nyio, elle irutuna itai alabali, ŋadi irutuna iko emma.
Ijiara alabali obolori arabotie iko emma 'daŋ many iholoŋ dioŋo. Attati ni iramana adioŋok oŋida orutuni alabali do addi, ette ititir isi, attati isuahina ihima; buo odioŋoni emma imugu hoŋ.’”
Inyiak Yesu iramana isi obo etarriamai onno ojio jio, “Ara Nolobie ettedou ihua ana: iduhu nyia obo atulo aŋerio cahai ette idulana imana honyi.
Inyi aŋerio alla agalik 'to 'daŋ ta amutari, ati obolo ayyani honyi agalik 'daŋ. Alla abolo ayyani honyi, ofuonni aheny ette iduhonia asik hosi itanata honyi.”

Inyiak Yesu iramana isi obo etarriamai onno ojio jio, “Ara Nolobie ettedou ihua ana: iduhu nyia obo aŋotte olobou, ette icaŋana ihifua hunno oremehini ahiriehien hunihoi many odohuniere inyi 'daŋ dou.”
Iramio nyia Yesu erre huna 'daŋ jio eluluŋi waati te etarriamata. Obeŋ nyia inyi ikiana obo ariŋ arari fe te etarriamai.
Ihanio nyia inyi ihuo nyia itasiruniere ekiana ninyia ojio ekianani Hollum jio,
“Ekiana adi ni jihosi te etarriamata;
Eramak adi ni jihosi erre hunno hobeŋi omijani many tetteri fau.”
Ninyia abusaru Yesu eluluŋ waati ette ijiŋana ihaji, ette lejifak honyi ikiana jihonyi jiojio, “Iramak hohoi awoyo hiram ono alabali otto tua mana.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu jiojio, “Lia ollo oyehi 'to enyomo hunno oyiji 'to inyi Lonyi Tulo.
Amana inyi afau ana, buo enyomo hunno oyiji 'to isi aati hutto Lobie, buo alabali inyi aati hulo Olorroho.
Buo amiottononi ollo oyehi 'to alabali inyi Sittan. Adioŋo inyi esidi ono aati hulo ahana, buo adioŋok isi ajilohien.
Ihuo anna aharanyunierek alabali ette isuahina ihima, ara adi buo fe ihuo nyia isidi ono aati hulo ahana.
Ifak adi Lonyi Tulo ajilohien honyi iyari addi to Lobie honyi arrohojak 'daŋ iko esusuak waati iyyauniere,
ette ibironia isi ihima onno onok 'to bebe. Diya oyyooi adi isi buo fe oŋurutai aala hosi ta adiaha.
Attati aati hulo Hollum faŋan Ilobie Monyosi ihuo oloŋ. Itayiriete yo, alla awoni ayyaha jihatai!

“Ara Nolobie ettedou ihua ana. Onyurak nyia obo atulo anyahuo idimani itua obo amana, ette inyiak inuhana. Omuno nyia inyi bebe, ette leten itinyiaŋara erre honyi 'daŋ, ette icaharu inyiaŋuniere amana ania.
“Ara buo fe Nolobie ettedou ihua ana. Ottittifiaru nyia obo apoconi asihira hunne ilamani 'to.
Ninyia anyurak inyi obo enne ilaman 'to bebe, olo nyia inyi ette itinyiaŋana erre honyi 'daŋ inyiaŋuniere asihirati ania.
“Ara buo fe Nolobie ettedou ihuo ana. Oruaŋani nyia omuk ayafohok aboi hosi itua tafar enne ittokon, ette inefuna aham afacani gele gele.
Ninyia ifut aboi, ipihuni nyia isi inyi ilotifor, ette itoŋo ifau, ette ihuhuronia aham hunno oyiji 'to itua afee, buo iruoŋori hunno orrohoji 'to addi.
Ottu adi inyi irahan ihuo nyia jio esidi waati hula ahana. Ofuoi adi ajilohien igigialara addi arrohojak jio ayijok,
ette ibironia isi ihima onno onok 'to bebe. Diya, oyyooi adi isi buo oŋurutai aala hosi.”
Ifiyo nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Itaniŋuna itai erre hunia?”
Buo isi ette itarraŋ ojio, “Aafe.”
Attati inyi jiaran jihosi jio, “Itahutak ania jio, obo ettiyanani Ifahita elle ittiyanani Olobie ettedou, oso inyi ihuo amonye haŋ elle iduhu 'to erre aŋejuho iko erre amaruahi totua mugu honyi.”
Ninyia latuhok Yesu ekiana etarriamata hunia, idiaharu nyia inyi amaji ania,
ette icaharu ibore gala hosi. Ittiyenio nyia inyi ihaji emojit, many illilliharik aati hunyia itaniŋuni 'to inyi, ette jiaran, “Orumak inyi olofioro hunia iko eduariti hunia 'daŋ ajia?
Obiaŋara soho lonyi ahololoni olo? Obiaŋara soho honyonyi Maria? Obiaŋara soho illarak honyi bo Yakobo iko Yosefu buo Simone iko Yuda?
Obeŋi soho haniyarak honyi 'daŋ amanyai dini? Onyurak inyi erre huna 'daŋ ajia?”
Ania ette isi ihara inyi.
Attati Yesu jiaran jihosi jio, “Imasik 'daŋ, abaŋi aati ekianani Hollum arari fe aati hutto bore gala hosi iko hutta haŋ hosi hama.”
Ittallik inyi ihanio eduariti arriai diya, nyio, obeŋ nyia eruk owon jihosi.
To oŋitek hua, itaniŋu nyia Erode, Elettok olo Galilea, eram ono ehanita Yesu,
ette inyi iramana egiamak honyi jio, “Yoane Etifuotoni Batisimo alia luŋa. Itubuhuni inyi toye. Inyi anna awanari inyi iko agolon ihaniere eduariti.”
Nyio, iramak nyia Yoane inyi jio, “Obeŋ obis jihoi itadetuniere Erodias!”
Awak nyia Erode ittohoro Yoane, ati abaŋ nyia inyi aati Yudei, nyio, iruhi nyia isi jio ara Yoane ahekianani Hollum.
Ohia nyia ŋarri Erodias ihosiere iluluŋ waati 'daŋ to ninyia awanari agari ta agiluna ono esiuna Erode. Omuno nyia Erode bebe
many ocoroniere inyi jihonyi jio, “Ettuŋo ni jio, esio adi ni iyye ariŋ enne iwak iyye!”
Ihuo iramak honyonyi jihonyi, ette inyi jiaran jio Erode jio, “Esiarak ani ihuania ahou Yoane Etifuotoni Batisimo itua arrany ana.”
Attati Hobu ijiriŋa, ati ihuo ittuŋo nyia inyi ihosiere tamonok honyi 'daŋ, ette inyi iramana oŋida ihani ihuo awak neto nyia.
Ania, ette inyi ifahina aati ibabus iŋotuniere ahou Yoane,
ette iyaŋuno ahou honyi itua 'rany, ette isiarana jio neto nyia, buo inyi ette iyaru jio honyonyi.
Teya ofuonni nyia lejifak Yoane, ette iyaru ahuan honyi ette inuhana. Attati isi ifuatan iramana Yesu.
Ninyia itaniŋu Yesu eram ania, olo nyia inyi teya ta atogol jio obo amaji onno oyur 'to. Ati itayiruni nyia aati aleten honyi, ania, ette isi to borejin gala hosi ijifaru inyi te eejek.
Ninyia afany inyi ilotifor, ette inyi igonyuna eluluŋ waati enne ittok, ette ataji honyi imehino jihosi, ette inyi itaŋida aŋuak hosi.
Nyia kekai, ofuonni nyia lejifak jihonyi, ette jiaran, “Oyur amaji ana buo fe attu attari. Itatturok eluluŋi waati hunia itua misihi, ijiara ofuoi inyiaŋuniere aŋiyo hosi.”
Itarraŋ nyia inyi isi ojio, “Hèlaha isi ofuoi obo amaji. Itai, ta ahuattek hatai, isiatta obo aŋiyo jihosi.”
Oliahini nyia isi jihonyi jio, “Ewon hohoi iko emunio miyet buo aham arrihai ijiai.”
Attati inyi jiaran jihosi, “Iyaŋuniete isi jihoŋ dini.”

Attati inyi iramana aati hétetoŋohi imiyaŋ, ette iduhuna emunio huna miyet buo aham hula arrihai, ette ibonno ahide idou, ette isio ahumo jio Hollum, ette ibibeny emunio hunia, ette ihiharana jio lejifak honyi; buo lejifak ette isiarana jio aati.
Anyai nyia isi 'daŋ many ifuaŋarik. Attati lejifak ihuhuruna ofitot itua afeehien 'tomon harrihai 'daŋ 'lullur.
Arai nyia aliawa hama hinyia oŋiyei 'to diya ihuo alif miyet (5,000), elle ebeŋ ehianak aŋoruo iko iŋiayai.
Attati Yesu itadahina lejifak itogol oŋida allaŋi to osiere honyi ifohor tole ono atafar enne ittok, buo inyi itatturok eluluŋ waati.
Ninyia itatturok inyi eluluŋ waati, ette inyi leten idoŋe inyi hama imojori. Ninyia ara akekai arasa nyia Yesu diya hama.
Ta asaa ania, alama nyia atogol bebe itua tafar. Itaburaŋio nyia apoŋia poŋia hari atogol ania, nyio, ohut nyia oloyyami bebe ajihonyi.
Ninyia iliaha ataŋatio motie, ette Yesu ittuna jio lejifak alla adahuno ta ahide hari.
Ilafuhoi nyia isi bebe ninyia igonyuni isi inyi adahuno ta ahide hari, ette isi jiaran, “Etieŋ alia!” ette ituruho ta abaŋi.
Teya teya, ette inyi ikiana jihosi ojio, “Itagoloto atajia hatai. Ani alia, hèbaŋata!”
Attati Petro jiaran jihonyi jio, “Lettok, alla ara iyye hode alia, iramak ani adahuno jihoi ta ahide hari.”
Teya, itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi jiojio, “Waŋ!” Ania, ollu Petro to togol, ette idaharu jio Yesu ta ahide hari.
Ati ninyia igonyu inyi oyyami ohut bebe, ette abaŋi inef inyi, ette inyi itterio adioro itua hari. Attati inyi iluaha, “Lettok, eluak ani!”
Teya Teya, ihalamak Yesu aani honyi, ette inef inyi, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Aii! Iyye ollo omuta eruk olo! Nyio ikuaya iyye?”
Ninyia adahini isi 'daŋ arrihai itogol, ette oyyami iwotia dee.
Attati lejifak hutto tua togol itahabuyo Yesu, ette jiaran, “Hode, iyye Lonyi Hollum!”
Ninyia allaŋi isi afohor hari tole, ette isi ifanyan Genesaret.
Ninyia aheruni aati huttono abore gala ania Yesu, ette isi itisarrahina eram jio afau ania 'daŋ jio, ijiara iyaŋunie aŋuak 'daŋ jihonyi.
Attanai nyia isi inyi hataŋatak aŋuak hia ittiriere ara duadi bu esidi boŋo honyi; buo aati hinyia ottiri 'to aboŋo honyi ette iŋidari 'daŋ.
Attati omuk hulo
“Nyio omesie lejifak hoi ettiyenita hohonyiok hohoi? Nyio oŋiyei isi hobeŋi ihumi ifinia!”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Nyio ati imesiete itai efahita huno Hollum buo ijifatiete ettiyenita hatai?
Nyio, iramak nyia Hollum jio, ‘Abaŋa monyohoi iko honyohoi,’ buo ‘Atulo elle ittarrohojio 'to afure monyonyi kuyya ono honyonyi, ijiara luŋa ottohori inyi.’
Ati ittiyeniete itai jio alla awon obo atulo iko obo ariŋ onno oremik inyi iluahiere monyonyi kuyya honyonyi, buo ojio jio, ‘Ara ana ahono Hollum,’
oremik inyi ibiaŋan ibaŋi monyonyi.
Itai etihanak huattek hulo! Ottenu nyiadi Isaya to ninyia ikianari inyi eram Hollum tetai jio,
Itahabuye isi nani obojiai,
nyio, ittiyenie isi efahita waati ihuo anna arai isi efahita hoŋ.’ ”
Attati Yesu iloŋuna eluluŋ waati, ette jiaran jihosi, “Itayiriete buo fe omijana jio,
obiaŋara ariŋ onno ojiŋak 'to ihutuk tulo
Attati lejifak honyi ifuanna, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Imijak soho iyye jio itiloŋoj ekiana hoi ania Farisei?”
Itarraŋ nyia inyi jiojio, “Orutori adi ayyani 'daŋ hunno obeŋ Monyoŋ ettedou idulak.
Hèlafuhoti tesi! Arai isi aŋodok hullo orihotie 'to aŋodok. Alla arihotio oloŋodo obo oloŋodo, okuaharai adi isi 'daŋ itua iwure.”
Buo Petro ette jiaran jihonyi, “Itahutak hohoi ikiana etarriamai ania anyio.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “Hèbiaŋata buo fe itai imijana ihuo hullomuk?
Ibiaŋata itai imijana jio erre 'daŋ hunno ojiŋari 'to itua hutuk, ofuoi isi itua hohe ette ijiŋuna allet?
Ati erre hunno ojiŋuni 'to to hutuk, obotuni isi many to taji. Isi hunia erre hunne itiboti 'to atulo.
Nyio, totua taji tulo ofuonni egigilita hunno orrohoji 'to ihuo huna; attohoro tulo, aroto, erre somon, ahoho, agesemi, iko etarrohojio fureta waati.
Isi erre hunia hunne itiboti 'to atulo, buo obiaŋara alla abeŋ atulo ihum ifinia iŋiyere ihuo ijiatta itai.”
Odioto nyia Yesu teya, ette leten ifau etteger borejin gala Taya iko Sidon.
Attati obo aŋotte ono Kana ninyia amanya 'to jio aŋati ania ittuna jihonyi, ette jiaran, “Lettok, Lonyi Dafide, omehinie jihoŋ! Owon ŋarri hoŋ iko aminiaŋati arroho jihonyi bebe.”
Ati obeŋ nyia Yesu itarraŋak jihonyi obo ekiana. Attati lejifak honyi ifuanna jihonyi, ette ittana inyi jiojio, “Ifuhai aŋotte ania addi, nyio, ijifatio inyi hohoi buo iwuwoŋita.”
Attati Yesu itarraŋ isi ojio, “Ifahuni ani jio akioro hunno olitohini 'to, isi aati Israele hama.”
Tonyia, origoŋo nyia aŋotte ania ihosiere honyi, ette jiaran, “Lettok, eluak ani!”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ ojio, “Obeŋ oyyu iruoŋoniere aŋiyo duri jio aŋohe.”
Buo aŋotte ania ette itarraŋ inyi ojio; “Lettok, ara ahode, ati, ihuhuroi aŋohe ara duadi bu aŋiyo onno oddoddou 'to to 'teremeja lamonye hosi.”
Ania, ette Yesu jiaran jihonyi, “Haniye! Obolo eruk hoi bebe. Hétehaniehe jihoi ihuo iwak iyye” Teya teya, ette ŋarri aŋotte ania, ŋidari.
Teya, odioto nyia Yesu ette leten totto hutuk tafar Galilea, ette idahina ihide doŋe; ette iwoniara,
ette eluluŋi waati arriai ifuanna jihonyi, hulle iyaŋunie aŋurak, aŋodok, elurok huattek, attuhok iko aŋuak hullomuk arriai, ette ihanana isi iger hejek Yesu; buo inyi ette itaŋida isi.
Illillihai nyia aati ninyia igonyuni isi attuhok ikianai, adiotoi elurok, abisani aŋurak, buo fe aŋodok omijie, ette isi itahabuyo Hollum olo Israele.

Iloŋu nyia Yesu lejifak honyi, ette jiaran jihosi, “Omehino ataji hoŋ aati hulo, nyio, atuhi isi oŋitek hunihoi obeŋ obo ariŋ onno oŋiyei isi. Abeŋ ni awak itatturonia isi hullo oniamai, hèlaha ofuoi imohita ihiji ikoi alla acaharai miji.”
Ifiyei nyia lejifak inyi jiojio, “Erumak adi aŋiyo ajia, ihidiofo dini, onno oremik 'to itanya eluluŋ waati onno obolo 'to ana?”
Attati Yesu ifiyo isi jio, “Owoni emunio baya jihatai?”
Buo isi itarraŋi, “Emunio hattarik buo omuk aham kai hullo odihara.”
Ania, ette Yesu iramana eluluŋ waati ijiara owoniari ta fau.
Attati inyi iduhuna emunio hattarik huna iko aham, ette isio ahumo jio Hollum, ette ibibeny isi. Attati isiarana jio lejifak honyi, buo lejifak ette ihiharana jio eluluŋ waati.
Oŋiyei nyia isi 'daŋ many ifuaŋarik. Attati lejifak ihuhuruna ofitot itua afeehien hattarik 'daŋ lur lur.
Arai nyia aliawa hinyia oŋiyei 'to alif aŋuan (4,000), elle ebeŋ ehianak aŋoruo iko iŋiayai.
Attati Yesu itatturonia eluluŋ waati, ette idahina itua togol, ette leten ifau Magadan.
Itarraŋ nyia inyi jiojio, “Elle iddorro oloŋ, ijiatta itai, ‘Afaŋ adi motie, nyio, odo edou ariet.’
Buo fe ta amotie hanyik berien, ijiatta itai, ‘Iliaha ahide sayo, nyio, odo edou buo fe iriok.’ Iremehina itai imijana erre ta amijio idou buo ittallihoto imijana etamijanita huno oŋitek huna!
Orrohoji aati hula ahana buo fe obeŋi abaŋi Hollum. Nyio, awahi isi itahutani jihosi obo eduarit, ati obeŋi adi itahutani jihosi obo, arari fe eduarit ninyia ihani jio Yona.”
Ania, ette inyi idioto ette leten.
Ninyia allaŋari lejifak afohor tafar enne ittokon tole, oguoroi nyia isi iyari obo emune,
ette Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Ihumata mijio olobou ono
Ania, ette isi ikikiana isi hama jiojio, “Ikiana inyi ihuo nyia nyio, ebeŋ duo eyaŋuno obo emune.”
Ati omijak nyia Yesu ekiana hosi ania, ette inyi jiaran jihosi “Aii, itai aati hullo omuta eruk! Nyio ikikianati itai, itai hama ta abiaŋan obo emune?
Hèbiaŋata itai imijana? Ibiaŋata itai igiluna ninyia etaŋiyere ni aati alif miyet (5,000) te emunio miyet? Itulluronia nyia itai afeehien omukajia?
Buo te emunio hinyia hattarik, hunyia etaŋiyere ni aati alif aŋuan (4,000), itulluronia nyia itai afeehien omukajia?
Aŋai to ibiaŋata itai imijana jio abeŋ ni ekiana jihatai te eram ono emune? Ihumata mijio olobou ono
Attati isi imijana jio obeŋ duadi inyi ikiana jihosi te eram ono olobou ono emune. Ati asario duadi inyi isi te eram ono ettiyenita huno
Ninyia afany Yesu iger ŋati bore gala Cesaria Filipi, ette inyi ifiyo lejifak honyi jio, “Ojiori aati Lonyi Tulo ŋai?”
Attati inyi ifiyo isi ojio, “Buo jihatai, ijiatta itai ani ŋai?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ette jiaran, “Hatawana amuno ikoye, Simone lonyi Yoane! Nyio, obiaŋara atulo itahutak iyye erre hunia, ati Monyoŋ ettedou itahutak iyye.
Tania, eramak ni iyye Petro, ira iyye amoruo. Ihuo onno oduhonierek aaji ihide moruo, aduhok adi ni eluluŋ heruhok hoŋ jihoi. Ati ara duadi bu aye, ittallik adi inyi itattur isi.
Esiarak adi ni iyye eŋanyiti huno olobie ettedou. Erre 'daŋ hunne itik iyye ta fau, itihi adi buo fe isi idou. Buo erre 'daŋ hunne iŋatak iyye ta fau, aŋatani adi buo fe isi idou.”
Attati inyi ihum iramana jio lejifak honyi hèlaha iramani obo atulo jio inyi

Ta asaa nyia, itterio nyia Yesu ekiana jio lejifak honyi sar sar jio, “Alo ni luŋa Yerusalem irumaniere ettigemita jio lahou iko jio ehumak elettaha buo ettiyanak ifahita. Ottohori adi isi ani, ati itubuhuni adi ani ihalu oŋitek hunihoi.”
Iyaru nyia Petro inyi eger, ette iriŋ inyi, ette jiaran, “Lamonye, Hèlaha Hollum aŋatak erre hunia! Hèlaha luŋa erre hunia iduoŋi jihoi!”
Oyito nyia Yesu, ette jiaran jio Petro, “Sittan, ilo addi teger hoŋ! Itihotio iyye ekoi hoŋ, nyio, obiaŋara egigilo Hollum ottonohoi ania, ati ono aati.”
Nyio, alla awak obo atulo italuahuna esu honyi, italitohi adi inyi. Buo atulo elle italitohi 'to esu honyi te eram hoŋ, orumak adi inyi.
Anyio yiji 'tadi inyi, alla anyurak obo atulo erre 'daŋ hutta fau buo italitohi esu honyi? Kuyya anyio riŋ adi onno oremik inyi isio inyiahuniere esu honyi?
Nyio, ottu adi Lonyi Tulo iko ajilohien honyi ta akuatan ono Monyonyi. Ta asaa nyia oduma adi inyi aati 'daŋ te ehanita hosi.
Eramak ni itai, hode hode, owoni omuk dini hullo obeŋi adi igonyuni aye many igonyunierek isi Lonyi Tulo ottu Ahobu.”
Ihalu oŋitek ille iyaru nyia Yesu; Petro, Yakobo iko illanyi Yoane, ette isi ifuatan isi hama ihide doŋe onno ohodo.
Buo diya ihosiere hosi, iloito nyia omom Yesu onno olufa: ette omom honyi ipipiahi ihuo oloŋ, buo fe aboŋojin honyi ette pipiahi biny biny.
Attati isi 'daŋ hunihoi igonyuna Mose iko Elija ikianai iko Yesu.
Attati Petro jiaran jio Yesu, “Lamonye, oyyu jihohoi iwanari dini! Elle iwak iyye, aduhok adi ni aticio hunihoi; abotie jihoi, abotie jio Mose, buo fe abotie jio Elija.”
Ninyia itaniŋuni lejifak hulia ekiana ania, ette isi irruŋo ta abaŋi.
Ati olo nyia Yesu jihosi, ette ittir isi, ette jiaran, “Odiototi, hèbaŋata!”
Ninyia itadeti isi ossi hosi ahide, obeŋi nyia isi igonyuni obo atulo arari Yesu hama.
Ninyia isuruni isi to doŋe, ihum nyia Yesu iramana isi jio, “Hèramana aleyehino ania jio obo atulo many itubuhunierek Lonyi Tulo toye.”
Attati lejifak ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Nyioti ojiori ettiyanak ifahita jio oŋida Elija ottu do ahosiere?”
Itarraŋ nyia inyi isi jiojio, “Ottu adi Elija ahosiere, ihuhumaniere erre 'daŋ.
Ati eramak ni itai jio, lattu nyia luŋa Elija, ati obeŋ nyia tulo inyi iruk. Ihanie nyia isi jihonyi ihuo awahi isi. Ihuo nyia buo fe ittigemie adi isi Lonyi Tulo.”
Attati lejifak imijana jio ikiana duadi inyi jihosi te eram ono Yoane etifuotoni batisimo.
Ninyia acohunie isi jio eluluŋ waati, ette obo atulo ittuna jio Yesu, ette irigoŋo ihosiere honyi, ette jiaran,
“Lettok, omehinie jio lonyi hoŋ! Owon inyi iko aahue enne ittigemio 'to inyi bebe. Enyiahita arriai okuahitta inyi itua hima kuyya itua hari.
Eyaŋuno duo ni inyi jio lejifak hoi, ati ittallihi isi itaŋida inyi.”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ jiojio, “Aii, itai aati hullo obeŋ eruk buo fe ipalata! Etoŋo adi ni ikatai many baya? Many baya adi adik ni itai? Iyaŋuniete leto alia dini!”
Attati Yesu iŋerejanio jio aminiaŋati ania, buo aminiaŋati ania ette idehina leto alia. Teya teya, ette leto alia iŋidari.
Attati lejifak ifuanna jio Yesu isi hama, ette ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Nyio duati ettallik hohoi ifuhara aminiaŋati ania addi?”
“Ati, ariŋ anna ara 'to ihuo ana, oremehini ifuhara inyi ta amojo iko ta aferuna ijiai.”]
Ninyia attubanie lejifak 'daŋ Galilea, ette Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Isiori adi Lonyi Tulo ihas waati.
Ottohori adi isi inyi, ati iholoŋ etahunihi, itubuhuni adi inyi toye.”
Ijiriŋai nyia lejifak bebe.

Ninyia afany Yesu iko lejifak honyi Kapernaum, ofuonni nyia eddudduhak musuru hulo Aaji emojit enne ittokon jio Petro, ette ifiyo inyi jio, “Odumatio soho ettiyanani hatai alia amusuru huno Aaji emojit enne ittokon?”
Itarraŋ nyia Petro ojio, “Aafe.”
Ninyia ajiŋa Petro attua haji, ette Yesu ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Simone, igigilo iyye aŋai? Ŋai oduma amusuru jio hobuok huttono afau ana, aati hullo obuore kuyya aterejok?”
Itarraŋ nyia Petro inyi ojio, “Aterejok.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Itahutak fe ania jio obeŋi aati hulo obuore ania odumai.

Ati, ebeŋ hohoi ewak italoŋoj aati hulo. Ihuania ilo ibirok erirehi hoi itua tafar enne ittokon. Iduhu ahami etteri elle irirehu iyye, aŋaa etuk honyi. Irumak adi iyye diya arobiya ollo oremik idumari amusuru hoŋ iko hunohoi. Iyaru inyi isiarak jihosi.”
Attati Yesu iloŋuna obo leto ollo odiha, ette itawojihina ihosiere hosi
ette jiaran, “Ahode eramak ni itai jio, ibiaŋata adi itai ijiŋana Ilobie ettedou many iloiciette itai emanyiti hatai ihuo anna amanyarik aduri.
Elle itafiaha 'to ahuan honyi ihuo leto olo, inyi alla agalik 'to 'daŋ Ilobie ettedou.
Lia, elle ifuotu 'to obo eto ta afure hoŋ, ifuotu inyi, ani luŋa.
“Ati lia elle isusuhi 'to obo jio eruhok hoŋ hulo iyyauniere, osiru ifitani noonye hiriai imurut honyi, attati ibironia ilokubi tafar enne ittok.
Orroho adi bebe jio afau ana te eram ono esusuta! Nyio, ofuonni adi esusuta hunia ahode; ati orroho adi bebe jio atulo elle iyaŋuno 'to isi.

“Elle iyaru aani kuyya eeju hoi iyye iyyauniere, oŋutoi inyi itte ibiroro addi. Iyyak adi jihoi ilari jio nesu onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ buo iwon iko aani abotie kuyya eju abotie, agalik ibironiere iyye ihima onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ buo ahas kuyya eejek hoi ottubai 'daŋ.
Buo fe elle itadihoro onyek hoi iyye iyyau, ogolotu inyi itte ibiroro addi. Iyyak jihoi ilari jio esu 'tulaŋ buo iwon iko onyek abotie, agalik ibironiere iyye iko oŋite arrihai ihima ono iferno.
“Ihumata mijio, hèyyasata obo tehiji heruhok hoŋ hulo. Nyio, eramak ni itai jio, odulori ajilohien hosi huttedou iwanan ihosiere Monyoŋ ettedou. [
Nyio, ottu nyia Lonyi Tulo italahuniere aati hullo olitohini 'to.]

“Igigiloti itai ihan adi atulo ollo owon 'to iko akioro esiha abotie anyio, alla alitohi obo aker abotie tehiji hosi? Idiaharu adi inyi huna atomuana hottoŋuan hohottoŋuan attaditai ididaf doŋe, ette leten ittittifiaru aker ollo olitohi 'to.
Ahode, eramak ni itai jio, alla anyurak inyi aker alia, omuno adi inyi bebe agalik amuno honyi ta akioro huna atomuana hottoŋuan hohottoŋuan hunyia obeŋi 'to olitohini.
Ihuo nyia buo fe, obeŋ Monyatai

Buo alla abeŋ inyi itaniŋio ekiana hoi, iloŋoroi obo atulo abotie kuyya aati arrihai, oŋida ‘Aati arrihai hulia kuyya hunihoi iruhi jio obisi etisiahita hoi hunia, ette irahan asuuti hulo erre hunia,’ ihuo ojio abuk Hollum.

Buo fe alla abeŋ inyi itaniŋio ekenita hosi, iramak eram ania jio eluluŋ heruhok. Buo alla abeŋ buo fe inyi itaniŋio ekenita huno eluluŋ heruhok, ijiara inyi ara jihatai ihuo atulo ollo otimo 'to Hollum kuyya ihuo eddudduhani musuru.
“Enyiak ni jiaran jihatai, elle iruhi omuk hulatai arrihai ifau dini imojori obo ariŋ, isio adi Monyoŋ ettedou inyi jihatai.
Nyio, alla attubanie aati arrihai kuyya hunihoi ta afure hoŋ, awon buo fe ni diya ihiji hosi.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi jiojio, “Obeŋ. Obiaŋara enyiahita hattarik ijiai, ati, atomuana hattarik enyiahita hattarik.
Nyio, ara Olobie ettedou ihuo obo loobu, linyia awak 'to imijana owoni arobiyaa honyi baya jio egiamak honyi 'daŋ ababo.
Ninyia lalo inyi ihanio ihuo nyia, ette inyi iyaŋuno obo tehiji hosi linyia owoni arobiyaa honyi jihonyi arriai.

Ati obeŋ nyia egiamani alia owon iko arobiyaa idumari ahoros honyi. Ania, ette hobu jiaran ijiara itinyiaŋari atulo alia iko ŋoruoi honyi buo aduri honyi iko apiti. Ijiara buo fe itinyiaŋari erre honyi 'daŋ idumari ahoros ania.
Ania, ette egiamani alia irruk ihosiere hobu, ette jiaran. ‘Lettok, itilau kai, aduma adi ni arobiyaa hunia 'daŋ!’
Ania, ette hobu imehino jihonyi, ette idehina ahorosi honyi, ette buo fe ibusana inyi hételo.
“Attati egiamani alia leten inyurana obo egiamani ihuo inyi linyia owon 'to iko arobiyaa honyi kaiyo, ette inef inyi to murut, ette jiaran, ‘Odumai arobiyaa hoŋ.’
Attati egiamani obotie alia irruk ifau, ette ittana inyi jio, ‘Itilau kai, aduma adi ni iyye!’
Ati, iha nyia inyi, ette itifitana egiamani obotie alia ibabus many odumari adi inyi ahoros ania.
Ninyia igonyuni egiamak hullomuk eram ania, iloŋojitai nyia isi bebe, ette ifuatan iramana eram ania jio hobu.
Attati hobu iloŋuna egiamani alia, ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Iyye egiamani elle irroho 'to bebe! Ninyia ittanari iyye ani, edehi nyia ni ahorosi hoi 'daŋ ta amaji.
Oŋida duo buo fe iyye imehino jio egiamani ihuo iyye, ihuo ninyia amehiniere ni jihoi.’
Iloŋojita nyia hobu bebe, ette itifitana inyi ibabus oŋida ittigemie inyi diya many odumari inyi ahorosi honyi 'daŋ.
“Ihanio adi buo fe Monyoŋ ettedou ihuo nyia jihatai 'daŋ ababo elle ibiaŋata itai idehina illarak hatai ta tajia hatai.”
Ninyia atuhok Yesu ekenita hunia, odioto nyia inyi ette leten iŋati Yudea otto fohor owore Yordano tole.
Ijifarai nyia eluluŋi waati arriai inyi, buo diya ette inyi itaŋida aŋuak hosi.
Ofuonni nyia buo fe omuk
Ojio nyia Hollum, ‘Te eram ania, obusaru adi alle monyonyi iko honyonyi ette inosonio iko ŋoruoi honyi, buo isi 'daŋ arrihai ette irahan ahuan abotie,’
Ihuania obeŋi isi inyiahi irahan arrihai, arai isi abotie. Tania, Hèlaha obo atulo itapek obo ariŋ enne inosok Hollum.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Aŋatak nyia Mose itai ipiahari iko aŋoruo hatai, nyio, ogoli nyia ossi hatai. Ati obeŋ nyia ara ihuo nyia tetteri.
Eramak ni itai jio, lia ollo opiahai 'to iko ŋoruoi honyi to obo eram buo obiaŋara te eram silara, oroto inyi alla ayemu inyi obo aŋotte hama.”
Attati lejifak honyi jiaran jihonyi, “Alla ara eram 'le iko aŋotte ihuania, abeŋ fe inyi oyyu iyamari.”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Obeŋ ettiyenio ania ara ta aati 'daŋ. Ati ara inyi to hia hama hulle isio Hollum jihosi.

Owoni erre gele gele hunno obiaŋarik aati ayamarik. Isiuni omuk ihuo nyia, buo omuk iduoŋi oŋida obeŋi ayamai, buo fe omuk ihari ayama te eram ono Olobie Hollum. Ijiara atulo elle iruk 'to eram ana, ihanio ihuo nyia.”
Iyaŋunie nyia omuk aati iŋiayai jio Yesu, jio oŋida inyi iyabak ahas honyi jihosi buo fe hotomojoi tesi. Ati iŋerejanie nyia lejifak honyi jio aati hia.
Ati iramak nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Aŋatana iŋiayai ijiara ofuonni jihoŋ. Hètihoto isi, nyio, ara Olobie ettedou ahono aati ihuo isi.”
Attati inyi iyabana ahas honyi jihosi, ette leten addi.
To obo oloŋ, ottu nyia obo atulo jio Yesu, ette jiaran, “Hettiyanani, ehan 'tadi ni anyio onno oyyu ifuotuniere esu 'tulaŋ?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ojio, “Nyio ifiyo iyye ani eram hirre hunno oyiji 'to? Owon ayijoni Abotie ijiai. Ogottiere efahita, elle iwak iyye inyurana esu 'tulaŋ.”
Buo atulo lia ette ifiyo inyi ojio, “Hunani efahita?”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ inyi ojio, “Hèttoho, hèhanio erre somon, hèhoholio, hètisiak obo atulo obojiai;
abaŋa monyohoi iko honyohoi, buo fe itabuara ataji hoi jio onyihari hoi ihuo onno obuarari ataji hoi ahuan hoi.”
Itarraŋ nyia anyarhaluti lia ojio, “Aniŋio nyia ni efahita hunia 'daŋ, anyio obo anna habeŋ ni ehan?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ojio, “Elle iwak iyye abisan, ilo itinyiaŋak erre hoi 'daŋ. Isiarak arobiyaa hua jio alociaŋak, ihuo nyia, iwon adi iyye iko esamiti idou. Attati teya, waŋ yo ijifatie nani.”
Ninyia itaniŋu atulo alia erre hunia, ette inyi ijiriŋa, nyio, asam nyia inyi bebe.
Attati Yesu jiaran jio lejifak honyi, “Ahode, eramak ni itai, ogol adi bebe jio aati asamak ijiŋaniere Ilobie ettedou.
Enyiak ni iramana itai jio, inyiak iliaha bebe jio akonnikonni ijiŋari te ettulit libira, agalik jio asamani ijiŋaniere Ilobie Hollum.”
Ninyia itaniŋuni lejifak erre hunia, illillihai nyia isi bebe, ette ifiyo jiojio, “Ŋai 'tadi ollo oremik 'to italahuno?”
Oyohojok nyia Yesu jihosi 'tok 'tok, ette jiaran, “Agalik eram ania aati, ati oremik Hollum ihanio erre 'daŋ.”
Attati Petro ikiana jihonyi jiojio, “Imijie! Ediehuno hohoi erre hohoi 'daŋ ijifatiere iyye. Erumak 'tadi hohoi anyio?”

Ojio nyia Yesu jihosi, “Ahode, eramak ni itai, alla attu Lonyi Tulo itoŋo ta akuatan iseger ilohittok jio amanya aŋejuk, itoŋoti adi buo fe itai ejifak hoŋ hula 'tomon harrihai isegeri ilohittohori jio awoi Israele huna 'tomon harrihai

Buo atulo elle idiehuno 'to ahaŋitek honyi, kuyya illarak, kuyya haniyarak, kuyya monyonyi, kuyya honyonyi, kuyya amatta honyi te eram hoŋ, inyiak adi inyi ifuotuna erre enyiahita esiha abotie. Isiori adi buo fe jihonyi esu 'tulaŋ.
Ati, aati arriai hulla arai 'to ihuania ecuŋita arai adi isi etterita, buo arriai hia, hulla arai 'to ihuania etterita, arai adi ecuŋita.
“Ara Olobie ettedou ihua ana; iwany nyia obo latulo ijuruniere omuk egiamak igiamari imana fino honyi.
Ninyia iruk inyi idumari isi ababo oloŋ abotie arobiya abotie, ette inyi ifahina isi igiamari imana fino honyi.
Ninyia ara saa hottoŋuan, inyiak inyi leten isuk, ette igonyuna omuk aati awajatie diya obeŋi igiamai.
Ania, ette inyi iramana isi jiojio, ‘Ifuatta buo fe itai igiamati itua mana fino hoŋ aduma adi ni itai onno oyyu.’
Ania ette isi ifuatan. Ninyia ara akil fanni iko asaa hunihoi otto otoriai, inyiak inyi ihan ihuo nyia.
Buo ninyia iliaha saa miyet otto kekai, inyiak inyi leten isuk ette igonyuna omuk aati hullo owajatie diya, ette jiaran jihosi, ‘Nyio ituhoto itai oloŋ obojiai ta awajatio obeŋ egiama?’
Buo isi ette itarraŋ ojio, ‘Obeŋ bu tulo hohoi ojuraru igiama.’ Attati inyi iramana isi jiojio, ‘Ifuatta buo fe itai igiamati imana fino hoŋ.’
Ninyia afuonni hinyia ojurunie ta saa miyet otto kekai, ette inyi iharana isi 'daŋ ababo arobiya abotie abotie.
Ninyia afuonni hunyia ojurunie tetteri, igigiloi nyia isi jiojio ofuoi adi iharana jihosi arobiyaa hunna agalihini huno hullomuk. Ati aharani nyia buo fe jihosi 'daŋ ababo arobiya abotie abotie.
Ninyia ahoruni isi, ette isi itterio eŋuŋunita jio lamonye mana,
ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Igemuni aati hoduo iloŋuno iyye ehalu, asaa abotie ijiai, buo hohoi edik anahan holoŋ afanni 'daŋ. Ati itarriamahi iyye arobiyaa hosi iko hunohoi!’
“Buo lamonye mana ette itarraŋ obo olosi ojio, ‘Itaniŋie, illa. Abeŋ ni enyob iyye. Ibeŋ duo soho iyye iruhok jihoŋ igiamari oloŋ abotie ta arobiya abotie?
Hibe edumit hoi, ilo haŋ. Awak ni isiarana jio latulo olo oduo eloŋu ni ehalu, ihuo enne esiaraniere ni jihoi.
Obeŋ soho obis jihoŋ ihaniere ihuo awak ni ta ariŋ ottonoŋ? Kuyya ihayin ti iyye emorot hoŋ?’ ”
To ninyia alari Yesu many Yerusalem, ojio ihiji ikoi, ette inyi iloŋuna lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai aŋati honyi, ette jiaran jihosi,
“Itayiriete, efuo ihuania Yerusalem, buo diya isiori adi Lonyi Tulo jio ehumak elettaha iko ettiyanak ifahita, buo isi ette iŋotonia aye jihonyi.
Isiori adi inyi jio Alufajak. Osuhotierek adi isi inyi, abahie adi isi inyi, ette isihonia inyi likruce. Ati ihalu oŋitek hunihoi itubuhuni adi inyi.”
Attati ŋoruoi Sebedeyo iko lonyirok honyi ifuanna jio Yesu, ette irigoŋi ihosiere honyi, ette imojo jihonyi obo ariŋ.
Attati Yesu jiaran jihonyi, “Iwak iyye anyio?”
Buo inyi ette itarraŋ ojio, “Ocorok jihoŋ jio ofuoi adi lonyirok hoŋ hula arrihai hulo itoŋo, abotie totto hani iŋet hoi, buo abotie totto ihorroŋ, elle ittu iyye irahan ahobu.”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu ojio, “Itimoti itai anyio enne ifiyete itai. Iremehina adi itai idihuna ematit ono ettigemio anna alo ni irumana?”

Itarraŋi nyia isi jio, “Eremik hohoi.” Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “Hode, iremehina adi itai idihuna ettigemita hunna alo ni irumana. Ati abeŋ ni aremik inyimuna ŋai adi olo itoŋo totto hani iŋet kuyya totto ihorroŋ hoŋ. Nyio, arai amasik hunia ahuno hia hinyia ihuhumak Monyoŋ jihosi.”
Ninyia itaniŋuni lejifak honyi hula 'tomon eram ana, ette isi iloŋojita jio ellarak hula arrihai hulia.
Ania, ette Yesu iloŋuna isi 'daŋ arabotie, ette jiaran, “Imijana itai jio ilohittohi oobuok hulo Alufajak jio aati hosi, buo fe elettaha ihumi ilohittok jio aati hosi.
Ati obeŋ adi inyi ara ihuo nyia jihatai. Alla awak obo alatai igalihina hullomuk, ijiara inyi luŋa ara ahegiamani jio hullomuk.
Buo alla awak obo alatai igalihina hullomuk, ijiara inyi hétera apit hatai;
ihuo Lonyi Tulo, linyia obeŋ 'to ottu jio oŋida aati igiamai jihonyi, ati igiamari buo fe isiaraniere esu honyi italahuniere aati arriai jio eyyata.”
Ninyia itterie bo Yesu iko lejifak honyi afuatan addi to Yeriko, ette eluluŋ enne ittok ijifaru isi.
Owoni nyia omuk laŋodok arrihai hinyia itoŋoi iger hikoi. Ninyia itaniŋuni isi jio Yesu ollo ottu tolia, ette isi iwuwoŋita jiojio, “Lettok, lonyi Dafide, omehinie jihohoi!”
Iŋerejanio nyia eluluŋ waati jihosi, ette iramana isi hotoduahinie. Ati ihumi nyiati buo isi ifudana ewuwoŋita bebe jiojio, “Lettok, Lonyi Dafide, omehinie jihohoi!”
Ania, ette Yesu iwotia, ette iloŋuna isi, ette jiaran, “Iwahata itai ani ehan anyio jihatai?”
