Itarraŋi nyia isi jiojio, “Lettok ijiara oŋite hohoi omijie!”
Attati Yesu imehino jihosi, ette ittir oŋite hosi. Teya teya, ette isi imijio, ette ijifaru inyi.
Ninyia iliahai bo Yesu iko lejifak honyi Yerusalem, afanyi nyia isi Besfeji etteger doŋe Olifet. Teya, ette Yesu ifahina lejifak honyi arrihai to osiere,
buo iramak isi jio, “Ifuatta jio amiji otto hosiere hatai nyia. Inyurana adi itai obo asigiria anna atara iko ŋarri. Ohouniete isi, iyaŋuniete jihoŋ.
Elle ikiana obo atulo obo ariŋ jihatai, iramana inyi jio, ‘Awak Lamonye isi.’ Teya teya, isiarak adi inyi isi jihatai.”
Iduoŋi nyia erre hunia ihuo nyia itasiruniere ekiana ono ekianani Hollum onno ojio 'to jio:
“Iramana aati bore gala
imijiete hobu hatai ollo ottu jihatai!
Ofiaha inyi buo fe adaha ta asigiria
iko ta aŋarri sigiria.”
Attati lejifak ifuatan ihanio ihuo iramak duo Yesu jihosi;
ette isi iyaŋuno asigiria ania iko ŋarri, ette ifiatana aboŋojin hosi ihoruoŋite hosi, buo Yesu ette idahina diya.
Ofiatani nyia eluluŋ waati arriai aboŋojin hosi ihiji ikoi, buo omuk oguanyuni abene 'yani ette ifiatana ihiji ikoi.
Attati eluluŋ waati otto hosiere iko ette ehalu Yesu iwuwoŋita jiojio, “Hétahabuyete Lonyi Dafide! Hotomunoi lia ollo ottu 'to ta afure ono Lamonye. Hétahabuyete Hollum!”
Ninyia ajiŋak Yesu Yerusalem, ette abore gala ania 'daŋ ihosohita woo, ette isi ifiyo jiojio, “Ŋai alia?”
Itarraŋ nyia eluluŋ waati ninyia adaha 'to iko Yesu jiojio, “Yesu alia, ekianani Hollum, olo Nasaret, otto Galilea.”
Ojiŋak nyia Yesu Ihaji emojit enne ittokon, ette ifuhara aati etinyiaŋak iko enyiaŋak hinyia owoni 'to diya; ette itidelliara atteremejahien huno etattobok robiyaa, iko asegeri huno etinyiaŋak amami.
Ette inyi jiaran jio, “Igioroni nyia Ibuk Hollum jio, ojio Hollum jio, ‘Iloŋoi adi aaji hoŋ, aaji emojit,’ ati iloitoto itai inyi ahinom hahalak!”
Ofuonni nyia aŋodok iko aŋurak jihonyi Ihaji emojit enne ittokon, buo inyi ette itaŋida isi.

Iloŋojitai nyia ehumak elettaha iko ettiyanak ifahita ninyia igonyuni isi erre hunno obolori 'to hunyia ihanio inyi, iko ewuwoŋita duri itua Haji emojit enne ittokon jiojio, “Hétahabuyete Lonyi Dafide!”
Ania, ette isi ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Itaniŋu iyye erre hunne ikianai isi?”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ isi ojio, “Aafe! Hèbiaŋata itai ihenuna eram otto buk Hollum onno ojio 'to jio, ‘Ittiyanak iyye aduri iko edolio itahabuyere onno oŋida bebe?’ ”
Attati inyi ibusaru isi, ette leten ibore gala Betani ette iferihina diya.
Oniama nyia Yesu ninyia acahuno inyi nyia motie berien Yerusalem.

Attati inyi igonyuna obo ayyani ŋaboli iger hikoi, ette leten diya. Ati obeŋ nyia inyi onyurak omuk aŋabolo arari abene ijiai. Ania, ette inyi jiaran jio ayyani ania, “'Tuŋ, ibeŋ adi iyye inyiak iŋijana omuk aŋabolo!” Teya teya, ette ayyani ŋaboli nyia iyohojoro.
Ninyia igonyuni lejifak honyi eram ania, ette isi 'daŋ illilliha, ette ifiyo jiojio, “Aŋai oyohojo aŋaboli ania kokuak?”
Alla awon eruk jihatai, ifuotuna adi itai erre 'daŋ hunne ifiyete itai ta amojo.”

Ninyia acohuno Yesu Ihaji emojit enne ittokon, ette ehumak elettaha iko lahou ifuanna jihonyi buo inyi nyia ittiyenio, ette ifiyo inyi jio, “Ŋai isiarak jihoi elohittok ihaniere erre hunia? Anaŋai elohittok enne ihaniere iyye erre hunia?”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ isi ojio, “Awak ni isio jihatai efi abotie ijiai. Elle itarraŋata itai ani, eramak adi buo fe ni itai anaŋai elohittok enne ehaniere ni erre hunia.
Ottu nyia elohittok ono Yoane tai, itifuociere Batisimo? Jio Hollum kuyya jio aati?”
Attati isi itagolo ta ahuattek hosi jiojio, “Ejio adi aŋai? Elle etarraŋ jio, ‘Jio Hollum,’ ojio adi inyi, ‘Nyio nyiati ibiaŋata itai iruhoto jio Yoane?’
Buo elle ejio, ‘Jio aati,’ ebaŋ eluluŋ waati, nyio, iruhi nyia isi 'daŋ jio ara Yoane ahekianani Hollum.”
Ania, ette isi itarraŋ Yesu jiojio, “Ebeŋ hohoi emijak.”
Buo inyi ette jiaran jihosi, “Abeŋ adi buo fe ni eramak itai ta anani elohittok enne ehaniere ni erre hunia.
“Igigiloti itai aŋai? Owon nyia obo atulo iko laduri honyi arrihai. To obo oloŋ, ette inyi jiaran jio ahouti, ‘Ilo igiamai imana fino ahana.’
Buo leto alia ette itarraŋ jiojio, ‘Eha ni.’ Ati ihalu ette inyi iloit ataji honyi, ette leten.
Attati monye leten jiaran ihuo nyia jio obotie hito. Buo lia ette itarraŋ jio, ‘Oyyu, alo adi ni baba!’ Ati obeŋ nyia inyi olo.
Alali tehiji hosi arrihai ihan ihuo awak monyosi?”
Buo isi ette itarraŋ ojio, “Lahouti.”
Ania, ette Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Ahode, eramak ni itai; ikiomoroi eddudduhak musuru iko asomok Ilobie Hollum ahosiere hatai.

Nyio, attu nyia Yoane Etifuotoni Batisimo jihatai 'daŋ elle itahucio jihatai ekoi onno obis 'to, ihara nyia itai inyi. Ati iruhi nyia eddudduhak musuru iko asomok inyi. Duadi bu ihalu ninyia igonyuna itai eram ania, ibiaŋata nyia itai iloitoto atajia hatai iruhori inyi.”
Ninyia iliaha ayafa onno odiarik aaŋer fino, ifak nyia inyi apiti honyi jio ajurak hia oŋida obuanyani inyi hunonyi.
Buo ajurak hia ette inefuna apiti hia, ette ibak abotie, buo ottohori abotie, buo fe iruoŋi ollobo ta amoruoi.
Inyiak nyia atulo lia ifahina omuk apiti arriai, agalihini hoduo tetteri; buo ajurak hia fe ette ihanio jihosi ihuo nyia.
Ihalu hosi 'daŋ, ette inyi ifahina lonyi honyi, ette jiaran, ‘Abaŋi adi isi lonyi hoŋ.’
Ninyia igonyuni ajurak hia inyi, ette isi jiaran, ta ahuattek hosi jio, ‘Arutani honyi tibuo olo, ifuanna hattohoro inyi oŋida erutaa honyi arai ahunohoi!’
Ania, ette isi inefuna inyi, ette ipuasara addi totua mana fino, etteittohoro.”
Attati Yesu ifiyo jiojio, “Ihuania, alla attu lamonye mana, ihan adi inyi anyio jio ajurak hulia?”
Itarraŋi nyia isi jiojio, “Ottoho adi inyi luŋa aati hullo orrohoji 'to hulia, ette isiarana amana ania jio omuk ajurak hama, hullo obuanyani adi jihonyi aaŋer fino alla alum ayafa onno odiarik isi.”
‘Amoruo ninyia ihari aduhok
jiojio ara ariŋ asai,
inyiak tibuo inyi
igalihina 'daŋ ta ayiji.
Lamonye nyia ihan ihuania;
Ilaman tibuo inyi bebe to hosiere waati!’
“Tania, eramak ni itai jio, ohoruni adi Olobie Hollum jihatai, ette isiarana jio aati hullo oniŋie 'to efahita Hollum. [
Alla akuahino obo atulo jio amoruo ania, owurok adi inyi ahuan honyi tuny tuny. Buo alla akuahino amoruo ania jio obo atulo, oroyok adi inyi atulo lia arari attuduha.”]
Ninyia itaniŋuni ehumak elettaha iko
Tania, awahi nyia isi inefuna inyi, ati abaŋi nyia isi eluluŋi waati, hunyia iruhi 'to jio ara Yesu ahekianani Hollum.
Inyiak nyia Yesu ikiana jihosi te etarriamata.
“Ara Olobie ettedou ihua ana: Owon nyia obo oobu linyia ihuhumak 'to agari ta ayama lonyi honyi.
Ifak nyia inyi egiamak honyi oŋida iramani aati hunyia iloŋuni igari. Ati ihari nyia aati hia afuanna.
Inyiak fe inyi ifahina omuk egiamak héfuahi iramana eloŋot jio, ‘Imijiete, aŋida agari hoŋ, isiahi attamoti iko atawwa hoŋ hunyia itafiri, aŋidari erre 'daŋ. Ifuanna yo igari ono ayama.’
Ati obeŋi nyia eloŋot hia itaniŋie hirre, arai ifuatan ekotia hosi gele gele. Olo obo mana honyi, buo obo olo idukan honyi,
buo hullomuk ette inefuna egiamak hulia, ette ibahio, ette ittohoro.
Ania, ette hobu isuaharu iko ajore, ette ifahina oseŋer honyi héfuahi ittohoro aati hia, osuahini iko abore gala hosi.
Attati hobu iloŋuna apiti honyi, ette jiaran jihosi, ‘Ehuhumak ni agari hoŋ, ati orrohoji aati hunyia eloŋu ni.
Ihuania ifuatta ilofirihi, iloŋoto aati 'daŋ hulle iremehina itai irumana, ijiara ofuonni igari.’
Ania, ofuoi nyia egiamak ilofirihi, ette ittuttubuno aati hunyia orumani isi, ayijok iko arrohojak 'daŋ many ifutari atua haji eyemit 'daŋ atamonok.
“Ninyia ajiŋak hobu iheriere atamonok, igonyu inyi obo atulo ollo obeŋ iyyafatio eŋotiti huno ayama;
ette inyi ifiyo inyi jiojio, ‘Illa, aŋai ijiŋu iyye dini buo ibeŋ iyyafak eŋotiti huno ayama?’ Ati oduahino nyia latulo lia 'liŋ 'liŋ.
Attati hobu iramana egiamak jio, ‘Ifitata ahas honyi iko eejek 'daŋ. Opuasara inyi idumele; amaji anna alari inyi iyyoori buo fe oŋuruta aala honyi ta adiaha.’”
Attati Yesu itisidonia jio, “Nyio, oluaji aati hulle iloŋi, ati omutari hullo onyimuni.”
Ofuoi nyia

Teya, ette isi ifahina omuk lejifak hosi arabotie iko lejifak Erode jio Yesu, hinyia ojiori jihonyi jio, “Hettiyanani, emijak hohoi jio ikiana iyye erre ahode hode. Ittiyenio iyye elahode ono awahan Hollum. Ibeŋ iyye ibaŋ obo atulo buo fe ibeŋ igigia aati.
Ike iramak hohoi, igigilo iyye aŋai? Aŋatani soho efahita hohoi idumari amusuru jio Hobu Roma elle ittokon kuyya obeŋ?”
Ati omijak nyia Yesu egigilita hosi hunno orrohoji 'to hunia, ania, ette inyi jiaran jihosi, “Itai etihanak huattek hullo! Nyio iwahata itai italohuna ani?
Iko etahutana ani arobiya onno odumarik amusuru.”
Attati isi itahutana jihonyi arobiya.
Buo inyi ette ifiyo isi jiojio, “Anaŋai arrijiori ana iko afure enne igioroni ana ihide honyi?”
Itarraŋi nyia isi jiojio, “Huno Hobu elle ittokon olo Roma.”
Ania, ette Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Ihuania, Isiatta Hobu elle ittokon erre Hobu elle ittokon, buo jio Hollum, erre Hollum.”
Ninyia itaniŋuni isi ekenita hunia, illillihai nyia isi bebe, ette ibusana inyi, ette ifuatan addi.
Ifiye nyia isi Yesu jio, “Hettiyanani, ojiori nyia efahita Mose jio, alla aye atulo obeŋ isiu hito, ijiara illanyi ojuŋori ŋoruoi honyi isiuniere aduri a hulo ayaani lia.
Ihuania, owoni nyia omuk ellarak hattarik ihiji hohoi. Oyemu nyia ahouti aŋotte, ette iye obeŋ hito, buo illanyi ette ijuŋori ŋoruoi honyi.
Ara nyia buo fe inyi ihuo nyia jio etarrihi, etahunihi many jio etahattarihi.
Ihalu hosi 'daŋ, aye buo fe aŋotte nyia.
Ihuania, iholoŋ enne ibuhunierek ayaak, ara adi inyi ŋoruoi ŋai? Nyio, awattarik nyia isi 'daŋ inyi.”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi jio, “Ipalata itai! Nyio, ibiaŋata itai imijana abuk Hollum kuyya bu eduariti Hollum.
Nyio, elle ebuhuni ayaak, obeŋi adi isi inyiahi iyama. Arai isi ihuo ajilohien huttedou.
Ati te eram ono ebuhuna ono ayaak, hèbiaŋata itai ihenuna erre hunyia ikiana Hollum jihatai?
Ojio nyia jio, ‘Ani Hollum olo Abramo, Hollum olo Isako, buo fe Hollum olo Yakobo.’ Obiaŋara inyi Hollum olo ayaak, ati olo esuok.”
Ninyia itaniŋu eluluŋ waati erre hunia, ette isi illilliha te ettiyenio honyi.
Ninyia itaniŋuni
Attati obo olosi, alla ara ahettiyanani ifahita, iwahan italohuna inyi te efiyo.
Ifiyo nyia inyi Yesu jiojio, “Hettiyanani, anani efahi anna agalik 'to jio Efahita 'daŋ?”
Efahi ania anna agalik 'to 'daŋ, buo fe ara etteri.
Ara buo fe etarrihi ihuo inyi, ‘Itabuara ataji hoi jio onyihari hoi ihuo onno obuarari inyi ahuan hoi.’
Ofuonni efahita Mose iko ettiyenita huno ekianak Hollum 'daŋ jio efahita huna arrihai hunia.”
Ninyia attubanie omuk hulo
“Igigiloti itai aŋai te eram ono
Itarraŋi nyia isi jio, “To woyo Dafide.”
Attati Yesu ifiyo isi, “Nyio nyiati iramak Oloholio Dafide oŋida iloŋo inyi Lamonye? Ania, ojiari Dafide jio,
‘Ojio Lamonye jio Lamonye hoŋ:
Itoŋoi tene totto ŋati iŋet hoŋ
many ehananiere ni amiorok hoi
ariŋ enne irriehiniere iyye eejek hoi.’
Elle iloŋo ati Dafide inyi ‘Lamonye,’ aŋai ati inyiak
Obeŋ nyia obo oremik itarraŋ Yesu. Ania, many to oloŋ tonyia, obeŋ nyia tulo inyiak irinyana ifiyere inyi.
Attati Yesu ikiana jio eluluŋ waati iko jio lejifak honyi jio,
“Orutani ettiyanak ifahita iko
Tania, ihaniete luŋa erre 'daŋ hunne ittittoye isi jihatai. Ati, hèjifatiete ehanita hosi, nyio, ittittoye isi erre hunno obeŋi isi ihanie.
Itakafie isi aati erre hunno oddiŋi te ewwahatio, buo obeŋi iyahi iluak isi ikafari erre hunia, ara duadi bu ta afialai ijiai.
Ihanie isi egemita hosi 'daŋ jio oŋida aati igonyuni. Asalani isi afokio hunne igioronierek ekenita hutto buk Hollum hunne iyyafatie isi ihomomite iko ihas hosi.
Omunoi isi asegeri lettaha hutto masik gari iko hutto tua hasik emojiti.
Omunoi isi elle ifuanyai aati isi ta abaŋi itua suk buo fe iloŋoi isi ‘Hettiyanani.’
Ati hèlaha luŋa iloŋoi itai ‘Hettiyanani,’ nyio, irata itai 'daŋ ellarak buo fe iwanata iko ettiyanani abotie ijiai.
Hèlaha itai iloŋoti obo atulo jio afau ana jiojio, ‘Monye,’ nyio, iwanata itai iko Monye ettedou abotie ijiai.
Hèlaha buo fe iloŋoi itai jio ‘Lamonye’ nyio, iwanata itai iko Lamonye abotie, inyi
Ijiara lia, alla agalik 'to 'daŋ tehiji hatai hétera luŋa ahegiamani hatai.
Lia, alla akaf 'to ahuan honyi ahide, itafiahaji adi; buo lia, elle itafiaha 'to ahuan honyi, akafi adi ahide.”
“Orroho adi jihatai bebe ettiyanak ifahita iko
Orroho adi jihatai bebe ettiyanak ifahita iko
“Orroho adi jihatai bebe ettiyanak ifahita iko

“Orroho adi bebe jihatai aŋodok arihok ŋodok hulo! Nyio, ijiatta itai jio, ‘Elle ittuŋo atulo ta Aaji emojit enne ittokon, obeŋ ettuŋo honyi ara ahode. Ati elle ittuŋo inyi ta ayyel onno owon 'to itua Haji emojit enne ittokon, ara ettuŋo honyi ahode.’
Itai aŋodok hullo obeŋi hossi hulo! Anani anna agalik 'to ta ayiji, ayyel kuyya Aaji Emojit enne ittokon, enne italibo 'to ayyel ahono Hollum?
Ijiatta tai buo fe jio, ‘Elle ittuŋo atulo te etitiek ehumi, obeŋ ettuŋo honyi ara ahode. Ati elle ittuŋo inyi te esiorita hutto hide ititiek ehumi, ara ettuŋo honyi ahode.’
Itai aŋodok hulo! Anani anna agalik 'to ta ayiji, esiorita kuyya etitiek ehumi, enne italibo 'to esiorita ahuno Hollum.
Lia, elle ittuŋo 'to te etitiek, ittuŋo inyi te etitiek ehumi iko te esiorita 'daŋ hunno owoni 'to ihide ititiek.
Buo fe lia, elle ittuŋo 'to ta Aaji emojit enne ittokon, ittuŋo inyi buo fe tenyi iko to Hollum alla amanya 'to diya.
Buo fe lia, elle ittuŋo 'to tedou, ittuŋo inyi ta aseger ilohittok ono Hollum, buo fe tenyi elle itoŋo 'to diya.
Itai arihok aŋodok hulo! Iwajara itai ajaŋati addi jio asaŋ hunne imatati itai, buo idiloro akonnikonni.
“Orroho adi bebe jihatai ettiyanak ifahita iko
Iyye a Fariseitanani oloŋodo olo! Illilla do atua miolo iko ono oloŋet, buo oruoŋite hosi adi ette buo fe libori.
Orroho adi bebe jihatai ettiyanak ifahita iko
Ihuo nyia buo fe irata itai to hosiere waati ihuo ayijok, buo atuajin hatai ifuti iko eyyata.
“Orroho adi bebe jihatai ettiyanak ifahita iko
Buo fe ijiatta jio, elle emanya nyia hohoi to oŋitek huno hohonyiok hohoi, ebeŋ nyia hohoi eremik ittohoro ekianak Hollum hunyia ottohori isi.
Ati itahutana itai, ta ahuattek hatai, jio irata itai lonyirok hulo attok hekianak Hollum.
Tania, otuhonia yo erre hunyia itteri hohonyiok hatai ehanio.
Itai amunuok hulo, lonyirok munuok! Aŋai adi irisata itai afuatan iferno?

Tania, efak adi ni jihatai ekianak Hollum iko alofiorojok buo ettiyanak ifahita. Ittohoro adi itai omuk hulosi, isihonia omuk ikrucehien, ibahiete omuk ihasik Imojiti, buo fe itarraciete hullomuk iborejin gala 'daŋ.
Tania, irumana adi itai ettigemio te eram ono attohoro ono aati abisak hulo. Itterio ta attohoro ono Abele many jio ono Sakariya lonyi Berekiya linyia abahini ihiji ono etitiek ehumi iko Amaji Elibo.
Eramak ni itai ahode jio, ottu adi ettigemio jio aati hulo ahana te eram ono attohoro hosi.

“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Ittohio iyye ekianak Hollum, buo fe irruoŋ ta amoruo leyak sayyo hunyia ifahu Hollum jihoi! Enyiahita omukajia hunyia awahari ni imosouniere aati hoi 'daŋ ta ahas hoŋ, ihuo enne imosouniere ahohoro ekiyehi honyi itua hiwwa, ati ibeŋ iyye ani iŋatak!
Tania, idehini buo fe oyur adi Aaji hoi emojit enne ittokon.
Eramak ni iyye, ibeŋ adi iyye inyiak igonyuna ani, many ijiari iyye jio ‘Hotomunoi lia ollo ottu 'to ta afure ono Lamonye.’ ”
Ninyia ajio Yesu alo addi to Haji Emojit enne ittokon, ofuonni nyia lejifak honyi jihonyi, ette ihutana jihonyi asik huno Aaji emojit enne ittokon.
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Igonyuna itai erre hunia 'daŋ? Obeŋ adi obo amoruo dinia arasa idellia ihide obo. Ikukuri adi isi 'daŋ.”

To ninyia itoŋori Yesu idoŋe Olifet, ofuonni nyia lejifak isi hama jihonyi, ette ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Iramak hohoi, iduoŋi adi erre hunia baya? Anyio itamijani adi enne itahutak 'to attuna hoi iko alumon ono esidi fau?”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ isi ojio, “Ihumata mijio, hèlaha obo atulo itisiaba itai!
Nyio, ofuonni adi aati hulle ikianai ihuo alla arai isi ani. Ojiori adi ‘Ani
Ifuatta adi itaniŋuna jio owon afere aŋati, buo fe asayyo huno afere anna alama 'to. Ati hèbaŋata, nyio, iduoŋi adi erre hunia luŋa, ati obeŋi isi itahutani jio alum esidi fau.
Orriomonie adi afau iko afau, buo fe obuore iko obuore. Iboŋ adi ahure iko olokitihi amasik 'daŋ.
Arai erre hunia 'daŋ ihuo etteri honya hohe ŋotte onno ojio 'to esio.
Jio oŋitek hua, ihari adi aati arriai nani. Itisiahai adi isi ahuattek hosi, buo fe iyalari ahuattek hosi.
Ofuonni adi ekianak enyabak arriai, hullo ojiori 'to ekiana isi eram Hollum, ette itisiabara aati arriai.
Ihuania, isarrahi adi arrohoji jio aati arriai, many omumutararu abuaran tajia waati arriai.
Ati italuahuni adi lia ollo odihu 'to many isidi.
Ittittoye adi Asayyo Ayijok huna huno Olobie jio afau 'daŋ, oŋida arai etamijanita jio aati 'daŋ; attati esidi fau adi ittuna.
“Tania, ijiara hullo owoni 'to Yudea, Hotofuhohi itua doŋiok.
Ijiara lia, ollo owon 'to ihide haji, hotobiaŋa ollu ifau iduhuniere asaŋ ta haji honyi.
Buo fe lia, ollo owon 'to imana, hotobiaŋa acaharu iyaŋuniere aboŋo honyi.
Orroho adi bebe to oŋitek hua jio aŋoruo ayedurok iko etadasak!
Omojoti jio Hollum oŋida afuhotio hatai obeŋ iduoŋ ta ayafajin hacoro kuyya to oloŋ Sabatto!
Tania, obolo adi ettigemio ono oloŋ ania agalik ettigemita 'daŋ hunyia iduoŋi 'to tetteri fau many iko ahana. Obeŋ adi obo ariŋ inyiak irahan ihuania.
Ati alla abeŋ nyia Hollum oŋuto omuk oŋitek addi, obeŋ duo tulo ofituno. Ati te eram ono Olonyimot honyi, oŋutori adi omuk oŋitek addi.
“Tania, alla ajio obo atulo jihatai, ‘Imijiete
Ofuonni adi olonyimot enyabak iko ekianak enyabak, hullo ojiori 'to jio ekiana isi eram Hollum. Ihanie adi isi eduariti hunno obolori 'to iko ellillihita, inyobiere ara duadi bu olonyimot Hollum.
Itayiriete! Nyio, eramak nyia ni itai hobeŋi erre hunia iduoŋi.
Nyio, ottu adi Lonyi Tulo ihuo ahilai enne itafaŋ 'to edou 'daŋ teduoŋi holoŋ many iddorroi holoŋ.
Tania, oleyo adi etamijani Lonyi Tulo tedou; buo aati hutta fau 'daŋ ette ituruho elle igonyuni adi isi Lonyi Tulo ottu tedohuo ta aduaran iko ta akuatan onno obolo.
Ohuti adi afuruju enne ittokon, buo inyi ette ifahina ajilohien honyi jio aguli aŋuan huno afau, ittuttubuniere olonyimot honyi te isidi fau obotie many jio onnobo.
“Ittiyenuna jio ayyani ŋaboli. Alla ayisuni abene to tanata honyi, omijana jio iliaha atahas.
Ihuo nyia buo fe, elle igonyuna itai erre huna 'daŋ iduoŋi, omijana jio iliaha inyi, attuba jihonyi ittuniere.
Hode, eramak ni itai jio, iduoŋi adi erre hunia 'daŋ hobeŋi aati hulo ahana otuhoroi.
Olitohini adi edou iko afau muluyaŋ, ati obeŋi adi ekenita hoŋ olitohini.
“Ati obeŋ tulo omijak iduoŋ adi oloŋ nyia iko asaa nyia baya, ara duadi bu ajilohien huttedou iko Lonyi, arari fe Monye hama.
Ihuo ninyia arari inyi to oŋitek huno Noa, ara adi buo fe attuna ono Lonyi Tulo ihuo nyia.
Jio oŋitek hua, ninyia hobeŋ aari ibul, oŋiye nyia aati buo fe amatai. Ayamanie nyia buo fe aliawa iko aŋoruo, many jio oloŋ ninyia ojiŋaniere Noa itogol.
Ati obeŋi nyia isi omijani obo ariŋ many ibuliere aari, ette iwororo isi 'daŋ addi. Ara adi buo fe attuna ono Lonyi Tulo ihuo nyia.
Jio oloŋ nyia, igiamai adi aliawa arrihai imana. Iyarai adi abotie addi, buo idiaharai abotie.
Irieye adi aŋoruo arrihai arabotie; iyarai adi abotie addi, buo idiaharai abotie.
Ihumata ti mijio, nyio, ibiaŋata itai imijana ottu adi Lamonye hatai jio anani holoŋ.
Ati omijana jio, haraduo onno omijak lamonye haji asaa onno ottuniere olohoho, ihum duo inyi irriria, ette ibiaŋan idehi olohoho owur aaji honyi ta arue.
Ihumata buo fe irra, nyio, ottu adi Lonyi Tulo ta asaa enne itimoti itai.
“Ŋai ti alla ara 'to ahegiamani oloyijio buo fe ilofioro? Inyi alia, elle ihanak adi lamonye elettok olo egiamak hullomuk, isioriere jihosi aŋiyo alla attuba asaa ŋiyo.
Hotomunoi egiamani lia, alla attu elettok honyi inyurana inyi ihanio egiama ania.
Hode, eramak ni itai jio, ihanak adi inyi egiamani alia, elettok ollo oŋuahatio 'to erre honyi 'daŋ.
Ati alla ajio egiamani olorroho 'to alia jio ahuan honyi jio, ‘Illiŋia elettok hoŋ,’
ette itterio ebibahio egiamak hullomuk ihuo inyi, ette ŋiyo buo fe ette imata many orumari.
Attati elettok egiamani alia icohuno nyia obo oloŋ ta asaa onno otimo egiamani alia buo fe obeŋ igigilo ta attuna honyi,
ette ittigemio egiamani alia, ette ifuhara inyi jio etihanak huattek. Diya, oluaha adi inyi buo fe oŋuruta aala honyi ta adiaha.”
Ihiji hosi, ibuyaŋai nyia miyet, buo huna miyet ilofioroji.
Ania, ette hunne ibuyaŋai 'to iyaru allomohien hosi buo obeŋi asararai iko obo ajas ta ajirikisi.
Buo hunne ilofioroji 'to iyarai allomohien hosi buo asararai iko ajirikisi jas.
Illiŋia nyia ayamani ittuniere, ania ette oduo hunia ijeŋita, ette ijotoro.
Ninyia ara attiŋ harue, afany nyia eram woŋ woŋ jio, ‘Ojiŋuna, ifuanna arraŋuna inyi!’
Ohenyuni nyia oduo hunia 'daŋ, ette ihuhumio allomohien hosi.
Attati oduo hunne ibuyaŋai 'to imojo jio hunne ilofioroji 'to, ‘Eluahina hohoi obo ajas hatai, afuoi allomohien hohoi dunyari.’
Buo alofiorojok ette itarraŋ isi jio, ‘Jai! Obeŋ inyi oremik jihohoi ikatai. Ifuatta inyiaŋuna obo jihatai to tobolia.’
Ninyia hofuoi isi ihuania inyiaŋuniere ajas, ette ayamani fanyan. Attati hunyia arrai 'to jiŋara iko ayamani ihaji anna awanari agari ono ayama, buo ette ihianana ekat.
Ati itarraŋ nyia inyi isi jio, ‘Hode, eramak ni jihatai jio atimo ni itai.’ ”
Attati Yesu itisidonia ekiana honyi jio, “Ihumata mijio nyio, ibiaŋata itai imijana anani holoŋ kuyya anani saa adi onno ottuniere inyi.”
“Jio oŋitek hua, ara adi Olobie ettedou ihuo ana. Owon nyia obo atulo linyia awak 'to leten obo amaji. Iloŋu nyia inyi egiamak honyi, ette isiarana erre honyi 'daŋ ihas hosi.
Isiarak nyia inyi agurusi jihosi 'daŋ ababo ihuo oremehini isi ittoŋotio. Jio obo, arobiyaa alif miyet (5,000), buo jio obo alif arrihai (2,000), buo fe jio obo alif abotie (1,000).
Teya teya, ette egiamani linyia ifuotu 'to alif miyet leten ipocori agurusi hunia, ette ipocouna alif miyet ihide hosi.
Buo fe linyia ifuotu 'to alif arrihai opocou alif arrihai ihide hosi.
Buo linyia ifuotu 'to alif abotie, ette ibok ewure, ette idimana agurusi lettok honyi diya.
“Ihalu ayafajin arriai, ette elettok egiamak hulia icohuno imijaniere owoni arobiyaa honyi baya jihosi.
Attati egiamani linyia ifuotu 'to alif miyet ittuna, ette isiarana alif miyet hunnomuk, ette jiaran, ‘Lettok, isio nyia iyye ani alif miyet. Ihuania, apocou ni alif miyet ihide hosi.’

Buo inyi ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Oyyu bebe! Iyye egiamani elle iyyu 'to. Ittoŋotio iyye agurusi hunno omutari 'to onno oyyu. Tania, ehanak ni iyye ahattoŋoni olo agurusi arriai. Waŋ hamunoi arabotie ikoŋ.’
Ette buo fe egiamani linyia ifuotu 'to arobiyaa alif arrihai ittuna, ette jiaran, ‘Lettok, isio nyia iyye ani arobiyaa alif arrihai. Ihuania, apocou ni omuk alif arrihai ihide hosi.’

Buo inyi ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Oyyu bebe! Iyye egiamani elle iyyu 'to. Imijak iyye attoŋotio arobiyaa hunno omutari 'to onno oyyu. Tania, ehanak adi ni iyye ahattoŋoni olo agurusi arriai. Waŋ hamunoi arabotie ikoŋ.’

Attati egiamani linyia ifuotu 'to arobiyaa alif abotie ittuna, ette jiaran, ‘Lettok, amijak ni ira iyye atulo olorroho. Idioŋo iyye amat hunne ibeŋ iyye iyehi, buo fe ihuna jio hunne ibeŋ iyye igilli.
Abaŋ nyia ni, ania, edimaniere ni arobiyaa hoi itua iwure. Hibe arobiyaa hoi huna.’
Ati itarraŋ nyia elettok honyi jiojio, ‘Iyye egiamani olorroho buo fe ira oloboyo. Imijak iyye luŋa jio, adioŋo ni amat hunna abeŋ ni ayehi buo fe ahuna hunna abeŋ ni egilli.
Nyio nyiati ibeŋ iyye ittunak arobiyaa hoŋ hunia itua beŋk? Ŋaduo ni ihuania efuotu isi iko efoniti hosi oduo acohuno ni.
Ihuania, iduhuna addi arobiyaa hunia jihonyi. Isiatta jio lia, ollo owon 'to iko arobiyaa alif 'tomon.
Nyio, lia, ollo owon iko obo ariŋ, ofonihini adi jihonyi, buo adi inyi ette iwanan iko asaŋ arriai. Ati jio ollo obeŋ riŋ jihonyi, iduhari adi addi ara duadi bu ariŋ ollo odiha ollo owon 'to jihonyi.
Buo egiamani olorroho olo, opuasara inyi allet idumele. Ijiara inyi olo iluaha diya buo fe oŋuruta aala honyi ta adiaha.’
Ottubanie adi aati hutta fauhien 'daŋ ihosiere honyi. Attati inyi ibuany aati eluluŋi arrihai ihuo enne igigeliere eyyahani akioro jio eedie.
Ittaŋak adi inyi aati abisak oŋiatai, buo hullomuk arraŋai.
Attati Hobu ijiaran jio aati hutto oŋiatai honyi, ‘Ifuanna, itai hullo omuno Monyoŋ! Ifuanna harutana Olobie ninyia ihuhumani ahanatai many tetteri fau.
Aniama nyia ni, buo itai ittata isio ani aŋiria. Eboto nyia ni, buo itai ittata iwohina ani aari. Ara nyia ni atamononi, ati ifuotuna nyia itai nani.
Obeŋ nyia boŋo jihoŋ, buo itai ittata isiarana aboŋo jihoŋ iyyafatiere. Aŋuai nyia ni, buo itai ittata mijio ani onno oyyu. Efita nyia ni ibabus, buo itai ittata ifuanna mijaru ani.’
“Attati abisak adi itarraŋ inyi jio, ‘Lamonye, nyia baya egonyu hohoi iyye iniama, buo hohoi ette iŋojaŋa iyye aŋiria, kuyya nyia baya iboto iyye, buo hohoi ette iwohina iyye aari?
Nyia baya buo fe egonyu hohoi iyye atamononi, buo hohoi ette ifuotuna iyye ihaŋitek hohoi. Kuyya nyia baya obeŋ aboŋo jihoi, buo hohoi ette isiarana iyye obo iyyafatiere?
Nyia baya buo fe egonyu hohoi iyye iŋuai kuyya ifita ibabus, buo hohoi ette ifuatan imijuno iyye?’
Buo Hobu ette adi itarraŋ jio, ‘Hode, eramak ni itai jio, elle ihanata nyia itai ihuania jio illarak hoŋ hulo, ara duadi bu ollo ofiaha 'to tehiji hosi, ara inyi ihuo elle ihanata nyia itai jihoŋ!’
“Attati inyi adi jiaran jio hia hutto ehorroŋ honyi jio, ‘Ifuatta addi jihoŋ, itai hulle ipitak Hollum hulo. Ifuatta ihima onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ, ninyia inahini ahono Sittan iko ajilohien honyi.
Nyio, aniama nyia ni, buo itai ibiaŋata isiatta ani aŋiria. Eboto nyia ni, buo itai ibiaŋata iwohina ani hari.

Ara nyia ni atamononi, buo itai ibiaŋata ifuotuna nani ihaŋitek hatai. Obeŋ nyia aboŋo jihoŋ, buo itai ibiaŋata isiatta obo jihoŋ iyyafaniere. Aŋuai nyia ni buo fe efita ibabus, ati ibiaŋata nyia itai ifuanna mijaru nani.’
“Itarraŋi adi isi inyi ojio, ‘Lamonye, nyia baya egonyu hohoi iyye iniama, kuyya ibuoto, kuyya obeŋ boŋo, kuyya iŋuai, kuyya ifita ibabus, buo hohoi ebeŋ eluak iyye?’
Itarraŋ adi Hobu isi jio, ‘Hode, eramak ni itai jio, elle ibiaŋata nyia itai iluahata obo jio afiahajak hulia, ara inyi ihuo enne ibiaŋata itai iluahata nani.’
Isi hulia, hulle ifuhari adi ittigemio onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ, buo adi abisak ofuoi jio esu onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ.”
Ninyia atuhok Yesu ettiyenio erre hunia 'daŋ, ette inyi jiaran jio lejifak honyi jio,
“Imijana itai jio ihalu oŋitek arrihai owon adi neyom ono allaŋan. Buo teya, isiori adi Lonyi Tulo oŋida isihoni likruce.”
Tania, ottubanie nyia ehumak elettaha iko lahou ihaŋ Kaifas ehumani elle ittokon,
ette isi iwwahuna obo ekoi inefuniere Yesu lit, ette ittohoro.
Ati ojiori nyia isi jio, “Hèlaha luŋa enefu inyi to oloŋ ono neyom, nyio, ŋadi aati itaŋalafaye hohoi.”
Owon nyia Yesu ibore gala Betani ihaŋ Simone latulo linyia oŋuai 'to iko
Ninyia hoŋiyo Yesu, ottu nyia obo aŋotte jihonyi enne iyaŋuno akarajaja riaa onno ogol te enyiaŋa, ette ijuhonia ihou Yesu.
Ninyia igonyuni lejifak eram ania, ette isi iloŋojita, ette jiaran, “Nyio ittarrohojani ariaa ania?
Itinyiaŋari duo ariaa ania ta agurusi arriai, ette isiarana agurusi hua jio alociaŋak!”
Ati omijak nyia Yesu ekiana hosi ania, ette inyi jiaran jihosi, “Nyio ittigemiete itai aŋotte ania? Ihan inyi jihoŋ ariŋ onno oyyu buo fe ilaman.
Odulori adi alociaŋak iwanan ikatai, ati abeŋ adi ni adulo awanan ikatai.
Te ejuhonia honyi ariaa ania ihuan hoŋ, ihan inyi ihuo nyia ihuhumaniere ani inuhari.
Hode, eramak ni itai jio, jio amasik 'daŋ hutta fau hunne ittittoyerek asayyo ayijok huna, iramani adi buo fe ariŋ enne ihan aŋotte ania, igiluttari inyi.”
Attati obo olo lejifak hula 'tomon harrihai, elle iloŋoi Yuda Iskariot, leten jio ehumak elettaha,
ette jiaran, “Isiatta adi itai anyio jihoŋ elle esio ni Yesu jihatai?” Ette isi ihianana jihonyi arobiyaa atomuana hunihoi, ette isiarana jihonyi.
Many to oloŋ nyia, ottifia nyia Yuda obo ekoi onno oyyu itinefuniere isi Yesu.
Ofuonni nyia lejifak jio Yesu to oloŋ etteri ono neyom ono Emune onno obeŋ Lobou, ette ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Iwak atiye hohoi efuo ihuhumana jihoi aŋiria ono Allaŋan jio anani maji?”
Itarraŋ nyiia inyi isi ojio, “Ifuatta ibore gala jio obo latulo, iramana inyi jio, ‘Ojio Ettiyanani jio, attu asaa hoŋ; alo adi ni iko lejifak hoŋ iŋiyo neyom ono Allaŋan ihaŋ hoi.’ ”
Ihuhumani nyia lejifak aŋiyo ono allaŋan ihuo iramak duo Yesu isi.
Ninyia ara akekai, itoŋo nyia Yesu iko lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai iŋiyere.
Ninyia aŋiye isi, ette Yesu jiaran, “Eramak ni itai jio, itinyiaŋak adi obo alatai ani.”
Ijiriŋai nyia lejifak hulia bebe, ette ifiyo inyi 'daŋ ababo jiojio, “Lamonye, nani ati?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu ojio, “Lia, elle edutu 'to ikoŋ arabotie to 'rany, inyi adi itinyiaŋak ani.
Oye adi Lonyi Tulo ihuo igioroni tenyi ibuk Hollum. Ati orroho adi bebe jio atulo elle itinyiaŋak 'to Lonyi Tulo! Osiru obeŋi nyia luŋa isiuni atulo alia!”
Attati Yuda, etinyiaŋani ikiana jiojio, “Hettiyanani, nani ati?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ojio, “Iyye ijio ihuo nyia.”
To ninyia oŋiyerek isi, iduhu nyia Yesu emune, ette isiarana ahumo, ette ibeny inyi, ette isiarana jio lejifak honyi, ette jiaran, “Hibetina, oŋiyete, ahuan hoŋ ana.”
Attati iduhuna ematit, ette isiarana ahumo jio Hollum, ette isiarana jihosi, ette jiaran, “Amatata itai 'daŋ,
nooto hoŋ ana ono ecorit aŋejuk, onno owouno 'to te eram waati arriai ihohiniere eyyata hosi.
Ajio ni jihatai jio, abeŋ adi ni enyiak imat afino ana many iholoŋ enne ematari adi itai ikoŋ afino aŋejuk Ilobie Monyoŋ.”
Attati isi idol afure etahabui Hollum, ette ifuatan idoŋe Olifet.
Ati, elle itubuhuni ani, ekiomoro adi ni Galilea to osiere hatai.”
Attati Petro ipulonia jihonyi jiojio, “'Tuŋ, abeŋ adi ni abusaru iyye, duadi bu ofuhororoi hullomuk 'daŋ.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Hode, eramak ni iyye jio, irisa adi iyye nani arue ana ahana enyiahita hunihoi hobeŋ ahohoro illok.”
Itarraŋ nyia Petro inyi ojio, “'Tuŋ, ettallik ni adi irisa iyye, ara duadi bu ottohori ani ikoye.”
Ikianai nyia buo fe lejifak hullomuk 'daŋ ihuo nyia.
Attati Yesu leten iko lejifak honyi jio obo amaji anna anya Jessemani, ette iramana isi jio, “Itoŋoti dini buo ni alo diya imojori.”
Iyaru nyia inyi Petro iko lonyirok Sebedeyo hula arrihai. Ijiriŋa nyia inyi buo fe ataji honyi ette imijan,
ette inyi jiaran jihosi jio, “Obolo amijan taji jihoŋ bebe ihuo ejio nani ettoho. Itoŋoti dini, oduloro mijio ikoŋ.”

Ihut nyia inyi alamarai kai, ette irigoŋo, ette ijurru afau, ette imojo jio, “Monyoŋ, kuyya ollo oremik, iyai addi jihoŋ ematit ono ettigemio ana! Ati obiaŋara ta awahan hoŋ, ati ijiara ara ihuo iwak iyye.”
Attati inyi icohuno jio lejifak honyi hula hunihoi, ette irumana isi ajotoroi, ette inyi jiaran jio Petro jio, “Ittallihoto itai mijio ikoŋ ara duadi bu asaa abotie?
Ihumata mijio buo fe imojoti jio, hèlaha itai imuahata jio esusuta. Oyiji egigilita hatai, ati ibiaŋata itai igoloto, nyio, irata itai awaati.”
Inyiak Yesu leten addi, ette mojo ojio, “Monyoŋ, alla abeŋ osiru iyari ematit ono ettigemio ana addi, many amatari ni inyi, ijiara ihanie ihuo iwak iyye.”
Ninyia inyiak inyi icohuno, orumak nyia inyi isi ajotoroi; ittallihi nyia isi mijio.
Inyiak nyia Yesu diaharu isi, ette leten mojo enyiahi etahunihi. Idas inyi imojo te ekenita ihuo hoduo omojori inyi.
Attati inyi icaharu jio lejifak, ette jiaran jihosi, “Hèrasati itai joto buo fe iyiriata? Imijiete! Attuba asaa ani isiaranierek Lonyi Tulo ihas waati eyyak.
Ottenna, efuo. Imijiete latulo olo, elle itinyiaŋak 'to nani!”

Ninyia hekiana Yesu, afany nyia Yuda, inyi obo olo lejifak hula 'tomon harrihai. Ottu nyia inyi iko eluluŋ waati enne ittok hulle irumuni iko ademio erremiti buo elluhi. Ehumak elettaha iko lahou nyia ifahuni isi.
Iramak nyia etinyiaŋani jihosi obo etamijani jio, “Atulo elle efony ni ta ahucio 'yaha, inefuna inyi.”
Ania, ette Yuda ibocioro jio Yesu, ette jiaran, “Hettiyanani, moŋ,” ette ihut ayyaha honyi.
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ojio, “Illa, ihanie ariŋ ania kokuak
Attati isi ifuanna jio Yesu, ette iniafaru inyi cok.
Attati obo atulo jio aati hinyia owoni 'to iko Yesu, isutuna ademi honyi erremit, ette isaluna eyyok ono apit olo ehumani elle ittokon.
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi jio, “Inyiak ademi ania imaji honyi. Aati hullo orremi 'to ta ademio, oye adi buo fe isi ta ademio.
Ibeŋ iyye imijak jio aremik ni imojo jio Monyoŋ etteduo, buo inyi ette ifahuna eluluŋi 'tomon harrihai huno ajilohien italuahiere ani?
Ati alla ara ihuo nyia, aŋai 'tadi itasiruni egierita hutto Buk Hollum hunno ojiori 'to jio, oŋida eram anna ara ihuo nyia?”
Ati iduoŋi nyia erre hunia 'daŋ itasiruniere erre hunyia igioroni ekianak Hollum ibuk Honyi.”
Attati lejifak honyi 'daŋ idiaharu inyi, ette ifuhororo.
Teya, iniafarai nyia isi Yesu many ihaŋ Kaifas, ehumani elle ittokon. Diya, ottubai nyia ettiyanak ifahita iko lahou.
Ijifaru nyia Petro inyi alamarai many ihiloŋoni attahaŋ ehumani elle ittokon; ette inyi ijiŋara ihiloŋoni, ette itoŋo ihiji hegiamak imijaniere esidi hiram.
Ottifiai nyia ehumak elettaha iko aati Lokikoi Yudei 'daŋ omuk erre itisiahiniere Yesu oŋida ottohori inyi.
Ati obeŋi nyia isi onyurani obo eram, duadi bu itisiahini nyia agesomok arriai inyi. Ihalu hosi 'daŋ, ofuonni nyia aati arrihai,
ette jiaran jio, “Ojio nyia latulo olo jio, ‘Aremik inyi itattur Aaji emojit enne ittokon ono Hollum, buo ette inyiak iduhonia inyi imaji honyi ihalu oŋitek hunihoi.’ ”
Attati ehumani elle ittokon idioto ahide, ette ifiyo Yesu jiojio, “Ibeŋ iyye iwon iko obo ekiana itarraŋiere etisiahita hunia?”
Ati oduahino nyia Yesu 'liŋ 'liŋ. Inyiak fe ehumani elle ittokon ifiyo Yesu jiojio, “Ta afure ono Hollum lesuoni, eramak ni iyye ittuŋoi luŋa, elle ira iyye

Itarraŋak nyia Yesu jihonyi jiojio, “Iyye ijio ihuo nyia. Ati, eramak ni itai 'daŋ, ihuania many moi igonyuna adi itai Lonyi Tulo itoŋo ihani iŋet ono Laduarani, buo fe igonyuna inyi osuu te edohuo huttedou.”
Igigiloti itai anyio?”
Itarraŋi nyia isi ojio, “Ipal inyi, ijiara luŋa ottohori inyi.”
buo ojiori jiojio, “Iyye
Itoŋo nyia Petro illet ihiloŋoni, attati nobo aŋotte egiamani ono ehumani elle ittokon ittuna jihonyi, ette jiaran, “Iwon nyia buo fe iyye iko Yesu Agalileatanani.”
Ati orisa nyia inyi ihosiere hosi 'daŋ jio, “Abeŋ ni amijak anyio enne ikiana iyye.”
Ninyia icul Petro ikat haŋ, ette buo fe obo aŋotte egiamani igonyuna inyi, ette jiaran jio aati hunyia owoni 'to diya jio, “Owon nyia atulo alia iko Yesu a Nasaretanani.”
Buo Petro ette inyiak irisa jio, “'Tuŋ, atimoni latulo alia!”
Ojio gaa, ofuonni nyia buo fe aati hinyia owotiai 'to diya jio Petro, ette jiaran, “Hode hode, ira iyye aholosi, nyio, iheruno iyye te ekiana hoi.”
Attati Petro jiaran, “'Tuŋ, ekiana ni ahode hode! Ijiara Hollum abak ani elle enyobio ni! Atimo ni latulo alia.”
Teya teya, ette ahohoro illok,
ette Petro igiluna ekiana ninyia iramak Yesu jihonyi jio, “Hobeŋ ahohoro illok, irisa adi iyye ani enyiahita hunihoi.” Attati inyi leten allet, ette iyyoo bebe.
Nyia motie berien iwwahuni nyia ehumak elettaha 'daŋ iko lahou arabotie ittohori Yesu.
Ifiti nyia isi inyi ta aririk, ette iyaru jio Pilato, amondir olo gala Roma.
ette jiaran, “Eyyau ni itinyiaŋaniere latulo ollo obeŋ eyyau jihonyi.”
Itarraŋi nyia isi jihonyi, “Hunohoi anyio? Ottenu erre hoi hama!”
Attati Yuda iruoŋoro arobiyaa hua itua Haji emojit enne ittokon, ette leten igororo.
Ati, ohuruni nyia ehumak elettaha arobiyaa hua, ette jiaran, “Arobiyaa hoto huna. Tania, obeŋi efahita hohoi aŋatani isi ottunani ittunit ono Aaji emojit enne ittokon.”
Ninyia iwwahuni isi, ette iduhuna arobiyaa hua, ette inyiaŋuniere Amana ono Layyani Tobuaha, oŋida onuhattarik aterejok.
Ania, iloŋorik amana nyia “Amana Hoto” many iko ahana.
Itasirunierek ekiana Yeremia ekianani Hollum, ninyia ojiari inyi jio, “Iduhuni isi arobiyaa atomuana hunihoi, arobiyaa hunyia iduhuni onyiok Israele edumit honyi,
ette inyiaŋuniere Amana ono Layyani Tobuaha, ihuo iramak nyia ani Lamonye.”
Owotia nyia Yesu ihosiere mondir olo Roma, linyia ifiyo 'to inyi jiojio, “Iyye Hobu Yudei?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu ojio, “Iyye ijio ihuo nyia.”
Ati obeŋ nyia inyi itarraŋ erositi huno ehumak elettaha iko lahou.
Attati Pilato jiaran jihonyi, “Ibeŋ iyye itaniŋu erre arriai hunne itisiahinierek isi iyye?”
Ati obeŋ nyia inyi itarraŋ, ara duadi bu obo abotie jio etisiahita hua, many illillihari mondir bebe.
Ohohitta nyia mondir olo Roma atulo babus abotie to oloŋ ono neyom ono allaŋan, alla awahi aati.
Owon nyia obo atulo babus elle idiefer bebe, afure honyi Yesu Barabas.
Ninyia attubanie aati arriai, ette Pilato ifiyo isi jiojio, “Iwahata itai ahohi ni alali, Barabas kuyya Yesu elle iloŋoi
Omijak nyia inyi jio inefunie nyia isi Yesu jihonyi ta ahaini hosi.
Ninyia howon Pilato itua haji lokikoi, ifahu nyia ŋoruoi honyi jihonyi eram jio, “Hèjiŋak jio eram ono atulo ollo obeŋ ipali, nyio, ettigemi ani arigiai honyi duo arue.”
Ati isusuye nyia ehumak elettaha iko lahou Yudei aati oŋida iramani Pilato ohohi jihosi Barabas buo itattoho Yesu.
Ati inyiak Pilato ifiyo isi jiojio, “Iwahata itai ahohi ni jihatai ŋai tehiji hula arrihai hulo?”
Itarraŋi nyia isi jio, “Barabas!”
Buo Pilato ette ifiyo isi ojio, “Ehan 'tadi ni anyio jio Yesu elle iloŋoi
Itarraŋi nyia isi 'daŋ jiojio, “Isihonia inyi likruce!”
Ati ifiyo nyia Pilato isi jio, “Anyio ipali enne ihan inyi?”
Ati iwuwoŋitai nyia isi bebe jiojio, “Isihonia inyi likruce!”
Buo aati 'daŋ ette itarraŋ ojio, “Ijiara nooto honyi oŋiyo hohoi iko lonyirok hohoi.”
Attati Pilato ihohina Barabas jihosi, ette itabak Yesu, ette isiarana inyi jihosi ijiara isihoni likruce.
Attati oseŋer Pilato iyaru Yesu ihaŋ enne ittok ono Mondir, buo eluluŋ hosi 'daŋ ette ittubanio iger Yesu,
ette ihouna aboŋojin honyi 'daŋ addi, ette itiyyafana inyi aboŋo anariet.
Attati isi iyyir egoria hikua, ette itiyyafana ihou honyi, ette itaŋuahina atelek ihani iŋet honyi, ette irigoŋo ihosiere honyi, ette isuhotiere inyi jiojio, “Hobu Yudei Moŋ!”
Omitani nyia isi amilak jihonyi, ette ibak ahou honyi ta atelek.
Ninyia attohuni isi asuhotiere inyi, ette isi ihouna noduo boŋo, ette itayyafana inyi aboŋojin honyi, ette irihoro inyi addi isihoniere likruce.
Ninyia afuoi isi, oruaŋanie nyia isi iko obo atulo olo Sirine, afure honyi Simone, ette oseŋer italoronia inyi akruce Yesu ta ajore.
Ninyia afanyi isi jio amaji enne ifurani Golgota, onno ojio 'to jio, “Amaji Hotio Hou.”
Diya, isiarani nyia isi jio Yesu afino enne iŋala iko obo ariŋ onno odua. Ati ninyia iniŋ Yesu, ette inyi ihara imat inyi.
Ania, ette isi itoŋo diya irririari inyi.
Igioroni nyia isi etisiahita huna totto hide hou honyi jio, “Yesu olo, Hobu Yudei.”
Isihoni nyia buo fe isi omuk ahahalak likrucehien: abotie tetteŋet honyi, buo ollobo tettehorroŋ honyi.
“Ijio nyia bu iyye jio iremik iyye itattur Aaji emojit enne ittokon buo inyiak iduhonia ihalu oŋitek hunihoi! Italuahu bu ahuan hoi, elle ira iyye Lonyi Hollum! Ollu ifau to hide Kruce.”
Ihuo nyia buo fe, itafittaŋie nyia ehumak elettaha inyi, isi iko ettiyanak ifahita, buo lahou ojiori jio,
“Italuahu nyia inyi aati hullomuk, buo ittallik italuahuna ahuan honyi. Obiaŋara soho inyi hobu Israele? Ijiara inyi ollu to hide kruce, buo adi hohoi ette iruk jihonyi.
Iyihi inyi jio Hollum buo fe akafatio ahou jio inyi Lonyi Hollum. Oyyu, hamijiete alla awak Hollum italuahuna inyi!”
Ette buo fe ahahalak hinyia isihoni ikonyi likrucehien morio inyi ihuo nyia.
Ninyia ara akil fanni, ette edumele iriok 'tir 'tir afau 'daŋ many otuk asahien hunihoi.
Ninyia ara ihuo asaa etahunihi otto otoriai, ette Yesu iluaha jiojio, “Eloi, Eloi, lema Sabakttani?” onno ojio 'to jio, “Hollum hoŋ, Hollum hoŋ, nyio ibasak iyye nani”
Attati omuk aati hinyia owotia 'to diya itayiruna inyi, ette jiaran, “Iloŋo latulo olo Elija!”
Teya teya, ette obo olosi iduhuna espony, ette difonia itua fino enne iruattiŋo 'to, ette ihasana itelek, ette igumana jihonyi oŋida ojur.
Ati ojiori nyia hullomuk jio, “Itilauna, hamijiete kuyya ollo ottu adi Elija italuahuna inyi!”
Inyiak Yesu iluaha woŋ woŋ, ette iye.
Buo elumio ette iŋa, ette itubuhuna aati Hollum arriai hunyia oye 'to;
ette isi ijiŋuna addi telumio. Buo ninyia ibuhu Yesu toye, ette isi ifuatan Ibore Gala Elibo, buo aati arriai ette igonyuna isi.
Ninyia igonyu ajafit iko oseŋer hunyia owoni 'to ikonyi ekikiro fau iko erre 'daŋ hunyia iduoŋi 'to, ette abaŋi inef isi, ette isi jiaran, “Lonyi Hollum duadi olo luŋa.”
Ihiji hosi owon nyia Maria Madalina, Maria honye Yakobo iko Yosefu. Owon nyia buo fe ŋoruoi Sebedeyo diya.
Nyia kekai, ette lobo asamani olo Aremeteya ittuna alla anya Yosefu. Ara nyia buo fe inyi ahejifani Yesu.
Olo nyia inyi jio Pilato imojuniere ahuan Yesu. Attati Pilato iramana jio oŋida isiarani jihonyi.
Ette Yosefu ikafaru inyi, ette ibubunana inyi ta aboŋo enuhit aŋejuk,
ette itaferihina inyi ilume honyi aŋejuk ninyia obuahak Yosefu itua moruo. Ette inyi ittaboronia amoruo enne ittok ihutuk ilume, ette leten addi.
Owoni nyia diya ba Maria Madalina iko Maria ebotie. Itoŋoi nyia isi buo attanyi jio elume nyia.
Ara nyia ebotie holoŋ noloŋ Sabatto, ette ehumak elettaha iko
ette jiaran, “Lettok, egigilu hohoi jio, ninyia hèsu ologesem alia, ojio nyia inyi jio, ‘Itubuhuni adi nani ihalu oŋitek hunihoi.’

Tania, ifak eram, ijiara ihumi irriria elume nyia many iholoŋ etahunihi. Nyio, ŋadi lejifak honyi ofuoi hahalaru ahuan honyi te lume, buo ette ifuatan iramana aati jio itubuhuni inyi toye. Agalik adi agesemi ana ninyia hosiere.”
Attati Pilato iramana isi jio, “Iyatti erririak, ijiara ofuoi irriria elume nyia ihuo iremehina itai irriria.”
Ania, ette isi fuatan, ette ihum duanyana elume ania, ette idiaharu erririak oŋida ihumi irriria.
Ihalu oloŋ Sabatto, ninyia iliaha ataŋatio motie ono Dominika, ette Maria Madalina iko Maria ebotie iwany imijuniere elume.
Teya teya, odioto nyia olokitik onno orroho bebe, ette ajilo olo Lamonye ittuna tedou, ette ittabororo amoruo ania addi, ette itoŋo ihide honyi.
Opipiak nyia omom honyi ihuo ahilai buo aboŋojin honyi obuori biny biny ihuo eriri.
Inef nyia abaŋi erririak many ikikirorik, ette rahan ihuo ayaak.
Ati ojio nyia ajilo jio aŋoruo hua jio, “Hèbaŋata, amijak ni jio ittifiati itai Yesu linyia isihoni likruce.
Abeŋ inyi tene, itubuhuni inyi ihuo ninyia ojiari inyi. Ifuanna omijata amaji ninyia awanari inyi.
Ihuania, ifuatta kokuak iramaniere lejifak honyi jio, ‘Itubuhuni inyi toye buo ihuania alo inyi Galilea to osiere hatai, ifuatta adi igonyuna inyi teya!’ Isi hunia erre hunne eramak ni itai.”
Ania, ette isi iruharu kokuak telume buo abaŋi. Ati omunoi nyia isi bebe, ette iŋioron iramaniere jio lejifak.
Oruaŋanie nyia isi iko Yesu turunyaŋ, ette inyi jiaran jihosi jio, “Ogotto.” Ofuoni nyia isi many jihonyi, ette inef eejek honyi itahabuyere inyi.
Attati Yesu jiaran jihosi jio, “Hèbaŋata, ifuatta iramana illarak hoŋ, ijiara ofuoi Galilea, buo diya, ofuoi adi isi igonyuna ani.”
Ninyia hofuoi aŋoruo hunia, acaharai nyia omuk hulo erririak ibore gala iramaniere ehumak elettaha erre 'daŋ hunyia iduoŋi 'to.
Ottubanie nyia ehumak elettaha iko lahou, ette iwwahuna, ette isiarana agurusi arriai jio erririak,
ette jiaran jio, “Iramana aati jio, ofuonni nyia lejifak honyi nyia arue, ette ihahalaru ahuan honyi, buo itai ijototi.
Buo elle itaniŋu mondir eram ania, ekiana adi hohoi jihonyi. Ebeŋ adi hohoi eŋatak obo eram ottu jihatai.”
Ania, ette isi ifuotuna agurusi hunia, ette ihanio ihuo iramani nyia jihosi, buo eram ania ette isarrahina jio aati Yudei 'daŋ many ahana.
Ninyia igonyuni isi Yesu, ette isi itahabuyo inyi, ati okuayai nyia omuk hulosi.
Attati Yesu ihutonia, ette jiaran jihosi jio, “Isiarani jihoŋ elohittok ettedou iko atta fau.
Tania, ifuatta jio aati 'daŋ, imasik 'daŋ, ihanata isi ahejifak hoŋ, itifuotonia isi batisimo ta afure Monye iko ono Lonyi iko ono Loholio Olibo.
Ittiyeniete buo fe isi oŋida abaŋi erre 'daŋ hunyia eramak ni itai. Awon adi ni ikatai many isidi fau.”
Asayyo Ayijok huna huno Yesu Kristo, Lonyi Hollum
Itterie isi ihuo igiorok nyia Isaya ekianani Hollum jio:
“Ojio Hollum jio, ‘Efak adi ni eyani sayyo hoŋ to osiere hoi.
Olo adi inyi ihuhumana ekoi hoi.’
Obo latulo elle iwuwoŋita ihidiofo jio,
‘Ihuhumana ekoi ono Lamonye;
itabisana alori honyi!’ ”
Tania, iduoŋ nyia Yoane etifuotoni Batisimo ihidiofo. Ittittoyo nyia inyi aati jio
Ofuonni nyia aati arriai ta fau Yudea iko to bore gala Yerusalem itayiriere eram honyi. Opuloni nyia isi eyyata hosi buo inyi ette itifuotonia isi batisimo itua owore Yordano.
Ittittoyo nyia inyi jio, “Ottu adi obo atulo te ehalu hoŋ alla agalik 'to ani. Abeŋ ni ikoddaŋ asiru iridori, ihouniere amuha honyi.
Etifuotok ni itai batisimo ta aari, ati ottu adi inyi itifuotonia itai batisimo to Loholio Olibo.”
To oŋitek hua, ottu nyia Yesu to bore gala Nasaret atta fau Galilea, attati Yoane itifuotonia inyi batisimo to tua owore Yordano.
Ninyia attu Yesu addi to tua hari, ette inyi igonyuna edou aŋa, ette Loholio Olibo suuna jihonyi tedou ihuo awolo.
Attati ekiana ittuna tedou onno ojio, “Iyye Lonyi hoŋ hode. Amuno ni iyye bebe.”
Teya teya, ette Oloholio iyaru inyi ihidiofo;
amaji ninyia itoŋori inyi oŋitek atomuana aŋuan buo Sittan okemio inyi. Owoni nyia aciaŋi diya buo ajilohien oluahie inyi.
Ninyia ifitani Yoane ibabus, ette Yesu leten Galilea ittittoyere Asayyo Ayijok huno Hollum.
Ojio nyia inyi jio, “Attuba asaa, iliaha buo fe Nolobie ono Hollum! Obusana eyyata hatai, iruhoto Asayyo Ayijok.”
Ninyia illillor Yesu to olotifor tafar enne ittokon ono Galilea, igonyu nyia inyi Simone iko Andrea illanyi ayafohoi aham ta aboyo, nyio, arai nyia isi ahayafok.
Attati Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Ijifuniete ani, etahutak adi ni itai iloŋutari aati jihoŋ ihuo ayafohok.”
Teya teya, ette isi ibusana aboyo hosi, ette ijifaru inyi.
Ninyia alo inyi ahosiere kaiyo, ette inyi igonyuna ellarak arrihai; Yakobo
Teya teya, ninyia igonyu inyi isi, ette inyi iloŋuna isi, buo isi ette ibusaru monyosi Sebedeyo iko egiamak itua togol, ette ijifaru Yesu.
Tania, ofuoi nyia Yesu iko lejifak honyi ibore gala Kapernaum. Buo ninyia alum oloŋ ono Sabatto, ette inyi leten ihaji emojit, ette itterio ettiyenio.
Illillihai nyia aati bebe ettiyenio honyi, nyio, obeŋ nyia inyi ittiyenio ihuo ettiyanak ifahita. Ittiyenio nyia inyi luŋa ihuo elettok.
Teya teya, ojiŋu nyia obo latulo miniaŋa attua haji emojit, ette iwuwoŋita jiojio,
“Yesu olo Nasaret, anyio enne iwak iyye jihohoi? Ittu iyye itatturio hohoi? Emijak hohoi ŋai iyye, iyye eyani sayyo Hollum elle ilibo 'to!”
Ette Yesu iŋerejanio jio aminiaŋa hua jio, “Oduati, ojiŋuna addi jio latulo alia!”
Teya, ette aminiaŋa hunia inef inyi ihuo aahue, ette ijiŋuna addi buo ituruhoi.
Illillihai nyia aati 'daŋ bebe, ette ifiyo ahuattek hosi jiojio, “Eii, anyio hirre huna? Ettiyenio aŋejuk 'tadi ana? Iŋerejanio latulo olo jio aminiaŋa te elohittok, buo isi oniŋie ekiana honyi.”
Teya teya, okuataru nyia olohuo Yesu amasik 'daŋ hutto ŋati Galilea 'daŋ.
Odiotoi nyia bo Yesu iko lejifak honyi arabotie iko Yoane buo Yakobo ta haji emojit, ette boton ihaŋ Simone iko Andrea.
Ofer nyia hamoni Simone ijotit, nyio, oŋuai nyia inyi iko anahan huan. Teya Teya, ninyia afany Yesu, ette isi iramana jihonyi eram aŋuani ania.
Attati Yesu leten jio aŋuani ania, ette ittoŋ aani honyi, ette itadet inyi ahide. Teya ette anahan huan iŋatana aŋuani ania, ette inyi ikoddaŋ ihuhumio aŋiyo jihosi.
Ninyia iddorro oloŋ buo fe ara akekai, iyaŋunie nyia aati jio Yesu aŋuak 'daŋ iko aati miniaŋa.
Ottubanie nyia aati 'daŋ huttono abore gala ania ihiloŋoni ahaŋ ania.
Attati Yesu itaŋida aŋuak arriai hunyia owoni 'to iko eŋuati gele gele, buo fe ifuha addi aminiaŋa arriai. Obeŋ nyia inyi aŋatak aminiaŋa ikenuni hirre, nyio, omijani nyia isi inyi.
Ohenyu Yesu nyia taŋatio motie berien, ette iwany totua bore gala jio obo amaji onno oyur, ette mojo diya.
Ati ottittifiarai nyia ba Simone iko orriahat honyi Yesu.
Ninyia anyurani isi inyi, ette isi jiaran jihonyi “Ottifiai aati 'daŋ iyye.”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ jiojio, “Hafatta jio amisihi hunnomuk hunia 'daŋ. Oŋida buo fe ani alo ittittoyo diya, nyio, inyi eram ania ninyia attuniere ni.”
Ottu nyia obo atulo ollo owon iko
Omehino
Teya teya, ette aŋuai nyia idehina atulo alia, ette inyi libori.
Attati Yesu ihum iramana inyi, ette ifahini inyi addi teya teya, ninyia ajio jihonyi jiojio,
“Itayirie, hèramak obo atulo eram ania. Ati obotik jio ehumani, ijiara inyi ihum imi iyye. Attati teya, isiarak ehumi jio Hollum, itahutaniere jio aati jio ilibo iyye, ihuo ojiori efahita huno Mose.”

Ati olo nyia atulo alia ette itasarrahina eram ania imasik 'daŋ. Ihum nyia inyi ikiana bebe eram ania many obiaŋari luŋa Yesu adaha sol ibore gala. Ania, alari Yesu itoŋori jio amasik hunno obiaŋarik aati, buo aati ette ifuanna to masik 'daŋ jihonyi.
Ihalu omuk oŋitek, acaharu nyia Yesu Kapernaum, buo aati ette itayiruna awanan honyi ihaŋ.
Ania, ette aati arriai ittubanio itua haŋ many aŋaramahi amaji; ara duadi bu ihosiere ikat haŋ, buo inyi ette ittittoyo jihosi ekiana Hollum.
Ofuonni nyia omuk aati aŋuan hulla akafunie, jio Yesu, obo atulo ollo oye aŋati huan.

Buo te efuda waati, ittallihi nyia isi ifanyari inyi ihosiere Yesu; ania, ette isi ihet aaji to hide maji ninyia awattari Yesu. Ninyia aŋahini isi ettullit, ette isi ililiofonia atulo alia ollo oferio iferit.
Ninyia igonyu Yesu eruk hosi, ette inyi jiaran jio atulo alia, “Illa, ahohinie eyyata hoi.”
Owoni nyia buo fe omuk ettiyanak ifahita diya. Igigiloi nyia isi ta atajia hosi jio,
“Aŋai orinyak atulo olo ekiana ihuo nyia? Abalari inyi afure Hollum! Hollum fe hama oremik ihohina eyyata!”
Teya teya, omijak nyia Yesu egigilita hosi, ania ette inyi ifiyo isi jiojio, “Nyio igigiloti itai erre hunna arai 'to ihuania?
Anani enne iliaha 'to, ijiari jio atulo ollo oye ŋati huan olo, ‘Ahohinie eyyata hoi’, kuyya ijiari jio, ‘Totte, iduhu eferit hoi, adahai?’
Etahutak adi ni jihatai jio, owon Lonyi Tulo iko elohittok ifau ihohiniere eyyata.” Ania, ette inyi jiaran jio atulo ollo oye ŋati huan jio,
“Ajio ni jihoi, totte, iduhu eferit hoi, ilo haŋ!”
Ette atulo alia idioto ihosiere hosi 'daŋ, ette iduhuna eferit honyi, ette leten addi. Illillihai nyia isi 'daŋ, ette itahabuyo Hollum jiojio, “Hèbeŋ hohoi egonyu obo ariŋ ihuo ana.”
Teya, inyiak nyia Yesu icaharu ilotifor tafar Galilea. Attati eluluŋ tulo ikudana inyi, buo inyi ette ittiyenio isi.
Buo ninyia alo inyi ahosiere, igonyu inyi Lefi lonyi Alfeyo itoŋo imahatab honyi, ette inyi jiaran jihonyi, “Ijifunie ani.” Ette Lefi idioto, ette ijifaru inyi.
Buo ninyia aŋiyo Yesu ihaŋ Lefi,
Igonyuni nyia omuk ettiyanak ifahita hulla arai 'to Afarisei Yesu oŋiyo iko eyyak buo eddudduhak Musuru, ette isi ifiyo lejifak Yesu jiojio, “Nyio oŋiyo inyi iko aati ihuo hulia?”
Ninyia itayiru Yesu ekiana hosi, ette inyi itarraŋ jiojio, “Obeŋi aŋidarak awahi adiktor, ati aŋuak hama awahi inyi. Abeŋ ni attu iloŋori abisak, ati attu ni iloŋori eyyak.”
To obo oloŋ oferuni nyia lejifak Yoane iko
Itarraŋ Yesu isi ojio, “Oremehini soho atamonok hayamani iferuna buo ayamani howon ikosi? Obeŋ! Ittallihi isi iferuna buo inyi howon.
Ati ofuonni adi oŋitek hunne iyarik ayamani tehiji hosi addi, tania, oferuni adi isi.
“Obeŋ tulo attaf ettulit boŋo amaruani ta aboŋo aŋejuk, nyio, iruna adi aboŋo aŋejuk ette iguasuno addi, ette tibuo italat ettulit boŋo amaruani.
Obeŋ buo fe tulo iturak afino aŋejuk itua ihulo amaruani nyio, obor adi afino ehulo ania, ette ijuhoro addi, buo fe ehulo ette irrohoji. Ati ijiara iturani afino aŋejuk itua ihuloo aŋejuho.”
Attati

ania, ette Dafide ijiŋana ihaji Hollum, ette iŋiyo emunio hunyia isiori jio Hollum, ette buo fe isiarana omuk jio aati honyi. Ihan nyia inyi eram ania, buo Abiatar nyia ara ahehumani elle ittokon. Ati ojiori efahita hohoi, oduari nyia emunio hunia jio aati asai iŋiyere isi, arari fe ehumak hama.”
Attati Yesu itisidonia ekiana honyi jihosi, ette jiaran, “Oyyeuni nyia Sabatto te eram waati, buo obiaŋara aati te eram Sabatto.
Tania, ara Lonyi Tulo Lamonye ara duadi bu olo Sabatto.”
Ania, attati Yesu icaharu attua haji emojit ninyia awanari atulo ollo oye hani.
Owoni nyia omuk aati diya hunyia awahi 'to itisiahina Yesu jio, ihanio inyi erre hunno orrohoji. Ania, ette isi ihum irriria inyi imijaniere kuyya itaŋida adi inyi atulo alia to oloŋ Sabatto.
Ette Yesu jiaran jio atulo ollo oye hani, “Waŋ dini.”
Attati Yesu ifiyo isi jio, “Anyio anna aŋatani efahita hohoi ihaniere to oloŋ Sabatto? Iluahiere kuyya ittarrohojiere? Italuahuniere atulo kuyya ittohori inyi?”
Ati oduai nyia isi 'liŋ 'liŋ.

Attati Yesu mijio jihosi elle ijoria, ette ataji honyi imehino jihosi ta agolon hossi hosi, ette jiaran jio atulo lia, “Itabisak aani hoi.” Buo inyi ette itabisana, buo aani honyi ette inyiak iŋidari.
Attati
Olo nyia Yesu iko lejifak honyi itafar enne ittokon, buo eluluŋ waati enne ittok ette ijifaru inyi. Ofuonni nyia isi to Galilea, ta fau Yudea,
to Yerusalem, ta ŋati Idumea, ta ŋati fohor Yordano etteduoŋi holoŋ, to borejin gala Taya iko Sidon. Ofuonni nyia isi arriai jio Yesu nyio itayiruni nyia isi erre hunyia ihanio inyi.
Ania, ette Yesu iramana lejifak honyi oŋida iyaŋunie obo atogol jihonyi, nyio, ŋadi eluluŋ waati ottehini inyi.
Itaŋida nyia inyi aati arriai, many odulorik aŋuak 'daŋ efudaru ajihonyi jio oŋida bati isi ettir inyi.
Ibatatie nyia aati miniaŋa ihosiere honyi elle igonyuni isi inyi buo ituruhoi jiojio, “Iyye Lonyi Hollum!”
Ati ihum nyia Yesu iramana aminiaŋa hunia oŋida obeŋi iramani obo atulo jio ŋai inyi.
Attati Yesu leten ihide doŋe, ette iloŋuna jihonyi aati hinyia awak inyi. Ofuonni nyia isi jihonyi,
ette inyi inyimuna aati 'tomon harrihai hinyia ifurak inyi lefahat, ette iramana isi jiojio, “Anyimu ni itai oŋida iwanata ikoŋ. Efak adi ni itai ittittoyere.
Owon adi agolon jihatai ifuhatiere aminiaŋa.”
Aati 'tomon harrihai hinyia onyimu inyi hulo: Simone (linyia ifurak inyi Petro);
lonyirok Sebedeyo, Yakobo iko illanyi Yoane, (hinyia ifurak inyi Bonerges, onno ojio 'to jio, “Laati hilai”);
Andrea, Filipo, Bartolomeyo, Matteyo, Tomaso, Yakobo lonyi Alfeyo, Tadeyo, Simone alla anya 'to Silot
iko Yuda Iskariot etinyiaŋani Yesu.
Attati Yesu leten haŋ, buo obo eluluŋ waati enne ittok ette inyiak ittubanio diya many obiaŋarak asaa inyi iko lejifak honyi iŋiyere
Ninyia itayiruni haŋ ba Yesu eram ania, ette isi ifuanna inefiere inyi, nyio, ojiori nyia aati jio, “Isita Inyi!”
Ania, ette Yesu iloŋuna isi ajihonyi, ette ikiana jihosi te etarriamata jiojio: “Aŋai oremik Sittan ifuhara addi Sittan?
Elle ibibuanya afau aŋacio aŋacio hunno orriomonie, otturo adi afau nyia.
Buo fe elle ibibuanya ahaŋ abotie, eluluŋi eluluŋi hunna aŋalafai, otturo adi ahaŋ nyia.
Tania, elle ibibuanya olobie ono Sittan eluluŋi eluluŋi hunno orriomonie, ittallik adi inyi iwotia, otuhoro adi inyi, ette ilitohina.
“Ittallik obo atulo ijiŋara ihaŋ olottir ihorori asaŋ honyi, buo hobeŋ ifit olottir alia, ŋati inyi ihalu oremik ibialaru asaŋ honyi.
“Hode, eramak ni itai jio, ohohini adi eyyata waati 'daŋ iko erre arrohojak 'daŋ hunne ikenuni isi.
Ati obeŋi adi ohohini eyyau tulo elle ittarrohojio 'to afure ono Loholio Olibo; nyio, iyyau inyi eyyau onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ.”
Ikiana nyia Yesu ihuo nyia, nyio, ojiori nyia omuk aati jio, “Owon aminiaŋati jihonyi!”)
Attati illarak Yesu iko honyonyi ifanyan diya, ette iwotia illet, ette ifahina eram oŋida iloŋi inyi.
Itoŋo nyia eluluŋ waati iger honyi, ette isi jiaran jihonyi, “Honyohoi iko illarak hoi hutto 'let, awahi isi iyye.”
Itarraŋ Yesu jio, “Ŋai iyaŋ? Ba ŋai illarak hoŋ?”
Attati inyi mijio jio aati hunyia itoŋoi 'to iger honyi, ette jiaran, “Heyaŋ iko illarak hoŋ huna!
Atulo elle ihanio 'to erre hunna awak Hollum, inyi illaŋ, inyi haniyoŋ, inyi iyaŋ.”
Iduhutta nyia inyi etarriamata ette ittiyeniere isi erre arriai, jiojio:
“Itayiriete! Olo nyia obo aromoni iyehina enyomo.
Ninyia ayehi inyi, ofodoŋonie nyia omuk ihiji ikoi, ette aheny ikukubuna isi.
Ofodoŋonie nyia omuk ihiji moruoi, amaji anna ahaharaŋi aboro, ette isi isuruna kokuak, nyio, ahaharaŋi nyia aboro diya.
Ninyia anok oloŋ, ette inyi isuahina ayyalaŋa himma hunia; nyio, obeŋi nyia aadde hosi ihumi irriomonio attua, ette isi iyohojoro.
Ofodoŋonie nyia buo fe omuk ihiji hikua, ette eekua ibolori, ette itabunara isi, ette ibiaŋan oŋijana emma.
Okuahinie nyia buo fe omuk jio aboro hunno oyiji 'to, ette isuruna, ette ibolori, ette isuaru, omuk atomuana hunihoi, buo omuk atamuana ille, buo fe omuk esiha abotie.”
Attati Yesu itisidonia ekiana honyi jiojio, “Itayiriete, alla awoni ayyaha jihatai!”
Ninyia awon Yesu inyi hama, ette omuk aati hunyia itayiruni 'to inyi ifuanna iko lefahat jihonyi, ette ifiyo inyi oŋida iramak awoyo hiram ono etarriamata hunia.
Itarraŋ inyi isi ojio, “Isiarani jihatai amijana hirre huno Olobie Hollum hunyia otimoi. Ati, iramani jio aati hutto 'let te etarriamata,
jio oŋida,
‘Isi luŋa ihumi imijio, buo obeŋi igonyuni
buo fe ihumi itayira,
buo obeŋi itayiruni.
Alla amijani duo isi ŋaduo isi iloiti atajia hosi jio Hollum,
buo duo Hollum ette ihohina eyyata hosi.’ ”
Attati Yesu ifiyo isi ojio, “Itimoti itai ojio etarriamai ania anyio? Aŋai 'tadi imijana itai etarriamata hunnomuk 'daŋ?
Oyehi ayani hinyomo ekiana Hollum.
Arai omuk aati ihuo enyomo hunno ofodoŋonie 'to ihiji ikoi. Ninyia hètaniŋuni isi ekiana Hollum ihuania, ette Sittan ittuna, ette ikuararu eram ania.
Arai omuk aati ihuo enyomo hunno ofodoŋonie 'to ihiji moruoi. Ninyia itaniŋuni isi ekiana Hollum ihuania, ette isi ifuotuna inyi ta namuno.
Ati obeŋ inyi ihum idioro itajia hosi, buo fe obeŋ itoŋo diya fur. Ojiori ettigemita kuyya etahawwata ofuonni te eram ono Hollum, teya teya, ette isi ihara.
Buo omuk aati arai ihuo enyomo hunno oyehini ihiji hikua. Isi aati hulle itayiruni 'to ekiana Hollum,
ati obunaru inyi te ehawwata hosi hutta fau, ta amuno esamit, iko ta adaya hirre hunnomuk 'daŋ; ania obiaŋari inyi oŋijari.
Ati arai omuk aati ihuo enyomo hunno oyehini jio aboro hunno oyiji 'to. Itayiruni isi ekiana Hollum, ette iruk, ette iŋijana eŋija: omuk atomuana hunihoi, omuk atomuana ille, buo omuk esiha abotie.”
Italeyehini adi erre 'daŋ hunyia idimani, buo fe asalani adi erre 'daŋ hunyia imuhoni.
Itayiriete yo, alla awoni ayyaha jihatai!”
Nyio, jio atulo ollo owon 'to iko obo ariŋ, ofonihini adi arriai jihonyi. Buo jio atulo ollo obeŋ riŋ jihonyi, iduhari adi addi jihonyi ara duadi bu obo ariŋ kaiyo ollo owon jihonyi.”
Inyiak nyia Yesu ikikianaru ahosiere jiojio, “Ara Nolobie ono Hollum ihuo ana: Oyehi nyia obo atulo enyomo imana honyi.
Oferio inyi ta attari, buo ohenyu ta afanni ette iddidaha, buo enyomo hunia isuruni ette ibobolororo. Ati otimo nyia inyi obobolororoi isi aŋai.
Aboro hama itaboloruni buo fe itaŋijani emma hunia, tetteri isuruni, teya ette itturo ania ette ŋijana emma.
Ninyia lado amana, ette atulo alia iduhuna ademi, ette idioŋo; nyio, alum nyia ayafa onno odioŋorik.
Attati Yesu jiaran jiojio, “Etarriamahi adi Nolobie Hollum iko anyio? Anani itarriamai adi enne etahutaniere inyi?
Ara inyi ihuo aŋerio cahai elle idulak obo latulo. Inyi emuta haŋer ta fau 'daŋ.
Buo ninyia isuru inyi ette ibolori ayyani enne ittok, ette isarana atanata hunne ittaha, buo aheny ette iduhonia asik hosi itua honyi.”
Ittittoyo nyia Yesu eram Hollum jio aati te etarriamata ihuo hunia; iramata nyia inyi jihosi ihuo oremehini isi itayiruna.
Obeŋ nyia inyi ittittoyo isi omuk erre arari fe te etarriamata hama. Buo alla awon inyi, inyi hama iko lejifak honyi, itahutatta nyia inyi jihosi erre 'daŋ.
Nyia otoriai to oloŋ nyia, ojio nyia Yesu jio lejifak honyi jio, “Hallaŋata aŋati tafar enne ittok tole.”
Ania, ette lejifak idehina eluluŋ waati, ette idahina itogol ninyia awanari Yesu, ette ifuatan ikonyi. Owoni nyia buo fe omuk atogoli diya.
Teya teya, ette oyyami enne ittok hutan, ette apoŋia poŋia hari ifoliahino itua togol many ojiari atogol efut ahari.
Oferio nyia Yesu itua togol tettehalu buo ibalorok ahou honyi illuri. Attati lejifak honyi itaheny inyi, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Hettiyanani, ibeŋ iyye igigilo ta aye onno ottu 'to ana jihohoi?”
Attati Yesu ihenyuna, ette iŋerejanio oyyami ania jiojio, “Oduai!” ette iramana apoŋia poŋia hari jiojio, “Owotiai dee!” Ette oyyami ania iwotia, ette ediofo 'daŋ iwotia dee.
Attati Yesu jiaran jio lejifak honyi, “Ibaŋata itai anyio? Obeŋ eruk jihatai?”
Ati abaŋi nyia isi 'daŋ bebe, ette ikikiana isi hama jiojio, “Ŋai 'tadi olo? Ara duadi bu aari iko oyyami, oniŋie inyi!”
Afany nyia Yesu iko lejifak honyi ifohor tole ono atafar Galilea, ifau Gerasa.
Teya teya, ninyia hèsuru Yesu to togol, oruaŋanie inyi iko obo latulo linyia ottu 'to te ilumio. Owon nyia atulo alia iko aminiaŋati,
buo fe amanyatio ilumio. Obeŋ nyia obo atulo oremik inyiak ifit inyi ta aririk.
Ifiti nyia inyi enyiahita arriai ta abilat iko aririk, ati odulo nyia inyi afucio aririk, buo fe iŋuŋucio abilat hunyia ifitanierek eejek iko ahas honyi. Obeŋ nyia tulo oremik inef inyi.
Iddidaha nyia inyi ihiji ilumio ta afanni iko ta arue, buo fe odohita ihide doŋiok buo ituruho, buo fe ibibuacio ahuan honyi ta amoruoi.
Ninyia igonyu inyi Yesu alamarai, ette inyi iŋioron jihonyi, ette irigoŋi ihosiere honyi,
ette ituruho woŋ woŋ jiojio, “Yesu Lonyi Hollum elle Illomohi 'to 'Daŋ! Anyio enne iwak iyye jihoŋ? Ta afure Hollum, hibe awotto. Hèttigemio nani!” (
Ikiana nyia inyi ihuo nyia, nyio, ojio nyia Yesu jio, “Aminiaŋati ania, ojiŋu addi jio latulo alia!”)
Ania, ette Yesu ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Ŋai afure hoi?” Itarraŋ inyi ojio “Afure hoŋ Iluluŋ;…nyio, eluaja hohoi.”
Odulo nyia inyi attana Yesu jio, hèlaha ifuha aminiaŋa hunia addi jio afau ania.
Owoni nyia omuk abataha arriai hunna attaditai lididaf doŋe.
Ania, ette aminiaŋa hunia ittana Yesu jio, “Ifuhak hohoi jio abataha hua, ijiara hohoi ejiŋak jihosi.”

Ania, ette Yesu iŋatana isi; buo aminiaŋa hunia ette ijiŋuna addi jio atulo alia, ette ijiŋana jio abataha, buo abataha hunia 'daŋ so so isuoro te edidaf doŋe jiojio hutu, hutu, hutu, ette ikuahino itua tafar enne ittokon jio woo, ette idioro, ette iye diya. Arai nyia abataha hunia ihuo alif arrihai (2000).
Ofuhororoi nyia eyyahak bataha hunia, ette itisarrahina eram ania itua bore gala iko itua matta. Attati aati ifuanna mijio erre hoduo iduoŋi 'to hunia.
Ninyia afuonni isi jio Yesu, igonyuni nyia isi latulo ollo owattatio 'to iko aminiaŋa arriai itoŋo diya elle iyyafatio aboŋojin buo fe ahou honyi abis. Ania, ette isi 'daŋ ibaŋi.
Buo aati hunyia igonyuni 'to erre hunia ette iramana anyio hirre hoduo iduoŋi 'to jio latulo miniaŋa alia iko jio abataha.
Ania, ette aati afau ania ittana Yesu hètelo ta fau hosi addi.
Ninyia lalo Yesu idahina itogol, ette latulo linyia owon 'to iko aminiaŋa ittana inyi jiojio, “Efuo 'daŋ ikoŋ!”
Ati iha nyia Yesu, ette iramana inyi jiojio, “Acaharu haŋ, ilo iramak aati hutta haŋ hatai erre hunne ihan Lamonye jihoi, iko amehino honyi jihoi.”
Ania, ette latulo alia leten, ette ilur Aborejin Gala Huna 'Tomon 'daŋ buo iriramaru erre hunyia ihan Yesu jihonyi, buo aati 'daŋ ette illilliha.
Ninyia inyiak Yesu 'laŋan afohor tole ono atafar enne ittokon, owon nyia inyi ilotifor tafar buo eluluŋ waati enne ittok ette ittubanio jihonyi.
Attati elettok olo aaji emojit, afure honyi Yayiro, ittuna. Ninyia igonyu inyi Yesu, ette inyi irruaŋana ahuan ihosiere hejek honyi,
ette ittana inyi jio, “Oŋuai ŋarri hoŋ onno odiha 'to many imohita, waŋ ottirok ahas hoi jihonyi, oŋida adi inyi, ette isu!”
Attati Yesu leten ikonyi buo aati arriai hunne ifudanie nyik nyik ajihonyi ette ifuatan ikonyi.
Owon nyia buo fe obo aŋotte diya onno oŋuai iko ayaf yaf aŋasi 'tomon harrihai.
Otuhok nyia inyi erre honyi 'daŋ jio a diktorat arriai buo obeŋ oŋida, ati oŋitek 'daŋ orrorrohojaru nyia aŋuai honyi ania.
Itaniŋu nyia inyi eram Yesu, ania ette inyi ihihisuno te ehiji waati te ehalu Yesu.
Nyio, ikiana nyia inyi ta ataji honyi jio, “Duadi bu attir ni aboŋo honyi ijiai, aŋida adi ni.”
Ania, ette inyi ittir aboŋo Yesu, teya teya, ette ayaf yaf honyi ŋidari buo inyi, ette mijana jio aŋida inyi.
Teya teya, omijak nyia Yesu jio alo aduaran jihonyi addi, ette inyi iyito jio eluluŋ waati, ette ifiyo jiojio, “Ŋai ottir aboŋo hoŋ?”
Itarraŋi lejifak honyi jiojio, “Igonyu bu iyye aati ifudanie nyik nyik ajihoi buo iyye inyiak ifiyo jiojio ŋai ottir iyye?”
Ati odulo nyia inyi attifia ŋai ottir inyi.
Ati omijak nyia aŋotte ania erre hunyia iduoŋi 'to jihonyi, ette inyi ittuna jio Yesu anna abaŋ, ette irigoŋi ihosiere honyi, ette ipulonia ahode hode hirre 'daŋ.
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Ŋarri hoŋ, itaŋida eruk hoi iyye. Ilo te elik taji.”
Ninyia hekiana Yesu erre huna, ofuonni nyia omuk eyak sayyo ta haŋ Yayiro, ette iramana inyi jiojio, “Aye ŋarri hoi. Hènyiak ittigemio ettiyanani obojiai!”
Ati itafayacio
Attati Yesu itik aati 'daŋ afuatan ikonyi arari Petro iko Yakobo buo illanyi Yoane hama.
Ninyia afanyi isi ihaŋ Yayiro, ette Yesu igonyuna aati arriai oyihinie 'tor buo fe ituruhoi woŋ woŋ.
Ojiŋak nyia inyi attua ette jiaran jihosi, “Nyio iyihiniete itai 'tor buo fe ituruhoti? Obeŋ neto ania oye, ojoto inyi joto!”

Ati osuhotierek nyia isi inyi, ania ette inyi ifuhara isi 'daŋ allet, ette iyaru monye iko honye hito buo lejifak honyi hula hunihoi, hoduo ofuonni 'to ikonyi, ette isi ijiŋara imaji ninyia awanari eto nyia.
Ette Yesu inef aani eto ania, ette jiaran, “Talita, kum,” onno ojio 'to jio, “Iŋie, ajio ni jihoi totte!”
Teya teya, ette eto ania idioto, ette idaha. (Arai nyia aŋasi honyi 'tomon harrihai.) Illillihai nyia isi 'daŋ bebe ninyia iduoŋi erre hunia.
Ati ihum nyia Yesu iramana isi hèlaha iramani obo atulo, ette iramana isi jio, “Isiatta inyi obo aŋiyo.”
Idiaharu nyia Yesu amaji ania, ette icaharu abore gala hosi, buo lejifak honyi ette ijifaru inyi.

Ninyia afany oloŋ Sabatto, ette inyi itterio ettiyenio ihaji emojit. Oluaji nyia aati diya. Buo ninyia itaniŋuni isi ettiyenio honyi, ette isi 'daŋ illilliha, ette jiaran, “Orumak inyi erre hunia 'daŋ ajia? Anyio ofioro hunne isiarani hunia jihonyi? Aŋai ihanio inyi eduariti hunia?
Obiaŋara soho ahololoni alia, lonyi Maria, illa ba Yakobo, Yosefu, Yuda iko Simone? Obeŋi soho haniyarak honyi emanyai ikohoi dini?” Ania, ette isi ihara inyi.
Tania, obeŋ nyia inyi oremik ihanio omuk eduariti diya arari eyabana honyi ahas jio omuk aŋuak kaiyo, ette itaŋida isi.
Illilliha nyia Yesu bebe ta abiaŋan ono eruk jio aati.
Attati Yesu leten jio amisihi hunno onyihai 'to jio amaji ania, ette ittiyenio.
Ottubak nyia inyi lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai amaji abotie, ette ifahina isi arrihai arrihai. Isiarak nyia inyi jihosi elohittok igalihiniere aminiaŋa,
buo fe ihum iramana jihosi jio, “Hèyatti obo ariŋ ta adaha hatai, arari atelek ijiai. Hèyatti emune, edee hemimojok, kuyya agurusi iloboni hatai.
Iyyafatti amuha, ati hèyyafatti agamisi arrihai.”
Ette buo fe inyi jiaran jihosi jio, “Elle ifuotuni itai jio obo ahaŋ, itoŋoti diya many ifuatti itai addi.
Buo alla abeŋi ifuotuni itai jio obo abore gala kuyya buo fe obeŋi itaniŋie jihatai, ifuatta addi teya, ipipuahara attuduha addi to hejek hatai, oŋida ara esarit jihosi.”
Ania, ette isi ifuatan, ette ittittoyo aati oŋida idehini eyyata hosi.
Ifuhari nyia isi addi aminiaŋa arriai, ette iyal aŋuak arriai te eyali, ette itaŋida isi.
Buo fe omuk ojiori, “Elija alia.”
Buo omuk ojiori jio, “Ara inyi ahekianani Hollum ihuo obo olo ekianak Hollum hinyia berien.”
Ati ninyia itayiru Erode eram ania, ette inyi jiaran, “Itubuhuni Yoane linyia aŋutu ni ahou honyi addi!”
Nyio, Erode nyia itinefu Yoane, ette itifitana inyi ibabus te eram Erodias, ŋoruoi illanyi Filipo, ninyia itadetu inyi.
Iŋerejanio nyia Yoane jio Erode jiojio, “Obeŋ obis jihoi itadetuniere ŋoruoi illahoi!”
Ania, owoni nyia aŋunai Erodias iko Yoane, many awahari inyi ittohoro inyi, ati te eram Erode, ittallik nyia inyi ihan ihuo nyia.

Abaŋ nyia Erode Yoane bebe; nyio, omijak nyia inyi jio ara Yoane atulo oloyijio buo fe ololibo, ania ottoŋotiere inyi Yoane onno oyyu. Omuno nyia inyi etaniŋio jio Yoane duadi bu oŋuŋusia atua honyi eram enne itaniŋu inyi jio Yoane.
Attati amiji siruna Erodias to oloŋ ninyia itahabuyerek esiuna ono Erode. Ihuhumak nyia Erode agari jio elettaha gala honyi iko ajafiti buo elettaha hulo Galilea.
Ottu nyia ŋarri Erodias,
Te ettuŋita arriai ojio nyia Erode jihonyi jio, “'Tuŋ, esio adi ni luŋa ariŋ enne iwak iyye, ara duo bu anus ono nobuore hoŋ!”
Ania, ette neto ania jiŋara allet, ette ifiyo honyonyi jiojio, “Ijiara ani alo ifiyo anyio?”
Buo honyonyi ette itarraŋ ojio, “Ahou Yoane etifuotoni Batisimo.”
Teya teya, ette inyi icaharu kokuak jio hobu Erode, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Awak ni ihuania, ihuania, oŋida iyye isiarak ani ahou Yoane etifuotoni batisimo itua 'rany!”
Itijiriŋ nyia eram ana hobu bebe, ati ittallik nyia inyi ihara, nyio ittuŋo nyia inyi ihosiere tamonok honyi 'daŋ.
Teya teya, ette Hobu ifahina obo olo oseŋer hulo erririak hételo iyaŋuno ahou Yoane. Ette erririani alia leten ibabus, ette iŋutuno ahou Yoane,
ette iyaŋuno inyi itua 'rany, ette isio inyi jio neto ania, buo neto ania ette isiarana inyi jio honyonyi.
Ninyia itayiruni lejifak Yoane eram ania, ette isi ifuanna, ette ikafaru ahuan honyi, ette inuhana inyi.
Ocohunie nyia lefahat jio Yesu, ette iramana jihonyi erre 'daŋ hunyia ihani isi buo fe ittiyenie.

Obiaŋarak nyia asaa jihosi iyiriari iŋiyere, nyio, odulori nyia aati arriai adaha wat wat jihosi. Ania, ette Yesu jiaran jio lefahat honyi jio, “Hafatta jio obo amaji onno oyur 'to oŋida efuo iyiri kai.”
Ania, ette isi ifuatan ta atogol jio obo amaji onno oyur 'to isi hama.

Ati igonyuni nyia aati arriai isi ofuoi, ette isi imijana baŋai isi. Ania, ette isi ifuanna jio aborejin gala hua 'daŋ, ette iŋioron te eejek ahosiere jio amaji nyia, ette ifanyan diya ahosiere Yesu iko lejifak honyi.

Ninyia afany inyi ilotifor, igonyu nyia inyi eluluŋ waati enne ittok, ette ataji honyi imehino jihosi. Nyio, arai nyia isi ihuo akioro hunno obeŋ heyyahani. Ania, ette inyi itterio ettiyenio isi erre arriai.
Ninyia ara ollotoriai, ette lejifak honyi ifuanna jihonyi, ette jiaran, “Alo oloŋ iddorro buo fe amaji ana oyur.
Itatturok aati; ijiara ofuoi jio amatta iko amisik hunia inyiaŋuniere obo aŋiyo hosi.”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu jiojio, “Itai ta ahuattek hatai, isiatta jihosi obo aŋiyo.”
Buo isi ette ifiyo inyi ojio, “Iwak ati iyye hohoi efuo ituhonia arobiyaa
Ania, ette Yesu ifiyo isi jiojio, “Omukajia emunio hunno owoni 'to jihatai? Ike ifuatta imijata.”
Ninyia arumani isi, ette isi iramana inyi jio, “Emunio miyet iko aham arrihai.”
Attati inyi iramana lejifak honyi hétetitoŋohi aati 'daŋ eluluŋi eluluŋi jio amiyaŋ egara.
Ania, ette aati itoŋo eluluŋi eluluŋi; omuk esiha abotie, buo omuk atomuana miyet.

Attati Yesu iduhuna emunio hoduo miyet iko aham hula arrihai, ette ibonno ahide dou, ette isio ahumo jio Hollum, ette ibibeny emunio, ette isiarana jio lejifak oŋida ihiharani jio aati, ette buo fe inyi iguguasana aham hula arrihai jihosi 'daŋ.
Anyai nyia isi 'daŋ many ifuaŋarik.
Attati lejifak ihuhuronia ofitot huno emunio iko aham itua afeehien 'tomon harrihai lur lur.
Arai nyia aliawa hunyia oŋiye 'to emunio hunia alif miyet (5,000).
Teya Teya, itadak nyia Yesu lejifak honyi itogol oŋida allaŋi to osiere honyi ifohor tole many Besseyida, buo inyi itatturok eluluŋ waati.
Ninyia esio inyi ahumo jio aati, ette inyi leten ihide lobo ladoŋe imojori.
Ninyia ara akekai, afany nyia atogol nyia ihiji tafar enne ittokon, buo Yesu harasa ifohor inyi hama.

Igonyu nyia inyi lejifak honyi itagolie egurio hari; nyio, ohut nyia oyyami bebe ajihosi. Ojio ninyia iliaha ataŋatio motie, ette Yesu ittuna jihosi alla adahuno ta ahide hari. Awak nyia inyi igalaru isi.
Ati ninyia igonyuni isi inyi adaha ihide hari, ette isi ituruho jiojio, “Etieŋ alia!”
Abaŋi nyia isi 'daŋ bebe ninyia igonyuni isi inyi.
Teya teya, ette Yesu jiaran jihosi jio, “Itagoloto atajia, ani alia, hèbaŋata.”
Attati inyi idahina jihosi itua togol, buo oyyami nyia ette iwotia. Buo lejifak 'daŋ ette illilliha bebe,
nyio, hobeŋi nyia isi omijani awoyo hiram ninyia itaŋiyere Yesu aati alif miyet; nyio, agalik eram ania ofioro hosi.
Ninyia allaŋi isi afohor tafar tole, afanyi nyia isi Genesaret amaji ninyia ataranierek isi atogol.
Oheruni nyia aati Yesu ninyia hèsuruni isi ihuania to togol.
Ania, ette isi iŋioron aŋati nyia 'daŋ, ette ikafuno aŋuak te eferiti jio amasik 'daŋ hunyia itayirunierek isi jio owon Yesu diya.

Buo jio amasik 'daŋ hunyia afanyari Yesu, ihuo amisihi, aborejin gala, kuyya amatta, itaferihini nyia aati, aŋuak hosi isuk, ette ittana inyi ijiara aŋatak aŋuak ottiri ara duadi bu esidi boŋo honyi; buo hinyia ottiri 'to 'daŋ ette iŋidari.
Ofuonni nyia omuk
Igonyuni nyia isi omuk lejifak Yesu oŋiye aŋiria hobeŋi ihumi ifinia. Obeŋi nyia lejifak hulia ihumi illilla ahas hosi ihuo awahi
(Nyio, obeŋi nyia
Ittallihi nyia isi iŋiyo erre 'daŋ hunne iyaŋunie isi to suk hobeŋi illillai
Ania, ette
Attati Yesu itarraŋ isi ojio, “Itai etihanak huattek hulo! Ottenu nyiadi Isaya to ninyia ikianari inyi eram Hollum tetai jiojio,
‘Ojio Hollum jio, itahabuye aati hulo ani te etuhe hosi,
buo atajia hosi luŋa alamaji jihoŋ.
Itahabuye isi ani obojiai,
nyio, ittiyenie isi efahita waati ihuo anna arai efahita hoŋ!’
“Idehina itai efahita Hollum buo igottiette ettiyenita waati.”
Ette Yesu inyiak jiaran jihosi jio, “Igigiloti itai jio ibisata itai te edehina hatai efahita Hollum buo igolihina kok kok jio ettiyenita hatai!
Nyio, iramak nyia Mose jio, ‘Abaŋa monyohoi iko honyohoi,’ buo ‘Atulo elle ittarrohojio 'to afure monyonyi, kuyya ono honyonyi, ijiara luŋa ottohori inyi.’
Ihuania, owoni omuk hulatai iko omuk asaŋ iluahiere monyie hosi kuyya honyie hosi. Ati oliai isi jio, ‘Arai isi Korban’, (onno ojio 'to jio, arai isi ahuno Hollum).
Tania, ittiyeniete itai jio, oŋida aŋatani isi obeŋi oluahierek monyie kuyya honyie hosi.
Te ekoi ania, itapuahi ettiyenita hunne ittiyeniete itai jio aati eram Hollum. Owoni buo fe erre arriai ihuo hunia hunne ihaniete itai.”
Attati Yesu inyiak iloŋuna eluluŋ waati, ette jiaran jihosi jio, “Itai 'daŋ, itayiriete jihoŋ buo fe omijana jio,
obiaŋara ariŋ onno ojiŋa 'to totto hutuk tulo
[Itayiriete, alla awoni ayyaha jihatai]
Ninyia abusaru inyi eluluŋ waati ette ijiŋana itua haji, ifiye nyia lejifak honyi inyi oŋida iramak awoyo hiram ono etarriamai ania.
Buo inyi ette itarraŋ isi jiojio, “Ibiaŋata buo fe itai imijana ihuo aati hullomuk? Ibiaŋata itai imijana jio obeŋi erre hunno ojiŋari 'to attua tulo itiboti inyi.
Nyio, obeŋ inyi ojiŋak itua taji honyi, ati ojiŋak inyi itua hohe honyi, ette iculuna addi to huan.” (Ta ajiaran honyi erre hunia, itahutak inyi jio oyiji amat 'daŋ iŋiyere.)
Attati inyi jiaran jio, “Erre hunno ojiŋuni 'to totua tulo, isi itiboti inyi.
Nyio, to tua iko to taji tulo ofuonni egigilita hunno orrohoji hunne iyarai 'to inyi ihaniere erre ihuo; erre somon, ahoho, attohoro tulo, aroto,
adaya, arrohojita, enyobio, asilara, ahaini, etarrohojo fureta waati, etadara, iko abiaŋan hou.
Ofuonni erre hunno orrohoji 'to hunia 'daŋ to tua tulo, ette
Teya odioto nyia Yesu ette leten jio aŋati fau etteger borejin gala Taya iko Sidon, ette ijiŋana itua haji buo fe obeŋ awak obo atulo omijak jio awon inyi diya, ati ittallik nyia inyi idima.
Owon nyia obo aŋotte diya ninyia owon ŋarri honyi iko aminiaŋati. Teya teya, ninyia itayiru inyi awanan Yesu, ette inyi ittuna, ette irigoŋo ihosiere honyi;
ette ittana Yesu oŋida ifuha aminiaŋati ania addi jio ŋarri honyi. Ara nyia aŋotte ania ahono Grik, ta ŋati Fonisia atta fau Siria.
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi jio, “Hétanyata do aduri, nyio, obeŋ oyyu iruoŋoniere aŋiyo duri jio aŋohe.”
Buo aŋotte ania ette itarraŋ ojio, “Aafe Lettok, ara duadi bu aŋohe hutto woyo 'teremeja, ihuhuroi buo fe isi ebenyiti ŋiria hunno oddoddouni 'to jio aduri.”
Ania, ette Yesu jiaran jihonyi jio, “Te etarraŋi hoi ania otto icaharu haŋ. Irumak adi iyye aminiaŋati nyia alo addi jio ŋarri hoi!”
Attati aŋotte ania leten haŋ, ette inyurana ŋarri honyi ofer iŋeref buo aminiaŋati nyia luŋa alo addi jihonyi.
Attati Yesu icaharu addi ta ŋati etteger Taya, ette leten totto Sidon iko totto ŋati Aborejin Gala Huna 'Tomon many itafar enne ittokon ono Galilea.
Otto omuk aati iyaŋuno jihonyi obo olottuho buo fe ittallik ikiana, ette ittana Yesu oŋida iyabak ahas honyi jio olottuho alia.
Ania, ette Yesu iyaru inyi iger te iluluŋ, ette ittironia afiala honyi iyyaha atulo alia, ette imitana amilak, ette ittir aŋadief honyi.
Attati Yesu ibonno ahide idou, ette iyiri hau, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Efata,” onno ojio 'to jio, “Aŋati!”
Teya teya, ette ayyaha atulo alia iŋa, buo fe aŋadief honyi ette iwalaha ette inyi ikiana onno oyyu.
Attati Yesu ihum iramana aati jio, hèlaha isi iramani eram ania jio obo atulo. Ati elle ihum inyi iramana isi ihuo nyia, inyiahi tibuo isi itisarrahina eram ania.
Buo aati 'daŋ hunyia itayiruni 'to eram ania ette illilliha bebe ette jiaran, “Ihanio inyi erre 'daŋ onno oyyu! Ara duadi bu attuhok, itayirie; buo fe aati hulle iriatai aŋadiafa, ikianai!”
Hobeŋi nyia oŋitek arriai allaŋi, ette obo eluluŋ waati hama inyiak ittubanio diya. Buo ninyia abiaŋarak isi obo aŋiyo ette Yesu iloŋuna lejifak honyi, ette jiaran jihosi,
“Omehino ataji hoŋ aati hulo, nyio, atuhi isi oŋitek hunihoi ikoŋ obeŋi anyai obo ariŋ.
Elle etatturok ni isi ihaŋitek hosi hullo oniamai, ofuoi adi isi imohita ihiji ikoi, nyio, ofuonni omuk hulosi alamarai.”
Buo lejifak honyi ette ifiyo inyi ojio, “Ŋai adi oremik inyurana obo aŋiyo jio ediofo ana itaŋiyere aati hulo 'daŋ?”
Attati Yesu ifiyo isi ojio, “Owoni emunio baya jihatai?”
Itarraŋi isi jiojio, “Emunio hattarik.”

Ania, ette Yesu ihum iramana eluluŋ waati hétetoŋohi ifau, ette iduhuna emunio huna hattarik, ette isio ahumo jio Hollum, ette ibibeny isi, ette isio jio lejifak honyi oŋida ihiharani jio eluluŋ waati, buo lejifak ette ihan ihuo nyia.
Owoni nyia buo fe isi iko omuk aham kaiyo hullo odihara 'to. Ninyia isiarak Yesu ahumo tesi, ette inyi iramana lejifak honyi oŋida buo fe ihiharani aham hulia.
Oŋiyei nyia isi 'daŋ many ifuaŋarik. Attati lejifak ihuhuronia ebenyiti ofitot itua afeehien hattarik 'daŋ lur lur.
Arai nyia aati hia ihuo alif aŋuan (4,000).
Attati Yesu itatturonia isi, buo teya teya ette idahina atogol inyi iko lejifak honyi, ette ifuatan ifau Dalmanuta.
Ati oyiri nyia Yesu hau, ette jiaran, “Nyio awahi aati hula ahana eduarit? Hode, eramak ni itai jio, obeŋi adi ihani jihosi obo eduarit.”
Idiaharu nyia inyi isi, ette inyiak idahina itogol, ette illaŋara aŋati tafar tole.
Oguoroi nyia lejifak Yesu eyaru emunio hunno oremehini, arari emune abotie ijiai ninyia owon 'to jihosi itua togol.
Asar nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Ihumata imijio olobou
Itterie nyia isi ikikiana isi hama jiojio, “Ikiana inyi ihuo nyia, nyio, ebeŋ duo eyaŋuno obo emune.”
Ati omijak nyia Yesu erre hunne ikianai isi. Ania ette inyi ifiyo isi jiojio, “Nyio ikikianati itai ta abiaŋan obo emune jihatai? Hèbiaŋata itai igonyuna buo fe imijana? Hoddiŋi ossi hatai?
Owoni oŋite jihatai…ibiaŋata itai imijiete? Owoni ayyaha…jihatai ibiaŋata itai itayiriete? Ibiaŋata itai igiluna,
ninyia abenyiere ni emunio jio aati alif miyet (5,000)? Iddudduhuna nyia itai ofitot afeehien omukajia?”
Itarraŋi isi inyi jiojio, “'Tomon harrihai.”
Buo Yesu ette inyiak ifiyo isi ojio, “Buo ninyia abenyiere ni emunio hunyia hattarik, hunyia etaŋiyere ni aati alif aŋuan (4,000), itilluronia nyia itai ofitot afeehien omukajia?”
Itarraŋi isi jiojio, “Hattarik.”
Buo inyi ette jiaran jihosi, “Hèrasati fe itai 'daŋ itimo?”
Ninyia afuonni isi Besseyida, iyaŋunie nyia omuk aati obo oloŋodo jio Yesu, ette ittana Yesu hotottiro inyi.

Ania, ette Yesu ittoŋ aani atulo alia, ette irihoro inyi addi to tua miji. Ninyia amitak inyi amilak ihoŋite atulo alia, buo fe iyabak ahas honyi jihonyi, ette inyi ifiyo inyi ojio, “Igonyu iyye obo ariŋ?”
Attati atulo lia ibonno ahide, ette jiaran, “Aafe, egonyu ni aati, ati arai isi ihuo ayyani hunne iddidahai.”
Attati Yesu inyiak iyabana ahas honyi ihoŋite latulo alia. Ania ette atulo alia ihum mijio 'tok 'tok, ette oŋite honyi iŋidari, ette igonyuna erre 'daŋ onno oyyu.
Attati Yesu ifahina latulo alia ihaŋ hosi buo ihum iramana inyi jiojio, “Hècaharu attua miji.”
Attati Yesu leten iko lejifak honyi jio amisihi hutteger Cesaria Filipi. Ojio ihiji ikoi, ette inyi ifiyo lejifak honyi jiojio, “Ojiori aati ani ŋai?”
Itarraŋ Petro inyi ojio, “Iyye
Attati Yesu ihum iramana isi jio, “Hèramana obo atulo eram ania.”

Itterio nyia Yesu ettiyenio lejifak honyi jiojio, “Obolo adi ettigemio jio Lonyi Tulo, ihari adi inyi lahou iko ehumak elettaha, buo fe ettiyanak ifahita. Ottohori adi inyi, ati ihalu oŋitek hunihoi ibuhu adi inyi toye.”
Opulok nyia inyi erre hunia jihosi sar sar, ania, ette Petro iyaru inyi eger, ette iriŋ inyi.
