Ati oyito nyia Yesu, ette mijio jio lejifak honyi, ette iriŋ Petro, ette jiaran, “Sittan, ilo addi teger hoŋ! Nyio, obiaŋara egigilo Hollum ottonohoi ania, ati ono aati.”
Nyio, alla awak obo atulo italuahuna esu honyi, italitohi adi inyi. Ati atulo elle italitohi 'to esu honyi te eram hoŋ iko te eram asayyo ayijok, italuahu adi inyi.
Anyio yiji 'tadi inyi, alla anyurak obo atulo erre 'daŋ hutta fau buo italitohi esu honyi?
Anyio riŋ adi onno oremik inyi isio inyiahuniere esu honyi?

Elle iloriri obo atulo toni iko te eram hoŋ ihosiere waati hula ahana, hullo otimoi 'to Hollum buo fe arai aheyyak, iloriri adi buo fe Lonyi Tulo tenyi alla attu inyi ta akuatan ono Monyonyi iko ono ajilohien hullo olibori 'to.”
Attati inyi inyiak jiaran jihosi, “Hode, eramak ni itai, owoni omuk dini hullo obeŋi adi igonyuni aye many igonyunierek isi Olobie Hollum ottu ta agolon.”
buo fe aboŋojin honyi ette ipipiahi biny biny abuoŋi agalihini hunne illilla tulo ta fau 'daŋ.
Attati isi 'daŋ hunihoi igonyuna Elija iko Mose ikianai iko Yesu.
Ette Petro jiaran jio Yesu, “Hettiyanani, oyyu jihohoi iwanari dini! Eduhok adi hohoi aticio hunihoi; abotie jihoi, abotie jio Mose, buo fe abotie jio Elija.”
Obeŋ nyia Petro omijak eken adi inyi anyio hirre; nyio abaŋi nyia isi bebe.
Ninyia amiji isi kuak ihuania, obeŋi nyia isi igonyuni obo atulo, arari fe Yesu hama.
Ninyia isuruni isi to doŋe, ette Yesu ihum iramana isi jio, “Hèramana obo atulo erre hunne igonyuna itai, many ibuhuniere Lonyi Tulo toye.”
Ania, ette isi iduahiniere eram ania, buo ikikianai isi hama jiojio, “Ojio awoyo hiram ono ‘ebuhuna toye’ anyio?”
Attati isi ifiyo inyi jio, “Nyioti, ojiori ettiyanak ifahita jio, oŋida Elija ottu do ahosiere?”
Itarraŋ inyi isi ojio, “Ottu adi Elija luŋa ahosiere ihuhumaniere erre 'daŋ. Nyioti igioroni Ibuk Hollum jio, ittigemie adi Lonyi Tulo bebe ette ihara inyi?
Ati, eramak ni itai jio, lattu nyia Elija buo isi ette ihanio jihonyi ihuo awahi isi, ihuo enne igioronierek Ibuk Hollum tenyi.”
Ninyia acohunie isi jio lejifak hullomuk, igonyuna nyia isi eluluŋ waati enne ittok okudani isi, buo isi itarisai iko omuk ettiyanak ifahita.
Illillihai nyia aati bebe ninyia igonyuni isi Yesu, ette iŋioron jihonyi, ette ifonya inyi.
Attati Yesu ifiyo lejifak honyi jiojio, “Anyio riŋ enne itarisati itai iko isi?”
Buo lobo atulo teluluŋ ette itarraŋ ojio, “Hettiyanani, eyaŋuno duo ni Lonyi hoŋ jihoi, nyio, owon inyi iko aminiaŋati enne itik inyi ekiana.

Elle inef aminiaŋati ania inyi, obuaratta inyi, buo obulal ette ittutta totto hutuk, ette inyi iŋuruta aala, ette ahuan honyi igolioro koŋodor. Efiyo duo ni lejifak hoi hétefuhahi aminiaŋati ania addi, ati ittallihi duo isi ifuhara.”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ isi ojio, “Aii, itai aati hullo obeŋ eruk! Etoŋo adi ni ikatai many baya? Many baya adi adik ni itai? Iyaŋuniete leto alia jihoŋ!”
Ette isi iyaŋuno inyi jio Yesu.
Teya teya, ninyia igonyu aminiaŋati ania Yesu, ette inyi inef leto alia ette leto alia kuaharu ifau, ette ibalaŋatio buo obulal ette ittuna totto hutuk.
Attati Yesu ifiyo monye hito jiojio, “Many baya ara inyi ihuania?”
Buo inyi ette itarraŋ ojio, “Many hara ahito.
Enyiahita arriai itakuahitta aminiaŋati ania inyi itua hima iko itua hari ittohori inyi. Ati elle iremik iyye itaŋida inyi, omehinie jihohoi! Oluaha hohoi!”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ inyi ojio, “Nyio ijio iyye, elle iremik iyye, oremik atulo ollo owon 'to iko eruk ihanio erre 'daŋ.”
Teya teya, ette monye leto alia iyyoo jiojio, “Awon ni iko eruk. Ati omuta, oluaha nani, inyiaha ifuanana jihoŋ obo!”

Ninyia igonyu Yesu eluluŋ waati ihuhutu ajihosi, ette inyi iŋerejanio jio aminiaŋati ania jiojio, “Iyye aminiaŋati enne itattuhio 'to buo fe itik ekiana, ehum ni iramana iyye, ojiŋu addi jio leto alia, hènyiak ijiŋana jihonyi 'tuŋ!”
Attati aminiaŋati ania ituruho, ette isiarana leto alia aahue onno orroho bebe, ette ijiŋuna addi; ette leto alia irahan ihuo ayaani, buo aati 'daŋ ette jiaran jio, “Aye inyi!”
Ati inef nyia Yesu aani leto alia, ette itadetuna inyi, ette inyi iwotia.
Ninyia lajiŋak Yesu itua haji ette lejifak honyi ifiyo inyi buo isi owoni isi hama jiojio, “Nyio duati ettallik hohoi ifuhara aminiaŋati ania addi?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Oremehini ifuhara ariŋ anna ara 'to ihuania ta amojo hama, buo obiaŋara to obo ariŋ.”
Ninyia alo Yesu iko lejifak honyi teya, ofuoi nyia isi totto Galilea. Obeŋ nyia inyi awak obo atulo oŋida omijak amaji anna awanari inyi.
Nyio, ittiyenio nyia inyi lejifak honyi jio, “Isiori adi Lonyi Tulo ihas waati. Ottohori adi isi inyi, buo attohori inyi, itubuhuni adi inyi ihalu oŋitek hunihoi.”
Obeŋi nyia lejifak omijani ojio ekiana ania anyio, ati abaŋi nyia isi ifiyere inyi.
Ofuoi nyia Yesu iko lejifak honyi many Kapernaum. Buo ninyia ajiŋani isi itua haji, ette inyi ifiyo isi jio, “Anyio eduo itarisati itai ihiji ikoi?”
Ania, ette Yesu iwoniara, ette iloŋuna lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai, ette jiaran jihosi, “Alla awak obo irahan etteri, ijiara inyi luŋa hétera esidi iko ahegiamani olo aati 'daŋ.”
Attati inyi irihuna eto, ette itawojihina ihiji hosi, ette ikafuna inyi ta ahas honyi, ette jiaran jihosi,
“Lia, elle ifuotu 'to eto ollo odiha 'to olo ta afure hoŋ, ifuotu inyi ani; buo lia, elle ifuotu 'to ani, obeŋ inyi ifuotu ani, ati ifuotu inyi lia, elle ifahu 'to ani.”
Attati Yoane jiaran jihonyi, “Hettiyanani, egonyu duo hohoi obo atulo ifuhatio aminiaŋa ta afure hoi, ette hohoi itik inyi, nyio obeŋ inyi ara teluluŋ hohoi.”
Ati iramak nyia Yesu inyi jiojio, “Hètihoto inyi; nyio, obeŋ obo oremik ihanio eduariti ta afure hoŋ buo ihalu olo ittarrohojio afure hoŋ.
Nyio, lia ollo obeŋ 'to oliwari hohoi, ara inyi aholohoi.
Hode, eramak ni itai jio, lia elle isio 'to jihatai aari amatat, ta arahan hatai a huloŋ, ifuotu adi inyi luŋa esiorita honyi.
“Lia, elle isusuhi 'to obo jio eruhok hoŋ hulo iyyauniere, osiru ifitani noonye hiriai imurut honyi, ette ibironia inyi itua hari enne ittok.
Elle iyaru aani hoi iyye iyyauniere, oŋutoi inyi addi, iyyak jihoi ilari jio esu 'tulaŋ buo iwon iko aani abotie, agalik jihoi ilari ihima onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ iko ahas arrihai.
[Diya, ‘Obeŋi ahuru hunno oŋiye 'to isi oye, buo fe eema onno omudio 'to isi obeŋ odunya.’]
Buo elle iyaru eju hoi iyye iyyauniere, oŋutoi inyi addi; iyyak jihoi ijiŋaniere jio esu 'tulaŋ iko eju abotie, agalik ijiŋaniere ihima onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ iko eejek arrihai.
[Diya, ‘Obeŋi ahuru hunno oŋiye 'to isi oye, buo fe eema onno omudio 'to isi obeŋ odunya.’]
Buo elle itadihoro onyek hoi iyye iyyauniere, ogolotu inyi addi; iyyak jihoi ijiŋaniere Ilobie Hollum iko onyek abotie agalik ibironiere iyye iko oŋite arrihai ihima onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ.
Diya, ‘Obeŋi ahuru hunno oŋiye 'to isi oye, buo fe eema onno omudio 'to isi obeŋ odunya.’
“Italibori adi aati 'daŋ te eema ihuo enne italiborierek ehumi ta amile.
“Awanata iko amile imanya hatai, buo fe itoŋoti te elik tajia.”
Odioto nyia Yesu, ette leten Yudea, ette illaŋan afohor owore Yordano tole. Buo eluluŋ waati ette inyiak ittubanio jihonyi, buo inyi ette ittiyenio isi ihuo toloŋi.
Ofuonni nyia omuk
Attati Yesu itarraŋ isi jio, “Anyio ifahita hunyia isiarak Mose jihatai?”
Ati ojio nyia Yesu jihosi, “Igiorok nyia Mose jihatai efahita hunia, nyio, ogoli nyia ossi hatai.
Ati many tetteri, to ninyia oyyeuniere Hollum erre, oyyeu nyia inyi abusuha iko abotoro.
Nyio, te eram ania obusaru adi alle monyonyi iko honyonyi, ette inosonio iko ŋoruoi honyi
Buo isi 'daŋ arrihai ette irahan ahuan abotie. Ihuania, obeŋi isi inyiahi irahan arrihai, ati arai isi abotie.
Tania, hèlaha obo atulo itapek obo ariŋ enne inosok Hollum.”
Ninyia ajiŋani isi itua haji, ifiye nyia lejifak Yesu te eram ania.
Buo inyi ette jiaran jihosi, “Lia, ollo opiahai 'to iko ŋoruoi honyi buo ette inyiak iyemuna obo aŋotte hama, oroto inyi to hosiere ŋoruoi honyi.
Buo fe aŋotte onno opiahai 'to iko habi, buo inyiak iyemuna obo alle, oroto buo fe inyi.”
Iyaŋunie nyia omuk aati, aduri jio Yesu jio, oŋida inyi iyabak ahas honyi jihosi, ati, iŋerejanie nyia lejifak jihosi.
Ninyia igonyu Yesu eram ania, ette inyi iloŋojita, ette jiaran jio lejifak honyi, “Aŋatana aduri ofuonni jihoŋ. Hètihoto isi, nyio, ara Olobie Hollum ahono aati ihuo isi.
Hode, eramak ni itai jio, lia ollo obeŋ 'to ifuotu Olobie Hollum ihuo enne ifuotuniere eto ollo odiha 'to, obeŋ adi inyi ojiŋak diya.”
Attati inyi ikafuna iŋiayai hunia ababo, ette iyabana ahas honyi jihosi, ette imimit isi.

Ninyia holo Yesu itterio adaha honyi, ette obo latulo iŋeruna jihonyi, ette irigoŋo ihosiere honyi, ette jiaran, “Hettiyanani ollo oyyu 'to, ehan 'tadi ni anyio ifuotuniere nesu onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ?”
Itarraŋ Yesu inyi jio, “Nyio iloŋo iyye ani oloyijio? Obeŋ obo ara oloyijio arari fe Hollum hama.
Imijak iyye efahita: ‘Hèttoho, hèhanio erre somon, hèhoholio, hètisiak obo atulo obojiai, hèmumunio, abaŋa monyohoi iko honyohoi.’ ”
Buo atulo alia ette jiaran jihonyi, “Hettiyanani, aniŋio ni efahita hunia 'daŋ, many hara ni ahito.”

Attati Yesu imijio jihonyi 'tok 'tok ta abuaran taji, ette jiaran, “Hobiaŋarak iyye ariŋ abotie. Ilo itinyiaŋak asaŋ hoi 'daŋ, itte ihiharana agurusi hua jio alociaŋak, tania iwon adi iyye iko esamiti idou; buo teya, waŋ yo ijifunie nani.”
Ninyia itaniŋu latulo alia eram ania, ette omom honyi imur, ette inyi leten elle ijiriŋa, nyio, asam nyia inyi bebe.
Attati Yesu iyito jio lejifak honyi, ette jiaran, “Ogol adi bebe jio asamak ijiŋaniere Ilobie Hollum!”
Illillihai nyia lejifak bebe te ekiana ania. Attati Yesu inyiak ikiana jihosi jiojio, “Aduri hoŋ, ogol inyi bebe ijiŋaniere Ilobie Hollum!
Inyiak iliaha bebe jio akonnikonni ijiŋari te ettulit libira, agalik jio atulo asamani ijiŋari Ilobie Hollum.”
Illillihai nyia isi bebe, ette jiaran jihonyi
Ati omijio nyia Yesu jihosi 'tok 'tok, ette jiaran, “Agalik eram ania aati, ati obeŋ inyi agalik Hollum; nyio, oremik Hollum ihanio erre 'daŋ.”
Attati Petro jiaran jihonyi, “Imijie, ediehuno hohoi erre 'daŋ ijifatiere iyye.”

Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “Hode, eramak ni itai jio, atulo elle idiehuno 'to ahaŋ honyi, illarak honyi, haniyarak honyi, honyonyi, monyonyi, aduri honyi, kuyya amatta honyi ta afure hoŋ buo fe te eram ono Asayyo Ayijok,

inyiak adi inyi irumana asaŋ arriai jio aŋasi huna ahana. Ifuotu adi inyi enyiahita esiha abotie (100), asik hunnomuk, iko illarak, haniyarak, honyie, aduri iko amatta…buo ettigemita. Buo moi, ifuotu adi inyi nesu 'tulaŋ.
Ati, aati arriai hulla arai 'to ihuania etterita, arai adi ecuŋita, buo hulla arai 'to ihuania ecuŋita, arai adi etterita.”

To ninyia alari Yesu iko lejifak honyi te ekoi onno olo 'to Yerusalem, adaha nyia inyi to osiere. Illillihai nyia lejifak honyi bebe buo fe aati hunyia ijifarai 'to isi ette ibaŋi. Attati Yesu inyiak iloŋuna lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai aŋati, ette iramana jihosi erre hunno ofuoi 'to iduoŋ jihonyi,
ette jiaran jihosi jio, “Itayiriete, efuo ihuania Yerusalem, buo diya isiori adi Lonyi Tulo jio ehumak elettaha iko ettiyanak ifahita, oŋotoni adi isi jihonyi aye. Isiori adi isi inyi jio Alufajak.
Osuhotierek adi isi inyi, buo fe omicie amilak jihonyi, ette ibahio inyi, ette ittohoro inyi, ati ihalu oŋitek hunihoi ibuhu adi inyi toye.”
Ofuonni nyia lonyirok Sebedeyo, Yakobo iko Yoane, jio Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Hettiyanani, owon obo ariŋ enne ewak hohoi oŋida iyye ihan jihohoi.”
Buo Yesu ette ifiyo isi ojio, “Anyio riŋ enne iwahata itai oŋida ni ehan jihatai?”
Itarraŋi isi jiojio, “Aŋatak hohoi itoŋori Ilobie hoi onno okuat 'to; abotie totto iŋet hoi, buo abotie totto ihorroŋ hoi.”
Itarraŋi isi inyi ojio, “Eremik hohoi.” Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “Hode, idihuna adi itai ettigemita hunna alo ni irumana. Itifuotoni adi buo fe jihatai batisimo anna alo ni ifuotuna.
Ati abeŋ ni aremik inyimuna ŋai adi olo itoŋo totto iŋet kuyya totto ihorroŋ hoŋ. Nyio, arai amasik hunia ahuno hia, hinyia ihuhumani tesi.”
Ninyia itaniŋuni lejifak hula 'tomon eram ana, ette isi iloŋojita jio Yakobo iko Yoane.
Ania, ette Yesu iloŋuna isi 'daŋ arabotie jihonyi, ette jiaran, “Imijana itai jio hia hullo ojiori arai ahobuok Lufajak, ilohittohi isi jio aati hosi, buo fe elettaha ihumi ilohittok jio aati hosi.
Ati obeŋ adi inyi ara ihuo nyia jihatai. Alla awak obo alatai irahan elettok, ijiara inyi luŋa ara ahegiamani jio hullomuk.
Buo alla awak obo alatai igalihina hullomuk, ijiara inyi hétera apit hatai 'daŋ.
Nyio, obeŋ nyia buo fe Lonyi Tulo ottu jio, oŋida aati igiamai jihonyi. Ati ottu nyia inyi igiamari buo fe isiaraniere esu honyi italahuniere aati arriai.”
Afanyi nyia isi Yeriko, buo ninyia ajio Yesu alo addi teya iko lejifak honyi buo eluluŋ waati enne ittok, itoŋo nyia obo emimojoni oloŋodo iger hikoi, afure honyi Bartimeyos lonyi Timeyos.
Ninyia itayiru inyi jio Yesu olo Nasaret nyia lia, ette inyi itterio ewuwoŋita jiojio, “Yesu! Lonyi Dafide, omehinie jihoŋ!”
Iŋirejanie nyia aati arriai jihonyi ette iramana inyi hotoduai. Ati ifudak nyia inyi ewuwoŋita bebe jiojio, “Lonyi Dafide, omehinie jihoŋ!”
Ania, ette Yesu iwotia, ette jiaran jihosi, “Iloŋuna inyi.”
Ania, ette isi iloŋuna oloŋodo lia, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Itagolo ataji! Totte, iloŋo inyi iyye.”
Attati inyi iruoŋoro aboŋo honyi, ette ifirri ahide, ette ittuna jio Yesu.
Attati Yesu ifiyo inyi ojio, “Iwak iyye ani ehan anyio jihoi?”
Itarraŋ nyia oloŋodo lia jiojio, “Hettiyanani, awak ni inyiak mijio.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Ilo, itaŋida eruk hoi iyye.”
Teya teya, inyiak inyi mijio, ette ijifaru ekoi Yesu.
Ninyia iliahai isi Yerusalem, iger Besfeji iko Betani, hutteger doŋe Olifet, ette Yesu ifahina lejifak honyi arrihai ahosiere,

buo iramak isi jiojio, “Ifuatta itua miji otto hosiere hatai nyia. Teya teya, héjiŋana itai diya ihuania, inyurana adi itai aŋarri sigiria atara diya, onno hobeŋ tulo adahari. Ohouniete inyi, iyaŋuniete dini.
Elle ifiyo obo atulo itai jio, ‘Nyio ihaniete itai ariŋ ania?’ Iramana inyi jio, ‘Awak Lamonye
Ania, ette isi ifuatan ette irumana aŋarri sigiria ilofirik anna atarani ikat haŋ. Ninyia hohoye isi inyi ihuania,
ette aati hunyia owotiai 'to diya ifiyo isi jiojio, “Nyio ihoyete itai aŋarri sigiria ania?”
Attati isi itarraŋ ihuo iramak duo Yesu isi, buo aati hia ette iŋatana isi ofuoi.
Attati isi iyaŋuno aŋarri sigiria nyia jio Yesu, ette ifiatana aboŋojin hosi ihoruoŋ honyi, buo Yesu ette idahina ihide honyi.
Ofiatani nyia aati arriai aboŋojin hosi ihikoi, buo omuk aratani abene hunyia ogiluni isi to tua matta.
Attati aati hunyia ofuoi 'to to osiere iko hunyia adahai 'to te ehalu iwuwoŋita jiojio, “Hétahabuyete Hollum! Hotomunoi lia, ollo ottu 'to ta afure ono Lamonye!
Hotokuata Olobie onno ottu 'to, ono monye hohoi Dafide! Hétahabuyete Hollum!”
Ninyia afany Yesu Yerusalem, ojiŋak nyia inyi itua Haji emojit enne ittokon, ette iher erre 'daŋ. Ati, iliaha nyia attari, ette inyi leten Betani iko lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai.
Jio ebotie holoŋ, ninyia acohunie isi to Betani, oniama nyia Yesu.

Ninyia igonyu inyi alamarai obo aŋaboli iko abene arriai, ania ette inyi leten imijio, kuyya alla aremik adi inyi irumana omuk aŋabolo diya. Ati ninyia afany inyi iwoyo honyi, obeŋ nyia inyi orumak obo ariŋ arari abene hama, nyio, obiaŋara nyia ayafa onno oŋijarik aŋabolo ania.
Attati inyi jiaran jio aŋoboli ania, “Ijiara obo atulo hotobiaŋa inyiak ideuna omuk eŋija jihoi 'tulaŋ!”
Itayiruni lejifak honyi ekiana honyi.

Ninyia afanyi isi Yerusalem, olo nyia Yesu itua Haji Emojit enne ittokon, ette itterio efuhatio apocok 'daŋ iko enyiaŋak addi, ette itidelliara atteremejahien huno etattobok gurusi iko etoŋita huno etinyiaŋak amami.
Ati obeŋ nyia inyi aŋatak obo atulo akafaru obo ariŋ totto hiloŋoni Haji Emojit enne ittokon.
Attati inyi ittiyenio aati jiojio, “Igioroni nyia Libuk Hollum jio, ojio Hollum, ‘Iloŋoi adi aaji hoŋ, aaji emojit ono aati 'daŋ hutta fau.’ Ati iloitoto itai inyi ahinom hahalak!”
Ninyia itayiruni ehumak elettaha iko ettiyanak ifahita erre huna, ette isi ittifia obo ekoi ittohori inyi. Ati abaŋi nyia isi inyi, nyio, illillihai nyia aati 'daŋ ettiyenita honyi.
Ninyia ara akekai ette Yesu iko lejifak honyi ifuatan addi to tua abore gala ania.
To ninyia ofuarik isi te ehiji ikoi nyia motie hanyik, igonyuni nyia isi ayyani ŋaboli nyia aye many ihadde.
Iyiyiu nyia Petro erre hunyia iduoŋi 'to, ette jiaran jio Yesu, “Hettiyanani, imija! Aye ayyani ŋaboli oŋole ipitak iyye!”
Itarraŋ Yesu isi jio, “Awanata iko eruk jio Hollum.

Hode, eramak ni itai, alla ajio obo jio adoŋe ana ‘Odiotoi, orruaŋak ahuan hoi itua hari enne ittokon,’ buo obeŋ okuaya itua taji honyi, ati iruk inyi jio iduoŋi adi hode erre hunno ojio inyi, ihani adi erre hunia jihonyi.
Tania, eramak ni itai, ifuotuna adi itai erre 'daŋ hunne ifiyete itai ta amojo, elle iruhoto itai jio ifuotuna itai isi.
Elle idioto iyye, itte imojo buo imijak jio owon eram hoi iko obo atulo, idehi eram nyia, oŋida buo fe Monyohoi ettedou idehi eyyata hoi.
[Elle ibiaŋata itai idehina eyyata waati hullomuk, obeŋ adi buo fe Monyatai ettedou idehi eyyata hatai.]
Inyiahi nyia isi icohuno Yerusalem. Ofuonni nyia ehumak elettaha iko ettiyanak ifahita buo lahou jio Yesu to ninyia ilattari inyi itua Haji emojit enne ittokon,
ette ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Ta anani ilohittok ihanio iyye erre hunia? Kuyya ŋai isio jihoi elohittok ihaniere isi?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Efiyo ni itai, itarraŋata ani, eramak adi buo fe ni itai ta anani elohittok enne ehaniere ni erre hunia.
Iramana ani, ottu nyia elohittok ono Yoane tai itifuociere batisimo, jio Hollum kuyya jio aati?”
Attati isi itarisa isi hama jiojio, “Elle ejio ‘Jio Hollum,’ itarraŋ adi inyi jio, ‘Nyio nyiati ibiaŋata itai iruhoto eram Yoane?’
Ati elle ejio ‘Jio aati…’ ” (Abaŋi nyia isi aati, nyio, iruhi nyia aati 'daŋ jio ara nyia Yoane ahekianani Hollum.)
Ania, itarraŋierek isi Yesu jiojio, “Etimo hohoi.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “Abeŋ adi buo fe ni eramak jihatai ta anani elohittok enne ehaniere ni erre hunia.”
Ninyia iliaha ayafa onno odiarik aaŋer fino, ifak nyia inyi apit honyi jio ajurak hia oŋida isi obuanyani hunonyi jihonyi.
Buo isi ette inefuna apit lia, ette ibak, ette itacahara inyi ahas ahania.
Attati lamonye mana inyiak ifahina jihosi apit ollobo. Buo isi ette iriafuna lia ihide hou, ette ihanio jihonyi erre hunne iyaŋunie 'to ariri.
Ifak nyia lamonye mana apit ollobo, buo isi ette ittohoro inyi, ette buo fe ihanio ihuo nyia jio apiti hullomuk arriai; abahi nyia omuk, buo ottohori omuk.
Afitoro nyia latulo abotie jihonyi ifahiniere, lonyi honyi, ollo obuor ataji honyi bebe. Ihalu hosi 'daŋ, ette inyi ifahina lonyi honyi jihosi, ette jiaran jio, ‘Ofuoi adi yo isi ibaŋi lonyi hoŋ.’
Ati ikianai nyia ajurak hia isi hama jio, ‘Arutani honyi tibuo olo. Ifuanna, hattohoro inyi, oŋida erutaa honyi arai ahunohoi!’
Ania, ette isi inefuna inyi ette ittohoro, ette buo fe iruoŋoro ahuan honyi addi totua mana.
“Ihan adi lamonye mana anyio? Ottu adi inyi ittohoro ajurak hulia 'daŋ, ette itajurana amana ania jio omuk aati hama.
‘Amoruo ninyia ihari aduhok jiojio ara ariŋ asai,
inyiak tibuo inyi igalihina 'daŋ ta ayiji.
Lamonye nyia ihan ihuo nyia;
ilaman tibuo inyi bebe to hoŋite hohoi!’”
Tania, awahi nyia elettaha Yudei inefuna Yesu, nyio, omijani nyia isi jio ikiana nyia etarriamai ania tesi. Ati abaŋi nyia isi eluluŋ waati ania, ette isi ibusana inyi, ette ifuatan addi.
Ifahini nyia omuk hulo

Ofuonni nyia aati hulia, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Hettiyanani, emijak hohoi jio ikiana iyye erre ahode hode. Ibeŋ iyye ibaŋ obo atulo, buo fe ibeŋ igigia aati. Ati ittiyenio iyye ahode, eram anna awak Hollum. Ike eramak hohoi, aŋatani soho efahita hohoi idumari amusuru jio Hobu Roma elle ittokon kuyya obeŋ?”
Ati omijak nyia Yesu enyobita hosi, ania ette inyi itarraŋ isi jio, “Nyio iwahata itai italohuna ani? Hadina jihoŋ arobiya, ijiara ani ami inyi.”
Ette isi iyaŋuno obo jihonyi, buo inyi ette ifiyo isi jiojio, “Anaŋai arrijiori ana iko afure ana?” Itarraŋi isi inyi jiojio, “Huno Hobu elle ittokon.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “Odumana Hobu elle ittokon, erre Hobu elle ittokon, buo jio Hollum, erre Hollum.”
Illillihai nyia isi eram honyi bebe.
“Hettiyanani, igiorok nyia Mose jihohoi efahi onno ojio 'to jio: ‘Alla aye atulo buo idiaharu ŋoruoi honyi obeŋ hito, ijiara illanyi ojuŋori aŋotte ania isihiniere aduri a hulo ayaani lia.’
Owoni nyia omuk ellarak hattarik. Oyemu nyia oloŋeu aŋotte, ette iye hobeŋi isiuni hito.
Ania, ette etarrihi ijuŋori aŋotte ania, ette buo fe inyi iye hobeŋ isiuni hito. Ara nyia buo fe ihuo nyia jio etahunihi,
iko jio hullomuk 'daŋ. Awattarik nyia isi 'daŋ hattarik aŋotte ania, ette 'daŋ iye obeŋi isiuni hito. Ihalu hosi 'daŋ, ette buo fe aŋotte ania iye.
Ihuania, iholoŋ ono ebuhuna toye, ottu adi aŋotte ania irahan ŋoruoi ŋai? Nyio, awattarik nyia isi 'daŋ hattarik inyi.”
Attati Yesu itarraŋ isi ojio, “Inyi tibuo enne ipalatti itai! Nyio, itimoti itai abuk Hollum kuyya agolon Hollum.
Nyio, elle ibuhuni layaak toye, arai adi isi ihuo ajilohien huttedou. Obeŋi adi isi ayamanie.

Ati te eram ono ebuhuna toye, hèbiaŋata itai ihenuna to Buk Mose, jio aŋati enne ikiana 'to ta agurrumare onno owulo 'to ahima? Diya, igioroni jio ojio Hollum jio Mose, ‘Ani Hollum olo Abramo, Hollum olo Isako, buo fe Hollum olo Yakobo.’
Ipalata itai bebe! Obiaŋara inyi Hollum olo layaak, ati inyi Hollum olo esuok!”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ isi ojio, “Efahi anna agalihi 'to 'daŋ ana, ‘Itayiriete yo, Israele! Hollum Lamonye hohoi, inyi Lamonye hama
Itabuara ataji hoi 'daŋ jio Hollum Lamonye hoi, to oloyiri hoi 'daŋ, te egigilita hoi 'daŋ, iko ta agolon hoi 'daŋ.’
Buo enne ijifak 'to inyi ana; ‘Itabuara ataji hoi jio onyihari hoi ihuo onno obuarari inyi ahuan hoi.’ Obeŋ obo efahi anna agalik 'to huna 'daŋ.”

Ijiara ataji hoi obuor Hollum ta ataji hoi 'daŋ, ta ahou hoi 'daŋ, iko ta agolon hoi 'daŋ. Oŋida buo fe ataji hoi obuor onyihari hoi ihuo onno obuarari inyi ahuan hoi. Oyyu bebe ijifatiere efahita hunia, agalik aciaŋi hunno osuahini ehumita iko esiorita hunnomuk.”
Ninyia igonyu Yesu ofioro hunyia itarraŋiere latulo alia, ette inyi jiaran jihonyi, “Ibeŋ iyye ilama to Lobie Hollum.”
Ihalu eram ania, obeŋ nyia tulo inyiak irinyana ifiyere Yesu.
Ninyia hettiyenio Yesu itua Haji emojit enne ittokon, ifiyo nyia inyi jio, “Aŋai ati ojiori ettiyanak ifahita jio odetuno adi
Nyio, ta aduaran ono Loholio Olibo, ikiana nyia Dafide ta ahuan honyi jio,
‘Ojio Lamonye jio Lamonye hoŋ:
Itoŋoi tene totto ŋati iŋet hoŋ,
many ehananiere ni amiorok hoi erriet hejek hoi’.
Iloŋo nyia Dafide ta ahuan honyi, inyi ‘Lamonye,’ aŋai ati inyiak
Itayirie nyia eluluŋ waati jio Yesu ta amuno.
Ninyia hettiyenio inyi isi, ojio nyia jio, “Ihumata imijio ettiyanak ifahita. Omunoi isi eŋalata ta aboŋojin hunno ohodori, buo fe omunoi elle ifuanyai aati isi ta abaŋi itua suk.
Onyimoi isi asegeri lettaha hutto tua hasik Imojiti iko amasik lettaha hutto masik gari.
Imumunie isi ehidahi buo fe ohoruttai ahaŋitek hosi, buo ette itihanio ahuattek te emojiti hunno ohodori 'to. Tania, obolo adi ettigemio hosi agalik 'daŋ.”
Itoŋo nyia Yesu iger senuk eddudduhi isiorita otto Haji Imojit enne ittokon, buo iŋiŋiala eluluŋ waati ninyia ibirotiai 'to arobiyaa diya. Ibirotiai nyia asamak arriai arobiyaa arriai.
Attati obo ehidak elociaŋ ittuna, ette ibironia attarifat arrihai hullo oremehini agiris abotie.
Attati Yesu iloŋuna lejifak honyi, ette jiaran jihosi, “Hode, eramak ni itai jio, ibirok ehidak elociaŋ ania arriai agalik aati 'daŋ hulle ibirotiai 'to itua senuk eddudduhi.
Nyio, isiori isi allaŋo huno esamiti hosi. Ati te elociaŋ ottononyi, ibirok inyi asaŋ 'daŋ hullo owoni 'to jihonyi. Isiarak inyi erre 'daŋ hunna amanyari inyi.”
Ninyia hojiŋu Yesu to tua Haji emojit enne ittokon, ette obo olo lejifak jiaran jihonyi jio, “Hettiyanani, imijie! Ilamani amoruoi iko asik hunia bebe.”
Itarraŋ Yesu inyi ojio, “Igonyu iyye asik hunne ettaha 'to hunia? Obeŋ adi obo amoruo dinia arasa idellia ihide obo. Ikukuri adi isi 'daŋ sar sar.”
Ninyia itoŋori Yesu idoŋe Olifet, totto ŋati anna attany 'to Ahaji emojit enne ittokon, ofuonni nyia Petro iko Yakobo iko Yoane buo Andrea jihonyi isi hama,
ette ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Iramak hohoi, ofuonni adi erre hunia baya? Anyio itamijani adi enne itahutak 'to jio attuba asaa onno ofuarik erre hunia 'daŋ iduoŋ?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Ihumata mijio, hèlaha obo atulo itisiaba itai.
Ofuonni adi aati arriai hulle ikianai ihuo alla arai isi ani. Ojiori adi isi jio, ‘Ani inyi!’ Itisiabari adi isi aati arriai.
Buo elle itaniŋuna itai jio owon afere, buo eram ojiori ono arem, hèlafuhoti. Iduoŋi adi erre hunia luŋa, ati obeŋi isi itahutani jio attu esidi fau.
Orriomonie adi afau iko afau, buo fe obuore iko obuore. Iboŋ adi olokitik iko ahure amasik 'daŋ. Arai erre hunia 'daŋ ihuo etteri honya hohe ŋotte onno ojio 'to esio.
Ati, oŋida do luŋa ittittoye Asayyo Ayijok jio aati 'daŋ hutta fau.

Buo elle inefuni itai, ette iyaru ilokikoi, hèlafuhoti do jio, anyio adi enne ifuatta itai ikiana. Ati ikianati erre hunne isiori adi jihatai jio asaa nyia. Nyio, obiaŋara adi itai ifuatta ikiana, ati Loholio Olibo adi ikiana.
Itinefuni adi ellarak illarak oŋida ottohori, buo fe monyie itinefuni aduri hosi oŋida ottohori. Oyitonie adi aduri esiok hosi, ette itattohoro.
Oliwarik adi aati 'daŋ itai te eram hoŋ. Ati italuahuni adi lia ollo odihu 'to many isidi.
Ijiara lia, ollo owon 'to ihide haji, hotobiaŋa ollu ifau, iduhuniere obo ariŋ addi to tua haji.
Ijiara buo fe lia, ollo owon 'to imana, hotobiaŋa luŋa acaharu haŋ iyamari aboŋo honyi.
Orroho adi bebe to oŋitek hua jio aŋoruo ayedurok iko etadasak.
Omojoti jio Hollum oŋida erre huna obeŋi iduoŋi to ayafajin hacoro!
Nyio, agalik adi arrohoji ono ettigemita huno oŋitek hua, ettigemita 'daŋ hunyia iduoŋi 'to tetteri ninyia hoyyeu Hollum afau, many iko ahana. Obeŋ adi obo ariŋ inyiak irahan ihuo nyia.
Ati alla abeŋ nyia Lamonye oŋuto addi omuk jio oŋitek hua, obeŋ duo tulo ofituno. Ati te eram ono olonyimot honyi, hinyia onyimu inyi, aŋuto inyi omuk oŋitek addi.
“Tania, alla ajio obo jihatai, ‘imijiete,
Nyio, ofuonni adi olonyimot enyabak iko ekianak enyabak hullo ojiori 'to jio, ekiana isi eram Hollum. Ihanie adi isi eduariti iko ellillihita inyobiere ara duadi bu olonyimot Hollum.
Ihumata irriria! Nyio, eramak nyia ni itai erre hunia hobeŋi isi iduoŋi.
“Ihalu oŋitek huno ettigemita hua, itayei adi oloŋ, obeŋ adi ayafa inyiak ibuaran.
Okuahunie adi elelefi tedou buo fe erre 'daŋ huttedou ette ittanniŋa.
Tania, igonyuni adi isi Lonyi Tulo ottu te dohuo, ta agolon onno obolo iko ta akuatan.
Ifak adi inyi ajilohien jio aguli aŋuan huno afau, ittuttubuniere aati olonyimot Hollum, tesidi fau obotie many jio onnobo.
“Ittiyenuna jio ayyani ŋaboli. Alla ayitoi atanata honyi egaraa buo abene itterie ayisuno, omijana jio iliaha atahas.
Ihuo nyia buo fe, elle igonyuna itai erre huna 'daŋ iduoŋi, imijana adi jio iliaha inyi luŋa attuna
Hode, eramak ni itai jio, iduoŋi adi erre hunia 'daŋ hobeŋi aati hulo ahana otuhoroi.
Olitohini adi edou iko afau muluyaŋ, ati obeŋi adi ekenita hoŋ olitohini.
Ihumata irriria, ihumata mijio, nyio, ibiaŋata itai imijana afany adi nasaa nyia baya.

Ara adi inyi ihuo atulo ollo olo 'to jio obo amaji, buo idiaharu ahaŋ honyi jio egiamak honyi oŋida omijie. Ninyia atuhok inyi ehiharana jihosi egemita hosi 'daŋ ababo, iramaru nyia buo fe inyi erririani hikat oŋida ihum irriria.
Ihuania, ihumatati imijio, nyio, ibiaŋata itai imijana ottu adi lamonye haŋ baya; ta akekai, kuyya ta attiŋ harue, kuyya ta ataŋatio motie, kuyya ta amotie.
Alla attu inyi turunyaŋ ihuo nyia, hèlaha inyi luŋa onyurak itai ijototi.
Ekiana ni jihatai, erre hunne ekiana ni jio aati 'daŋ: Ihumata mijio!”
Ati ojiori nyia isi jio, “Hèlaha luŋa enefu inyi to oloŋ ono neyom, nyio ŋadi aati itaŋalafie hohoi.”
Iloŋojitai nyia omuk hulo aati hinyia owoni 'to diya, ette ikiana isi hama jio, “Nyio ittarrohojani ariaa ania ihuania?
Oremehini duo itinyiaŋara inyi ta arobiyaa arriai agalihini esiha hunihoi, ette isiarana arobiyaa hua jio alociaŋak!” Ania, ette isi iŋerejanio jio aŋotte ania.
Ati ojio nyia Yesu jihosi jio, “Obusana inyi dee! Nyio ittigemiete itai inyi? Ihan inyi ariŋ enne ilaman jihoŋ.
Odulori adi alociaŋak awanan ikatai, iremehina adi itai iluak isi elle iwahata itai. Ati abeŋ adi ni adulo awanan ikatai.
Ihan aŋotte ania ihuo oremik inyi ihan. Ijuhok inyi ariaa ania ihuan hoŋ, ihuhumaniere inyi hobeŋ asaa onno onuhanierek inyi afany.
Ihuania, eramak ni itai hode jio, jio amasik 'daŋ hutta fau hunne ittittoyerek Asayyo Ayijok, iramani adi buo fe ariŋ enne ihan aŋotte ania, igiluttari inyi.”
Attati Yuda Iskariot, obo olo lejifak hula 'tomon harrihai, leten jio ehumak elettaha itinyiaŋaniere Yesu jihosi.
Omunoi nyia ehumak elettaha bebe ninyia itaniŋuni isi ekenita honyi, ette buo fe icoronia isiaraniere inyi arobiyaa. Ania, ette Yuda ittifia obo ekoi onno oyyu itinyiaŋaniere Yesu jihosi.

Iholoŋ etteri ono Neyom ono Emune onno obeŋ lobou, oloŋ onno oŋocierek olosobio hullo oŋiyerek aŋiria ono neyom ono Allaŋan, ifiye nyia lejifak Yesu jio, “Iwak ati iyye hohoi efuo ihuhumana jihoi aŋiria ono Allaŋan jio anani maji?”
Attati Yesu ifahina omuk lejifak honyi arrihai, buo iramak isi ekenita huna: “Ifuatta jio abore gala nyia. Oruaŋanio adi obo latulo ikatai, elle iwohuno aari ta atobok. Ijifatti inyi
many jio ahaŋ onno ojiŋaniere inyi. Ijiatta jio lamonye haŋ jio; ‘Ojio ettiyanani jio, tani aaji tamonok anna alari inyi iko lejifak honyi iŋiyere aŋiyo ono Allaŋan?’
Itahutak adi inyi jihatai atua haji anna alat otto amara, buo owon iko erre 'daŋ hunne ehuhumanie. Ihuhumana erre 'daŋ jihohoi diya.”
Ofuoi nyia lejifak hia many itua bore gala nyia, ette irumana erre 'daŋ ihuo iramak duo inyi isi; ette isi ihuhumana aŋiyo ono Allaŋan diya.
Ninyia ara akekai, otto Yesu ittuna iko lejifak hula 'tomon harrihai.
Buo ninyia hoŋiye isi itteremeja, ette Yesu jiaran, “Hode, eramak ni itai jio itinyiaŋak adi obo alatai nani, obo elle eŋiyo 'to ikoŋ.”
Ijiriŋai nyia lejifak hulia, ette itterio efiyo inyi 'daŋ ababo jiojio, “Ani ati?”
Itarraŋ Yesu ojio, “Inyi obo jihatai hula 'tomon harrihai hulo, lia elle edutu 'to ikoŋ emune arabotie to 'rany.
Oye adi Lonyi Tulo ihuo igioroni nyia tenyi Ibuk Hollum. Ati orroho adi bebe jio atulo elle itinyiaŋak 'to Lonyi Tulo! Osiru obeŋi nyia luŋa isiuni inyi!”
Ninyia hoŋiye isi, iduhu nyia Yesu emune, ette isiarana ahumo, ette ibeny inyi, ette isiarana jio lejifak honyi, ette jiaran, “Hibetina, ahuan hoŋ ana.”
Attati inyi buo fe iduhuna ematit, ette isio ahumo jio Hollum, ette isiarana jihosi, buo isi 'daŋ ababo ette imat inyi.
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “nooto hoŋ ana, ono ecorit aŋejuk, onno owouno 'to te eram waati arriai.
Ahode, eramak ni itai jio, abeŋ adi ni enyiak imat afino ana, many iholoŋ anna amatari ni afino aŋejuk Ilobie Hollum.”
Attati isi idol afure etahabui Hollum, ette ifuatan idoŋe Olifet.
Ati, elle itubuhuni nani, ekiomoro adi ni Galilea to osiere hatai.”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Petro ojio, “Ettallik adi ni idiaharu iyye, duadi bu ofuhororoi hullomuk 'daŋ addi!”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Hode, eramak ni iyye jio, irisa adi iyye ani arue ana ahana enyiahita hunihoi, hobeŋ ahohoro illok enyiahita arrihai.”
Ati ihum Petro inyiak ikiana onno ogol bebe jiojio, “Ettallik ni luŋa irisa iyye, duadi bu luŋa ojiori ottohori ani ikoye!”
Ojiori nyia buo fe lejifak hullomuk 'daŋ ihuo nyia.
Attati isi ifuatan jio obo amaji anna anya Jessemani, attati Yesu iramana lejifak honyi jio, “Itoŋoti dini, buo ni amojo.”
Iyaru nyia inyi Petro iko Yakobo buo Yoane. Obolo nyia bebe ejiriŋa iko amijan taji jihonyi,
ette inti jiaran jihosi, “Obolo amijan taji jihoŋ bebe ihuo ejio nani ettoho. Itoŋoti dini, oduloro amijio.”
Ihut inyi alamarai kai, ette irruaŋana ahuan honyi ifau, ette imojo jio, kuyya ollo oremik, hèlaha duo asaa ono ettigemio ania ottu jihonyi.
Omojo nyia inyi jiojio, “Baba, Monyoŋ, iremik iyye ihanio erre 'daŋ. Iyai addi jihoŋ ematit ono ettigemio ana. Ati, obiaŋara awahan hoŋ, ati hétera ihuo iwak iyye.”
Attati inyi icohuno, ette irumana lejifak honyi hula hunihoi ajotoroi, ette inyi ifiyo Petro ojio, “Simone, ijototi itai? Ittallihoto itai imijio ara duadi bu asaa abotie?
Ihumata mijio, omojoti jio, hèlaha itai imuahata jio esusuta. Oyiji egigilita hatai, ati ibiaŋata itai igoloto nyio, irata itai awaati.”
Inyiak inyi icaharu imojori, ette idasio emojiti hoduo omojori inyi.
Ninyia inyiak inyi icohuno jihosi, orumak nyia inyi isi ajotoroi, nyio, ittigemie nyia aajo isi bebe, many otimorik isi ejio adi isi anyio jio Yesu.
Ninyia lacohuno inyi enyiahi etahunihi, ojio nyia inyi jihosi, “Hèrasati fe itai ijoto buo fe iyiriata? Aremik! Attuba asaa enne isiaraniere Lonyi Tulo ihas waati eyyak.
Ottenna, efuo. Imijata etinyiaŋani hoŋ olo!”

Teya teya, ninyia hekiana Yesu, afany nyia Yuda, lobo olo lejifak hula 'tomon harrihai. Ottu nyia inyi iko eluluŋ waati hunyia irumuni 'to iko ademio erremiti buo eluhi. Ehumak elettaha iko ettiyanak ifahita buo lahou nyia ifahuni isi.
Iramak nyia etinyiaŋani jihosi etamijani jio, “Atulo elle efony ni ta ahucio 'yaha, inefuna inyi, inyiamatti inyi addi, buo ihumata irriria.”
Teya teya, ninyia afany Yuda, obotik nyia inyi jio Yesu, ette jiaran, “Hettiyanani!” ette ifony inyi ta ahucio 'yaha.
Ania, ette isi inefuna Yesu cok, ette iyaru.
Attati obo latulo jio aati hinyia owotia 'to diya isutuna ademi honyi, ette isaluna tub eyyok ono apit olo ehumani elle ittokon.
Attati Yesu ifiyo isi jio, “Osiru jihatai irumuniere iko ademio erremiti buo eluhi inefuniere ani, ihuo ara ni olohoho?
Oŋitek 'daŋ awattatio nyia ni ikatai buo fe ettiyanatio Ihaji emojit enne ittokon, buo itai ibiaŋata inefuna nani. Ati ijiara luŋa itasiruni egierita hutto Buk Hollum.”
Ania, attati lejifak honyi 'daŋ idiaharai inyi, ette ifuhororo.
Ijifaru nyia obo anyarhaluti Yesu. Iyyafatio nyia inyi obo aboŋo elle igarawa ihuan honyi. Awahi nyia isi inefuna inyi,
ania, ette inyi ifuhororo aŋaturoi buo idiaharu aboŋo lia diya.
Iniafarai nyia isi Yesu ihaŋ ehumani elle ittokon, amaji ninyia ottubarik ehumak elettaha iko lahou buo ettiyanak ifahita.
Ijifaru nyia Petro Yesu alamarai, many ihiloŋoni ehumani elle ittokon, ette inosonio isujari eema iko erririak.
Tania, ottifiai nyia ehumak elettaha iko aati lokikoi Yudei 'daŋ, omuk erre itisiahiniere Yesu oŋida ottohori inyi, ati obeŋi nyia isi onyurani obo.
Oluaji nyia asuuti hunyia orosoni 'to erre arriai jio Yesu, ati abahasai nyia erositi hosi.
Attati omuk aati idioto, ette irosonia erre huna jio Yesu:
“Etayiru nyia hohoi inyi ojio jio, ‘Etattur adi ni Aaji emojit enne ittokon ana ninyia oduhoni aati ania, buo ihalu oŋitek hunihoi enyiak iduhonia obo onno obiaŋara aati oduhi.’ ”
Ara duadi bu erositi hosi hunia, abahasai nyia isi 'daŋ.
Odioto nyia ehumani elle ittokon ihosiere hosi 'daŋ, ette ifiyo Yesu jio, “Ibeŋ iyye iwon iko obo ekiana itarraŋiere etisiahita hosi hunia?”
Ati oduahino nyia Yesu 'liŋ 'liŋ obeŋ ikenu obo eram. Buo ehumani elle ittokon inyiak ifiyo inyi ojio, “Iyye
Tania, igiguas nyia ehumani elle ittokon aboŋo honyi, ette jiaran, “Anyio suuti hulle enyiak iwahan?
Itaniŋuna itai inyi ittarrohojio afure Hollum. Igigiloti itai anyio?”
Oŋoti nyia isi 'daŋ eram Yesu, ette jiaran ijiara ottohori inyi.
Itterie nyia omuk hulosi amitata amilak jihonyi buo fe atarani aboŋo ihomom honyi, ette ibak inyi buo ojiori jio, “Ottenu ŋai abak iyye?” Iyarai nyia buo fe erririak inyi ette innaŋio.
Ninyia harasa Petro iwor, ihiloŋoni, ottu nyia nobo ono egiamak hehumani elle ittokon diya.
Buo ninyia igonyu inyi Petro osuja eema, ette inyi iyohojonia jihonyi 'tok 'tok, ette jiaran, “Iwon nyia buo fe iyye iko Yesu a Nasaretanani.”
Ati orisa nyia Petro jiojio, “Atimo ni erre hunne ikiana iyye hunia,” ette Petro ikoddaŋ ijiŋara allet attany ekat haŋ. Teya teya, ette ahohoro illok.
Inyiak nyia egiamani nyia igonyuna Petro, ette fe inyiak itterio edasio ekiana jio aati hinyia owotiai 'to diya jiojio, “Obo olosi alia!”
Ati inyiak nyia Petro irisa eram ania.
Ojio gaa kai, inyiahi aati hunyia owotiai 'to diya jiaran jio Petro jio, “Hode hode, ira iyye aholosi, nyio, ira iyye a Galileatanani.”
Attati Petro itterio ettuŋo jiojio, “'Tuŋ, ekiana ni ahode hode! Ijiara Hollum ottoho ani elle enyobio ni! Atimo ni atulo elle ikianati itai alia!”

Teya teya, ette ahohoro inyiak illok enyiahi etarrihi. Attati Petro igiluna ekiana ninyia iramak Yesu jihonyi jio, “Hobeŋ ahohoro illok enyiahita arrihai, irisa adi iyye ani enyiahita hunihoi.” Ania, ette ahuan Petro ilihuna, ette inyi ikoddaŋ iyyoo.
Nyia motie berien, iwwahuni nyia kuak ehumak elettaha iko lahou buo ettiyanak ifahita iko aati lokikoi 'daŋ, ette isi ifit Yesu, ette inyiamaru inyi addi, ette isiarana jio Pilato.
Buo Pilato ette ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Iyye Hobu Yudei?”
Itarraŋ Yesu ojio, “Iyye ijio ihuo nyia.”
Itisiahini nyia ehumak elettaha jio Yesu erre arriai,
ania, ette Pilato inyiak ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Ibeŋ iyye iwak itarraŋ? Imijie omukajia etisiahita hunne itisiahinierek isi iyye!”
Ati obeŋ nyia Yesu inyiak itarraŋ, ania, ette Pilato illilliha.
To oloŋ ono Neyom ono Allaŋan, ohohitta nyia Pilato jio aati atulo babus abotie alla awahi isi.
Jio oŋitek hua, ifita nyia obo latulo afure honyi Barabas ibabus iko omuk aati hinyia ottohori 'to atulo to ninyia itaŋalafarik isi gala.
Ninyia attubanio eluluŋ waati ifiyere Pilato ariŋ enne isiaratta inyi isi toloŋi,
ette Pilato ifiyo isi ojio, “Iwahata itai ahohi ni jihatai hobu Yudei?”
Nyio, omijak nyia Pilato bebe jio, inefunie nyia ehumak elettaha Yesu jihonyi ta ahaini hosi.
Ati isusui nyia ehumak elettaha aati 'daŋ jio ijiara Pilato, ohohi Barabas jihosi.
Attati Pilato inyiak ifiyo isi jiojio, “Iwahata itai oŋida ani ehan anyio jio latulo elle iloŋoti itai hobu Yudei?”
Attati isi 'daŋ iwuwoŋita jiojio, “Isihonia inyi likruce!”
Buo Pilato ette ifiyo isi ojio “Anyio epali enne ihan inyi?”
Ati ihumi nyia tibuo isi iwuwoŋita bebe jiojio, “Isihonia inyi likruce!”
Awak nyia Pilato itamuno eluluŋ waati, ania ette inyi ihohina Barabas jihosi buo ette itabak Yesu, ette isiarana inyi oŋida isihoni likruce.
Iyarai nyia oseŋer Yesu attua hiloŋoni haŋ enne ittokon ono mondir, ette ittubana eluluŋ oseŋer 'daŋ amaji abotie;
ette itiyyafana Yesu aboŋo anna ara erigie, ette buo fe iyyiruna egoria hikua, ette itiyyafana ihou honyi.
Attati isi itterio efonya inyi jiojio, “Hobu Yudei, Moŋ!”
Abahi nyia isi ahou honyi ta atelek, ette imitana amilak jihonyi, ette irigoŋi ifau ihuo elle itahabuye isi inyi.
Ninyia atuhi isi asuhotiere inyi, ette isi ihouna addi aboŋo enne erigie nyia, ette itiyyafana inyi aboŋojin honyi. Attati iyaru inyi addi isihoniere likruce.
Attati isi iyaru Yesu jio obo amaji enne ifurani Golgota onno ojio 'to, “Amaji Hotio Hou.”
Diya, isiarani nyia isi inyi afino enne iharruahini iko obo aŋallai onno oŋuo gir gir, ati iha nyia Yesu amatan inyi.
Ania, ette isi isihonia inyi likruce, ette ihihor aboŋojin honyi, ette ibak
Isihoni nyia isi inyi likruce ninyia ara saa hottoŋuan otto motie.
Igioroni nyia etisiahita huna tenyi, hunno ojiori 'to jio, “Hobu Yudei olo.”
Isihoni nyia buo fe isi omuk ahahalak arrihai likrucehien; abotie tetteŋet honyi buo ollobo tettehorroŋ honyi.
[Tania, itasiruni egierita hutto buk Hollum hunno ojiori 'to jio, “Igialani inyi jio arrohojak
Ihuania, italuahu ahuan hoi, ollu ifau to hide kruce.”
Ihuo nyia buo fe, itafittaŋie nyia ehumak elettaha iko ettiyanak ifahita Yesu ta ahuattek hosi jiojio, “Italuahu nyia inyi aati hullomuk, buo ittallik italuahuna ahuan honyi!
Ijiara
Ette buo fe ahahalak hula arrihai, hunyia isihoni likrucehien ikonyi, imorio inyi.
Ninyia ara akil fanni, imuluhak nyia edumele afau 'daŋ, many otuk asahien hunihoi.
Ninyia ara saa hunihoi otto otoriai, ette Yesu iluaha woŋ woŋ jiojio, “Eloi, Eloi, lema Sabakttani?” onno ojio jio, “Hollum hoŋ, Hollum hoŋ, nyio ibasak iyye nani?”
Itayiruni nyia omuk aati hinyia owotiai 'to diya aluaha honyi, ette jiaran, “Itayiriete, iloŋo inyi Elija!”

Ette lobo olosi iŋioron, ette idifonia espony itua fino enne iruattiŋo 'to, ette ihasana itelek, ette igumana ihutuk Yesu oŋida ojur, ette jiaran, “Itilauna! Hamijiete, kuyya ollo ottu adi Elija idutuna inyi addi to hide kruce!”
Ati oluaha nyia Yesu woŋ woŋ, ette iye.
Buo ninyia igonyu lajafit olo oseŋer linyia owotia 'to ihosiere kruce aŋai oye Yesu,
Ijifunie nyia aŋoruo hunia Yesu many howon inyi Galilea, iluahiere inyi. Owoni nyia buo fe omuk aŋoruo arriai hunyia ofuonni 'to ikonyi many to Yerusalem.

Ninyia ara akekai ono oloŋ enne ihuhumarik, (inyi oloŋ otto hosiere Sabatto), ottu nyia Yosefu olo Arimeteya, ette itagol ataji, ette leten many jio Pilato imojuniere jihonyi ahuan Yesu. Ara nyia Yosefu atulo olo eluluŋ waati hutto lokikoi Yudei, alla abaŋi aati bebe. Itila nyia inyi attuna ono Nolobie Hollum.
Illilliha nyia Pilato bebe ninyia itayiru inyi jio laye Yesu. Ania, ette inyi iloŋuna lajafit oseŋer, ette ittittif inyi jio kuyya laye duadi Yesu berien.
Ninyia itaniŋu inyi jio lajafit alia jio laye Yesu, ania ette inyi iŋatana Yosefu iyari ahuan Yesu.

Ania, ette Yosefu inyiaŋuna aboŋo enuhit, ette idutuna ahuan Yesu to kruce, ette ibubunana inyi ta aboŋo ania, ette itaferihina inyi lilume ninyia otulani itua moruo, ette ittaboronia amoruo enne ittok ihutuk ilume.
Iŋiŋialai nyia bo Maria Madalina iko Maria honye Yosefu, ette igonyuna amaji ninyia itaferihinierek ahuan Yesu.
Ninyia atuho oloŋ Sabatto, ette Maria Madalina iko Salome buo Maria honye Yakobo inyiaŋuno ariaa oŋida isi efuoi iyalana ihuan Yesu.
Nyia motie berien to Dominika, ninyia iduoŋ oloŋ, ette isi iwany ilume.

Ikikianarai nyia isi, isi hama jiojio, “Ŋai adi olo ifidihoro jihohoi amoruo ette ijiŋit ilume?” (Obolo nyia amoruo ania bebe.) Buo ninyia ibonnoi isi ahide, igonyuna nyia isi amoruo nyia ifidihori addi.
Ania, ette isi ijiŋara attua ilume, ette igonyuna lobo anyarhaluti itoŋo totto ŋati iŋet buo iyyafatio aboŋo aboŋ. Abaŋi nyia isi bebe.
Ati ojio nyia anyarhaluti alia jihosi jio, “Hèbaŋata, amijak ni ittifiati itai Yesu olo Nasaret linyia isihoni likruce. Labeŋ inyi tene. Itubuhuni inyi! Imijata amaji ana ninyia itaferihinierek inyi.
Ihuania, ifuatta iramana eram ana jio lejifak honyi iko jio Petro jio: ‘Lia, ikiomoro Galilea to osiere hatai. Ifuatta adi itai igonyuna inyi teya ihuo iramak nyia inyi itai.’ ”
Ania, ette isi ijiŋuna allet, ette iŋioron telume hunna abaŋi buo fe ijiriŋai. Obeŋi nyia isi iramani obo ariŋ jio obo atulo, nyio, abaŋi nyia isi.
Ninyia ibuhu Yesu toye nyia motie berien to Dominika, oleyehino nyia inyi do jio Maria Madalina, ninyia ifuhari addi jihonyi aminiaŋa hattarik.
Ette Maria leten, ette iramana orriahat Yesu hinyia ijiriŋai buo fe oyyooi.
Buo ninyia itaniŋuni isi jio isu Yesu buo fe Maria Madalina igonyu inyi, obeŋi nyia isi iruhi eram ania.
Ihalu eram ania, oleyehino nyia Yesu jio lejifak honyi arrihai to obo ekoi hama, buo lejifak hulia ofuoi attua matta.
Ette isi icaharu, ette iramana lejifak hullomuk. Ati obeŋi nyia lejifak hullomuk hulia iruhi eram hosi.

Ihalu erre hunia 'daŋ, oleyehino nyia Yesu jio lejifak honyi hula 'tomon habotie buo isi oŋiye, ette iŋerejanio jihosi. Nyio, ta abiaŋan ono eruk iko ta agolon hossi hosi, obeŋi nyia isi iruhi erre hunyia iramani aati hunyia igonyuni 'to Yesu elle isu.
Ette inyi jiaran jihosi, “Ifuatta afau 'daŋ, ittittoyete Asayyo Ayijok jio aati 'daŋ.
Italahuni adi lia, elle iruk 'to ette ifuotu batisimo. Ati, oŋotoni adi epali jio lia, ollo obeŋ 'to iruk.
Isiarani adi agolon jio eruhok ihaniere eduariti. Ifuhatie adi isi aminiaŋa ta afure hoŋ, buo fe ikianai te etuhe hunno olufaji.
Ittallihi adi iriafuna isi duadi bu iniafatie isi amunuok kuyya amati obo eyyeri. Iyabani adi isi ahas hosi jio aŋuak, ette itaŋida isi.”
Attati lejifak ifuatan, ette ittittoyo imasik 'daŋ, buo Lamonye oluahio isi, buo fe itahutak jio obisi ettittotia hosi te ehanio hosi eduariti.
Ofuoi nyia aŋoruo hunia jio Petro iko lejifak hullomuk, ette iramana jihosi, te ekenita kaiyo, erre hunyia iramani jihosi.
Ihalu erre huna, ette Yesu ta ahuan honyi, iramana eram ono etalahuna onno odua 'to buo fe osio 'tulaŋ imasik 'daŋ te etuhe hejifak honyi.]
Jio Tofilo:
Ihuo imijak iyye, igioroni nyia aati arriai eyabita hirre hunyia ihanie ihiji hohoi.
Igioroni nyia isi erre hunia ihuo etaniŋu nyia hohoi jio hia, hunyia igonyuni 'to tetteri buo fe ittiyenie isi.
Oyyu buo fe, elle egiorok ni erre huna 'daŋ ababo jihoi, lettok Tofilo, nyio, attifotio nyia ni isi many tetteri.
Egiorok ni jihoi oŋida iyye imijak jio erre hunyia ittiyenie jihoi arai ahode.
To oŋitek hunyia arari Erode Ahobu olo Yudea
Olibori nyia isi buo fe amanyai onno obis te efahita huno Lamonye.
Ati obeŋi nyia isi isiuni hito nyio, iholofi nyia Elisabeta buo fe isi 'daŋ imaruahi.
To obo oloŋ ihanio nyia Sakariya egiama honyi ono ehumani ihosiere Hollum, ninyia imok oloŋ ono ehuma jio ehumak hutto woyo Abija.
Teya, ihuo ojiori emanyiti huno ehumak, onyimuni nyia inyi te
To ninyia osuahiere inyi ottogoŋ omojo nyia eluluŋ waati illet.
Attati ajilo olo Lamonye ileyehino jihonyi ollo owotia oŋiatai te etitiek onno osuahinierek nottogoŋ.
Ninyia igonyu Sakariya ajilo lia, ette abaŋi inef inyi bebe ette inyi ikikiro.
Attati ajilo jiaran jihonyi, “Hèbaŋ Sakariya! Nyio, itaniŋu Hollum amojo hoi. Isihi adi ŋoruoi hoi, Elisabeta, eto 'le jihoi. Ittu adi iyye ifurana inyi Yoane.
Obolo adi etahabuyo iko namuno jihoi iko jio aati arriai elle isiuni inyi,
Ara adi inyi elettok to hosiere Lamonye. Obeŋ adi inyi amata afino kuyya obo abalu. Many luŋa hèsiuni inyi ifut adi inyi iko Loholio Olibo.
Ottu adi inyi inyiahuno aati Israele arriai jio Lamonye, Hollum hosi.

Adaha adi inyi to osiere Lamonye ta aduaran iko ta agolon ihuo Elija ekianani Hollum. Iloit adi inyi atajia monye jio aduri hosi, buo fe iloit lamiosok iruhori egigilita waati abisak. Ihuhumak adi inyi aati ta attuna Lamonye.”
Buo Sakariya ette ifiyo ajilo lia jiojio, “Aŋai 'tadi amijak ni jio ara eram ana ahode? Nyio, emaruak ni buo fe ŋoruoi hoŋ imaruak.”
Itarraŋ nyia ajilo inyi jiojio, “Ani Gabriele. Awotia ni ihosiere Hollum elle ifahu 'to nani iramaniere iyye asayyo ayijok huna.
Ihuania, ibeŋ iyye iruk eram hoŋ, ottuho adi etuk hoi, ibeŋ adi iyye ikiana many ofuonnierek erre hunia irahan ahode alia attuba asaa hosi.”
Itilai nyia aati Sakariya, many ilafuhorik jio nyio illiŋia inyi fur itua Haji emojit enne ittokon.

Ninyia attu inyi allet, ittallik nyia inyi ikiana jihosi; attati isi imijana jio, oleyehino obo ariŋ jihonyi totua Haji emojit enne ittokon. Ittallik nyia inyi ikiana jihosi, ania, ette inyi ihuhuta jihosi ihuhuta ta ahas.
Ninyia atuho asaa ono egiama honyi to tua Haji emojit enne ittokon, acaharu nyia inyi miji hosi.
Ihalu omuk oŋitek oyedu nyia ŋoruoi honyi, Elisabeta, ette itoŋo itua haŋ ayafajin miyet.
Ette Elisabeta jiaran, “Eii! Eluak ani Lamonye, iduha inyi nariri hoŋ tehiji waati addi.”
Jio ayafa etilleji onno oyedurori Elisabeta, ifak nyia Hollum ajilo Gabriele ibore gala Nasaret atta fau Galilea.
Iyaru nyia inyi asayyo jio obo oduoti, afure honyi Maria, onno hobeŋ ottironio iko obo alle. Ocoroni nyia inyi jio obo atulo to woyo ba Hobu Dafide afure honyi Yosefu.
Ottu nyia ajilo jihonyi ette ifony inyi ojio, “Ogolo Maria! Owen Lamonye iko iyye buo fe omuno iyye bebe!”
Ati ihawwa nyia Maria te ekiana ono ajilo, ette ifiyo ahuan honyi jio, nanyio hirre huna.
Buo ajilo ette jiaran jihonyi, “Maria, hèbaŋ; nyio, omuno Hollum iyye bebe.
Inef adi iyye ohe, itte ittuna isiuna eto 'le. Ittu adi iyye ifurana inyi Yesu.
Ara adi inyi elettok, iloŋoi, adi inyi Lonyi Hollum elle Illomohi 'to 'daŋ. Isio adi Hollum Lamonye jihonyi elohobu hohonyi honyi Dafide.
Tania, ottu adi inyi ilohobu ihaŋ Yakobo 'tulaŋ; obeŋ adi nolobie honyi owon iko esidi.”
Buo Maria ette iramana ajilo lia jiojio, “Habeŋ ni attironio iko obo alle, ofuonni 'tadi erre hunia aŋai?”
Itarraŋ nyia ajilo inyi jiojio, “Ottu adi Loholio Olibo jihoye, ottu adi aduaran Hollum imuluhana iyye. Tania, iloŋoi adi leto ololibo alia, Lonyi Hollum.
Iko ogigilu Elisabeta, atta haŋ hatai, ojiori nyia iholofi. Ati ihuania awon iko ohe ono ayafajin ille, duadi bu imaruak inyi bebe.
Nyio, obeŋ obo ariŋ anna agalik 'to Hollum.”
Buo Maria ette jiaran, “Ani egiamani ono Lamonye. Ijiara hétehaniehe jihoŋ ihuo ijio iyye.” Buo ajilo lia ette idiaharu inyi.
To oŋitek hua odioto nyia Maria ette iruharu jio obo abore gala onno owon itua doŋiok hutta fau Yudea.
Ette leten ihaŋ Sakariya ette ifony Elisabeta.
Ninyia itaniŋu Elisabeta efuanya Maria, ette leto otto hohe honyi iddidiaŋa. Buo Loholio Olibo ette ifut jihonyi.
Attati inyi ikiana woŋ woŋ jiojio, “Tehiji ŋoruo 'daŋ, obolo namuno jihoi iko jio leto elle ittu iyye isiuna!
Nanyio iduoŋ eram ana jihoŋ ihua ana jio, oŋida honye Lamonye hoŋ ottu imijaru nani?
Oduo etaniŋu ni efuanya hoi, ette leto otto hohe hoŋ, iddidiaŋa ta namuno.
Hatawana namuno jihoi enne iruk 'to jio, ofuonni adi erre hunyia ocorok Lamonye jihoi irahan ahode!”
Attati Maria jiaran,
“Itahabuyo ataji hoŋ Lamonye.
Itamuno Hollum oloyiri hoŋ, nyio, inyi etalahani hoŋ,
nyio igonyu inyi afiahaji hoŋ egiamani honyi!
Tania, iloŋoi adi aati 'daŋ ani ahamunoni.
Nyio, ihan Hollum alla agalik 'to 'daŋ erre hunno obolori 'to bebe jihoŋ
olibo afure honyi.
Owon amehino honyi jio aati hulla abaŋi 'to inyi,
iko jio amisik huno lonyirok lonyiok hosi.
Itahutak inyi agolon honyi ta aani,
ette ikikur etadarak iko egigilita hosi 'daŋ.
Itafiaha inyi elohobu hobuok hulle ittaha 'to
buo ette ikaf afiahajak ahide.
Isio inyi esamiti jio alociaŋak,
buo ette ifuhara asamak ta ahas asai.
Ogottiere inyi buo fe obeŋ itapuak erre hunyia ikiana inyi jio hohonyiok hohoi,
buo ette italuak egiamani honyi Israele.
Ogottiere inyi amehino honyi jio Abramo iko jio lonyirok honyi 'daŋ 'tulaŋ!”
Itoŋok nyia Maria ayafajin ihuo hunihoi iko Elisabeta attati icaharu miji hosi.
Ninyia attubai oŋitek huno ayeduri Elisabeta, ohonya nyia nohe honyi, ette inyi isiuna leto 'le.
Attati aati hutta haŋ hosi iko hutto onyihari itaniŋuna jio, itahutak Lamonye amehino honyi jio Elisabeta, ette isi 'daŋ muno ikonyi.
Ninyia atuk olodole lia esabit abotie, ofuonni nyia onyihari iko aati hutta haŋ, ette ittubanio arabotie ikosi ibosiere leto. Awahi nyia isi ifurana inyi Sakariya, afure monyonyi.
Ati iramak nyia Elisabeta isi jio, “Obeŋ! Afure honyi luŋa Yoane.”
Buo isi ette jiaran jihonyi, “Obeŋ obo atta haŋ hatai anya ihuo nyia.”
Attati isi ihuhuta jio Sakariya ta ahas ifiyere anani fure anna awak inyi ifurani jio leto alia.
Ette Sakariya imojuna obo ariŋ enne igioronierek, ette igioronia jio, “Afure, honyi Yoane.” Tania, illillihai nyia isi 'daŋ bebe.
Teya teya, inyiak Sakariya ikiana ette itterio etahabuyo Hollum.
Inef nyia abaŋi aati onyihari hosi 'daŋ, buo asayyo huno erre huna ette isarrahina atua doŋiok 'daŋ hutta fau Yudea.
Igigiloi nyia aati 'daŋ hunyia itaniŋuni 'to asayyo huna te eram hosi, ette buo fe ifiyo jiojio, “Ottu 'tadi leto alia irahan anyio?” Nyio, owon nyia aduaran ono Lamonye jihonyi.
Ifut nyia Loholio Olibo jio Sakariya Monye Yoane, ette inyi ikiana asayyo Hollum jiojio:
“Hétahabuyete Lamonye, Hollum olo Israele!
Lattu inyi italuahiere aati honyi buo fe italahuniere isi.
Isiarak inyi hohoi Etalahani ollo ogol 'to bebe
ollo odetuno 'to to woyo Dafide egiamani honyi.
Ihuo ikiana nyia inyi berien te etuhe hekianak honyi aliborok jio,
etaluahu adi inyi hohoi to miorok hohoi
iko ta has waati hullo oliwarik 'to hohoi.
Ojio nyia amehino adi inyi jio hohonyiok hohoi
buo fe agottiere ecorit honyi onno odua 'to.
Te ettuŋo ninyia ocorok Hollum jio hohonyi hohoi Abramo
jio, etaluahu adi inyi hohoi ta has miorok,
buo fe oŋida hohoi ebeŋ ebaŋ elle egiama hohoi jihonyi.
Oŋida bati hohoi elibo buo fe ebis to hosiere honyi many isidi manya hohoi.
“Buo iyye lonyi hoŋ, iloŋoi adi iyye ekianani Hollum elle Illomohi 'to 'daŋ.
Idaha adi iyye to nosiere Lamonye ihuhumaniere ekoi jihonyi.
Iramak adi buo fe iyye aati honyi jio italahuni adi isi
ta ahohina ono eyyata hosi.
Nyio, ta amehino iko ta abijon taji Hollum jihohoi,
iyaŋuno adi inyi jihohoi etalahuna onno ottu 'to tedou faa ihuo ataŋatio motie;
isiaraniere afaŋan jio hia hullo owoni 'to idumele iko ibali ono naye;
buo fe itahutaniere hohoi ekoi ono namanya enne iyaŋuno 'to nelik tajia.”
Ninyia abolo leto alia, ette buo fe nahuan iko Oloholio honyi 'daŋ igolon. Amanya nyia inyi itua hidiofo many jio noloŋ ninyia oleyere inyi ihiji waati Israele.
To ninyia tonyia, ifak nyia Augusto, Hobu elle ittokon, eram jio oŋida igioroni afureta waati hutto obuore Roma 'daŋ.
Onyurak nyia etteri ihenio ono aluaji waati Kuirino ara amondir olo afau Siria.
Tania, ofuoi nyia aati 'daŋ iborejin gala hosi ababo itigioroniere afureta hosi.

Ette buo fe Yosefu ette idioto to bore gala Nasaret, atta fau Galilea, ette leten ibore gala Betelehem atta fau Yudea, abore gala ninyia isiorik Hobu Dafide. Olo nyia inyi diya nyio, ara nyia inyi to woyo Dafide.
Iyaru nyia inyi iko Maria, oduoti ninyia ocoroni jihonyi, itigioroniere afureta hosi. Oyedu nyia Maria,
attati noloŋ enne isiori inyi lumon buo isi howoni Betelehem;
ette inyi isiuna lonyi honyi oloŋeu, ette ibubunana inyi ta aboŋojin, ette itaferihina inyi itobol etanyai hisuŋ, nyio, obiaŋarak nyia isi amaji totua haji eyirit.
Owoni nyia omuk eyyahak kioro itua mur hulle irririai akioro hosi ta narue jio naŋati nyia.
Attati ajilo olo Lamonye ileyehino jihosi, ette akuatan ono Lamonye ifaŋan jihosi 'tel 'tel, buo isi 'daŋ ette ibaŋi bebe.
Ati ojio nyia ajilo jihosi, “Hèbaŋata! Nyio, eyaŋuno ni jihatai asayyo ayijok hunno ofuonni 'to itamuno aati 'daŋ bebe.
Isiuni duahana jihatai Letalahani itua bore gala Dafide, inyi Lamonye,
Ara adi ana jihatai etahuti; ifuatta adi itai irumana olodole ofer itobol etanyai hisuŋ ollo obubuna ta aboŋojin.”
Teya teya, oleyehino nyia eluluŋ ajilohien enne ittoki iko ajilo lia ette idolo afureta etahabuta Hollum jiojio,
“Akuatan hatawana ihide dou buo nelik tajia ifau jio aati hullo omuno inyi bebe!”
Ninyia acaharai ajilohien hulia lidou, ette eyyahak kioro jiaran, “Ikohafatta Betelehem imijuniere eram enne iduoŋ 'to ana, enne itahutak Lamonye jihohoi.”
Ania, ette isi iruharu kokuak ette inyurana Maria iko Yosefu buo olodole ollo ofer itogol.
Ninyia igonyuni eyyahak hia inyi, ette isi itisarrahina asayyo honyi ihuo itaniŋuni nyia isi jio ajilo.
Illillihai nyia aati 'daŋ hunyia itaniŋuni 'to asayyo hunyia iramani eyyahak hulia jihosi.
Ogottiere nyia Maria erre hunia 'daŋ itua taji honyi buo fe igigilo tesi bebe.
Acaharai nyia eyyahak kioro hulle itakuacie buo fe itahabuye Hollum te erre 'daŋ hunyia itaniŋuni isi buo fe igonyuni; nyio, onyurani nyia isi erre hua ihuo iramak nyia ajilo jihosi.
Ninyia attubai oŋitek hunno ofuarik Maria iko Yosefu ihaniere efahi ono etaliborio ihuo igioroni ifahita huno Mose, iyarai nyia isi leto alia Yerusalem isioriere inyi jio Lamonye.
Nyio, igioroni nyia ifahita huno Lamonye jio, “Oŋida oloŋehua 'daŋ igialani ahulo Lamonye.”
Ofuoi nyia buo fe isi isiarana amami arrihai kuyya awolosin arrihai hunne ihumarik ihuo ojiori efahita huno Lamonye.
Owon nyia obo atulo Yerusalem afure honyi Simion. Ara nyia inyi atulo alla abaŋ Hollum bebe. Itila nyia inyi etalahuna waati Israele. Owon nyia Loholio Olibo jihonyi,
linyia iramak 'to jihonyi jio, obeŋ adi inyi ojio aye kuak many igonyuniere inyi

Olo nyia Simion Ihaji emojit enne ittokon ihuo iramak nyia Loholio Olibo inyi. Ninyia iyaŋunie ba Yosefu iko Maria lonyi hosi Yesu itua Haji emojit enne ittokon ihaniere jihonyi ihuo ojiori efahita hosi,
ette Simion ikafuna Yesu; ette isio ahumo jio Hollum ette jiaran:
“Ihuania, Lamonye, ijiara ani egiamani hoi aye te nelik taji ihuo ijio nyia iyye.
Nyio, egonyu ni to oŋite hoŋ etalahani
elle ihuhumak iyye ihosiere waati 'daŋ
Ara adi inyi afaŋan, jio Alufajak,
buo fe iyaŋuno adi inyi akuatan jio aati hoi Israele.”
Tania, illillihai nyia esiok Yesu bebe te erre honyi hunyia ikiana Simion.
Attati Simion imojonia jihosi amuno, ette jiaran jio Maria, honyonyi jio, “Iyaŋuno adi leto olo akuaharu iko etalahuna waati Israele arriai. Ara adi inyi etahuti onno ottu 'to jio Hollum.
Oliwarik adi aati arriai inyi. Tania, asalanie adi egigilita hutto tajia hosi. Ocuk adi ejiriŋa ataji hoi ihuo ademi onno ofi 'to.”

Owon nyia buo fe nobo ekianani Hollum enne imaruak afure honyi Anna, ŋarri Fanuele, to woyo ba Aser. Oye nyia habi honyi buo isi hamanyuni aŋasi hattarik ijiai. Ihuania arai nyia aŋasi honyi atamuana hottohunik haŋuan
Jio asaa ania, afany nyia Anna ette isio ahumo jio Hollum, ette ikiana eram leto alia jio aati 'daŋ hunyia itilai 'to etalahuna ono Yerusalem.
Ninyia abolo leto alia, ofuananie nyia buo fe agolon iko olofioro honyi 'daŋ. Owon nyia buo fe inyi iko amuno ono Hollum.
Adahatie nyia esiok Yesu Yerusalem aŋasi 'daŋ iyomori eyom ono allaŋan.
Ninyia ara Yesu aŋasi 'tomon harrihai, ofuoi nyia isi iyom ihuo iyomitarik isi aŋasi 'daŋ.
Ninyia atuho neyom, acaharai nyia isi abore gala hosi Nasaret, ati arasahino nyia Yesu Yerusalem. Obeŋi nyia isi omijani arasa honyi,
nyio, igigiloi nyia isi jio owon adi inyi ihiji iluluŋ waati. Teya, adaharai nyia isi oloŋ abotie attati ittifia inyi ihiji hutta haŋ iko orriahat hosi.
Ninyia abeŋi isi onyurani inyi, ette isi icaharu Yerusalem ittifiari inyi.
Iholoŋ etahunihi
Te elofioro iko te etarraŋita honyi, illillihai nyia aati 'daŋ hunyia itaniŋuni 'to inyi.
Ninyia igonyuni esiok honyi inyi, ette isi illilliha. Attati honyonyi jiaran jihonyi, “Lonyi hoŋ, nyio ihanio iyye ihuania jihohoi? Ettoho ani iko monyohoi ehawwa iko attifia iyye.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu ojio, “Nyio ittifiati itai ani? Itimoti itai jio oŋida ani awon ihaji Monyoŋ?”
Ati obeŋi nyia isi omijani ikiana inyi anyio.
Attati Yesu icaharu ikosi Nasaret, amaji ninyia oniŋiere inyi ekiana hosi. Ogottiere nyia Maria erre hunia 'daŋ itaji honyi.
Ofuananie nyia abolori iko elofioro Yesu buo fe amuno Hollum inyi iko amuno waati inyi ette ifuananio.

Ihiŋa etattomoni homiyet ono elohobu Tiberias, Hobu elle ittokon; ara nyia Pontio Pilato amondir olo Yudea, buo Erode ara elettok olo Galilea, buo illanyi Filipo ara elettok olo afau Iturea iko Trakonito; buo fe Lisania ara elettok olo Abilin,
buo Anas iko Kaifas arai a hehumak hulle ittaha. Attati ekiana ono Hollum ittuna jio Yoane lonyi Sakariya ihidiofo.
Ania, ette Yoane leten aŋacio 'daŋ hutteger hari Yordano buo ittittoyo jiojio, “Obusana eyyata hatai, ifuotuna batisimo buo Hollum adi ette ihohina eyyata hatai.”
Ihuo igioroni nyia ibuk ono Isaya ekianani Hollum jio,
“Obo latulo elle iwuwoŋita ihidiofo jiojio,
‘Ihuhumana ekoi ono Lamonye
itabisana alori honyi!
Ijiara luŋa isihani awudorita 'daŋ,
ijiara osotoni adoŋiok 'daŋ iko aduleti ifau.
Ijiara ekotia 'daŋ hunno okukudoi 'to itabisanie 'tor 'tor,
buo fe iliŋoni alori 'daŋ hunno ogoŋie 'to.
Igonyuni adi aati 'daŋ etalahuna enne iyaŋuno Hollum.’ ”

Ihuo ayyani onno oŋijak 'to aaŋer ihaniete egemita hunne itahutani 'to jio, ihara itai eyyata hatai. Hètteriete ajiaran ta ahuattek hatai jio, ara Abramo ahohonyi hatai. Nyio, eramak ni itai jio, oremik Hollum iduhuna amoruoi huna ette iyyeuna aduri hutto woyo Abramo.
Ihuania, accio atolu ihadde 'yani. Ayyani onno obeŋ 'to oŋijak aŋer hunno oyiji 'to olloŋori adi inyi ette ibironia ihima.”
Buo eluluŋi waati ette ifiyo inyi, “Ehan 'tadi hohoi anyio?”
Itarraŋ nyia inyi ojio, “Lia, ollo owon 'to iko aboŋojin arrihai, ijiara luŋa aharak ebotie jio ollo obeŋ 'to owon iko obo. Ijiara buo fe lia ollo owon 'to iko amat ihan ihuo nyia.”
Buo inyi ette iramana isi jiojio, “Hètallaŋana amusuru hunne iddudduhuttati itai jio aati.”

Ette buo fe omuk oseŋer ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Buo hohoi, ehan 'tadi hohoi anyio?” Buo inyi ette iramana isi jiojio, “Hèhorotiete arobiyaa waati, hètisiahina obo atulo obojiai; hèmianati buo fe edumiti hatai.”
Obobolororo nyia eyihina waati, ania, ette itterierek isi eŋiŋa ta atajia hosi jio, kuyya hara Yoane

Ania, iramaniere Yoane isi 'daŋ jiojio, “Etifuocio ni itai batisimo ta aari, ati ottu adi lobo alla agalik 'to ani. Abeŋ ni ikoddaŋ asiru ihouniere amuha honyi. Ottu adi inyi itifuocio itai batisimo to Loholio Olibo iko te eema.
Owon egilli honyi ihani, igilliyere emma hunne igis inyi. Ififieu adi inyi emma 'daŋ ette ihanana imugu honyi, buo ette isuahina acono ihima onno obeŋ 'to odunya.”
Ittittoyo nyia Yoane Asayyo Ayijok jio aati te ekotia arriai buo fe ihum iramana isi oŋida iloiti emanyiti hosi.
Ati iŋerejanio nyia Yoane tuar tuar jio Erode Lamondir, te etadetuna Erode hahutani honyi Erodias buo fe te egemita honyi hunno orrohoji 'to.
Attati Erode inyiak irinyana obo epali onno orroho 'to agalik 'daŋ te etifitana honyi Yoane ibabus.
Ninyia ifuotuni aati 'daŋ batisimo, ette buo fe Yesu ifuotuna. Ninyia homojo inyi, aŋa nyia edou;
ette Loholio Olibo ollo owon iko ahuan ihuo awolo isuuna jihonyi tedou. Buo ekiana ette ittuna tedou onno ojio, “Iyye luŋa Lonyi hoŋ, ollo obuor ataji hoŋ; amuno ni iyye bebe.”
Ninyia itteriere Yesu egiama honyi, arai nyia aŋasi honyi ihuo atomuana hunihoi. Igigiloi nyia aati jio, inyi lonyi Yosefu, lonyi Eli,
lonyi Matat, lonyi Lefi, lonyi Melki, lonyi Yanai, lonyi Yosefu,
lonyi Matasias, lonyi Amos, lonyi Nahum, lonyi Esli, lonyi Nagai,
lonyi Maas, lonyi Matasias, lonyi Semin, lonyi Yosek, lonyi Yoda,
lonyi Yoanan, Lonyi Resa, lonyi Serubabel, linyia ara 'to lonyi Salatiel, linyia ara 'to lonyi Neri,
lonyi Meleki, lonyi Adi, lonyi Kosam, lonyi Elemadama, lonyi Er,
lonyi Yosua, lonyi Elieser, lonyi Yorima, lonyi Matat, lonyi Lefi,
lonyi Simion, lonyi Yuda, lonyi Yosefu, lonyi Yonam, lonyi Elayakim,
linyia ara 'to lonyi Meliya, lonyi Mena, lonyi Mattatta, lonyi Natan, lonyi Dafide,
lonyi Yese, Lonyi Obed, lonyi Bowas, lonyi Salmon, lonyi Nason,
lonyi Aminadab, lonyi Adimin, lonyi Arni, lonyi Heseron, lonyi Peres, lonyi Yuda,
lonyi Yakobo, lonyi Isako, lonyi Abramo, lonyi Tera, lonyi Nahor,
lonyi Seruca, linyia ara 'to lonyi Ru, lonyi Pelek, lonyi Eber, lonyi Sela,
lonyi Kainan, lonyi Arfaksad, lonyi Sem, lonyi Noa, lonyi Lamek,
lonyi Metusela, lonyi Enok, lonyi Yared, lonyi Mahalalil, lonyi Kenan,
lonyi Enos, lonyi Ses, lonyi Adam, lonyi Hollum.
Ninyia acohuno Yesu to hutuk lowore Yordano, ifut nyia inyi iko Loholio Olibo. Teya itadihoro nyia Oloholio alia inyi itua hidiofo,
diya okemio nyia Sittan inyi oŋitek atomuana aŋuan. Jio oŋitek hua 'daŋ, obeŋ nyia inyi anya obo ariŋ; ania, ette ahure ittohoro inyi ninyia atuhoi oŋitek hua.
Attati Sittan jiaran jihonyi jio, “Elle ira iyye Lonyi Hollum, iramak amoruo ana hotoyitoi emune.”
Ati, itarraŋ nyia Yesu ojio, “Igioroni ibuk Hollum jio, ‘Obeŋ atulo amanya te emune ijiai.’ ”
Attati Sittan iyaru Yesu jio obo amaji onno odu; teya teya, ette itahutana jihonyi olobiehien hutta fau 'daŋ.
Ette iramana jihonyi jio, “Esio adi ni jihoi elohittok iko esamiti honyi 'daŋ, nyio, isiori nyia isi 'daŋ jihoŋ. Aremik ni isiarana isi jio lia alla awak ni.
Arai adi hunia 'daŋ ahunohoi elle itahabuyo iyye ani.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu ojio, “Igioroni ibuk Hollum jio, ‘Itahabuye Hollum Lamonye hoi, buo fe igiama jihonyi hama!’ ”
Attati Sittan iyaru inyi Yerusalem, ette itawojihina inyi isihidi Haji emojit enne ittokon, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Elle ira iyye lonyi Hollum, orruaŋai ahuan hoi tene many ifau.
Nyio, igioroni ibuk Hollum jio, ‘Iramak adi Hollum ajilohien honyi oŋida irririai iyye.’
Igioroni buo fe jio, ‘Ittarrauni adi isi iyye ta ahas hosi jio ŋadi iyye ibosok eejek hoi imoruoi.’ ”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu ojio, “Ojio abuk ono Hollum jio, ‘Hèkemio Hollum Lamonye hoi.’ ”
Ninyia atuhok Sittan ekotia honyi 'daŋ hunyia okemiere inyi Yesu, ette inyi leten do addi.
Acaharu nyia Yesu Galilea buo owon iko agolon ono Loholio Olibo. Isarrahini nyia asayyo honyi jio afau nyia 'daŋ.
Ittiyenio nyia inyi ihasik emojiti buo aati 'daŋ ette itahuyo inyi.
Attati Yesu leten Nasaret, amaji ninyia itabolorunierek inyi, ette leten ihaji emojit to oloŋ Sabatto
ette imojuna abuk ono Isaya ekianani Hollum, ette iwalak agagar, ette inyurana aŋati enne igioronierek jio,
“Owon Oloholio olo Lamonye jihoŋ,
nyio, onyimu nyia inyi ani ittittoyere asayyo ayijok jio alociaŋak.
Ifahu inyi ani iramaniere ahouno jio efitak,
buo fe inyiahiniere amijio jio aŋodok,
ihohiniere aati hulle ittigemie,
iramaniere eeŋa,
onno ottuniere Lamonye italahuniere aati honyi.”
Ninyia atuhok inyi ehenio, obobin inyi agagar nyia, ette inyiahina jio aluahani; buo inyi ette itoŋo ittittoyere. Attati aati hunyia totua haji emojit iyohojonia jihonyi 'tok 'tok.
Buo inyi ette jiaran jihosi, “Ahana, arai egierita huna ahode te neduo itaniŋuniete itai isi ihenie.”
Itahuye nyia aati 'daŋ inyi buo fe ette illilliha bebe ta abisan ikenita honyi, ette isi jiaran, “Obiaŋara soho lonyi Yosefu alia?”

Buo inyi ette jiaran jihosi, “Amijak ni jio iramana adi itai ani ekeni ofioro onno ojio 'to jio, ‘Diktor, itaŋidara ahuan hoi.’ Ihanie buo fe dini ibore gala hatai erre hunyia etaniŋu hohoi jio ihanio iyye Kapernaum.”
Ette inyi jiaran, “Eramak ni itai hode jio, obeŋi aati iruhi ekianani Hollum otto bore gala hosi.
“Ahode, eramak ni itai, owoni nyia aŋoruo ehidahi arriai ifau Israele to oŋitek huno Elija. Obeŋ nyia ahide asayo aŋasi hunihoi iko ayafajin ille, ette aati afau ania 'daŋ ihuria.
Obeŋ nyia Hollum ifak Elija jio obo atulo ta fau Israele, ati ifahini nyia inyi jio obo aŋotte ehidak ninyia amanya 'to Sarafat atta fau Sidon.
Oluaji nyia buo fe aati hullo owoni 'to iko
Ninyia itaniŋuni aati hutto tua haji emojit erre hunia, ette isi 'daŋ iloŋojita bebe.
Ania, ette isi idioto, ette ipihoro inyi addi to bore gala, ette iyaru inyi ihide doŋe ollo odiha linyia awattari abore gala hosi. Awahi nyia isi isuluna inyi to hide walaŋ.
Ati ohihisaru nyia inyi tehiji hosi, ette leten addi.
Attati Yesu leten Kapernaum, abore gala otto Galilea, ette ittiyenio aati to noloŋ Sabatto.
Illillihai nyia isi ettiyenio honyi, nyio, ikiana nyia inyi te elohittok.
Diya, owon nyia obo atulo itua haji emojit ollo owon iko aminiaŋati, ette inyi iluaha woŋ woŋ jiojio,
“Eii! Yesu olo Nasaret, nanyio enne iwak iyye jihohoi? Ittu iyye itatturiere hohoi? Amijak ni iyye ŋai. Iyye
Ati iŋerejanio nyia Yesu jihonyi, “Oduai! Ojiŋu addi jio atulo alia!” Ette aminiaŋati ania ibuarana atulo alia ifau ihosiere hosi ette ijiŋuna addi jihonyi, buo obeŋ iriafu inyi.
Illillihai nyia aati 'daŋ, ette ifiyo ahuattek hosi jiojio, “Anyio ikenita huna? Iŋerejanio atulo olo jio aminiaŋa te elohittok iko ta agolon, buo isi ette ijiŋuna addi.”
Tania, ette asayyo Yesu isarrahina jio afau nyia 'daŋ.
Odioto nyia Yesu ta haji emojit, ette leten ihaŋ Simone. Diya, oŋuai nyia hamoni Simone iko anahan huan onno orroho 'to bebe. Attati isi ifiyo Yesu oŋida oluak inyi.
Attati Yesu leten ette iwotia iger ijotit hamoni Simone, ette ifuhara anahan huan ania buo inyi ette leten addi. Teya teya, odioto nyia hamoni Simone ette ihuhumana jihosi aŋiyo.
Ninyia iddorro oloŋ, iyaŋunie nyia aati 'daŋ orriahat hosi hunyia owoni 'to iko eŋuati gele gele jio Yesu; buo Yesu ette ittir isi ababo ta ahas honyi ette itaŋida isi 'daŋ.
Ojiŋuni nyia aminiaŋa addi jio aati arriai, buo oluahai jio, “Iyye Lonyi Hollum!”
Iŋerejanio nyia Yesu jihosi buo ette itik isi ikianari nyio omijani nyia isi jio ara inyi

Nyia taŋatio motie, iwany nyia Yesu totua bore gala ette leten jio obo amaji onno obeŋi waati. Attati aati ittifia inyi. Ninyia anyurani isi inyi, awahi nyia isi itihotio inyi jio Hèlaha inyi obusaru isi.
Ati ojio nyia inyi jihosi, “Ijiara buo fe ani alo ittittoyo Asayyo Ayijok huno Olobie Hollum jio aborejin gala hunnomuk, nyio, inyi eram ania ninyia ifahunierek ani.”
Ania, ittittoyere inyi ihasik emojiti hutta fau Yudea
Ette inyi igonyuna atogoli arrihai atarani ilotifor. Idiaharai nyia ayafohok atogoli hunia, buo ofuoi illillayo aboyo hosi.
Attati Yesu idahina jio atogol ebotie ninyia ara 'to ono Simone. Ette iramana Simone ijiara osulak atogol ania kai attua hari. Attati Yesu itoŋo itua togol, ette ittiyenio eluluŋ waati nyia.
Ninyia atuhok inyi ekiana, ette inyi jiaran jio Simone, “Osulak atogol ana many iwudori hari, buo iyye iko orriahat hoi iruoŋonia aboyo hatai itua hari iyafohuniere aham.”
Ninyia ibironi isi aboyo itua hari ette isi iyafohuna aham arriai many ojiarik aboyo efuto.
Attati isi ifalio orriahat hosi hutto togol ebotie oŋida ofuonni iluak isi, ette isi ifuanna, ette itafutana atogoli hunia 'daŋ many ojiori odiori.
Ninyia igonyu Simone Petro erre hunia, ette inyi irigoŋo ihosiere Yesu, ette jiaran, “Lamonye, ilo jihoŋ addi! Nyio, ara ni atulo eyyani!”
Ette inyi iko hullomuk 'daŋ illilliha ta aluaji ham hunna ayafohuni isi.
Illillihai nyia buo fe orriahat Simone, bo Yakobo iko Yoane, lonyirok Sebedeyo. Attati Yesu jiaran jio Simone, “Hèbaŋ! Ihuania many moi, ittu adi iyye iyaŋutta aati jihoŋ.”
Ania, ette isi ipihuna atogoli hunia ilotifor hari ette idiaharu erre 'daŋ buo ette ijifaru Yesu.
Owon nyia Yesu jio obo abore gala ninyia awattari obo latulo ollo owon iko
Attati Yesu ihalamana aani honyi, ette ittir inyi ette jiaran, “Awak ni, toliboi.” Teya teya, ette aŋuai nyia idehina atulo alia.

Attati Yesu ihum iramana inyi jio, “Hèramak obo atulo eram ania, obotik jio ehumani, oŋida inyi ihum imi iyye; attati teya, ilo isiarak ehumi jio Hollum ihuo ojiori efahita huno Mose, itahutaniere jio aati 'daŋ jio ilibo iyye.”
Ati, inyiahi atibuo asayyo huno Yesu ikuataru bebe bebe, attati eluluŋi waati ifuonnutta jihonyi itaniŋiere buo fe oŋida itaŋidari isi jio eŋuati hosi.
Ati adahatio nyia inyi imasik hunno oyuri 'to imojori.
To obo oloŋ, ninyia ittiyeniere Yesu, owoni nyia omuk
Teya, illillorunie nyia omuk aati obo atulo elle iluro huan, te ejotit. Awahi nyia isi itajiŋaru inyi attua haji ihananiere ihosiere Yesu.

Ati obeŋi nyia isi onyurani ekoi iyari inyi attua haji, nyio, ifudai nyia aati bebe. Attati isi ikafaru inyi ahide haji, ette ibolohoro ategula, ette itusuronia inyi te eferit honyi, ihiji iluluŋ, ihosiere Yesu.
Ninyia igonyu Yesu eruk hosi ette inyi jiaran, “Illa, ahohinie eyyata hoi.”
Attati ettiyanak ifahita iko
Ati omijak nyia Yesu egigilita hosi, ette inyi ifiyo isi jiojio, “Nyio igigiloti itai ihuo nyia?
Anani enne iliaha 'to, ijiari ‘Ahohinie eyyata hoi’ kuyya ijiari, ‘Totte adahai?’
Ati etahutak adi ni jihatai jio, owon Lonyi Tulo iko elohittok ifau ihohiniere eyyata.” Attati inyi jiaran jio atulo elle iluro huan, “Eramak ni iyye, totte, iduhu ejotit hoi ilo haŋ!”
Teya Teya, odioto nyia inyi ihosiere hosi 'daŋ, ette iduhuna eferit noduo oferiori inyi, ette leten haŋ, buo itahabuyo Hollum.
Tania, illillihai nyia isi 'daŋ, ette buo fe itahabuyo Hollum ta abaŋi, ette jiaran, “Ajajaja! Alufajak hirre hunne egonyu hohoi huna ahana!”
Ihalu erre hunia, olo nyia Yesu allet ette igonyuna Lefi eddudduhani musuru itoŋo imahatab honyi; ette jiaran jihonyi, “Ijifunie ani.”
Ette inyi idioto ette idiaharu erre 'daŋ ette ijifaru Yesu.
Attati Lefi ihuhumana Yesu agari enne ittok ihaŋ honyi. Obolo nyia eluluŋ hèddudduhak musuru iko aati hullomuk hinyia oŋiye 'to diya.
Attati omuk
Attati Yesu itarraŋ isi jiojio, “Obeŋi aati hullo oŋidari 'to awahi diktor, arari fe aŋuak hama.
Abeŋ ni attu iloŋori abisak, ati attu ni iloŋori eyyak oŋida ihari eyyata hosi.”
Attati isi jiaran jio Yesu, “Oferuttai nyia ejifak hulo Yoane buo fe omojoi gagaga. Ihanie nyia buo fe lejifak hulo
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu jiojio, “Oremehini soho orriahat hayamani iferuna buo ayamani howon ihiji hosi? Obeŋ!
Ati ofuonni, adi oŋitek hunne iyarik ayamani tehiji hosi addi, tania oferuni adi isi.”

Iramak nyia buo fe Yesu jihosi etarriamai ana, “Obeŋ tulo oguasu aŋati boŋo aŋejuk ittafiere aboŋo amaruani. Elle ihan inyi ihuo nyia, ittarroho adi inyi aboŋo aŋejuk. Obeŋi adi buo fe aŋati boŋo aŋejuk orriamahini iko ono aboŋo amaruani.
Obeŋ buo fe tulo iturak afino aŋejuk itua ihulo amaruani, nyio, obor adi afino ehulo ania ette ijuhoro addi buo ehulo ania ette irrohoji.
Ati ijiara iturani afino aŋejuk jio ehulo aŋejuk.
Alla amat atulo afino amaruani, obeŋ inyiak iwahan afino aŋejuk, nyio, ojio adi inyi jio, ‘Ilaman afino amaruani jihoŋ.’ ”
To obo oloŋ Sabatto, adaharu nyia Yesu ta atua matta, attati lejifak honyi igiluna omuk ossi himma ette ifofo, ette niŋa.
Attati omuk hulo
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ isi ojio, “Hèbiaŋata itai ihenuna erre hunyia ihan Dafide iko aati honyi ninyia aniamai isi?

Ojiŋak nyia inyi ihaji Hollum, ette iduhuna emunio hunyia isiarani jio Hollum ette iŋiyo; ette buo fe isio omuk jio aati honyi. Ati ihuo ojiori efahita hohoi, oduari nyia emunio hunia jio aati asai iŋiyere isi, arari fe ehumak hama.”
Attati Yesu itisidonia ekiana honyi, ette jiaran, “Ara Lonyi Tulo Lamonye olo Sabatto.”
To oloŋ Sabatto onnobo ojiŋak nyia Yesu ihaji emojit, ette ittiyenio. Owon nyia obo atulo diya ollo oye aani iŋet honyi.
Attati omuk hulo ettiyanak ifahita iko omuk
Ati omijak nyia Yesu egigilita hosi, ette jiaran jio atulo ollo oye hani, “Totte, waŋ ihosiere.” Odioto nyia atulo lia ette leten iwotia diya.
Attati Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Efiyo ni itai: anyio anna aŋatani efahita hohoi jio oŋida ehanio to oloŋ Sabatto? Iluahiere kuyya ittarrohojiere, italuahuniere atulo kuyya ittohori inyi?”
Teya attati inyi imijio jihosi 'daŋ, ette jiaran
Ati ijoriai nyia isi bebe bebe, ette isi iwwaha isi hama jio ehan adi isi Yesu aŋai.
To oloŋ tonyia olo nyia Yesu imojo idoŋe, ette inyi imojo arue 'daŋ jio Hollum.
Ninyia afaŋ amotie, iloŋu nyia inyi ejifak honyi ette inyimuna aati 'tomon harrihai tehiji hosi hinyia ifurak inyi lefahat:
Simone (Linyia ifurak inyi Petro) iko illanyi Andrea; Yakobo iko Yoane, Filipo iko Bartolomeyo,
iko Matteyo buo Tomaso, Yakobo lonyi Alfeyo iko Simone (linyia iloŋoi Silot
Yuda lonyi Yakobo, iko Yuda Iskariot linyia ottu 'to irahan ahetinyiaŋani Yesu.

Ninyia allu Yesu iko lefahat honyi to hide doŋe, owotia nyia inyi igum doŋe iko lejifak honyi arriai, buo eluluŋ waati arriai hunyia ofuonni 'to ta fau Yudea, to Yerusalem buo fe to broejin gala Taya iko Sidon hutteger hari mile enne ittokon.
Ofuonni nyia isi 'daŋ itaniŋiere jio Yesu, buo fe awahi oŋida itaŋidari eŋuati hosi. Ofuonni nyia buo fe aati hulle ittigemie aminiaŋa, buo ette itaŋida isi.
Awahi nyia aati 'daŋ ittir inyi, nyio ottu nyia aduaran to huan honyi ette itaŋida isi 'daŋ.
Attati Yesu imijio jio lejifak honyi ette jiaran,
“Omunoti itai alociaŋak,
ara Olobie ono Hollum ahanatai!
Omunoti buo fe itai hulle iniamati 'to ihuania;
ifuaŋata adi itai!
Omunoti itai hulle iyyooti 'to ihuania;
nyio isuhotiete adi itai!
“Omunoti itai alla aliwarik aati itai, ihari itai, omorie itai, buo fe ittarrohojie afureta hatai, te eram Lonyi Tulo!
Omunoti buo fe isahuttati alla afuonni erre hunia irahan hode, nyio, obolo adi esiorio jihatai idou. Nyio, ihanie nyia hohonyiok hosi erre hunia jio ekianak Hollum.
“Ati, orroho adi bebe jihatai hulle isamata 'to ihuania,
nyio, inyurana itai amuno hatai!
Orroho adi buo fe bebe jihatai hulle ifuoŋata 'to ihuania;
nyio, ihuriati adi itai!
Orroho adi buo fe bebe jihatai hulle imunoti 'to ihuania;
nyio, ijiriŋati adi itai buo fe iyyooti.
“Orroho adi bebe jihatai elle itahuye aati itai, nyio, ihanie nyia hohonyiok hosi ihuo nyia jio ekianak enyabak hullo ojiori 'to jio ekiana isi eram Hollum.
“Ati eramak ni jihatai hulle itaniŋiete 'to jihoŋ: Itabuarata atajia jio amiorok hatai, ihaniete onno oyyu jio hia hullo oliwarik 'to itai,
Omunoti aati hulle ipice 'to itai, omojoti buo fe to aati hullo omorie 'to itai.
Alla annaŋ obo atulo amahalio hoi, isiarak buo fe inyi annaŋ ebotie; elle iyaru buo fe obo atulo akout hoi, isiarak buo fe inyi agamis hoi.
Isiarak obo ariŋ jio lia, ollo omojo 'to jihoi; buo fe elle iyaru obo atulo ariŋ hoi, idehi jihonyi.
Ihaniete jio aati ihuo iwahata itai isi ihanie jihatai.
“Alla abuori atajia hatai ijiai aati hullo obuori atajia hosi itai, anyio yiji 'tadi enne inyiahata itai irumana! Ara duadi bu eyyak ihanie buo fe isi ihuo nyia.
Elle ihaniete buo fe itai onno oyyu jio aati hulle ihanie 'to jihatai onno oyyu, anyio yiji 'tadi enne inyiak inyi iyaŋuno jihatai? Ara duadi bu eyyak, ihanie buo fe isi ihuo nyia!

Elle ihuronia buo fe itai erre jio hia hama hulle iyihina itai jio ofuonni adi inyiahina jihatai, anyio yiji 'tadi enne inyiak inyi iyaŋuno jihatai? Ara duadi bu eyyak, ohurotiai buo fe isi jio eyyak ihuo isi, ifuotuniere onno orriama!

Ati itabuarata atajia jio amiorok hatai, ihaniete onno oyyu jihosi, ohuronia jihosi buo fe hèyihina jio ofuonni adi isi inyiahina jihatai obo ariŋ. Tania, obolo adi esiorio jihatai; irata adi itai olonyirok Hollum elle Ilomohi 'to 'daŋ. Nyio, omehino inyi jio hia hullo obeŋi 'to ojiori humo iko jio arrohojak.
Iwatta iko amehino ihuo anna awattari Monyatai.
“Hèŋototo eram omuk, buo obeŋ adi Hollum oŋot eram hatai. Hèŋotonia epali jio omuk, buo fe Hollum adi obeŋ oŋotok epali jihatai. Idehina epalita huno hullomuk, buo fe Hollum adi idehi epalita hatai.

Isiatta jio hullomuk, buo isiarak adi Hollum jihatai. Ifuotuna adi itai luŋa ekemit sudu hia eluahiti huno emorot hunne ijuhoni adi ihide hirre huttanatai. Nyio, ekemit ninyia ikemiette itai, inyi adi onno okemierek esiorita jihatai.”
Obeŋ obo eyiyanani agalik ettiyanani honyi; ati alla atuk inyi eyiyana honyi, ara adi inyi ihuo ettiyanani honyi.
“Anyio imijio iyye jio aboroti otto honyek illahoi buo ibeŋ igonyu abeleri otto honyek hoi?

Aŋai adi ijio iyye jio illahoi, ‘Illa, hadi eduhu ni aboroti otto honyek hoi,’ buo ibeŋ igonyu abeleri otto honyek hoi? Jai! Iyye etihanani huan, iduhu do addi abeleri otto honyek hoi; tania, iremik adi iyye ihum igonyuna buo fe iduhuna addi aboroti otto honyek illa hoi.
“Obeŋ ayyani onno oyyu 'to oŋijak eŋijiti hunno orrohoji, buo fe ayyani onno orroho 'to obeŋ oŋijak eŋijiti hunno oyiji.
Oherunie ayyani 'daŋ te eŋijiti hosi; ittallihoto itai ideuna aŋabolo to ŋarria, ittallihoto itai buo fe ideuna eŋijiti fino to hikua.

Iyaŋuno oloyijio erre ayijok to hirre hunno oyiji 'to hunno ottunai 'to itua taji honyi, buo olorroho iyaŋuno erre arrohojak to hirre hunno orrohoji 'to hunno ottunai 'to itua taji honyi. Nyio, ikiana eetuk erre hunno owoni 'to itua taji.
“Nyio iloŋoti itai ani ‘Lamonye, Lamonye,’ buo ibiaŋata ihaniete erre hunne eramak ni itai?
Atulo ollo ottu 'to itaniŋio ekenita hoŋ buo fe oniŋio isi, eramak adi ni itai ara inyi ihuo ŋai.

Ara inyi ihuo atulo aduhoni haji ollo obok 'to ewurio wir wir many ottuloniere imoruoi ette iduhonia etawojita haji honyi diya. Ninyia ifut olowore many aŋabiere olotifor, ette ibul aaji ania, obeŋ nyia inyi oritihoro nyio, ihum nyia inyi iduho.

Ati atulo elle itaniŋu 'to ekenita hoŋ buo obeŋ oniŋio isi, ara inyi ihuo atulo ollo oduhok 'to aaji honyi ihide hifuoto buo obeŋ obok ewurio etawojita haji honyi. Ninyia ibul aari aaji ania, ette inyi iritihoro. Orroho nyia ekuahit honyi bebe!”
Ninyia atuhok Yesu ekiana erre hunia 'daŋ jio aati, ette inyi leten Kapernaum.
Buo diya, owon nyia obo ajafit olo oseŋer Roma iko apit honyi ollo omuno inyi bebe. Ati oŋuai nyia apit alia many imohita.
Ninyia itaniŋu ajafit lia asayyo Yesu, ette inyi ifahina lahou Yudei jio Yesu jio oŋida ottu itaŋida apit honyi.
Ninyia afanyi isi jio Yesu, ette isi ittana inyi bebe jio “Osiru iluak iyye ajafit alia,
nyio, obuor ataji honyi aati hohoi buo fe oduhok jihohoi aaji emojit.”

Ette Yesu leten ikosi. Ninyia iliaha inyi iger haŋ ajafit alia, inyiak ajafit alia ifahina orriahat honyi jio Yesu, héfuahi jiaran jihonyi jio, “Lettok, hèttigemio ahuan hoi obojiai, nyio obeŋ osiru ittu iyye ihaji hoŋ.
Obeŋ buo fe osiru jihoŋ ilari jihoye ta ahuan hoŋ, ati ikianai te eetuk ijiai oŋida adi apit hoŋ.

Orriama ihuo anna aniŋiere ni elettaha hoŋ, buo fe oseŋer hoŋ oniŋie ani. Aremik ni jiaran jio obo, ‘Ilo!’ buo inyi ette leten, buo fe jio lobo, ‘Waŋ!’ buo inyi ette ittuna; buo fe ajio jio apit hoŋ, ‘Ihana enya!’ buo inyi ette ihan.”

Ninyia itayiru Yesu eram ana, ette inyi illilliha, ette iyito jio eluluŋ waati ninyia ijifatio 'to inyi, ette jiaran jihosi, “Eramak ni itai, habeŋ ni anyurak obo eruk onno obolo ihuo ana, ara duo bu ifau Israele!”
Attati leyak sayyo hunyia ifahini jio Yesu icaharu ihaŋ ajafit lia, ette inyurana apit honyi aŋida.
Nyia motie

Ninyia iliaha inyi ikol bore gala, oruaŋanio nyia inyi iko aati ojiŋuni addi, hulla akafunie ayaani inuhiere. Ara nyia ayaani alia eto olobotie jio obo aŋotte ehidak ninyia ofuonni 'to iko eluluŋ waati to tua bore gala.
Ninyia igonyu Lamonye ehidak ania, ette inyi imehino jihonyi, ette jiaran, “Hèyyoo.”
Attati Yesu ittuna, ette ittir ekafit hayaani lia, buo akafak ette iwotia. Attati Yesu jiaran, “Illa, ajio ni jihoi totte!”
