Teya, ette ayaani alia idioto, ette itterio ekiana, buo Yesu ette isio inyi jio honyonyi.
Abaŋi nyia aati 'daŋ bebe; ette isi itahabuyo Hollum ojio, “Adetuno ekianani Hollum elettok ihiji hohoi! Attu buo fe Hollum italahuniere aati honyi!”
Attati eram ono Yesu isarrahina ifau Yudea iko afauhien hutto onyihari honyi 'daŋ.
Ninyia itaniŋu Yoane erre huna 'daŋ jio lejifak honyi, ette inyi iloŋuna lejifak honyi arrihai,
ette ifahina isi jio Lamonye ifiyere inyi jio, “Iyye atulo linyia ojio Yoane olo adi ittuna, kuyya etila 'tadi hohoi lobo hama?”
Ninyia afuonni isi jio Yesu, ette isi jiaran, “Ifahu hohoi Yoane etifuotoni Batisimo jihoi ifiyere; kuyya elle ira iyye atulo linyia ojio inyi olo adi ittuna, kuyya etila 'tadi hohoi obo atulo hama?”
To ninyia tonyia itaŋida nyia Yesu aati arriai te eŋuati hosi, buo fe itaŋida aati miniaŋa, buo ette inyiahina amijio jio aŋodok.

Attati Yesu itarraŋ eyak sayyo hunyia ifahu Yoane jiojio, “Ifuatta iramana Yoane erre hunne igonyuna itai buo fe itaniŋuna: amijie aŋodok, adahai aŋurak, alibori hullo oŋuai 'to iko eŋuati belelio, itayirie attuhok, ibuhuni ayaak, ittittoye buo fe Asayyo Ayijok jio alociaŋak
Hotomunohi hia, hullo obeŋi 'to okuayai eram hoŋ!”

Ninyia acaharai eyak sayyo hulo Yoane, itterio nyia Yesu ekiana jio eluluŋ waati to Yoane ojio: “Ninyia ifuati itai jio Yoane ihidiofo, iwahata nyia itai igonyuna anyio? Igonyuna nyia itai afarawati miyaŋ onno ohucio oyyami?
Ati ifuatta nyia itai imijio anyio? Atulo elle ihum iŋata? Ahode, aati hulla aŋatai 'to ihuo nyia buo fe ilobiai, amanyai isi ihasik hobuok!
Ati, iramana ani ifuatta nyia itai imijio anyio? Ekianani Hollum? Hode, igonyuna nyia itai atulo alla agalik 'to ekianani Hollum.
Yoane nyia linyia ikiana abuk Hollum jio: ‘Ojio Hollum jio, efak adi ni eyani sayyo hoŋ to osiere hoi, ihuhumaniere ekoi hoi.’
Eramak ni itai, jio aati hutta fau 'daŋ hobeŋ obo alla agalik 'to Yoane. Ati Ilobie Hollum, inyiak atulo asai igalihina Yoane.”
Ati ihari nyia
Attati Yesu jiaran, “Etarrijohi adi ni aati hulo ahana iko anyio? Arai isi ihuo anyio?
Arai isi ihuo aduri hulla abalai 'to isuk buo illilloŋoi ahuattek jiojio, ‘Ehutak hohoi itai aatar, ati ibiaŋata itai ihiati! Edol hohoi afureta tuari, buo itai ibiaŋata iyyooti!’
Ottu nyia Yoane Etifuotoni Batisimo ollo oferutta buo fe obeŋ amata afino, buo itai ijiatta jio, ‘Owon inyi iko aminiaŋati!’
Lattu Lonyi Tulo, ollo oŋiyo buo fe amata, buo itai ijiatta jio, ‘Ike imijata atulo alia, ara inyi alaŋaru, aharumani buo fe amotte hèddudduhak musuru iko eyyak!’
Ati itahutani aati hulle eruhi 'to ofioro Hollum jio obisi ofioro honyi.”
Iloŋu nyia obo a Fariseitanani Yesu iŋiria. Attati Yesu leten ihaŋ honyi, ette itoŋo iŋiyere.
Itua bore gala ania, owon nyia obo aŋotte anna ara 'to aheyyani ta amanya honyi 'daŋ. Ninyia itaniŋu inyi jio Yesu oloŋiyo ihaŋ a Fariseitanani lia, ette inyi iyaŋuno ariaa ta akarajaja,
ette irigoŋo ifau iger hejek honyi onno oyyoo buo itadohitta eyyoo honyi ihejek Yesu. Attati inyi ifufus eejek Yesu to oofir honyi, ette ijur jur isi, ette buo fe iyal isi ta ariaa.

Ninyia igonyu a Fariseitanani lia eram ana, ette inyi ikiana hama jiojio, “Ara duo atulo olo luŋa ahekianani Hollum, omijak duo inyi anani ŋotte onno ottir 'to ania inyi; nyio, ara aŋotte ania aheyyani!”
Attati Yesu jiaran jihonyi, “Simone, ajio ni ekiana obo eram jihoi.”
Buo inyi ette itarraŋ ojio, “Oŋida, ikianai Hettiyanani.”
Attati Yesu jiaran, “Owon nyia obo atulo iko aati horos honyi arrihai. Owon obotie iko arobiyaa esiha miyet (500), buo ollobo iko arobiyaa atomuana miyet.
Ati ogol nyia jihosi idumari amonye robiyaa, ette amonye robiyaa ibusana isi 'daŋ, ihuania alali adi tehiji hosi ollo omuno 'to bebe?”
Itarraŋ Simone ojio, “Egigilo ni lia ollo obusani jihonyi arriai.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Ittenu iyye.”

Attati inyi iyito jio aŋotte ania ette jiaran jio Simone, “Igonyu iyye aŋotte ana? Noduo attuniere ni ihaŋ hoi, ibeŋ duo iyye isio ani aari illillayere eejek hoŋ, ati illilla inyi eejek hoŋ te eyyoo honyi ette buo fe ifufus to oofir honyi.
Ibeŋ duo iyye ifony ani ta ahucio 'yaha, ati arasa inyi ijujurio eejek hoŋ many hafany ni ihaŋ hoi.
Ibeŋ duo iyye iyal ahou hoŋ te eyali, ati iyal inyi eejek hoŋ ta ariaa.

Tania, eramak ni iyye jio, itahutak abuaran taji honyi onno obolo 'to ania jio, ahohinie eyyata honyi hunno oluaji 'to. Ati jio lia, ollo omuta abuaran taji honyi, itahutak jio omutari eyyata honyi hunno ohohinie 'to.”
Attati Yesu jiaran jio aŋotte ania, “Ahohinie eyyata hoi.”
Attati aati hunyia itoŋoi 'to ikonyi imaji ŋiria itterio ikiana isi hama jiojio, “Ŋai buo fe olo, ollo oremik 'to ihohina eyyata?”
Ati ojio nyia Yesu jio aŋotte ania, “Italahu eruk hoi iyye. Ilo te nelik taji.”
Teya, olo nyia Yesu totto borejin gala iko amisihi buo ittittoyo Asayyo Ayijok huno Olobie Hollum. Olo nyia inyi iko lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai,
buo fe omuk aŋoruo hunyia itaŋida inyi te ŋuati buo fe ifuha addi aminiaŋa jihosi: Maria enne ifurani Madalina inyia ifuhari aminiaŋa hattarik addi jihonyi;
Yohana ŋoruoi Kusa elettok ilobuore ono Erode; iko Susana, buo fe omuk aŋoruo arriai, hunyia iduhuni 'to esamiti hosi oluahierek bo Yesu iko lejifak honyi.
Odulori nyia aati afuonnutta jio Yesu to borejin gala 'daŋ ababo, ati ninyia attuba eluluŋ waati enne ittok, ette Yesu iramana isi etarriamai ana:
“Olo nyia obo aromoni iyehina enyomo. Ninyia layehi inyi, ofodoŋonie nyia omuk enyomo ihiji ikoi, buo aati adak ette irririe buo fe aheny ette ikukubuna isi.
Ofodoŋonie nyia buo fe omuk ihiji moruoi; ninyia isuruni isi, ette isi iyohojoro nyio, obeŋi nyia aboro ofuji.
Ofodoŋonie nyia omuk ihiji hikua, ette isi isuruna arabotie iko nekua, ette nekua itabunara isi.

Okuahinie nyia omuk jio aboro hunno oyiji 'to ette isi isuruna onno oyyu buo emai abotie ette isuaru esiha abotie (100).” Attati Yesu itisidonia ekiana honyi, ette jiaran, “Itayiriete alla awoni ayyaha jihatai!”
Attati lejifak Yesu ifiyo inyi anyio woyo hiram enne ikiana etarriamai ania.

Buo inyi ette itarraŋ isi jiojio, “Isiarani jihatai amijana hirre huno Olobie Hollum hunyia otimoi; buo iramani jio aati hullomuk te etarriamata oŋida isi omijie buo obeŋ igonyuni, itayirai buo obeŋi omijani.
“Ikiana etarriamai ana ihuo ana: arai enyomo ekiana ono Hollum.
Nenyomo hunno ofodoŋonie 'to ihiji ikoi, isi aati hulle itaniŋuni 'to ekiana, ati ottu Sittan ette ikuararu inyi addi to tajia hosi oŋida isi obeŋi iruhi ette ibiaŋan italahunie.

Nenyomo hunno ofodoŋonie 'to imoruoi, isi aati hulle itayiruni 'to ekiana, ette ifuotuna ta namuno. Ati obeŋ inyi ihum ijiŋana ituajin hosi; iruhi isi do, buo alla attu akemio, ette isi 'daŋ ikuaharu addi.
Nenyomo hunno ofodoŋonie 'to itua hikua, isi aati hulle itayiruni 'to ekiana, ati itabuna isi egigilo te esamiti iko ehawwata buo emuniti huno afau ana, ette eŋijiti hosi ibiaŋan iŋidari.
Buo enyomo hunno okuahinie iboro hunno oyiji, isi aati hulle itayiruni 'to ekiana ette ittunana itajia hosi ta ayiji iko ta aniŋio, ette isi idihan many oŋijarik.
Ofuonni nyia honye iko illarak Yesu imijio inyi, ati ittallihi nyia isi ifanyan jihonyi nyio, ifudai nyia aati bebe.
Attati obo atulo jiaran jihonyi, “Honyohoi iko illarak hoi hunno owotiai illet, awahi isi imijio iyye.”
Ati ojio nyia Yesu jihosi 'daŋ, “Iyaŋ iko illarak hoŋ, isi aati hulle itaniŋie 'to ekiana Hollum buo fe oniŋie inyi.”
To nobo noloŋ, adak nyia Yesu itogol iko lejifak honyi, ette jiaran jihosi, “Hallaŋata aŋati tafar enne ittokon tole.” Ania ette isi ifuatan.
Ninyia ayiroroi isi atogol ette inyi ijotoro. Attati oloyyami enne ittok ihutan onno orroho bebe many ojio aari etafutak atogol, many oyeyerari jihosi.
Ette lejifak Yesu itaheny inyi jiojio, “Hettiyanani, Hettiyanani! Efuo iye!”
Odioto nyia Yesu, ette ihum iramana addiŋilla ania iko afoliahita hari hotoduahi; ette Addiŋilla ania iwotia, buo aari ette idua dee.
Attati Yesu ikiana jihosi, “Tani buo eruk hatai?”
Ati abaŋi nyia isi buo fe illillihai, ette ikikiana ta ahuattek hosi jiojio, “Eii! Anyio tulo olo! Ihum inyi iramana oloyyami iko afoliahita hari hotoduaniehe, buo isi ette iniŋio!”
Attati Yesu iko lejifak honyi illaŋan many ifau Gerasa

Ninyia isurok Yesu ilotifor, oruaŋanio nyia inyi iko obo atulo miniaŋa linyia ottu 'to totua bore gala. Adaha nyia atulo alia aŋaturoi aŋasi arriai buo fe obeŋ itoŋo itua haŋ. Ati amanyatio nyia inyi ihiji ilumio.

Ninyia igonyu inyi Yesu, ette inyi iyyoo bebe, ette irruaŋana ahuan honyi ifau ihosiere Yesu, ette ikiana jihonyi woŋ woŋ ojio, “Yesu, Lonyi Hollum Elle illomohi 'to 'daŋ! Anyio, enne iwak iyye jihoŋ? Hibe awotto, hèttigemio ani!”

Ikiana nyia inyi ihuo nyia, nyio, ifuhatio nyia Yesu aminiaŋati hételo jihonyi addi. Iniafatio nyia aminiaŋati ania inyi enyiahita arriai, duadi bu irririai inyi buo fe ifiti ahas iko eejek honyi ta aririk, ifufut nyia inyi aririk buo aminiaŋati ania ette itisiabaru inyi itua hidiofo.
Attati Yesu ifiyo inyi ojio, “Ŋai afure hoi?”
Itarraŋ nyia inyi ojio, “Afure hoŋ iluluŋ!” Nyio, oluaji nyia aminiaŋa hunyia ojiŋani 'to jihonyi;
ette aminiaŋa hunia ittana Yesu jio hèlaha inyi ifuhak isi itua iwure onno owudo 'to bebe.
Owoni nyia omuk abataha arriai hunna attaditai ididaf doŋe. Ania, ette aminiaŋa hunia ittana Yesu jio ijiara isi ejiŋak jio abataha, buo yesu ette iŋatana.

Ette aminiaŋa hunia ijiŋuna addi jio atulo alia otto jiŋana jio abataha, buo abataha hunia so so suoro te didaf doŋe hutu, hutu, hutu, ette ikuahino itua tafar jiojio woo, ette idioro ette ikoddaŋ iye diya.
Ninyia igonyuni eyyahak bataha eram ana, ette isi ifuho, ette ifuatan itisarrahina asayyo huna itua bore gala iko imatta 'daŋ.

Attati aati ifuatan imijio anyio nyia onno owon 'to diya, ette isi ifuanna jio Yesu, ette inyurana eduo tulo ifuhari aminiaŋa jihonyi addi itoŋo iger hejek Yesu. Iyyafatio nyia inyi aboŋojin buo fe egigilo honyi nyia abis. Attati isi 'daŋ ibaŋi.
Buo aati hunyia igonyuni 'to erre huna ihanie, ette ifuatan iyabana jio hullomuk aŋai itaŋida Yesu atulo miniaŋa.
Attati aati 'daŋ hutta fau Gerasa jiaran jio ijiara Yesu hétolo addi nyio abaŋi nyia isi bebe. Tania, adak nyia Yesu itogol ette icaharu.
Buo atulo oduo ifuhari aminiaŋa jihonyi addi, ette ittana Yesu jiojio, “Efuo 'daŋ ikoŋ.”
Ati ifuhak nyia Yesu inyi addi, ette jiaran;
“Acaharu haŋ. Ilo iramak anyio hirre hunne ihan Hollum jihoi.”
Attati atulo alia leten attua bore gala 'daŋ buo iriramaru erre hoduo ihan Yesu jihonyi.
Ninyia acohuno Yesu ilotifor tafar enne ittok tole, ette aati irraŋuna inyi nyio itilai nyia isi 'daŋ inyi.
Attati obo atulo afure honyi Yayiro elettok haji emojit, ittuna jihonyi ette irruaŋana ahuan ihosiere hejek honyi ette ittana jio ijiara Yesu olo ihaŋ honyi,
nyio, ojio nyia ŋarri honyi nebotie aye. Arai nyia aŋasi honyi 'tomon harrihai.
Ninyia holo Yesu diya, ette aati ifudanio jihonyi nyik nyik.
Buo jio eluluŋ waati ania, owon nyia obo aŋotte onno oŋuai iko ayaf yaf onno orroho 'to bebe. Otuk nyia aŋuai ania aŋasi 'tomon harrihai, many otuhok aŋotte ania erre honyi 'daŋ
Ette inyi ihihisuno tehiji waati many ihoruoŋ Yesu, ette ittir esidi boŋo Yesu, buo ayaf yaf honyi ette iwotia teya, teya.
Attati Yesu ifiyo ojio, “Ŋai ottir nani?” Ati orisai nyia aati 'daŋ, buo Petro ette itarraŋ ojio, “Lettok, okudani aati 'daŋ iyye buo fe ifudanie nyik, nyik ajihoi.”
Ati ojio Yesu, “Ottir obo atulo ani nyio, amijak ni ta aleten duaran jihoŋ addi.”

Ninyia igonyu aŋotte ania jio amijani inyi, ette inyi ittuna enne ikikiro ette irruaŋana ahuan honyi ihejek Yesu ette ipulonia ihosiere waati 'daŋ jio, inyi attir Yesu buo fe aŋai arumak inyi aŋidari teya teya.
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Ŋarri hoŋ, itaŋida eruk hoi iyye. Ilo te nelik taji.”
Ninyia hekiana Yesu, ottu nyia obo atulo ta haŋ lettok ette jiaran jio, “Yayiro, aye ŋarri hoi, hènyiak ittigemio ettiyanani obojiai.”
Ati itayiru nyia Yesu ekiana ania, ette inyi jiaran jio Yayiro, “Hèbaŋ iruho buo oŋida adi inyi.”
Ninyia afany Yesu ihaŋ, obeŋ nyia inyi awak obo atulo ojiŋari ikonyi arari Petro, Yoane, iko Yakobo, buo monye iko honye hito.
Ililuoi nyia aati 'daŋ buo fe oyyooi eto ania. Ati ojio nyia Yesu jihosi jio, “Hèyyooti, nyio obeŋ neto ana oye…ojoto inyi joto!”
Ati osuhotierek nyia isi 'daŋ inyi nyio, omijani nyia isi jio, aye nyia neto nyia.
Ati inef nyia Yesu aani hito ette iloŋ inyi, “Hito, totte!”
Attati oloholio honyi icohuno ette inyi idioto teya teya, buo Yesu ette iramana isi oŋida isiori jihonyi obo aŋiyo.
Illillihai nyia esiok honyi, ati ihum nyia Yesu iramana isi jio hèlaha iramana obo atulo eram ania.
Iloŋu nyia Yesu lejifak hula 'tomon harrihai amaji abotie ette isio jihosi aduaran iko agolon ifuhari aminiaŋa buo fe itaŋidariere eŋuati.
Attati inyi ifahina isi ittiyeniere Olobie ono Hollum buo fe itaŋidariere aŋuak.
Iramak nyia inyi isi jiojio, “Hèyatti obo ariŋ ta adaha hatai ania; kuyya atelek, edee hemimojok, aŋiyo, arobiyaa, ara duadi bu agamis etarrihi.
Buo elle ijiŋana itai jio obo aaji, itoŋoti diya many ifuati itai addi jio abore gala nyia.
Buo alla abeŋi aati ifuotuni itai, idiahati abore gala nyia, ipipuahara attuduha to hejek hatai oŋida ara esarit jihosi.”
Tania, ofuoi nyia lejifak hulia atua misihi 'daŋ, buo ittittoye Asayyo Ayijok buo fe itaŋidarie aati imasik 'daŋ.
Buo omuk ojiori jio aleyo Elija, buo fe omuk ojiori ibuhu obo olo ekianak Hollum hinyia berien.
Attati Erode jiaran, “Aŋotu nyia ni ahou Yoane addi; ŋai buo fe elle inyiak ni olo itayirio eram honyi?” Attati inyi ihum iwahan igonyuna Yesu.
Ocohunie nyia lefahat ette iramana Yesu erre 'daŋ hunyia ihanie isi. Attati inyi iyaru isi hama jio abore anna anya Besseyida.
Ninyia itaniŋuni eluluŋi waati eram ania, ette isi ijifaru inyi. Buo inyi ette irraŋuna isi, ette ikiana jihosi eram ono Olobie Hollum buo fe itaŋida hia hunyia awahi 'to aŋidari.

Ninyia iddorro oloŋ, ette lejifak hula 'tomon harrihai ifuanna jihonyi ette jiaran, “Itatturok eluluŋ waati ana, ijiara ofuoi itua misihi iko itua matta hunia irumaniere aŋiyo iko amasik ijotiti hosi, nyio ewon jio amaji onno oyur 'to.”

Ati ojio nyia Yesu jihosi, “Itai ta ahuattek hatai isiatta jihosi obo aŋiyo.” Itarraŋi nyia isi jiojio, “Ewon hohoi iko emunio miyet buo aham arrihai. Iwak atiye hohoi efuo inyiaŋuno aŋiyo jio eluluŋ waati ana 'daŋ?” (
Oremehini nyia aati hulia ihuo alif miyet (5000)). Attati Yesu jiaran jio lejifak honyi jio, “Ititoŋonia aati eluluŋi, eluluŋi, ihuo atomuana miyet iluluŋ abotie.”
Ninyia ititoŋoni lejifak aati 'daŋ ifau,
otto Yesu iduhuna emunio hoduo miyet iko aham arrihai, ette ibonno ahide dou, ette isio ahumo jio Hollum tesi, ette beny isi, ette isiarana jio lejifak oŋida ihiharani jio aati.
Anyai nyia isi 'daŋ many ifuaŋarik, ette lejifak iddudduhuna ofitot afeehien 'tomon harrihai.
To obo oloŋ ninyia omojori Yesu inyi hama, ofuonni nyia lejifak jihonyi buo inyi ette ifiyo isi jiojio, “Ojiori aati aniŋai?”
Buo Petro ette itarraŋ ojio, “Iyye
Attati Yesu ihum iramana isi jio hèlaha iramani eram ania jio obo atulo.
Buo fe ette jiaran jihosi jio, “Obolo adi ettigemio jio Lonyi Tulo, ihari adi inyi lahou iko ehumak elettaha buo ettiyanak ifahita. Ottohori adi inyi, ati ihalu oŋitek hunihoi, itubuhuni adi inyi.”
Nyio alla awak obo atulo italuahuna esu honyi, italitohi adi inyi. Buo atulo elle italitohi 'to esu honyi te eram hoŋ, italuahu adi inyi.
Anyio yiji 'tadi inyi, alla anyurak obo atulo erre 'daŋ hutta fau buo italitohi kuyya ittarroho ahuan honyi? Obeŋ obo!
Elle iloriri obo atulo toni, iloriri adi buo fe Lonyi Tulo tenyi alla attu inyi iko akuatan honyi buo ono Monye iko ono ajilohien hullo olibori 'to.
Eramak ni itai ahode hode, owoni omuk dini hullo obeŋi adi igonyuni naye many igonyunierek isi Olobie ono Hollum.”
Ninyia homojo inyi, ette omom honyi iloito onno olufa, so so aboŋojin honyi ipipiahi biny biny aboŋi.
Teya teya, oleyehinie nyia aati arrihai, ette ikiana ikonyi; isi Mose iko Elija.
Oleyehinie nyia isi ta akuatan, ette ikiana iko Yesu ta aleten honyi ye Yerusalem ituhoniere egiama ninyia ifahunierek inyi.
Ihuania, ojotoroi nyia Petro iko mottiarak honyi, buo ninyia lahenyuni isi, igonyuni nyia isi akuatan Yesu buo aati hulo arrihai hinyia owotiai 'to ikonyi.

Ninyia ajiori Aati hia efuo addi, ette Petro jiaran jio Yesu, “Lettok, oyyu jihohoi iwanari dini! Eduhok adi hohoi aticio hunihoi; abotie jihoi; abotie jio Mose, buo fe abotie jio Elija.” (Ati obeŋ nyia Petro omijak anyio enne ikiana inyi.)
Ninyia hekiana Petro, ofuonni edohuo, ette imuluhana isi te nedis hosi; ette ejifak ibaŋi ninyia imuluhani edohuo Elija iko Mose.
Buo ekiana itayiruno totua idohuo onno ojio, “Lonyi hoŋ alia alla anyimu ni. Itayiriete jihonyi!”
Ninyia latuho ekiana ania, arasaru nyia Yesu inyi hama. Oduai nyia lejifak to oŋitek hua buo fe obeŋi iramani obo atulo erre hunyia igonyuni isi.
Jio ebotie holoŋ, olluni nyia Yesu iko ejifak honyi hula hunihoi to doŋe, ette eluluŋ waati iruaŋanio ikonyi.
Attati obo atulo tehiji iluluŋ iwuwoŋita jiojio, “Hettiyanani! Attana ni iyye, imija lonyi hoŋ, lonyi hoŋ olobotie!
Iniafatio aminiaŋati inyi, ette ibuarana inyi ifau, teya ette inyi iyyoo buo iddidiaŋa; ette obulal ittuna totto hutuk. Iriafutta aminiaŋati ania inyi buo fe obeŋ obusak inyi.
Attana duo ni lejifak hoi hétefuhahi aminiaŋati ania addi, ati ittallihi isi ifuhara.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu ojio, “Itai aati hullo obeŋ eruk buo fe ipalata! Etoŋo adi ni ikatai many baya? Many baya adi adik ni itai? Iyaŋunie lonyi hoi dini.”

Ninyia hottu leto alia, ette aminiaŋati ania inef inyi, ette ibuarana inyi ifau, ette inyi iddidiaŋa. Attati Yesu iŋerejanio jio aminiaŋati ania, ette itaŋida leto alia, ette inyiahina inyi jio monyonyi.
Illillihai nyia aati 'daŋ ta abolori duaran ono Hollum.
Ninyia hèllillihai aati te erre 'daŋ hunyia ihanio Yesu, ette inyi ikiana jio lejifak honyi jio,
“Ijiara ekenita huna ihumi ijiŋana iyyaha hatai! Nyio, isiori adi Lonyi Tulo ihas waati.”
Ati obeŋi nyia lejifak omijani ojio ekiana ania anyio. Nyio, idimani nyia awoyo hiram ekiana ania jihosi jio oŋida isi obeŋi omijani inyi, ati abaŋi nyia isi ifiyere ojio ekiana ania anyio.
Ati omijak nyia Yesu egigilita hosi, ette inyi iduhuna eto ette itawojihina iger honyi,

ette jiaran jihosi, “Lia, elle ifuotu 'to eto ollo odiha 'to olo ta afure hoŋ, ifuotu inyi ani. Buo fe lia, elle ifuotu 'to ani, ifuotu inyi lia elle ifahu 'to ani. Nyio, lia, ollo omuta 'to bebe tehiji hatai 'daŋ, inyi alla agalik 'to 'daŋ.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yoane inyi jiojio, “Lettok, egonyu duo hohoi lobo atulo ifuhatio aminiaŋa ta afure hoi, attati hohoi itik inyi nyio obeŋ inyi ara te eluluŋ hohoi.”
Ojio nyia Yesu jihonyi, “Hètihoto inyi, nyio, lia ollo obeŋ 'to oliwari itai ara inyi ahalatai.”
Ninyia iliahai oŋitek hunne iyarik Yesu idou, odioto nyia to hou honyi, ette inyi leten Yerusalem.
Ette inyi ifahina leyak sayyo to osiere honyi, hinyia ofuoi 'to jio obo amiji ono Samaria ihuhumaniere erre 'daŋ jihonyi.
Ati obeŋi nyia aati amiji nyia ifuotuni inyi, nyio, oleyo nyia jio icul inyi Yerusalem.
Ninyia igonyuni lejifak, hulla anyai 'to Yakobo iko Yoane eram ana, ette isi jiaran, “Lamonye, iwak ti iyye hohoi eloŋu eema tedou oŋida ottu isuahina isi?”
Ati oyito nyia Yesu, ette iriŋ isi.
Attati isi 'daŋ ifuatan jio nobo amiji hama.
Ninyia Hadahai isi ihiji ikoi, ojio nyia obo atulo jio Yesu, “Ejifaru adi ni iyye jio amasik 'daŋ hunne ilari iyye.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaraŋ jihonyi, “Owoni obeyohi iko ewurio hosi, buo fe aheny owoni iko asik hosi, ati obeŋ obo amaji onno oferiere Lonyi Tulo iyiriari.”
Ette inyi jiaran jio atulo ollobo, “Ijifunie ani.” Buo lia ette itarraŋ inyi ojio, “Lamonye ijiara do nani alo inuhana monyoŋ.”
Ati ojio nyia Yesu jihonyi, “Ijiara aati ayaak onuhani ayaak hosi, buo jihoye, iriramaru Olobie ono Hollum.”
Buo fe lobo ette jiaran, “Lamonye ejifaru adi ni iyye, ati ijiara do ani alo ifonyuno aati hutta haŋ hohoi.”
Buo Yesu ojio jihonyi, “Elle inef obo atulo ahebu iromori buo inyiak ifiala ehalu, obeŋ inyi osiru Ilobie ono Hollum.”
Ihalu erre huna onyimu nyia Lamonye omuk aati hama, atomuana hattarik harrihai
Ette inyi jiaran jihosi, “Aŋida amana, ati omutari egiamak. Omojoti jio Lamonye mana oŋida ifahu adioŋok arriai idioŋori imana honyi.
Ifuatta! Efak ni itai ihuo akioro ihiji lewwo.
Hèyatti olobooni kuyya edee hemimojok iko amuha buo hèwotiati ihiji ikoi ifonyari obo atulo tekoi.
Elle ijiŋana itai jio obo ahaŋ, ijiatta do, ‘Ijiara nelik taji hatawana jio ahaŋ ana!’
Alla awon atulo diya alla awak nelik taji, ijiara efuanya hatai ono nelik taji odulo jihonyi; buo labeŋ, ocohuno adi efuanya hatai ono nelik taji jihatai.
Itoŋoti jio ahaŋ nyia, oŋiyete buo fe imatati erre hunne isiori isi jihatai, nyio, osiru aduma jio egiamak te egiama hosi. Hèluttati ahaŋitek ababo.
Kuyya elle ijiŋana itai jio obo abore gala buo aati honyi arraŋuni itai, oŋiyete ariŋ enne isiori isi jihatai.
Itaŋidarata aŋuak hosi, iramana aati abore gala nyia jio, attu Olobie ono Hollum liger hosi.
Ati elle ijiŋana itai jio obo abore gala buo aati honyi obeŋi arraŋuni itai, ifuatta ikianati ilofirihi hosi jio,
‘Ara duadi bu attuduha abore gala hatai anna adafa 'to ihejek hohoi, epipuak hohoi ajihatai. Ati omijana jio attu Olobie ono Hollum liger hatai!’
Eramak ni itai jio, Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, obolo adi amehino Hollum jio Sodom agalik amehino honyi jio abore gala ania.

“Orroho adi bebe jihoi Korasin! Orroho adi buo fe bebe jihoye Besseyida! Nyio, hara nyia ihanie eduariti hunyia ihanie jihatai iborejin gala Taya iko Sidon, ŋanyia isi idehini eyyata hosi berien, ette iyyafana asuwali ette ipur ahuattek hosi te enuara itahutaniere jio eha isi eyyata hosi.
Ati Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, obolo adi amehino Hollum jio Taya iko Sidon agalik amehino honyi jihatai.
Buo jihoi Kapernaum! Iwak iyye ikaf ahuan hoi many lidou? Ati ibirori adi iyye many imaji hayaak!”
Attati aati hula atomuana hattarik harrihai
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Eŋonyu ni Sittan okuahuno tedou ihuo ahilai.
Itayiriete! Esiarak ni jihatai aduaran, irriyere amunuok iko atone buo fe oŋida igalihina egoliti 'daŋ huno amiottononi. Obeŋ adi obo ariŋ iriafu itai.
Hèmunoti jio oniŋie aminiaŋa itai; ati omunoti jio igioronie afureta hatai idou.”
Ta asaa nyia, ifut nyia amuno jio Yesu to Loholio Olibo
Attati inyi iyito jio lejifak honyi ninyia awoni isi isi hama, ette jiaran, “Osiru amiji itai igonyuniere erre huna!

Eramak ni itai jio, oluaji nyia ekianak Hollum iko oobuok hinyia awahi 'to igonyuna erre hunne igonyuna itai, ati obeŋi isi iŋonyuni. Awahi nyia buo fe isi itaniŋuna erre hunne itayiruna itai, ati obeŋi nyia isi itayiruni.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ojio, “Anyio enne igioroni ifahita Mose? Ihenio iyye isi aŋai?”

Buo atulo alia ette itarraŋ ojio, “ ‘Itabuara ataji hoi 'daŋ jio Hollum Lamonye hoi, to oloyiri hoi 'daŋ, ta agolon hoi 'daŋ, iko te egigilita hoi 'daŋ’; buo fe ‘Itabuara ataji hoi jio onyihari hoi ihuo onno obuarari inyi ahuan hoi.’ ”
Ojio Yesu jihonyi, “Ittenu iyye, ihanie ihuo nyia, isu adi iyye.”
Ati awak nyia inyi itahutana abisan honyi, ette inyi jiaran jio Yesu “Ŋai onyihari hoŋ?”
Itarraŋ Yesu ojio, “Orubo nyia obo atulo to Yerusalem many Yeriko, ette omuk ahahalak irrauna inyi, ette ihororo erre honyi 'daŋ, ette ibak inyi, ette idiaharu inyi mugur mugur.
Jio asaa nyia ottu nyia obo ehumani te ekoi ania; ninyia igonyu inyi atulo alia, ette inyi ilor aŋati hikoi tole.
Ihuo nyia buo fe ottu nyia obo atulo to woyo ba Lefi tolia, ette leten imijio atulo lia, ette buo fe inyi ilor te ebotie ŋati.
Attati obo a Samaritanani linyia olo 'to tolia ittuna many jio atulo lia, ninyia igonyu inyi, ette ataji honyi imehino.

Ette inyi leten many jihonyi, ette iyalana eyali buo fe ijuhok afino itoŋos honyi, ette illulluronia atoŋos honyi, ette ikafana inyi ihide sigiria honyi, ette iyaru inyi jio obo aaji eyirit, ette imijio inyi onno oyyu.

Jio ebotie holoŋ isiarak nyia inyi arobiyaa arrihai jio lamonye haji, ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Omijie inyi onno oyyu, alla awoni omuk erre hunne inyiaŋak iyye inyi, attu adi ni iduma iyye alla acohuno ni tolo.’ ”
Attati Yesu ifiyo Ettiyanani ifahita lia jiojio, “Alali jio hula hunihoi elle igigilo iyye jio ara olonyihari jio atulo alla arrauni ahahalak alia?”
Buo inyi ette itarraŋ jio “Lia, ollo omehino 'to jihonyi.” Attati Yesu jiaran, jihonyi, “Ilo ihanie ihuo nyia.”
Owon nyia inyi iko haniye anna anya Maria ninyia itoŋo iger hejek Lamonye buo itayirio ettiyenio honyi.
Ati obolorok nyia egiama Marta ette inyi ittuna jio Yesu ette jiaran, “Lamonye, ibeŋ ti iyye igigilo jio idehi haniyoŋ jihoŋ egiama ana 'daŋ? Iramak inyi hétettu ani iluak!”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Lamonye jihonyi ojio, “Marta, Marta! Ihawwa iyye buo fe ittigemio ahuan hoi te erre arriai,
ati ariŋ abotie anna awahi. Anyimu Maria ariŋ onno oyyu 'to, obeŋi adi iyari addi jihonyi.”
To obo oloŋ omojo nyia Yesu jio obo amaji. Ninyia attohu inyi, ette obo olo lejifak honyi jiaran jihonyi jio “Lamonye, ittiyenie hohoi amojo ihuo ninyia ittiyeniere Yoane lejifak honyi.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “Elle imojoti itai ijiatta:
‘Monye:
Ijiara abaŋi afure hoi onno olibo 'to.
Hétettu olobie hoi.
Isiara jihohoi motie motie aŋiyo enne ewak hohoi.
Ohohi eyyata hohoi
ihuo enne edehiniere hohoi aati 'daŋ hulle ihanie 'to onno orroho jihohoi.
Buo fe hèyaru hohoi jio ekemiti hunno ogoli 'to.’ ”
Ette Yesu jiaran jio lejifak honyi, “Kuyya alla alo obo alatai ihaji motte honyi ta attiŋ harue ette jiaran, ‘Illa, ehurok ani omuk emunio hunihoi,
nyio, hetek motte hoŋ ifanyan to momoriya. Obeŋ obo aŋiyo enne esio ni jihonyi!’
Buo elle itarraŋ inyi totua haji honyi jiojio, ‘Hèttigemio ani! Ihiana ekat, eferio buo fe hohoi, nani iko aduri hoŋ. Ettallik ni idioto isiaraniere jihoi obo ariŋ.’
Eramak ni itai, ara duadi bu obeŋ inyi awak idioto isiaraniere iyye emunio nyio ira iyye ellanyi, elle ibeŋ iyye iloriri idulori imojo, odioto adi inyi ette isiarana jihoi erre 'daŋ hunne iwak iyye.
“Ihuania, ajio ni jihatai, ifiyete, isiori adi jihatai. Ottifiati, inyurana adi itai. Ikukuhoto, aŋahini adi ekat jihatai.
Nyio, lia elle ifiyo 'to, ifuotu adi, lia ollo ottifia 'to, onyurak adi inyi, buo fe lia elle ikukuk 'to aŋahini adi jihonyi.
Jihatai monyie, alla amojo lonyi hoi iyye ahami, isio adi iyye inyi amunu?
Kuyya alla amojo inyi atelio, isio adi iyye jihonyi etoni?
Elle imijana itai hulle irrohojata 'to esiorio hirre hunno oyiji 'to jio aduri hatai; aŋai 'tadi Monye ettedou, obeŋ 'tadi esiorio honyi Loholio Olibo jio hia hulle ifiye 'to inyi agalik!”
Ifuhatio nyia Yesu aminiaŋati enne ittallik 'to ikiana; buo ninyia ajiŋu aminiaŋati ania addi, ette atulo lia itterio ekiana. Illilliha nyia eluluŋ waati,
ati ojiori nyia lomuk hulosi jio, “Ifuhatio inyi aminiaŋa ta aduaran ono Belsebul, hobu miniaŋa.”

Ati omijak nyia Yesu egigilita hosi, ette inyi jiaran jihosi “Elle ibibuanya obo afau eluluŋi eluluŋi hunno orriomonie, otturo adi inyi. Buo elle ibibuanya obo ahaŋ inyi hama buo aŋalafai, oturo inyi.
Ihuania, alla awon olobie ono Sittan iko eluluŋi hunno orriomonie isi hama, odulo 'tadi inyi aŋai? Ijiatta itai jio efuhatio ni aminiaŋa addi ta aduaran Belsebul,
elle efuhatio ni aminiaŋa addi ta aduaran Belsebul, buo lejifak hatai ifuhatie isi ta aduaran ŋai? Tania, arai adi lejifak hatai ahaŋotok hiram hatai.
Ati elle efuhatio ni aminiaŋa ta aduaran Hollum, itahutak ania jio alum Olobie ono Hollum ihiji hatai.
“Elle irriria olottir ahaŋ honyi te erremiti honyi, itoŋoi adi erre honyi dee.
Ati elle iburanio obo atulo ollo ogol 'to agalik inyi, ette itattur inyi, ohoru adi lia erremiti hoduo iyihi inyi jio oluahi adi inyi, ette buo fe ihihor erre 'daŋ hunno ohoru inyi jio olottir alia.
“Alla ajiŋu aminiaŋati jio obo atulo, ilor inyi ta amaji onno oyoho 'to ittifiari amaji eyirit. Buo alla abeŋ inyi onyurak, ette inyi jiaran, ‘Acaharu adi ni ihaji hoŋ eduo ediehuno ni.’
Ninyia acohuno inyi, onyurak nyia inyi aaji honyi alibo bebe buo fe ilaman.
Attati inyi leten iloŋuno omuk aminiaŋa hattarik hunno orrohoji 'to agalihini inyi, ette isi ijiŋana, ette imanya diya. Tania, ninyia atuho 'daŋ, orroho nyia jio atulo alia agalik ninyia tetteri.”
Ninyia ikiana Yesu erre huna, odioto obo aŋotte teluluŋ, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Hotomunoi aŋotte enne isiu 'to iyye buo fe itadasu iyye!”
Ati itarraŋ nyia Yesu jiojio, “Ati hotomunohi hia hulle itaniŋuni 'to ekiana Hollum buo fe oniŋie inyi!”
Ihuo ninyia arari Yona etamijani jio aati hutto bore gala Ninife, ara adi buo fe Lonyi Tulo etamijani jio aati hulo ahana.

Odioto adi Nobu ono Seba Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, ette itisiahina aati hulo ahana. Nyio, ottu nyia inyi ta fau honyi anna alama 'to itayiruniere olofioro huno Hobu Solomon. Eramak ni itai, owon obo ariŋ dini anna agalik 'to Solomon.

Odiotoi adi aati Ninife Iholoŋ ono Aŋocio Hiram, ette itisiahina aati hulo ahana, nyio, ihari nyia isi eyyata hosi ninyia itayiruni isi ettittoyo ono Yona. Eramak ni itai, owon obo ariŋ dini anna agalik 'to Yona!
Arai noŋite hoi ihuo allomo ihuan hoi. Alla ayiji oŋite hoi, obolo adi afaŋan ihuan hoi 'daŋ; buo alla arrohoji oŋite hoi, obolo adi edumele ihuan hoi 'daŋ.
Ihuania ihuma imijio, hèlaha afaŋan ottonohoi ara edumele.
Elle ifut afaŋan ihuan hoi 'daŋ obeŋ obo aŋati iriok, afaŋ adi inyi 'tel 'tel ihuo elle inuok allomo iyye ta afaŋan honyi.”
Ninyia latuhok Yesu ekiana, iloŋoro nyia obo olo
Illilliha nyia olo
Tania, ette Lamonye jiaran jihonyi, “Itai
Obeŋi hossi! Obiaŋara nyia Hollum ollo oyyeu 'to oruoŋ, oyyeu buo fe atua?
Ati isiatta enyati hutto miolohien iko hutto loŋeti hatai jio alociaŋak, buo erre 'daŋ ette adi ilibori jihatai.
“Ati orroho adi bebe jihatai
“Orroho adi bebe jihatai
Orroho adi bebe jihatai! Nyio, irata itai ihuo elumio hunno obeŋi 'to oleye. Adahai aati totto hide hosi buo obeŋi omijani.”
Attati lobo olo ettiyanak ifahita jiaran jihonyi, “Hettiyanani, elle ikiana iyye ihuo nyia, imorio buo fe iyye hohoi!”

Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ inyi ojio “Orroho adi buo fe bebe jihatai ettiyanak ifahita! Nyio, itakafiete itai aati erre hunno oddiŋi 'to te ewwahatio, buo ibiaŋata iluahata isi ikafari ara duadi bu ta afialai ijiai.
Orroho adi bebe jihatai! Nyio ihuhumana itai elumio hekianak Hollum hinyia ottohori hohonyiok hatai.
Iruhonia itai ehanita hohonyiok hatai buo fe iruhoto ehanita hua; nyio, ottohori nyia isi ekianak Hollum buo itai ittata iduhonia elumio hosi.
Tania, ojiori Ofioro Hollum jio, ‘Efak adi ni jihosi ekianak hoŋ iko lefahat hoŋ; buo ottohori adi isi lomuk buo ittigemie lomuk.’
Onyurani adi aati hulo ahana ettigemio, nyio ta naye hekianak Hollum 'daŋ hinyia ottohori many tetteri fau.
Itterio ta attohoro ono Abele many jio ono Sakariya, linyia abahini ihiji ono etitiek ehumi iko Amaji Elibo. Aafe, eramak ni itai, onyurani adi aati hulo ahana ettigemio tesi 'daŋ!
“Orroho adi bebe jihatai ettiyanak efahita! Nyio, iduhuna itai addi eŋanyit ofioro; buo itai ta ahuattek hatai ibiaŋata ijiŋana, buo fe itihoto hulla awahi 'to ijiŋana diya!”
Ninyia alo Yesu teya, ette ettiyanak ifahita iko
nyio ottifiai nyia isi omuk erre italohuniere inyi.
Asalani adi erre 'daŋ hunne imuho 'to, buo fe omijani adi erre 'daŋ hunne idimai 'to.
Ofuonni adi itayiruna ta afanni erre 'daŋ hunne ikianati itai idumele. Itakuati adi buo fe to sihidihien hasik, erre 'daŋ hunne ihahayati itai itua hasik hatai.
“Eramak ni itai mottiarak hoŋ, hèbaŋata hia hullo ottohori 'to ahuan, buo ihalu ittallihi ihanio omuk erre hunna agalihini ta arrohoji.
Etahutak adi ni itai jio oŋida ibaŋata ŋai. Abaŋata Hollum, ollo owon 'to iko agolon ittohori, buo ihalu 'tohoro ibironia ihima onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ. Aafe eramak ni itai, abaŋata luŋa inyi!
“Obeŋi soho itinyiaŋani olodili miyet ta amillimi arrihai? Ati obeŋ Hollum oguhi obo olodil.
Ara duadi bu oofir hutto hossi hatai, iheni isi 'daŋ. Tania, hèbaŋata, nyio agalik ayiji tulo abotie olodili arriai!
“Eramak ni itai, lia elle iruhok 'to ani ihosiere waati, iruhok adi buo fe Lonyi Tulo inyi ihosiere ajilohien Hollum.
Buo lia, elle iha 'to ani ihosiere waati, iha adi buo fe Lonyi Tulo inyi ihosiere ajilohien Hollum.
Nyio, jio nasaa nyia, ittiyanak adi Loholio Olibo itai erre hunne ifuata ikiana.”
Attati lobo atulo tehiji iluluŋ jiaran jio Yesu, “Hettiyanani iramak illaŋ ehor ikoŋ erutaa hunyia idiaharu monye hohoi.”
Buo Yesu ette itarraŋ inyi jiojio, “Illa, ŋai ihanak ani ahaŋotoni hiram kuyya ahaharani saŋ hunia jihatai?”
Attati Yesu jiaran jihosi 'daŋ, “Ihumata imijio, hèlaha obo eŋaru ojiŋak itajia hatai; nyio obeŋ amanya tulo ara ta aluaji hirre hunno owoni 'to jihonyi.”
Attati Yesu iramana jihosi etarriamai ana: “Owon nyia obo asamani iko amana honyi anna aŋidari amat honyi.
Otto inyi igigilo ta ahuan honyi jiojio, ‘Abeŋ ni awon iko amaji ittunaniere amat hoŋ 'daŋ. Ehan adi ni anyio?’
Ette inyi jiaran, ‘Ehan adi ni ihua ana, etattur adi ni amuguo hoŋ, ette ni iduhonia omuk hunne ettaha hunna alari ni ittunaniere emma iko erre hoŋ 'daŋ hunnomuk.
Attati ni jiaran jio ahuan hoŋ, osiru miji! Owoni erre 'daŋ jihoi hunne iyarai aŋasi arriai. Abalai ta allalla, oŋiye, amatai, buo fe omunoi!’
Ati ojio nyia Hollum jihonyi, ‘Jai, obeŋ hou! Arue ono ahana iduhari adi esu hoi addi; ofuonni 'tadi erre hunne ittunak iyye ahunohoi irahan ahunaŋai?’ ”
Otto Yesu itisidonia ekiana honyi jiojio, “Ara adi inyi ihuo nyia jio hia, hulle ifuroni 'to esamiti ahunosi, buo obeŋi asami to hosiere Hollum.”
Attati Yesu jiaran jio lejifak honyi, “Ihuania, eramak ni itai, hèhawwati ta anyio enne iwahata itai, ta esu hatai, kuyya ta aboŋojin hunne iyyafatiete itai ihuattek.
Nyio, agalik ayiji ono esu ayiji ŋiria, buo fe ayiji huan agalik ayiji boŋojin.
Ike imijata olohurahi; obeŋi isi oyehini enyomo buo fe obeŋi odeŋuni amat; obeŋi buo fe amuguo iko ebecio jihosi, ati itaŋiyo Hollum isi! Igalihina itai aheny ta ayiji!
Ŋai jihatai ollo oremik 'to noŋitek huno esu honyi te ehawwa?
Elle ittallihoto itai ihan ariŋ ollo omuta 'to a lia, nyioti ihawwati itai te erre hunnomuk?

Ike imijata obolori ayaburita hutto mur aŋai. Obeŋi isi igiamai buo fe obeŋi ihuhumie aboŋojin hosi. Ati eramak ni itai jio ara duadi bu hobu Solomon iko esamiti honyi 'daŋ, obeŋi nyia aboŋojin honyi ilamani ihuo ayaburita hunia.
Ati elle itiyyefio Hollum amiyaŋ otto mur, onno owon 'to ahana buo motie osuahini iyali, obeŋ 'tadi inyi itiyyef itai agalik bebe? Aii! Itai aati hullo omuta eruk!
“Hèhawwati, buo fe hèfuurati motie motie aniyo adi enne iŋiyete itai kuyya enne imatati itai.
Nyio, ottifiai aati
Ottifiati do Olobie Honyi, buo arai adi erre hunia 'daŋ ahunatai.
“Itai eluluŋ onno omuta 'to, hèbaŋata, nyio, omuno Monyatai esiarana jihatai Olobie.

Itinyiaŋana asaŋ hatai, isiatta arobiyaa hua jio alociaŋak. Ihuhumuna olobooni hatai hunno obeŋ 'to ojiori emaruak. Ottunana esamiti hatai idou, amaji onno obiaŋarik isi omumutararai, nyio, ittallik olohoho ifanyan diya, buo fe eŋenyu ittallik ittarroho.
Nyio, odulo adi ataji hoi jio amaji onno ottunarik esamiti hoi.
ihuo egiamak hulle itilai 'to acohuno lettok hosi to hafula ono nayama. Ninyia lattu inyi ette ikukuk ekat, ette isi iŋahina ekat jihonyi kuak.

Hotomunohi egiamak hullo ottu elettok hosi nyurani homijei, buo fe itilai ta acohuno honyi! Ahode eramak ni itai, ottodok adi inyi aboŋojin honyi ehoriti ŋiria ette iloŋuna isi iŋiyo, ette isiarana isi aŋiria.
Hotomunohi isi alla acohuno inyi ara duadi bu te ehiji harue kuyya hobeŋ ataŋatio motie afaŋ buo onyurak isi ihuo nyia.
Ati omijana jio, hara duo onno omijak lamonye haji jio ottu adi olohoho ihaji honyi baya; obeŋ duo inyi obusak olohoho ahahalaru erre hutta haŋ honyi.
Ihumata buo fe irra, nyio, ottu adi Lonyi Tulo ta asaa enne itimoti itai.”
Ette Petro jiaran, “Lamonye, ikiana soho etarriamai ania to hohoi hama, kuyya ta aati 'daŋ?”
Itarraŋ Lamonye ojio, “Ŋai 'tadi alla ara ahegiamani oloyijio buo fe ilofioro? Inyi adi elle ihanak lamonye haŋ isioriere aŋiyo jio egiamak hullomuk alla attuba asaa ŋiyo.
Hotomunoi egiamani lia alla attu elettok honyi inyurana inyi ihanio egiama ania.
Hode eramak ni itai, ihanak adi inyi egiamani alia elettok ollo oŋuahatio 'to erre honyi 'daŋ.
Buo alla ajio legiamani alia ta ataji honyi jio, ‘Illiŋia elettok hoŋ icohuniere’ ette itterio ebibahio egiamak hullomuk, aliawa iko aŋoruo 'daŋ, ette ŋiyo ette imata many orumari.
Attati elettok egiamani alia icohuno nyia obo oloŋ, ta asaa onno otimo egiamani alia buo fe obeŋ igigilo ta attuna honyi. Ittigemio adi elettok alia inyi, ette ifuhara inyi jio egiamak arrohojak.
“Legiamani ollo omijak 'to anyio anna awak elettok honyi oŋida inyi ihan, ati obeŋ inyi ihuhum ahuan honyi kuyya obeŋ ihan ihuo awak elettok, ofodohi adi inyi bebe.

Buo lia, ollo otimo 'to awak elettok honyi anyio, buo ihan erre hunno osiruni 'to ta afodohio, ofodohi adi inyi kai. Jio lia, elle isiori arriai, awahi adi buo fe jihonyi arriai; buo jio lia, elle isiori arriai bebe, awahi adi buo fe jihonyi arriai bebe.
“Attu ni isuahiniere afau, ati ojio atua hoŋ ŋaduo inyi ihuania awulo!
Owon obo batisimo anna ajio ni efuotu, ati obeŋ ataji hoŋ oyiri many otuhori inyi!
Igigiloti itai jio attu ni iyaŋuno nelik fau? Eramak ni itai, obeŋ. Ati eyaŋuno ni abuanya.
Ahana many moi, ibibuanya adi ahaŋ ono aati miyet; oliwarik adi hula hunihoi hula arrihai, buo fe hula arrihai oliwarik hula hunihoi.

Oliwarik adi monyie lonyirok hosi, buo fe lonyirok oliwarik monyie hosi. Oliwarik adi honyie ŋarriok hosi, buo fe ŋarriok oliwarik honyie hosi; oliwarik adi aŋoruo, honyie habiok hosi; buo fe honyie oliwarik aŋoruo lonyirok hosi.”
Attati Yesu jiaran jio eluluŋ waati, “Elle igonyuna itai edohuo ofuonni tetteddorro holoŋ, buo itai ijiatta jio alo ahide sayo, buo inyi ette sayo hode.
Elle igonyuna itai oyyami ohutuno otto junub, buo itai ijiatta jio alo oloŋ nahan, buo inyi ette nahan hode.
Itai etihanak huattek hulo! Imijana itai etamijanita hirre hutteduo iko hutta fau, nyioti itimoti itai awoyo hiram ono asaa ana?
“Nyio ibiaŋata itai iŋototo ariŋ onno obis 'to jihatai ihaniere?

Elle itiloŋoro obo atulo iyye ilokikoi, imuarati luŋa ikonyi hèbiaŋata itai ifanyata imaji lokikoi, ŋadi inyi ipihoro iyye many ihosiere haŋotoni hirre buo aŋotoni hirre ette isiarana iyye jio bolis, buo isi ette ifitana iyye ibabus.
Eramak ni iyye, ibeŋ adi iyye ihouno many idumaniere iyye edumiti 'daŋ hunno oŋotok aŋotoni hiram jihoi.”
Jio asaa nyia, owoni nyia omuk aati diya hinyia iramani 'to Yesu attohoro Pilato omuk aati hulo Galilea buo isi isiorie ehumita jio Hollum.
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Ta attohoro waati hulo Galilea hulia ihuo nyia, igigiloti itai jio itahutak inyi jio agalihini nyia eyyata hosi huno aati Galilea hullomuk 'daŋ?
Ahode obeŋ! Eramak ni itai jio, elle ibiaŋata itai idehina eyyata hatai, iyeti adi itai 'daŋ ihuo onno oyerik isi.

Ara bu aati hinyia 'tomon hohottohunik hulo Silowam, hunyia oritihonio aaji onno ohodo jihosi ette ittohoro isi, igigiloti itai jio itahutak inyi jio agalihini nyia eyyata hosi huno aati 'daŋ hulla amanyai 'to Yerusalem?
Ahode, obeŋ! Eramak ni itai jio elle ibiaŋata itai idehina eyyata hatai, iyeti adi itai 'daŋ ihua ninyia oyerik isi.”
Attati Yesu iramana jihosi etarriamai ana: “Owon nyia obo atulo iko aŋaboli ninyia isur 'to imana fino honyi. Ette inyi leten ittifia aŋabolo jihonyi, ati obeŋ nyia inyi orumak obo.

Ania ette inyi jiaran jio legiamani mana honyi, ‘Imijie, aŋasi hunihoi, attutta ni dini ittifiari aŋabolo jio aŋaboli ana, ati habeŋ ni anyurak obo. Olloŋok inyi ifau! Anyio ittarrohojio inyi aboro obojiai?’
Ati itarraŋ nyia egiamani lia jiojio, ‘Lettok, idehi inyi do obo eeŋa abotie. Arom adi ni awoyo honyi atto ni ihanana omuk aworot diya.
Alla aŋi inyi eeŋa otto tua, oyyu adi! Buo alla abeŋ, iremik iyye italloŋonia inyi ifau.’ ”
Ittiyenio nyia Yesu ihaji emojit to obo oloŋ Sabatto.
Owon nyia obo aŋotte diya ninyia owon 'to iko aminiaŋati ninyia itaŋuai 'to inyi aŋasi 'tomon hohottohunik. Ikudura nyia inyi buo fe ittallik itabisana ahuan honyi.
Ninyia igonyu Yesu inyi, ette inyi iloŋuna inyi, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Haniye, abusak aŋuai ania iyye!”
Ette Yesu ittironia ahas honyi jihonyi, buo teya teya, ette aŋotte ania itabisana ahuan honyi ahide, ette itahabuyo Hollum.

Ati iloŋojita nyia elettok olo aaji emojit, nyio, itaŋidario Yesu to oloŋ Sabatto. Ette jiaran jio aati hia, “Owoni oŋitek ille hunne igiamarik aati, ifuanna to oŋitek hunia oŋida itaŋidari itai; ati obiaŋara to noloŋ Sabatto!”
Itarraŋ nyia Lamonye inyi jiojio, “Itai etihanak huattek hulo! Obeŋ obo jihatai ohohi attamot kuyya asigiria honyi to bore to oloŋ Sabatto, ette leten itamacio inyi?
Ijiara ti obeŋi ohohini, to oloŋ Sabatto eto otto woyo Abramo ana enne ifitak Sittan aŋasi 'tomon hohottohunik?”
Attati etarraŋi honyi itanyahina amiorok honyi ariri; buo aati 'daŋ ette imuno te erre 'daŋ hunno obolori 'to hunyia ihanio inyi.
Attati Yesu ifiyo ojio “Ara Olobie ono Hollum ihua anyio? Etarriamahi adi ni inyi iko anyio?
Ara inyi ihua aŋerio cahai enne iyaru obo atulo ette idulana imana honyi. Isuru inyi, ette ibolori ayyani, buo aheny ette iduho asik hosi itanata honyi.”
Inyiak Yesu ifiyo ojio, “Etarriamahi adi ni Olobie Hollum iko anyio?
Ara inyi ihua olobou enne iduhu aŋotte, ette icaŋana ihifua hunno oremehini ahiriehien hunihoi, many odohuniere inyi 'daŋ dou.”
Olo nyia Yesu totto borejin gala iko totto misihi buo ittittiyanaru aati, buo inyi olo atany a Yerusalem.
Attati obo atulo ifiyo inyi ojio, “Lamonye, italahuni 'tadi aati kaiyo ijiai?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Ihumata ittifia ekoi ijiŋari te ekat ollo ottida 'to; nyio, oluaji adi aati hulla awahi 'to ijiŋari attua, ati ittallihi adi isi ijiŋara.
Odioto adi lamonye haji, ette ihianana ekat. Iwotiati adi itai illet, buo ikukuhoti ekat buo ijiatta, ‘Lettok, aŋahi hoi ekat!’ Ati itarraŋ adi inyi itai jiojio, ‘Abeŋ ni amijak tai ifuanna itai!’
Buo ittata adi itarraŋ jiojio, ‘Eŋiyo nyia hohoi buo fe emata ikoye; buo fe iyye nyia ittiyenio itua bore gala hohoi!’
Ati inyiak adi inyi jiaran, ‘Abeŋ ni amijak tai ifuanna itai. Ifuatta addi, itai ehanak hirre hunno orrohoji 'to!’
Owon adi ayyoo iko aŋuruta hala ta adiaha elle igonyuna itai Abramo, Isako, Yakobo iko ekianak Hollum 'daŋ owoni Ilobie Hollum buo opuasari itai allet!
Ofuonni adi aati tetteduoŋi holoŋ iko tetteddorroi holoŋ, buo fe totto sumal iko totto junub, ette itoŋo iŋiyere Ilobie Hollum.
Attati aati hulla arai 'to ihuania ecuŋita irahan adi etterita buo hulla arai 'to ihuania etterita, ette irahan adi ecuŋita.”
Ta asaa tonyia ofuonni nyia omuk
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Ifuatta iramana olobeyok lia io, ‘Efuhatio ni aminiaŋa buo fe etaŋidario aati ahana iko motie. Atuhok adi ni egiama hoŋ iholoŋ etahunihi.’
Ati oŋida ani adaha ahana iko motie many talialoŋ nyio, obeŋ osiru ittohori ekianani Hollum jio obo abore gala hama, arari fe Yerusalem.

“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Ittohio iyye lekianak Hollum, buo fe irruoŋ ta amoruo leyak sayyo hinyia ifahu Hollum jihoi! Enyiahita omuk ajia hunyia awahari ni imosouniere aati hoi 'daŋ ta ahas hoŋ, ihuo enne imosouniere ahohoro ekiyehi honyi itua hiwwa. Ati ibeŋ iyye ani iŋatak!

Tania, idehini buo fe oyur adi Aaji hoi emojit enne ittokon. Eramak ni iyye, ibeŋ adi iyye igonyu ani, many afanyari nasaa enne ittuniere iyye ijiari jio, ‘Ijiara lia hotomunoi ollo ottu 'to ta afure ono Lamonye.’ ”
To obo oloŋ Sabatto olo nyia Yesu iŋiyere aŋiria ihaji obo elettok olo Farisei; buo aati ette ihum imijio ehalu Yesu.
Ette obo atulo linyia oyejani hejek iko ahas ittuna jio Yesu.
Buo Yesu ette ifiyo ettiyanak ifahita iko
Ati oduahinie nyia isi 'liŋ 'liŋ, attati Yesu irihuna atulo alia, ette itaŋida, ette ifahina inyi addi.
Attati inyi jiaran jihosi, “Alla alum leto kuyya attamot obo alatai itua hiri, ŋai jihatai adi ollo obeŋ adi ipihu inyi kuak to oloŋ Sabatto?”
Ati ittallihi nyia isi itarraŋ efiyo honyi ania.
Ninyia igonyu Yesu lomuk hulo aati hinyia iloŋuni ihafula onyimoi amasik lettaha, ania iramaniere inyi isi 'daŋ etarriamai ana:
“Elle iloŋu obo atulo itai ihafula ono ayama, hètoŋoti itoŋita huno elettaha, nyio, hara héloŋuni nyia adi obo atulo elettok agalik iyye.
Ottu adi Lamonye hafula eloŋoni hatai 'daŋ, ette jiaran jihoi, ‘Obusak amaji ania jio atulo olo.’ Tania, ilo adi iyye itoŋo imaji fiahajak ta ariri.
Ati elle iloŋuni iyye, ilo itoŋoi imaji fiahajak. Ottu adi eloŋoni hoi jihoi ette jiaran, ‘Illa, otte, waŋ imaji lettaha.’ Iyaŋuno adi ania olohuo jihoye, ihosiere waati 'daŋ hunyia iloŋuni ihafula.
Nyio alla akaf obo atulo ahuan honyi ahide, itifiahaji adi inyi, buo elle itifiaha obo ahuan honyi, akafani adi inyi ahide.”

Attati Yesu jiaran jio eloŋoni honyi, “Elle ihanak iyye aŋiyo ono agari otto fanni kuyya otto 'tari, hèloŋu mottiarak hoi, kuyya illarak hoi, kuyya aati hutta haŋ hatai, kuyya onyihari hoi asamak; nyio ofuonni adi buo fe isi iloŋoro iyye itadumaniere eloŋuna hoi isi.
Ati elle ihanak iyye aŋiyo ono agari, iloŋu alociaŋak, arrohojak, aŋurak iko aŋodok;
tania, irumak adi iyye namuno, nyio obeŋi isi oremehini iloŋuna iyye itadumaniere eloŋuna hoi isi. Oduma adi Hollum iyye iholoŋ enne ibuhunierek aati ayijok.”
Ninyia itaniŋu lobo latulo tehiji waati hunyia to maji ŋiyo eram ana, ette inyi jiaran jio Yesu, “Hotomunoi hia hullo ofuoi 'to adi iŋiyo ihafula otto Lobie Hollum!”
Ati ojio nyia Yesu jihonyi, “Ihanak nyia obo atulo agari enne ittok, ette inyi iloŋuna aati arriai.
Ninyia attuba asaa ono aŋiyo, ifak inyi egiamani honyi hételo iramana aati hinyia iloŋuni jio, ‘Ifuanna, attubai erre 'daŋ!’
Ati itterie nyia isi alia 'daŋ ababo. Ette linyia tetteri jiaran jihonyi, ‘Hibe awotto, ajio ni alo imijio obo amana oŋole enyiaŋu ni.’
Buo fe obotie ette jiaran, ‘Hibe awotto, enyiaŋu ŋole ni attamoti husuŋ aromok 'tomon, ajio ni alo ikem isi.’
Buo fe linyia obotie ette jiaran, ‘Abeŋ ni aremik ittuna, nyio, hetek ni iwanan ta haŋ.’

“Attati egiamani alia icaharu, ette iramana erre huna 'daŋ jio elettok honyi. Ijoria nyia elettok alia bebe, ette jiaran jio egiamani honyi, ‘Ilo kuak ilori iko ilofirihi bore gala, iyaŋunie alociaŋak, arrohojarak, aŋurak iko aŋodok.’
Ihalu kai, ojio egiamani, ‘Lettok, ehan ni, ihuo iramak duo iyye nani, ati hofitoro amaji.’
Buo elettok ette jiaran jio egiamani honyi, ‘Ilo ikidimihien iko jio ekotia, iyaŋunie aati ijiara ofuonni, oŋida ahaŋ hoŋ ifut hiny hiny.
Eramak ni itai jio obeŋ adi obo jio hia hinyia iloŋuni ojio eniŋ aŋiyo otto hafula hoŋ!’ ”
To obo oloŋ ofuoi nyia eluluŋi waati arriai iko Yesu, ette inyi iyito jihosi ette jiaran,
“Alla attu obo jihoŋ buo obeŋ oliwari monyonyi, honyonyi, ŋoruoi honyi, aduri honyi, illarak iko haniyarak honyi, afee ara duadi bu ahuan honyi, ittallik inyi irahan a hejifani hoŋ.
Ollo obeŋ 'to olor akruce honyi buo fe obeŋ ijifuno ani, ittallik inyi irahan ahejifani hoŋ.
Alla awak obo alatai iduho aaji onno ohodo, itterio adi inyi do ehenio omuk ajia asaŋ hunna awak inyi; imijaniere kuyya owoni agurusi jihonyi hunno oremehini ittohina aduho ania.
Nyio, alla abeŋ inyi ihan ihuo nyia, oduhok adi inyi etawoji haji ijiai ati ittallik adi inyi ittohina aaji ania. Attati aati hulle igonyuni 'to 'daŋ aaji ania isuhotiere atulo alia
buo ikianai jio, ‘Itter atulo olo aduho haji, ati ittallik ituhonia egiama!’

“Elle iturumoro obo loobu aati honyi alif 'tomon (10,000) irriomoniere iko obo loobu ollo owon 'to iko aati honyi alif atomuana arrihai (20,000), inninek adi inyi do ahuan honyi imijaniere kuyya oremik agolon honyi irriomoniere iko oobu lia.
Alla abeŋ agolon honyi oremik, ifak adi inyi eyak sayyo jio oobu lia buo inyi halama, ikianari jihonyi eram ono emuara.
Ihuo nyia buo fe alla abeŋ obo alatai obusak erre honyi 'daŋ, ittallik adi inyi irahan ahejifani hoŋ.”
“Oyyu amile, ati elle ilik inyi, inyiahini adi eduarit honyi aŋai?
Obeŋ buo fe inyi oremik itayyu aboro hutto mana ara duadi bu aworot hunno ofuoi iruasana itua mana. Ati ibirori adi inyi addi. Lia, ollo owon 'to iko ayyaha itayirari, ijiara itayiru!”
Ottoi
Tania, ette Yesu iramani jihosi etarriamai ana:

“Alla awon obo alatai iko akioro esiha abotie (100) buo obo abotie ette ilitohina, obeŋ 'tadi inyi idiaharu huna atomuana hottoŋuan hohottoŋuan ihidiofo, ette leten ittittifiaru olobotie linyia olito 'to many onyuraniere inyi?
Ninyia lanyurak inyi, ette inyi iloruno buo omuno.
Ninyia lafany inyi ihaŋ, iloŋu nyia inyi mottiarak iko onyihari honyi arabotie, ette jiaran jihosi, ‘Hamunoti nyio, anyurak ni aker hoŋ linyia olito 'to!’

Ihuo nyia buo fe eramak ni itai, obolo adi amuno idou, te eyyani abotie ollo obusak 'to eyyata honyi agalik amuno ta abisak atomuana hottoŋuan hohottoŋuan hulle igigiloi 'to jio obeŋi eyyata jihosi ibusaniere.
“Kuyya alla awon obo aŋotte iko arobiyaa 'tomon, buo ette italitohina arobiya abotie, ihan 'tadi inyi anyio? Itawulohi adi inyi allomo, ette ifie aaji buo ihum ittifia many onyuraniere inyi?
Ninyia lanyurak inyi arobiya lia, iloŋu nyia inyi mottiarak iko onyihari honyi arabotie, ette jiaran jihosi, ‘Hamunoti, nyio, anyurak ni arobiya loduo etalitohi ni!’
Ihuo nyia buo fe, eramak ni itai, omunoi adi ajilohien Hollum te eyyani abotie elle iha 'to eyyata honyi.”
Attati Yesu jiaran, “Owon nyia obo atulo iko lonyirok honyi arrihai,
ette ollo odiha 'to jiaran jio monyonyi jiojio, ‘Baba obuanyak ani erre hoŋ.’ Buo monyosi ette ibibuanyana jihosi asaŋ honyi 'daŋ.
Ihalu omuk oŋitek kai, itinyiaŋak lonyi ollo odiha 'to asaŋ honyi 'daŋ, ette leten jio obo afau anna alama, ette ittarrohojana agurusi honyi 'daŋ ta amanya onno orroho 'to.
Ninyia latuhok inyi asaŋ honyi 'daŋ, attati ahure onno obolo ittuna jio afau ania ette inyi ilociaŋ.
Attati inyi leten igiama iko obo atulo olo afau ania, linyia ifak 'to inyi itua mana honyi iyyahatiere abataha.
Adaya nyia inyi iŋiyere abehenyita modoro hunyia oŋiye abataha, ati obeŋ nyia tulo isio inyi obo ariŋ.
Ninyia afuonni ofioro ihou honyi, ette inyi jiaran, ‘Omukajia egiamak monyoŋ hullo oŋiye 'to aŋiyo bai many ofitoro, buo nani ahure dini ettoho!
Adioto adi ni, ette ni leten jio monyoŋ, ette ni jiaran jihonyi, “Baba, eyyau ni ihosiere Hollum buo fe ihosiere hoi.
Abeŋ ni enyiak isiruna irari olonyi hoi, ijiara ani ara ihuo obo egiamani hoi.” ’
Tania, odioto inyi ette leten jio monyonyi.
“Ninyia halama inyi, igonyuni nyia monyonyi inyi, ette imehino jihonyi, ette iŋioron, ette imosouna inyi, ette ifony inyi ta ahucio 'yaha.
Attati lonyi honyi jiaran jihonyi, ‘Baba, eyyau ni ihosiere Hollum iko ihosiere hoi, abeŋ ni enyiak isiruna irari alonyi hoi.’
Ati ojio nyia monye jio egiamak honyi, ‘Oruhuniete! Iyaŋuniete aboŋo enne ilaman 'to bebe, itiyyafana inyi; itiyyafana buo fe abilata ihafialai buo amuha ihejek honyi.
Orihuniete atawwo linyia itafiri, ocuhoto inyi, haŋiyete, buo fe hamunoti,
nyio aye nyia lonyi hoŋ olo, ihuania inyiak inyi isu. Olitohi nyia inyi, buo ihuania arumanio inyi.’ Ania, ette isi itterio amuno.
“Ta asaa ania, owon nyia lonyi honyi ahouti imana. Ninyia acohuno inyi many iger haŋ, itayiru nyia inyi edolo iko efufuoho.
Ette inyi iloŋuna obo egiamani, ette ifiyo inyi jio, ‘Jai! Owon anyio diya?’
Itarraŋ nyia inyi ojio, ‘Attu illahoi, ania, acuk monyohoi atawwo linyia itafiri; nyio ifuotu inyi illahoi ollo oyyu.’
“Tania, iloŋojita leto ahouti alia bebe, ette ihara ajiŋana attua haŋ. Ania, ette monyonyi ijiŋuna, ette ittana jio ijiara inyi hotojiŋai attua.

Buo inyi ette itarraŋ monyonyi ojio, ‘Imijie, egiama ni jihoi aŋasi hunia 'daŋ buo fe abeŋ amesio efahita hoi, ati ibeŋ iyye ani isio obo ariŋ ara duadi bu elloti alla aŋot ni imunori iko mottiarak hoŋ.
Ati noduo lacohuno lonyi hoi alia, elle ittarrohojak 'to erre hoi 'daŋ jio asomok, buo iyye itte icuhonia inyi atawwo linyia itafiri!’
Itarraŋ nyia monyonyi ojio, ‘Lonyi hoŋ, idulo iyye itoŋo ikoŋ, arai buo fe asaŋ hoŋ 'daŋ ahunohoi.
Ati osiru jihohoi imunori; nyio aye nyia illahoi alia, ati ihuania inyiak inyi isu; olitohi nyia inyi, buo ihuania arumanio inyi.’ ”

Ette buo fe Yesu jiaran jio lejifak honyi, “Owon nyia obo lasamani iko obo egiamani linyia ottoŋotio 'to erre honyi. Itisiahini nyia attoŋoni hirre alia jio asamani jiojio ittarrohojio inyi esamiti hunia asai asai.

Ania, ette inyi iloŋuna attoŋoni hirre alia ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Anyio enne ihan iyye enne etaniŋio ni ana? Ike ihuma itahutana jihoŋ erre 'daŋ hunne ifuotu iyye iko hunne isio iyye allet, nyio, ibeŋ iyye inyiak irahan ahattoŋoni hirre hoŋ.’
Buo attoŋoni hirre alia ette ikiana inyi hama jio, ‘Alo elettok hoŋ itawoj ani te igiama. Ehan 'tadi ni anyio? Obeŋ agolon jihoŋ ibuahari ewurio buo fe ni eloriri imimojori.
Ihuania amijak ni anyio adi enne ehan ni oŋida aati ifuotuni ani ihaŋitek hosi elle itawoji ani te igiama.’
“Tania iloŋu nyia inyi aati horosi lettok honyi ababo ette jiaran, jio etteri, ‘Awak elettok hoŋ jihoi omukajia?’
Buo lia ette itarraŋ jiojio, ‘Ajirikisi hiyali huŋuro esiha abotie (100).’ Attati attoŋoni hirre jiaran jihonyi, ‘Ahorosi hoi huna, itoŋoi ifau igiorok kokuak atomuana miyet.’

Attati inyi jiaran jio ollobo ‘Buo iyye, awak inyi jihoi omukajia.’ Buo inyi ette itarraŋ ojio, ‘Asuwali himma esiha abotie (100).’ Attati attoŋoni hirre jiaran jihonyi, ‘Ahorosi hoi huna, igiorok atomuana hottohunik.’
“Tania, itahuyo nyia elettok alia attoŋoni hirre olorroho olo ta agenyan honyi; nyio ogenyi aati hula afau ana, igiamari erre hosi agalihini, hula afaŋan.”
Attati Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Eramak ni itai orrehuna mottiarak hatai te esamiti hutta fau, nyio, alla atuhoi esamiti hunia, ifuotuna adi itai amanya onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ.

Lia, ollo ottoŋotio 'to erre hunno omutari 'to onno oyyu, ottoŋotio adi buo fe inyi erre hunno obolori 'to onno oyyu, buo lia ollo obeŋ 'to ottoŋotio erre hunno omutari 'to onno oyyu, obeŋ adi buo fe inyi ottoŋotio erre hunno obolori 'to onno oyyu.
Ati elle ibiaŋata itai ittoŋotiete onno oyyu esamiti huno afau ana, ŋai 'tadi isio jihatai esamiti hunna arai 'to hode ittoŋotiere?
Elle ibiaŋata itai ittoŋotiete onno oyyu erre huno obo atulo, ŋai 'tadi isiarak itai erre hunna arai 'to ahunatai?
Ninyia itayiruni
Attati Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Itihaniete itai ahuattek ahabisak ihosiere waati, ati omijak Hollum atajia hatai. Nyio, erre hunna adayai aati bebe, orrohoji isi 'daŋ to hosiere Hollum.
Ati iliaha jio edou iko afau ilitori muluyaŋ agalik jio egieri ollo odiha olo efahita ilitori.
“Owon nyia lobo lasamani elle iyyafatio aboŋojin hunne ilamani bebe buo ogoli te enyiaŋa. Ilobia nyia inyi oŋitek 'daŋ.
Owon nyia buo fe obo atulo olociaŋ alla anya Lasaro, linyia oso nahuan 'daŋ atoŋos. Iyaŋuttai nyia inyi ikat asamani alia,
jio oŋida inyi anyautta ebenyiti ŋiria hunno oddoddotiai 'to to 'teremeja hasamani alia. Ati ofuonnuttai nyia buo fe aŋohe ididala atoŋos honyi.
“Ninyia laye olociaŋ alia, akafarai nyia ajilohien inyi itoŋori iger Abramo iŋiyo ettedou. Oye nyia buo fe asamani alia, ette inuhana inyi.
Buo imaji hayaak, ninyia obolorori ettigemio jihonyi, ibonno inyi ahide ette igonyuna Abramo alamarai buo Lasaro itoŋo iŋer honyi.
Ania, ette inyi iloŋo ojio, ‘Baba Abramo, omehinie jihoŋ! Ifak Lasaro ottirok afialai honyi itua hari oŋida ottu itilik aŋadief hoŋ. Nyio, obolo ettigemio jihoŋ bebe itua eema ana!’
“Ati ojio nyia Abramo jihonyi, ‘Lonyi hoŋ, iko ihuma igigilo. Ninyia hésu iyye, ifuotu nyia iyye erre ayijok, buo Lasaro ifuotu erre arrohojak. Ati ihuania ilobia inyi buo iyye iwon ittigemio.
Buo jio hunia 'daŋ, omijak jio owon ewure ihiji hohoi ikatai jio, oŋida hia hullo owon 'to dini, ittallihi illaŋan ajihatai, buo fe oŋida obo jihatai ittallik illaŋuna a jihohoi.’
Buo lasamani lia ette jiaran, ‘Baba, Abramo, attana ni iyye, ifak Lasaro ihaŋ monyoŋ,
enne itoŋorik illarak hoŋ hula miyet. Ijiara inyi hételo isar isi, oŋida bati isi obeŋi ofuonni imaji ittigemio ana.’
Ati ojio nyia Abramo jihonyi, ‘Owoni illarak hoi iko bo Mose buo ekianak Hollum, ijiara isi itaniŋie ekiana hosi.’
Buo lasamani lia ette itarraŋ ojio, ‘Obeŋ ania oremik, baba Abramo! Ati elle ibuhu obo atulo toye ette leten jihosi, ihari adi isi eyyata hosi.’
Ati ojio nyia Abramo jihonyi, ‘Alla abeŋi adi isi itaniŋie jio Mose iko jio ekianak Hollum, obeŋi adi buo fe isi iruhi ara duadi bu ibuhu obo atulo toye.’ ”
Attati Yesu jiaran jio lejifak honyi “Ofuonni adi luŋa erre hunne isusuhini 'to aati iyyauniere, ati orroho adi bebe jio lia elle iyaŋuno 'to isi.
Osiru duo ifitani noonye hiriai imurut honyi, ette ibironia inyi itua hari enne ittokon ŋadi inyi isusuhi obo tehiji oŋiayai hulo iyyauniere.
Ihumata irriria ahuattek hatai!
“Elle ipal illahoi, iriŋa inyi, buo elle irue inyi, obusak inyi.
Buo elle ihanio inyi onno orroho jihoi enyiahita hattarik to noloŋ abotie buo odulo ajiaran jihoi, ‘Hibe awotto, hibe awotto!’ enyiahita hattarik, obusak luŋa inyi.”
Attati lefahat jiaran jio Lamonye, “Ofonik eruk hohoi.”
Itarraŋ nyia Lamonye ojio, “Alla abolo duo eruk hatai ihuo aŋerio cahai iremehina duo itai jiaran jio akamurei ana ‘Orutu ahuan hoi addi, idulanie itua hari enne ittokon!’ buo inyi duo ette niŋio.
“Kuyya alla awon obo alatai iko egiamani ollo oromo imana, kuyya iyyahatio akioro; alla acohuno inyi to mana, iramak adi iyye inyi ijiara obotik iŋiria?
Obeŋ! Ijio adi iyye jihonyi, ‘Ihuhumak aŋiria hoŋ otto 'tari, iyyafak aboŋo egemi oŋida isiaraniere ani aŋiria buo ni aŋiyo buo fe amata; ati ihalu iremik adi iyye iŋiyo aŋiria hoi.’
Isiarak soho inyi ahumo jio legiamani alia ta aniŋio honyi efaha?
Ara buo fe ihuo nyia jihatai, elle ituhonia itai egiama 'daŋ enne iramani jihatai, ijiatta jio, ‘Era hohoi ahegiamak asai, ehanio hohoi ijiai egiama enne isiori jihohoi.’ ”
To ninyia alari Yesu Yerusalem, ohisaru nyia inyi te ekori ette hiji Samaria iko Galilea.
Ninyia hojiŋak inyi jio obo amiji, oruaŋanie aliawa 'tomon ikonyi hunyia owoni 'to iko
ette illilloŋo woŋ woŋ jiojio, “Yesu! Lettok! Omehinie jihohoi!”
Igonyu nyia Yesu isi ette jiaran, “Ifuatta, itahutana ahuattek hatai jio ehumak.”
Ninyia hadahai isi ihiji ikoi, ette italibo isi.
Ninyia igonyu obo olosi jio aŋida inyi, ette inyi icohuno buo itahabuyo Hollum woŋ woŋ,
ette irruaŋana ahuan honyi ifau ihosiere hejek Yesu ette isio inyi ahumo. Ara nyia inyi a Samaritanani.
Attati Yesu ifiyo inyi ojio, “Irata duo bu itai hulle italibori 'tomon, tahiai ati hula hottoŋuan?
Nyio ti ololufa olo hama ollo ocohuno 'to itahabuyere Hollum?”
Attati Yesu jiaran jihonyi, “Totte ilo, itaŋida eruk hoi iyye.”
Ifiye nyia omuk hulo
Obeŋ adi obo atulo ojio, ‘Imijiete, ana dini!’ kuyya ‘Nyia fe nyia!’; nyio, awon Olobie ono Hollum ihiji hatai.
Attati inyi jiaran jio lejifak honyi, “Ofuonni adi oŋitek hunne iwahatti adi itai igonyuniere noloŋ abotie jio noŋitek Lonyi Tulo, ati ibiaŋata adi itai igonyuna inyi.
Owoni adi hia hullo ojiori adi jihatai jio, ‘Imijiete diya!’ kuyya, ‘Imijiete dini!’ Ati hèfuatta ijifatio isi.
Ihuo enne imiadahari ahilai, ette itafaŋ aŋacio 'daŋ huno edou, ara adi buo fe Lonyi Tulo ihuo nyia iholoŋ honyi.
Ati orumak adi inyi do ettigemita arriai buo fe aati hula ahana adi ihari inyi.
Ihuo ninyia arari inyi jio noŋitek huno Noa, ara adi buo fe inyi ihuo nyia jio noŋitek huno Lonyi Tulo.
Odulori nyia aati aŋiyo, iko amata buo fe aliawa ayamanie iko aŋoruo many jio noloŋ ninyia ojiŋaniere Noa itogol, attati ebuli hari ittohoro isi 'daŋ.
Ara adi ihuo ninyia to noŋitek huno Lot. Odulori nyia aati aŋiyo, amata, enyiaŋa, etinyiaŋa, edula, iko aduho.
To noloŋ ninyia alari Lot addi to bore gala Sodom, ette eema iko efuoto amunek onno owulo ahima,
Ara adi ihuo nyia to oloŋ enne italeyehinierek Lonyi Tulo.
Ogiluna to ŋoruoi Lot!
Lia, alla awak 'to italuahuna esu honyi italitohi adi inyi; ati lia, elle italitohi 'to esu honyi, italuahuno adi inyi.
Eramak ni itai, jio arue ania, ojotoi adi aati arrihai iŋeref abotie. Iyarai adi abotie addi buo idiaharai obotie.
Irieyei adi aŋoruo arrihai imaji abotie; iyarai adi abotie addi buo idiaharai ebotie. [
Owoni adi aliawa arrihai itua mana; iyarai adi abotie addi, buo idiaharai obotie.]”
Attati lejifak ifiyo inyi jiojio, “Lamonye, jio anani maji?”
Buo inyi ette itarraŋ jio, “Ottubanie adi ataruha jio amaji anna awanari obo ariŋ onno oye 'to.”
Attati Yesu iramana jio lejifak honyi obo etarriamai, ittiyeniere isi oŋida odulori amojo buo obeŋi oyuhoi.
Ojio nyia inyi jio, “Owon nyia lobo aŋotoni hiram jio obo abore gala. Obeŋ nyia inyi abaŋ Hollum buo fe obeŋ abaŋ aati.
Owon nyia buo fe aŋotte ehidak jio abore gala ania ninyia attana 'to inyi jio, ‘Itabisak eram hoŋ iko aati hullo osuarik 'to ani!’
Iha nyia aŋotoni hiram alia tetteri etabisana eram aŋotte ania. Ati ihalu igigilo nyia inyi ta ahuan honyi, ette jiaran, ‘Abeŋ duo bu ni aniŋio Hollum buo fe abeŋ abaŋ aati;
ati te ettigemio ehidak ana nani, etabisak adi ni eram honyi iko osuari honyi, ŋadi inyi odulo ittigemio ani oŋitek 'daŋ!’ ”
Ette Lamonye jiaran, “itaniŋiete erre hunne ikiana laŋotoni hiram ollo obeŋ 'to oŋocio onno obis.
Ihuania, obeŋ 'tadi Hollum oŋotok eram onno oyyu jio aati honyi hullo odulori 'to ifiyo jihonyi aluahio ta afanni iko ta arue 'daŋ? Illiŋiahi 'tadi inyi iluahiere isi?
Eramak ni itai, oŋotok adi inyi eram onno oyyu kokuak tesi. Buo alla attu Lonyi Tulo, onyurak 'tadi inyi eruk owon ifau?”
Iramak nyia buo fe inyi etarriamai ana jio aati hullo omijani 'to luŋa abisan hosi buo iyasie aati hullomuk.
“Ofuoi nyia lomuk aati arrihai imojo itua Haji emojit enne ittokon. Ara nyia lobo aholo
“Ihut nyia Afariseitanani eger kai
Aferutta ni enyiahita arrihai te esabit abotie, buo fe esiorio jihoi aŋacio etattomonita huno erre 'daŋ hunna anyuratta ni.’
“Ati owotia nyia eddudduhani musuru alamarai ollo obeŋ ikoddaŋ ibonno ahide, ette inninnaŋ asuhe honyi ette jiaran, ‘Hollum, omehinie jihoŋ, ani leyyani!’

Eramak ni itai, olo nyia eddudduhani musuru alia ihaŋ honyi alla abis ihosiere Hollum, ati obiaŋara a Fariseitanani. Nyio, alla akaf obo atulo ahuan honyi ahide, itafiahaji adi inyi, buo elle itafiaha obo ahuan honyi akafi adi inyi ahide.”
Iyaŋunie nyia omuk aati ara duadi bu olodolioo jio Yesu, oŋida inyi ottirok ahas honyi jihosi. Ninyia igonyuni lejifak isi, ette isi iŋerejanio jio aati.
Ati iloŋu nyia Yesu iŋiayai ette jiaran, “Aŋatana iŋiayai ijiara ofuonni jihoŋ, hètihoto isi nyio, ara Olobie ono Hollum ahano aati hulla arai 'to ihuo isi.
Ahode ajio ni jihatai jio, lia ollo obeŋ 'to ifuotu Olobie ono Hollum ihuo enne ifuotuniere eto ollo odiha 'to, obeŋ adi inyi ojiŋak diya.”
Attati lobo elettok olo Yudei ifiyo ojio, “Hettiyanani ollo oyyu 'to, ehan 'tadi ni anyio ifuotuniere esu 'tulaŋ?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu inyi ojio, “Anyio iloŋo iyye nani oloyijio? Obeŋ obo ara oloyijio arari fe Hollum hama.
Imijak iyye efahita, ‘Hèhanio erre somon, hèttoho, hèhoholio, hègesem, buo fe abaŋa monyohoi iko honyohoi.’ ”
Buo elettok alia ette jiaran, “Aniŋio ni efahita hunia 'daŋ many hara ni ahito.”

Ninyia itaniŋu Yesu erre hunia, ette inyi jiaran jihonyi, “Harasa obo ariŋ abotie enne hèbeŋ iyye ihan. Ilo itinyiaŋak erre hoi, itte iharana arobiyaa hua jio alociaŋak; ihuo nyia iwon adi iyye iko esamiti idou. Teya waŋ yo ijifatie nani.”
Ati ninyia itayiru atulo alia erre hunia, ette inyi ijiriŋa, nyio, asam nyia inyi bebe.
Igonyu nyia Yesu ejom honyi ette jiaran, “Ogol bebe jio aati lasamak ijiŋaniere Ilobie Hollum.
Inyiak iliaha bebe jio akonnikonni ijiŋari te ettulit libira, agalik atulo asamani ijiŋaniere Ilobie Hollum.”
Attati aati hunyia itayiruni 'to inyi ifiyo ojio, “Ŋai 'tadi ollo oremik 'to italahuno?”
Ati itarraŋ nyia inyi ojio, “Oremik Hollum ihanio erre hunne ittallihi aati ihanio.”
Buo Petro ette jiaran, “Imijie! Ediehuno hohoi ahaŋitek hohoi 'daŋ ijifatiere iyye.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihosi, “Hode ajio ni jihatai, atulo elle idehi 'to ahaŋ honyi, kuyya ŋoruoi, kuyya illarak, kuyya esiok honyi, kuyya aduri honyi, te eram ono Olobie Hollum,
inyiak adi inyi ifuotuna ihuania arriai agalihini hua, buo moi ottu ifuotuna esu 'tulaŋ.”
Iloŋu nyia Yesu lejifak honyi hula 'tomon harrihai ette jiaran jihosi, “Itayiriete! Efuo ihuania Yerusalem, buo diya, ofuoi adi erre 'daŋ hunyia igioroni ekianak Hollum to Lonyi Tulo irahan hode.
Isiori adi inyi ihas Lufajak, osuhotierek adi inyi, omorie adi inyi buo fe omicie amilak jihonyi.
Abahie adi isi inyi ette ittohoro, ati ihalu oŋitek hunihoi ibuhu adi inyi toye.”
Ati obeŋi nyia isi omijani erre hunia, nyio, idimani nyia awoyo hiram ekenita hunia jihosi, buo fe isi obeŋi omijani nanyio enne ikiana Yesu.
Ninyia iliaha Yesu Yeriko, owon nyia lobo oloŋodo linyia itoŋo 'to iger hikoi buo imimojo.
Ninyia itaniŋu inyi eluluŋ waati ofuoi tekoi, ette inyi ifiyo ojio, “Anyio riŋ ania?”
Itarraŋi isi inyi ojio, “Yesu olo Nasaret ollo ottu tolo.”
Attati inyi iloŋo woŋ woŋ ojio, “Yesu! Lonyi Dafide! Omehinie jihoŋ!”
Buo aati hutto hosiere ette iŋerejanio jihonyi, ette iramana inyi hotoduai. Ati ifudak nyia inyi ewuwoŋita bebe jiojio, “Lonyi Dafide! Omehinie jihoŋ!”
Ania owotiari Yesu, ette iramana isi ijiara iyaŋunie oloŋodo lia jihonyi. Ninyia lattu inyi aŋati, ette Yesu ifiyo inyi jiojio,
“Iwak iyye ani ehan anyio jihoi?” Itarraŋ nyia inyi jiojio,
“Lettok awak ni inyiak imijio.”
Ette Yesu jiaran jihonyi, “Inyiaha fe imijio! Itaŋida eruk hoi iyye.”
Teya teya, inyiak inyi imijio, ette ijifaru Yesu buo itahabuyo Hollum. Ninyia igonyu eluluŋ waati erre hunia, ette isi buo fe itahabuyo Hollum.
Ojiŋak nyia Yesu Yeriko ette iŋutoro tolia.
Owon nyia obo atulo diya afure honyi Sakeyos. Ara nyia inyi ahèddudduhani musuru elettok buo fe a sam.
Awak nyia inyi igonyuna Yesu, ati ta asuhon honyi buo fe ta aluaji waati, ittallik nyia inyi igonyuna Yesu.
Ania, ette inyi iŋioron ahosiere iluluŋ, ette idahina ihide bule igonyuniere Yesu linyia olo 'to ittuna tolia.
Ninyia afany Yesu jio amaji ania, ibonno nyia inyi ahide 'yani, ette jiaran jihonyi, “Sakeyos, isuru kokuak, nyio, ahana alo ni luŋa itoŋo ihaŋ hoi.”
Ania, ette Sakeyos isuruna kokuak, ette irraŋuna inyi ta amuno.
Iŋuŋunitai nyia aati 'daŋ hunyia igonyuni 'to eram ana jiojio, “Alo atulo olo irahan atamononi ihaŋ tulo leyyani!”
Attati Sakeyos idioto, ette jiaran jio Lamonye, “Lettok, itayirie! Esiarak adi ni anus hirre hoŋ jio alociaŋak, buo elle emumun ni obo atulo, aduma adi ni enyiahita aŋuan.”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran jihonyi, “Ahana, afany etalahuno jio ahaŋ ana, nyio ara atulo olo buo fe alonyi Abramo.
Nyio, ottu Lonyi Tulo ittifiari iko italahuniere aati hullo olitohini 'to.”
Ninyia hétaniŋie aati ekiana ana, so so Yesu iramana isi obo etarriamai, nyio, iliaha nyia inyi Yerusalem buo fe aati igigiloi jio alo adi Olobie ono Hollum iduoŋ teya teya.
Ania, ette inyi jiaran, “Olo nyia obo elettok jio obo afau anna alama ifuotuniere nelohobu attati icohuno.
Ette inyi iloŋuna egiamak honyi 'tomon, ette isiarana jihosi agurusi 'yeli 'tomon, ette jiaran jihosi, ‘Opocotti isi many acohuniere ni.’
Ati ihari nyia aati hutto miji hosi inyi, ette isi ifahina omuk eyak sayyo te ehalu honyi héfuahi jiaran jio, ‘Ebeŋ hohoi ewak atulo alia ahobu hohoi.’
“Ihanani nyia atulo alia ahobu, ette inyi icohuno. Teya teya, iloŋu nyia inyi egiamak honyi imijaniere omuk ajia agurusi hunno opocouni isi.
Otto etteri ittuna, ette jiaran, ‘Lettok, apocou ni agurusi ayyeli 'tomon to linyia isiarak iyye ani.’
Buo inyi ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Oyyu bebe. Iyye egiamani elle iyyu 'to! Ihuo ittoŋotio nyia iyye erre hullo omutari 'to onno oyyu, ehanak adi ni iyye elettok olo aborejin gala 'tomon.’
Ette buo fe egiamani etarrihi ittuna, ette jiaran, ‘Lettok, apocou ni agurusi ayyeli miyet to linyia isiarak iyye ani.’
Buo inyi ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Ira adi iyye elettok olo aborejin gala miyet.’
“Otto buo fe ollobo ittuna ette jiaran, ‘Lettok, hibe agiris 'yel hoi olo. Abubunak nyia ni inyi ta amannir, ette ni ittunana inyi onno oyyu;
nyio, abaŋ nyia ni arahan hoi atulo olorroho. Iduhutta iyye erre hunno obeŋi 'to arai ahunohoi buo fe idioŋotio erre hunne ibeŋ iyye iyehi.’

Buo hobu ette jiaran jihonyi, ‘Iyye legiamani elle irroho 'to! Aŋot adi ni eram hoi te ekenita hunno ofuonni 'to to hutuk hoi! Imijak iyye jio ara ni atulo olorroho, eduhutta ni erre hunno obeŋi 'to arai ahunoŋ buo fe adioŋotio erre hunna abeŋ ni ayehi.
Nyio nyiati ibeŋ iyye itunak agurusi hoŋ ibeŋk? Nyio, ŋaduo ni efuotu isi, iko efoniti hosi ninyia lacohuno ni.’
“Attati inyi jiaran jio hia hinyia owotiai 'to diya, ‘Iduhuna agiris 'yel alia addi jihonyi, isiatta jio lia ollo owon 'to iko agurusi ayyeli 'tomon!’
Ati ojiori nyia isi jihonyi ‘Lettok awon bu inyi iko agurusi ayyeli 'tomon!’

Itarraŋ nyia inyi ojio, ‘Eramak ni itai, jio lia ollo owon 'to iko asaŋ arriai, ofonihini adi jihonyi, buo lia ollo obeŋ riŋ jihonyi, iduhari adi addi jihonyi ara duadi bu obo ariŋ ollo owon 'to jihonyi.
Ihuania, iyaŋuniete amiorok hoŋ hulia hunyia ojiori 'to jio ebeŋ isi ewak ani ahobu hosi, ottohoro isi ihosiere hoŋ!’ ”
Ninyia latuhok Yesu ekiana, ette inyi leten Yerusalem to osiere.
Ninyia iliaha inyi iger Besfeji iko Betani hutteger doŋe Olifet, ette inyi ifahina lejifak honyi arrihai ahosiere,
ette jiaran jihosi, “Ifuatta jio amiji otto hosiere nyia; buo héjiŋana itai diya, inyurana adi itai obo aŋarri sigiria, anna atarani, onno hobeŋ tulo adahari; ohouniete inyi, iyaŋuniete dini.
Elle ifiyo obo atulo itai jio, ‘Nyio ihoyete itai inyi?’ Iramana jio, ‘Awak Lamonye’
Ofuoi nyia isi ette inyurana erre 'daŋ ihuo iramak nyia Yesu isi.
Ninyia hohoyei isi asigiria nyia, ette amonyie sigiria jiaran jihosi, “Nyio ihoyete itai inyi?”
Itarraŋi nyia isi jiojio, “Awak Lamonye inyi.”
Ania, ette isi iyaŋuno inyi many jio Yesu. Attati isi ifiatana aboŋojin hosi ihoruoŋ asigiria ania, ette itadahina Yesu ihide honyi.
Ninyia alari inyi ta asigiria, ofiatani nyia aati aboŋojin hosi ihikoi.

Ninyia lafany inyi iger Yerusalem jio amaji onno orubuniere ekoi onno ottu 'to to doŋe Olifet, ette eluluŋ hejifak itterio amuno buo fe itahabuye Hollum woŋ woŋ, nyio, te eduariti 'daŋ hunyia igonyuni isi.
Ojiori nyia isi, “Hotomunoi hobu ollo ottu 'to ta afure ono Lamonye! Ijiara nelik taji hatawana idou buo akuatan hatawana jio Hollum.”
Attati lomuk hulo
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu jio, “Eramak ni itai, alla aduahinie isi, itterie adi amoruoi ta ahuattek hosi ewuwoŋita.”
Ninyia iliaha inyi, ette igonyuna Yerusalem, ette inyi iyyoo tenyi,
jiojio “Aii, ara duo hémijak iyye ahana erre hunne iyaŋunie 'to nelik fau! Ati ihuania idimani isi to hoŋite hoi.
Nyio, ofuonni adi oŋitek hunne ikolonierek amiorok hoi iyye. Okudani adi iyye rid rid ta amariŋ itihiere iyye, attati irrioro attua ros ros totto ŋacio 'daŋ.
Otuhi adi isi iyye iko aati hutto tua iliati hoi 'daŋ muk. Obeŋi adi isi idehini obo amoruo imaji honyi nyio ibeŋ nyia iyye imijak asaa onno ottuniere Hollum italuahuniere iyye!”
Attati Yesu ijiŋara itua Haji Emojit enne ittokon, ette itterio efuhatio apocok addi.
Ette jiaran jihosi, “Igioroni ibuk ono Hollum jio, ojio Hollum, ‘Iloŋoi adi aaji hoŋ, aaji emojit.’ Ati iloitoto itai inyi ahinom hahalak!”
Ati obeŋi nyia isi onyurani obo ekoi ihaniere ihuo nyia; nyio, odulori nyia aati etaniŋio bebe, ekenita honyi 'daŋ.
To obo oloŋ ninyia ittiyeniere Yesu buo fe ittittoyo aati Asayyo Ayijok itua Haji emojit enne ittokon, ofuonni nyia ehumak elettaha iko ettiyanak ifahita buo lahou,
ette jiaran jihonyi, “Ike iramak hohoi, ta anani elohittok ihanio iyye erre hunia? Ŋai isio jihoi elohittok ania?”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi ojio, “Iko buo fe efiyo ni itai, iramana ani,
ottu nyia elohittok ono Yoane tai itifuociere batisimo, tedou kuyya jio aati?”
Ette isi itarisa isi hama jio, “Elle ejio jio, ‘Ottu teduo’ itarraŋ adi inyi jio, ‘Nyio nyiati ibiaŋata itai iruhoto erre Yoane?’
Ati elle ejio jio, ‘Ottu jio aati,’ iruoŋi adi hohoi aati 'daŋ ta amoruoi, nyio, iruhi nyia isi 'daŋ jio ara nyia Yoane ahekianani Hollum.”
Tania, itarraŋi isi jiojio, “Ebeŋ hohoi emijak ottu elohittok honyi tai.”
Itarraŋ nyia buo fe Yesu jihosi jio, “Abeŋ adi buo fe ni eramak jihatai ta anani elohittok enne ehaniere ni erre huna.”
Attati Yesu iramana etarriamai ana jio aati: “Idulak nyia obo atulo amana honyi ono afino, ette isiarana inyi jio ajurak, buo inyi ette leten jio afau anna alama, ette itoŋo diya fur.
Ninyia adiai afino, ette inyi ifahina apit jio ajurak hia oŋida obuanyani inyi hunonyi. Ati abahi nyia ajurak hia apit lia, ette itacahara ahas ahania.
Tania, ifak nyia inyi apit etarrihi, buo ajurak hia ette buo fe ibak inyi, ette ihanio jihonyi erre hunne iyaŋunie ariri, buo ette itacahara inyi ahas ahania.
Ette inyi ifahina apit etahunihi, buo ajurak hulia ette iriafuna lia, ette ipuasara inyi allet.
Attati lamonye mana jiaran ‘Ehan adi ni anyio? Efak adi ni lonyi hoŋ ollo obuor ataji hoŋ bebe; kuyya abaŋi adi isi inyi!’
Ninyia igonyuni ajurak hia inyi, ette ikiana isi hama jiojio, ‘Arutani honyi tibuo olo, hattohoro inyi oŋida erutaa honyi arai ahunohoi!’
Ette isi ipuasara inyi addi totua mana, ette ittohoro inyi.
“Ihan adi lamonye mana fino anyio jio ajurak hulia?
Ottu adi inyi ittohoro ajurak hulia, ette isiarana amana ania jio omuk ajurak hama.”
Ninyia itaniŋuni aati eram ana, ette isi jiaran “Hèlaha ara ihuo nyia!”
Ati omijio nyia Yesu jihosi, ette jiaran, “Anyioti enne ikianai egierita hutto buk Hollum huna?
‘Amoruo ninyia ihari aduhok jiojio ara ariŋ asai,
inyiak tibuo inyi igalihina 'daŋ ta ayiji.’
Alla akuahino obo atulo jio amoruo ania, owurok adi inyi ahuan honyi tuny tuny; buo alla akuahino amoruo ania jio obo atulo, oroyok adi atulo lia arari attuduha.”
Teya teya, awahi nyia ettiyanak ifahita iko ehumak elettaha inefuna Yesu, nyio, omijani nyia isi jio, ikiana nyia etarriamai enne iramak inyi tesi; ati abaŋi nyia isi aati.

Tania, ihumi nyia isi irriria Yesu, ette buo fe idum omuk asiri oŋida ofuoi itihanio ahuattek ihuo ayijok, ette ifahina isi héfuahi ififiyo Yesu italohuniere inyi oŋida isi enefu inyi ette isiarana ihas mondir olo gala Roma.
Attati asiri hulia ifiyo Yesu jiojio, “Hettiyanani, emijak hohoi jio ikiana iyye buo fe ittiyenio onno obis. Ibeŋ iyye igigia aati, ittiyenio iyye efahita huno Hollum hode.
Ike iramak hohoi, aŋatani soho efahita hohoi, idumari amusuru jio hobu Roma elle ittokon kuyya obeŋ?”
Ati omijak nyia Yesu enyobita hosi, ette inyi jiaran jihosi,
“Itahutana jihoŋ arobiya. Anaŋai arrijiori iko afure enne igioroni ihide honyi?”
Itarraŋi nyia isi jiojio, “Huno hobu elle ittokon.”
Ania, ette Yesu jiaran jihosi, “Isiatta hobu elettok erre hobu, buo jio Hollum erre Hollum.”
Diya ihosiere waati 'daŋ, ittallihi nyia isi ilohuna inyi to obo ariŋ enne ikiana inyi, ette isi dua ollokuai, buo illillihai te etarraŋi honyi.
“Hettiyanani, igiorok nyia Mose jihohoi efahi onno ojio 'to jio, ‘Alla aye illa obo atulo idiaharu ŋoruoi obeŋ hito, ijiara illanyi ojuŋori aŋotte ania isihiniere aduri a huno layaani.’
Owoni nyia ellarak hattarik; oyemu nyia oleŋeu aŋotte ette iye obeŋ hito.
Attati etarrihi ijuŋori aŋotte ania,
ette buo fe etahunihi; attati isi 'daŋ hattarik iye obeŋ obo isiu hito.
Ihalu hosi 'daŋ, aye buo fe aŋotte ania.
Ihuania, ottu adi inyi irahan aŋoruoi ŋai iholoŋ ono ebuhuna hayaak? Nyio, awattarik nyia isi 'daŋ hattarik inyi.”
Itarraŋ nyia Yesu isi jiojio, “Ayamanie aliawa iko aŋoruo huno ahana,
ati aliawa iko aŋoruo, hunno osiru ebuhuna toye ette imanya moi, obeŋi adi isi ayamai,
nyio, arai adi isi ihuo ajilohien, ittallihi adi isi iye. Arai isi aduri Hollum, te ebuhuna hosi toye.
Ihum tibuo Mose itahutana jio ibuhuni adi layaak toye. Jio aŋati egierita honyi hunne ikianai 'to te eram ono agurrumari, onno ojiari inyi jio, ‘Ara Lamonye, Hollum olo Abramo, Hollum olo Yakobo.’
Ihuania, obeŋ inyi ara a Hollum olo ayaak, ati ara inyi aholo esuok, nyio, jihonyi, isui aati 'daŋ.”
Attati omuk hulo ettiyanak ifahita itarraŋ inyi jiojio, “Hettiyanani, itarraŋ iyye onno oyyu.”
Nyio, abaŋi nyia isi enyiak ifiyo inyi.
Attati Yesu ifiyo isi jiojio, “Aŋai ati ojiori isi jio ara adi
Nyio, ojio nyia Dafide ta ahuan honyi ibuk ono Afureta jio,
‘Ojio Lamonye jio Lamonye hoŋ:
Itoŋoi tene totto ŋati hani iŋet hoŋ,
many ehananiere ni amiorok hoi ariŋ enne irriehiniere iyye eejek hoi.’
Iloŋo nyia Dafide inyi ‘Lamonye’; aŋai ati inyiak
Itayirie nyia aati 'daŋ jio Yesu, attati inyi jiaran jio lejifak honyi jiojio,

“Ihumata imijio ettiyanak ifahita! Omunoi isi eŋalata ta aboŋojin hunno ohodori, buo fe omunoi elle ifuanyai aati isi ta abaŋi itua suk. Onyimoi isi asegeri lettaha hutto tua hasik Imojiti iko amasik lettaha hutto hafulat.
Imumunie isi ehidahi buo fe ohoruttai ahaŋitek hosi, buo ette itahanio ahuattek te emojiti hunno ohodori 'to! Obolo adi ettigemio hosi agalik 'daŋ!”
Ihum nyia Yesu imijio, ette igonyuna asamak ibirotiai esiorita hosi itua senuk eddudduhi isiorita otto Haji emojit enne ittokon.
Ette buo fe inyi igonyuna obo ehidak elociaŋ ibirok atarifat arrihai diya.
Ette inyi jiaran, “Ahode eramak ni itai jio, ibirok ehidak elociaŋ ania agalik huno aati hullomuk 'daŋ.
Nyio, isiori nyia isi allaŋo huno esamiti hosi; ati te elociaŋ ottononyi, isiarak inyi asaŋ hullo owoni 'to jihonyi 'daŋ.”
Ikianai nyia omuk aati te eram ono Aaji emojit enne ittokon jio ilamani amoruoi honyi bebe iko esiorita waati jio Hollum. Buo Yesu ette jiaran,
“Ofuonni adi oŋitek hunne itatturierek erre hunne iŋiŋialati itai hunia. Obeŋ adi obo amoruo dinia arasa idellia ihide obo, ikukuri adi isi 'daŋ.”
Attati isi ifiyo Yesu jiojio, “Hettiyanani, iduoŋi adi erre hunia baya? Anyio itamijani adi enne itahutak 'to jio alum asaa enne iduoŋorik isi?”
Buo Yesu ette jiaran, “Ihumata irriria, hèlaha itisiabari itai! Nyio, ofuonni adi aati arriai hulle ikianai ihuo alla arai isi ani. Ojiori adi, ‘Ani inyi!’ buo fe ‘Alum asaa.’ Ati hèjifattiete isi.
Buo elle itaniŋuna itai jio owon afere buo fe etaŋalafayo gala, hèbaŋata; nyio iduoŋi adi erre hunia do ahosiere, ati obeŋi isi itahutani jio iliaha esidi hirre.”
Attati inyi jiaran jihosi, “Orriomonie adi afau iko afau, buo obuore iko obuore.
Iboŋi adi erre hunno orrohoji 'to huna amasik 'daŋ; olokitihi, ahure buo eŋuati. Ofuonni adi erre hunno oyeyeri 'to iko etamijanita hunno obolori 'to tedou.
Ati hobeŋi erre hunia 'daŋ iduoŋi, inefuni adi itai ette ittigemio. Itawojie adi itai ihasik Imojiti, ette ifitana itai ibabus. Iyarai adi itai ihosiere hobuok iko amondiri te eram hoŋ.
Inyi adi ania asaa enne ifuati itai ikianari te eram hoŋ ihiji waati:
Hèhumata igigilo obojiai hobeŋ asaa nyia. Hèhawwati jio ifuatta adi itai itarraŋ aŋai.
Nyio, esio adi ni jihatai ekenita iko olofioro hunne ittallihi adi amiorok hatai ihara kuyya itarisa.
Ara duadi bu esiok hatai, illarak hatai, aati hutta haŋitek hatai, iko mottiarak hatai, itinefuni adi isi itai ette itattohoro omuk hulatai.
Iyyalari adi aati 'daŋ itai te eram hoŋ.
Ati obeŋ adi obo ariŋ ottir itai, ara duadi bu ofitti abotie to hosi hatai.
Odihuna, tania, italuahuna adi itai ahuattek hatai.
“Elle igonyuna itai oseŋer ikoloni Yerusalem, omijana jio iliaha atturo honyi.
Tania, ijiaran hullo owoni 'to Yudea, hotofuhohi attua doŋiok; ijiara buo fe hullo owoni 'to itua miji héfuahi addi. Ijiara buo fe hullo owoni 'to itua matta, hotobiaŋahi ojiŋani attua miji.
Nyio, oŋitek adi hunia ‘Huno ettigemio’ jio oŋida itasiruni erre 'daŋ hunyia igioroni ibuk ono Hollum.
Orroho adi bebe to oŋitek hua jio aŋoruo ayedurok iko etadasak! Nyio, owon adi ejiriŋa onno obolo jio afau ana iko ettigemio onno obolo jio aati hulo.
Ottohori adi omuk ta ademio erremiti, buo ette inyaru omuk ofuoi ifita jio amisihi hutta fau 'daŋ. Irririei adi Alufajak Yerusalem many ottubarik oŋitek hosi.
Okuahatie adi aati mugur mugur ta abaŋi buo isi itilai arrohojita hunno ofuonni 'to adi ifau; nyio, ittanniŋai adi erre huttedou.
Igonyuni adi isi Lonyi Tulo ottu tedohuo ta aduaran iko ta akuatan onno obolo.
Elle itterie erre huna eduoŋ, owotiati, ibonnoto ahide, nyio, iliaha etalahuno hatai.”
Attati Yesu iramana jihosi etarriamai ana: “Imijata aŋaboli iko ayyanio hunnomuk 'daŋ.
Elle igonyuna itai abene hosi itterie ayisuna, imijana itai ta ahuattek hatai hama jio iliaha atahas.
Ihuo nyia buo fe elle igonyuna itai erre huna iduoŋi omijana jio, iliaha Olobie Hollum attuna.
“Hode hode, eramak ni itai, obeŋi adi aati hulo ahana oye many iduoŋorik erre huna 'daŋ.
Olitohini adi edou iko afau muluyaŋ, ati obeŋi adi ekenita hoŋ olitohini.
“Ati ihumata imijio! Hèlaha atajia hatai iminyiarai elobia ta aŋiyo iko amata buo ehawwata huno afau ana. Elle ihanata itai ihuo nyia, oburak adi oloŋ ania itai,
ihuo elohit. Nyio, ottu adi inyi jio aati 'daŋ hutta fau.
Tania, ihumata imijio buo fe omojoti motie motie jio oŋida iwatta iko agolon jio erre 'daŋ hunno ofuonni 'to, iko iwotiari ihosiere Lonyi Tulo.”
Buo ta amotie hanyik, iwanyutai nyia aati jihonyi Ihaji emojit enne ittokon itayiriere jihonyi.
Iliahai nyia oŋitek huno neyom ono nemune onno obeŋ 'to owon iko olobou. Inyi neyom enne ifurani Allaŋan.
