Itifonyana eruhok hutto Laudisia, agalik ti Nimfa iko eluluŋ heruhok onno omojotio 'to ihaŋ honyi.
Elle ihianata itai awaraga ana, ijiara buo fe luŋa ihianani awaraga ania jio eluluŋ heruhok otto Laudisia. Ihuo nyia buo fe, ihianata awaraga hoŋ onno ofuoi eruhok hutto Laudisia ifahuna jihatai.
Iramana buo fe Arkipos jio, “Otuhok luŋa egiama ninyia isiori jihoi, jio egiama ono Lamonye.”
Ani Paulo, egiorok efonyita huna jihatai, ta aani hoŋ. Hèguotti aririk hoŋ! Ijiara ayiji taji Hollum hatawana jihatai.
Jio eluluŋ heruhok otto Tesalonika hulla arai 'to a hulo Hollum, Monye, buo fe a hulo Yesu Kristo, Lamonye:
Ijiara ayiji taji iko nelik tajia hatawana jihatai.
Edulo hohoi esiorio ahumo jio Hollum tetai 'daŋ, buo fe edulo amojo tetai.
Ihosiere Hollum, Monye hohoi, edulo hohoi eyiyiutta egemita hatai huno neruk iko huno abuaran taji, buo agolon ono eyihina hatai jio Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi.
Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, emijak hohoi jio obuor ataji Hollum itai. Anyimu inyi itai awaati honyi.

Nyio, ebeŋ nyia hohoi ekiana jihatai Asayyo Ayijok hunia te etuhe ijiai; ati eyaŋuno nyia buo fe hohoi isi ta naduaran iko to Loholio Olibo, buo fe te eruk hohoi nelahode ono Asayyo hunia. Imijana itai emanya nyia hohoi aŋai ihiji hatai. Ara nyia inyi iluahiere itai.
Ijifatiete nyia itai emanyiti hohoi iko huno Lamonye. Duadi bu irumana itai ettigemita arriai, ifuotuna nyia itai ekiana ania ta amuno onno ottu 'to jio Loholio Olibo.
Tania, irata nyia itai etahuti jio eruhok 'daŋ hutto Masedonia iko hutto Akaya.
Nyio, ibiaŋata nyia itai itisarrahina ekiana ono Lamonye Masedonia iko Akaya ijiai, ati akuataru nyia buo fe eruk hatai Hollum amasik 'daŋ. Tania, abeŋ obo ariŋ enne ewak hohoi ikiana.
Ikianai nyia aati hia 'daŋ eram ono efuotuna hatai hohoi onno oyyu; buo fe aŋai ibusana itai amojo jio arrijiorihien, ittata iyituno jio Hollum, igiamari jio Hollum ahode hode, lesuoni.
Ikianai nyia buo fe isi te etila hatai attuna ono Lonyi Hollum tedou…Lonyi honyi Yesu, linyia itubuhu inyi toye, inyi nyia italuahu hohoi jio ajore Hollum onno ottu 'to.
Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, imijana itai ta ahuattek hatai jio obeŋ nyia afuanna hohoi jihatai ara asai.

Imijana itai jio enyurak nyia hohoi ettigemita iko emoriti ibore gala Filipi ninyia hèbeŋ hohoi efuonnu jihatai Tesalonika. Ara duadi bu oluaji aati hulle ihari 'to eram hohoi, isiarak nyia Hollum jihohoi agolon tajia iramaniere jihatai Asayyo Ayijok hunno ofuonni 'to jihonyi.
Obeŋ attana hohoi ara to obo epali, kuyya to obo egigilo onno orroho 'to, kuyya buo fe jio ewak hohoi inyob obo atulo.
Ati ekianatio hohoi oŋitek 'daŋ ihuo awak Hollum, nyio, aŋotok inyi jio osiru jihohoi ittittoyere Asayyo Ayijok. Ebeŋ hohoi ewak itamunoyo aati, ati itamunoyere Hollum, ollo omijak 'to atajia hohoi.
Imijana itai bebe jio, ebeŋ hohoi etafoyoŋio itai te ekenita hohoi buo fe ebeŋ etihotio obo eŋaru te ekenita hunia. Hollum, inyi asuut hohoi.
Ebeŋ nyia hohoi ettifia olohuo jio obo atulo, ara duadi bu jihatai kuyya jio aati hullomuk.
Ta arahan hohoi elefahat Kristo, eremik nyia hohoi iwahan omuk erre jihatai. Ati ninyia ewanari hohoi ikatai, enyalam nyia hohoi ihuo nonye
Ta abuaran tajia hohoi itai, inyi ninyia esiaraniere hohoi jihatai obiaŋara Asayyo Hollum Ayijok hama, ati esiarak nyia hohoi duadi bu ahuattek hohoi. Nyio, obuori nyia atajia hohoi itai bebe!

Hode, illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, hèbiaŋata itai iguotti aŋai nyia egiama hohoi buo fe epulo! Egiama nyia hohoi ta afanni iko ta arue jio oŋida hohoi ebeŋ ettigemio itai, to ninyia ettittoyere hohoi jihatai Asayyo Ayijok huno Hollum.
Irata itai asuuti hohoi, buo fe Hollum ara asuut, jio emanya nyia hohoi ihiji hatai heruhok ta alibori iko ta abisan, buo fe obeŋ obo epali.
Imijana itai aŋai ehanio nyia hohoi itai 'daŋ ababo ihuo enne ihanierek esiok jio aduri hosi.
Etagol nyia hohoi atajia hatai buo fe etilik isi. Edulo nyia hohoi eramio itai oŋida imanyati amanya enne itamunoyo 'to Hollum linyia iloŋu 'to itai Ilobie iko ikuatan honyi.

Edulo buo fe hohoi esiorio ahumo jio Hollum te eram ana: Ninyia eyaŋuniere hohoi jihatai ekiana Hollum, itaniŋuna nyia itai ittata iruk jio ara inyi luŋa ekiana Hollum, buo obiaŋara ono aati. Inyi enne igiama 'to ania ituajin hatai, heruhok.

Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, iduoŋi jihatai erre hunyia iduoŋi 'to jio eluluŋi heruhok Hollum hutta fau Yudea iko jio aati hulla arai 'to a hulo Kristo Yesu. Nyio, irumana itai ettigemita jio aati hatai ihuo ninyia orumanierek isi ettigemita jio Yudei;
hunyia ottohori 'to Yesu, Lamonye iko ekianak Hollum, ette buo fe ittigemio hohoi. Isi italoŋoji Hollum bebe! Osuarik isi aati 'daŋ!

Awahi nyia isi itik hohoi ittittoyere asayyo jio Alufajak jio oŋida bati isi italahunie. Ihuo nyia, itufutani isi eyyata hosi 'daŋ hunne iyyauttai isi toloŋi. Ihuania, attu tibuo luŋa ajore Hollum jihosi.

Alla ara jihohoi, illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, arasai nyia atajia hohoi ikatai, duadi bu iyarai hohoi addi kai to hosiere hatai. Ettoho hohoi bebe amolie hatai. Ewak luŋa hohoi bebe ifuatan imijuno itai.
Ewak nyia hohoi icaharu jihatai. Nani, ta ahuan hoŋ, akem nyia ni enyiahita arriai icohuniere ajihatai, ati itihotio nyia Sittan hohoi.
Anyio riŋ 'tadi enne iyaŋuno 'to jihohoi eyihina kuyya amuno kuyya etadara ihosiere Yesu, Lamonye hohoi, alla attu inyi? Obiaŋara soho itai?
Hode, itai tibuo iyaŋuniete jihohoi etadara iko amuno!
buo efak illa hohoi Timoteyo, elle egiama 'to ikohoi jio Hollum ittittoyere Asayyo Ayijok huno Kristo. Efak hohoi inyi itagoliere atajia hatai buo fe iluahiere itai jio neruk hatai.
Oŋida ettigemita hunia obeŋi ihani obo jihatai idehiniere neruk attanatai. Imijana itai, ta ahuattek hatai jio, Hollum aŋatak ettigemita hunia ofuonni jihohoi.
Ninyia héwon hohoi ikatai, esar nyia hohoi itai ahosiere jio efuo adi irumana ettigemita. Ania, iduoŋ inyi hode ihuo imijana itai.

Ninyia ettallik ni idihuna eram ania, inyi enne efahuniere ni Timoteyo jio oŋida bati nani amijak owon neruk hatai aŋai. Nyio, elafuho ni jio kuyya isusu Sittan itai, buo fe jio alo egiama hohoi irahan asai.
Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, jio ehawwata iko ettigemita hohoi 'daŋ, itabijoto itai atajia hohoi te neruk hatai. Neruk hatai nyia itagol atajia hohoi,
nyio, ihuania, emanya tibuo hohoi, elle iduloro itai arasa jio Lamonye.
Ihuania, eremik hohoi isiarana ahumo jio Hollum tetai. Esio hohoi jihonyi ahumo, nyio, erumak hohoi amuno ihosiere honyi tetai.
Edulo hohoi amojo afanni iko narue jio oŋida bati hohoi efuo jihatai, buo fe isiaraniere jihatai erre hunno hobeŋi jio neruk hatai.
Ijiara Hollum Monye hohoi, ta ahuan honyi, iko Yesu, Lamonye hohoi itahutani jihohoi ekoi ifanyari jihatai!
Ijiara Lamonye odulo afuanatta jihatai abuaran taji, oŋida abuaran taji onno owon 'to ihiji hatai buo fe etabuorio tajia hatai jio aati hullomuk odulo abobolororo, ihuo onno obuararik hunohoi itai.
Tania, itagol adi inyi itai, isatta adi a habisak buo fe aliborok ihosiere Hollum hohoi, Monye hohoi; alla attu Yesu, Lamonye hohoi iko aati honyi 'daŋ

Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, etisidok ni jio, iyiyenuna jihohoi oŋida imanyati aŋai itamunoyere Hollum. Inyi ania luŋa ekoi enne imanyatti itai. Ihuania, ettana hohoi buo fe eramak itai ta afure Yesu, Lamonye hohoi jio oduloro ehanio onno oyyu agalik ania.
Nyio, imijana itai ettiyenita hunyia eramak hohoi jihatai te elohittok ono Yesu, Lamonye.
Awak Hollum itai oŋida iliboroto buo fe luŋa ilamajata jio erre somon.
Ijiara luŋa itai 'daŋ ababo imijana itoŋoti iko aŋoruo hatai
buo obiaŋara ta amuno hirre somon, ihuo aati hullo obeŋi 'to omijani Hollum.

Jio erre hunia, hèlaha obo alatai ihanio onno orroho jio Kristiani ihuo inyi, kuyya imumunio isi. Eramak nyia hohoi jihatai erre hunia berien. Ehum nyia hohoi isar itai jio, ittigemio adi Lamonye hia hulle ihanie 'to ihuo nyia.
Obeŋ nyia Hollum iloŋu hohoi imanyari asomok, ati imanyari amanya elibo.
Tania, hia hulle ihari 'to ettiyenita hunia, obeŋ isi ihari atulo; ati ihari isi Hollum elle isio 'to jihatai Loholio Olibo honyi.
Obeŋ osiru egiorok ni jihatai eram ono etabuorio tajia jio aati hullomuk. Ittiyanak nyia Hollum jihatai aŋai oremik abuaran taji iwanan ihiji hatai.
Hode, ihaniete itai ihuo nyia jio eruhok 'daŋ hutto Masedonia. Tania, ettana hohoi itai illarak iko haniyarak hohoi jio, ihaniete ihuo nyia agalik ania.
Ijiara awahan manya dee owon itajia hatai, ihaniete egemita hatai, igemuna amat hatai ta ahas hatai, ihuo eramak nyia hohoi itai berien.
Elle ihaniete itai ihuo nyia, abaŋi adi aati hullo obeŋi 'to arai aheruhok itai. Ibiaŋata adi buo fe itai ittifiati obo ariŋ jio obo atulo.
Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, ewak hohoi oŋida itai imijana ahode hode hiram hayaak, nyio, ŋadi itai ijiriŋati ihuo aati hullo obeŋi 'to owoni iko eyihina.
Eruk jio oye nyia Yesu ette buo fe ibuhuna. Tania, eruk buo fe jio, to Yesu, itubuhu adi Hollum hia hinyia oye 'to buo iruhi jio Yesu.
Ottu adi ekiana tedou, etuk ono ajilo elle ittokon, afuruju Hollum, buo fe Lamonye ta ahuan honyi ette ittuna tedou. Teyya, ibuhuni adi ahosiere hia hinyia oye 'to buo iruhi jio Kristo.
Attati hohoi, hulle hésu 'to jio oŋitek hua, ittubanio arabotie ikosi itua idohuo irraŋuniere Lamonye tehiji dou iko afau. Tania, edulo adi awanan iko Lamonye.
Tania, itagoloto atajia hatai te ekenita hunia.
Illarak iko haniyarak hoŋ, obeŋ osiru igioroniere jihatai iduoŋi adi erre hunia jio anani holoŋ.
Nyio, ihumata itai imijana, ta ahuattek hatai jio, iduoŋ adi oloŋ ono Lamonye ihuo attuna lohoho ta arue.
Alla ajiori aati jio, “Owon elik fau, obeŋ obo abaŋi,” attati arrohoji iduoŋ jihosi turunyaŋ ihuo ahuanya ŋotte onno ojio 'to esio; obeŋ adi tulo iris.
Ati jihatai illarak iko haniyarak hoŋ, ibiaŋata itai iwanata idumele. Hèlaha Oloŋ ania oburak itai ihuo olohoho.
Nyio, irata itai 'daŋ awaati hulo afaŋan iko oloŋ. Ebeŋ era a hulo narue kuyya a hulo edumele.
Tania, hèlaha ejotoro ihuo aati hullomuk; ati, oŋida emijio buo fe ewon iko ossi huna afaŋi.
Hullo ojotoi 'to, ojotoi ta arue; buo arumak, orumai ta arue.
Ati era a hulo afanni, ijiara ossi hohoi afaŋi. Ijiara luŋa ewon iko neruk buo abuaran taji oŋida arai egerita hutto suhiara hohoi. Ijiara eyihina jio etalahuno ara olohuluk hohoi.
Obeŋ nyia Hollum onyimu hohoi ittigemiere. Ati, onyimu nyia inyi hohoi irumaniere etalahuno to Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi;
linyia oye 'to to hohoi, jio oŋida bati emanya ikenyi duadi bu esu kuyya eye, alla attu inyi.
Tania, itagoliete buo fe iluahiete ahuattek ihuo enne ihaniette itai ihuania.
Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, ettana hohoi itai jio, abaŋata hia hulle igiamai 'to ihiji hatai; hia hulle iyyahatie 'to itai buo fe ittiyenie itai emanyiti Kristiani.
Nyio, te egiama enne ihanie isi, abaŋata buo fe itabuarata atajia jihosi bebe bebe. Itoŋoti te elik tajia.
Illarak iko haniyarak, ettana hohoi itai jio, isiŋiete aboyojok, itagoloto atajia baŋak, oluahiete elihak buo fe odihata isi 'daŋ.
Ijiara obo jihatai obeŋ inienu epali te epali, ati oduloro ehanio erre ayijok jio ahuattek hatai iko jio aati 'daŋ.
Oduloro amuno.
Oduloro amojo.
Isiatta ahumo te erre 'daŋ; nyio, ariŋ ania anna awak Hollum jihatai ta amanya hatai iko Kristo Yesu.
Hètihoto Loholio Olibo.
Hèyyasata ekenita huno ekianak Hollum,
ati, okiamata erre 'daŋ; ogottiette hunno oyiji 'to,
ihara erre 'daŋ hunno orrohoji 'to.

Ijiara Hollum elle isio 'to jihohoi nelik tajia italibo ahuattek hatai 'daŋ. Ijiara inyi ogottiere onno oyyu oloyirihien hatai, oloholioo hatai, iko ahuattek hatai oŋida obo epali obeŋ jihatai jio oloŋ onno ottuniere Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi.
Lia elle iloŋu 'to itai, ihan adi inyi erre hunia; nyio, ogottiere inyi ecoriti honyi.
Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, omojoti buo fe to hohoi.
Itifonyana eruhok 'daŋ ta ahucio 'yaha ono nelik tajia.
Ta afure ono Lamonye, attana ni itai, ihianana awaraga ana jio eruhok 'daŋ.
Ijiara ayiji taji ono Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi hatawana jihatai.
Jio eluluŋ heruhok otto Tesalonika, anna ara 'to ahono Hollum Monye hohoi buo fe ahono Yesu Kristo, Lamonye.
Ijiara Hollum Monye hohoi iko Yesu Kristo, Lamonye isiori jihatai ayiji tajia iko nelik tajia.

Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, ijiara luŋa edulo esiorio ahumo jio Hollum tetai. Osiru inyi jihohoi ihaniere ihuo nyia, nyio, abobolororo neruk hatai bebe; buo fe etabuorio hatatai atajia jio ahuattek hatai, obobolororo.
Tania, etadara hohoi tetai ihiji iluluŋi heruhok huno Hollum. Etadara hohoi ta aduloro hatai adihan iko ta awanan hatai iko neruk ihiji ettigemita iko arrohojita 'daŋ hunne irumana itai.
Itamijanani erre hunia 'daŋ jio, obis aŋocio Hollum eram. Tania, isiruna adi itai jio Olobie honyi, enne ittigemierek itai te eram honyi.
Ihan adi Hollum ariŋ onno obis 'to; iyaŋuno adi inyi ettigemita jio hia hulle ittigemie 'to itai,
buo iyaŋuno ayiji jihohoi ikatai hulle ittigemie. Ihan adi inyi erre hunia alla attu Yesu, Lamonye tedou iko ajilohien honyi elettaha;
te neema onno owulo 'to, ittigemiere hia hulle ihari 'to Hollum iko hullo omesie 'to Asayo Ayijok huno Yesu, Lamonye hohoi.
Ifuotuni adi isi ettigemio onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ. Igialari adi isi addi to hosiere Lamonye iko jio aduaran honyi onno okuat 'to;

alla attu inyi jio Oloŋ nyia, ifuotuniere akuatan jio aati honyi 'daŋ buo fe etahabuyo jio aati 'daŋ hulle iruhi 'to. Ittubati adi buo fe itai ikosi nyio, iruhoto itai asayyo hunyia eramak hohoi jihatai.

Eram ania enne edulori hohoi imojo tetai, jio oŋida bati Hollum hohoi itasiru amanya hatai te nekoi ninyia iloŋuniere inyi itai. Ijiara buo fe inyi, isiarak jihatai ayiji enne iwahata itai, ijiara buo fe ottubak ehanita hatai huno neruk ta aduaran honyi;
oŋida itakuacie afure Yesu, Lamonye hohoi te ehanita hatai buo fe akuatan hatai ette ittuna tenyi ta ayiji taji ono Hollum hohoi iko ono Yesu Kristo, Lamonye

hèlaha ossi hatai iŋalai kokuak kuyya ilafuhoi te eram onno ojiori jio, alum Oloŋ ono Lamonye. Ara hara ogiloi jio, ekenu nyiadi hohoi eram ania buo hohoi ekiana kuyya ettittoyo eram Hollum, kuyya egiorok hohoi inyi iwaraga.
Hèlaha obo atulo inyob itai to obo ekoi, nyio, obeŋ adi Oloŋ nyia olum many ottuniere Apiaha waati esidi iko Hollum, buo fe many oleyeri Olorroho ollo obocio 'to iferno.

Inyi alia ollo ottu 'to ihara obo ariŋ 'daŋ onno ojiori ajiok kuyya obo ariŋ enne itahabuye, buo ette ikafana ahuan honyi ellettok hosi 'daŋ. Orinyak adi inyi etoŋo iseger atta Haji emojit enne ittokon ono Hollum, ette jiaran inyi Hollum.
Ibiaŋata itai igiluna jio eramak nyia ni erre hunia jihatai ninyia hawon ni ikatai?
Imijana itai ariŋ enne itihotio 'to inyi iduoŋori ihuania. Italeyehini adi Olorroho, alla attuba oloŋ nyia.
Ihuania, ihanie aati arriai erre hunno orrohoji 'to; ati obeŋ etihoni aŋatak isi iduoŋori many iyari Hollum addi etihoni alia.
Tania, ette tibuo italeyehina Olorroho alia. Buo alla attu Yesu, Lamonye hohoi, ottu adi ittohoro inyi to oloyiri hutuk honyi, ette ikukur inyi ta apipiahi ottononyi.
Ottu adi Olorroho iko agolon ono Sittan, ette ihanio eduariti iko ellillihita enyobita.
Ihanio adi inyi enyobita hunno orrohoji 'to jio hia hullo ofuoi 'to ituhoro. Otuhoroi adi isi nyio, ihari isi amuno elahode onno oremik 'to italuahuna isi.
Ania, isiaraniere Hollum jihosi epali erroho oŋida isi iruhi erre gesem jio,
oŋida oŋotoni epali jio hia hullo obeŋi 'to iruhi elahode buo omunoi eyyau.
Obuor ataji Lamonye itai, illarak iko haniyarak hohoi; ijiara luŋa edulo esiorio ahumo jio Hollum. Nyio, onyimu nyia Hollum itai many tetteri
Iloŋu nyia Hollum itai jio eram ania ta Asayyo Ayijok huno Yesu hunyia ettittoyo hohoi jihatai. Iloŋu nyia inyi itai ifuotuniere akuatan ono Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi.
Tania, illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, ogoloto, ogottiette nelahode ninyia ettiyanak hohoi jihatai, te ettittotia iko ta awaraga ninyia egiorok hohoi jihatai.
Amojo ni jio Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi ta ahuan honyi iko Hollum Monye hohoi hullo obuori atajia hosi hohoi, hulle isiarani 'to jihohoi abijon tajia iko eyihina onno oyyu 'to te nelik tajia;
ijiara isi itagoli atajia hatai oŋida iduloro ehanio buo fe ikianati erre ayijok.

Ihuania, illarak iko haniyarak hohoi etisidok ni ta ajiaran jio, omojoti to hohoi oŋida bati asayyo huno Lamonye odulori isarrara kokuak buo fe oŋida ifuotuni isi ta abaŋi, ihuo ninyia ararik isi jihatai.
Omojoti buo fe jio, ijiara bati Hollum italuahu hohoi ta has 'rohojak iko jio eyyak, nyio, obiaŋara aati 'daŋ iruhi asayyo hunia.
Ati, oyyu Lamonye bebe, itagol adi inyi itai, buo fe iciau itai jio Olorroho.
Isiarak Lamonye jihohoi eyihina tetai. Emijak hohoi luŋa jio ihaniete itai buo fe iduloro adi ehanio erre hunyia eramak hohoi jihatai.
Ijiara Lamonye isiarak jihatai olofioro imijaniere abuaran taji Hollum iko adihan enne isiarak Kristo.
Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, eramak hohoi itai ta afure Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi jio, hèrriahati iko eruhok aboyojok, hullo obeŋi 'to ijifatie ettiyenita hunyia eramak hohoi jihosi.
Imijana itai ta ahuattek hatai jio, ijiara itai luŋa ihaniete ihuo ninyia ehaniere hohoi. Ebeŋ nyia hohoi eboyo ninyia ewanari hohoi ikatai.
Ebeŋ nyia hohoi efuotu obo aluahio jio obo atulo buo ebeŋ eduma inyi. Ati egiamatio nyia hohoi afanni iko narue 'daŋ jio, oŋida hohoi ebeŋ ettigemio obo atulo.
Obiaŋara jio obeŋ nyia obis jihohoi imojori aluahio jihatai, ati ebeŋ nyia hohoi ehanio ihuo nyia jio, oŋida itai ihaniete ihuo enne ehaniere hohoi.
Ninyia ewanari hohoi ikatai, eramatta nyia hohoi jihatai jio, “Elle iha obo atulo egiama, hèlaha oŋiyo.”
Ekiana hohoi erre hunia nyio, etaniŋu hohoi jio owoni aboyojok ihiji hatai, hullo obeŋi igiamai buo idieferi.
Ta afure Yesu Kristo, Lamonye, eramak hohoi buo fe ehum ikiana jio aati ihuo hulia jio, ijiara isi amanyai onno oyyu buo fe igemuni aŋiyo hosi.
Buo jihatai illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, hèyuhoti ehanio onno oyyu.
Alla amesio obo alatai ekenita hohoi huttono awaraga ana, ihumata mijio inyi; obusana inyi dee oŋida ariri oŋiye inyi.
Hèmijiete inyi ihuo amiottononi, ati, asarata inyi ihuo lella.
Oŋitek 'daŋ, ijiara Lamonye olo nelik tajia ta ahuan ottonyi isiaratta jihatai nelik tajia te ekota 'daŋ. Hatawana Lamonye ikatai 'daŋ.
Ani Paulo, egiorok efonyita huna ta aani hoŋ. Emoi hoŋ ania enne esihottia ni jio awaragaa hoŋ 'daŋ, egieri hoŋ ania.
Ijiara ayiji taji Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi hatawana jihatai 'daŋ.
Ani alia Paulo, efahata Kristo Yesu ta awahan ono Hollum etalahani hohoi, buo ono Kristo Yesu elle eyihi jihonyi…
Ijiara Hollum Monye iko Kristo Yesu, Lamonye hohoi isiarani jihoi ayiji taji iko amehino buo elik taji.
Ninyia alari ni Masedonia, ehum nyia ni iramana iyye jio, arasai Efeso oŋida luŋa ihum iramana aati hulle ittiyenie 'to ettiyenita hunne ipali 'to hunia jio, ijiara luŋa itawoji ettiyenita hunia.

Iramak luŋa isi, hèlaha otuhoni oŋitek hosi 'daŋ jio eyabita eberien iko ekukuboro afureta hohonyiok hunno obeŋi esidita. Iyaŋunie isi olorisa ihiji waati, buo obeŋi oluahi atulo ihaniere egiama Hollum, onno ottu 'to te neruk.
Awak ni iyye oŋida ittiyenio aati abuaran taji onno ottu 'to jio ataji onno olibo 'to iko jio atua onno oyyu 'to buo neruk anna ara 'to hode.
Idehini omuk aati erre hunia, buo ette ittallunyanio jio etafudita asai.
Awahi isi irahan a hettiyanak ifahita huno Mose, buo otimoi erre hunne ikianai isi, duadi bu ojiori isi jio emijak isi.
Emijak jio, oyiji efahita elle igiamarik isi te ekoi onno oyyu 'to.
Omijana jio, obeŋi efahita arai ta abisak; arai isi ta amiosok ifahita, te epalak, ta
ta asomok, ta aliawa hullo ojotorik 'to aliawa ihuo isi, ta apocok waati, ta agesomok, ta asuuti agesomok iko ta atulo 'daŋ elle iha 'to ettiyenio onno obis 'to.
Onyurani ettiyenio ania jio asayyo hunyia itifuotoni ihas hoŋ ittittoyere. Isi Asayyo Ayijok hunno ofuonni 'to jio Hollum akuatani, elle etahabuyo.
Esiarak ni ahumo jio Kristo Yesu, Lamonye hohoi elle isio 'to jihoŋ agolon igiamari. Buo te ehianana honyi nani oloyijio, onyimuniere inyi ani ahegiamani honyi.
Ara nyia ni a hamoroni, a hetarrohojiani fure buo fe ahettigiamani heruhok Kristo. Ati omehino nyia Hollum jihoŋ nyio, abeŋ nyia ni amijak ehanio ni anyio, buo fe neruk nyia obeŋ jihoŋ.
Ati itufutak nyia Kristo Yesu, Lamonye hohoi, jihoŋ belette hia ayiji taji, neruk iko abuaran taji hunno ofuonni 'to jihonyi.
Ara ekiana ana ahode; ijiara luŋa atulo 'daŋ iruk jio, ottu nyia Yesu Kristo ifau dini, italahuniere eyyak. Ani nyia tibuo eyyani alla agalik 'to 'daŋ!

Ati omehino nyia Hollum jihoŋ jio, oŋida bati Kristo Yesu itahutak abolori ono adihan honyi toni, ani eyyani alla agalik 'to 'daŋ; irari etamijani jio hia hullo ofuonni 'to iruk jihonyi, ette inyurana nesu onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ.
Jio Oobu ollo osio 'to 'tulaŋ, elle ittallik 'to iye buo fe obeŋ oleyo, alla ara 'to a Hollum abotie, hatawana olohuo iko akuatan 'tulaŋ 'tulaŋ!
Timoteyo, lonyi hoŋ, esiarak ni efahi ana jihoi, orriama inyi iko eram ninyia ojiori ekianak Hollum teyye. Ijiara ekenita hunia arai erremiti hoi irriomori onno oyyu.
Ogottiere neruk iko egigilo onno obis 'to. Ihari omuk aati ejifatio egigilita hosi, ania ette ittarroho neruk hosi.
Ihiji aati hulia, owon Himenayo iko Alesandro hulle esio ni ihas Sittan ittigemiere isi, oŋida omijani jio, orroho etarrohojio fure Hollum.
Ahosiere 'daŋ, ehum ni iramana iyye jio, oŋida ittana, imojo buo fe isiarak ahumo jio Hollum ta aati 'daŋ.
Omojoi to Hobuok iko elettaha 'daŋ jio, oŋida bati emanya dee, te nelik tajia, ta abaŋi Hollum iko ta amanya onno oyyu to hosiere waati.
Oyyu ania buo fe itamunoyo Hollum Letalahani hohoi,
alla awak 'to oŋida italahuni aati 'daŋ, ette isi imijana nelahode.
Nyio, owon Hollum abotie; owon buo fe atulo abotie elle itimuarak 'to Hollum iko aati. Inyi Kristo Yesu,
linyia isiarak 'to ahuan honyi italahuniere atulo 'daŋ ta fau. Etamijani ania ninya iduoŋ 'to jio noloŋ ninyia osiru 'to jio Hollum itahutaniere jio, awak inyi aati 'daŋ italahunie.
Eram ania onno onyimunierek ani a hettittoni buo fe elefahata ittiyeniere neruk iko nelahode jio Alufajak. Abeŋ ni agesem, ekiana ni nelahode!
Awak ni ijiara aliawa to masik 'daŋ omojoi; aliawa hulla amanyai 'to ihuo awak Hollum, ijiara akafi atajia hosi imojori buo obeŋi ijioriai kuyya itarisai.

Ijiara buo fe aŋoruo iyyafani aboŋojin hunno oyiji buo fe osiruni te eyyafa. Hèlaha buo fe oyyehini oofir hosi te eyyeti hunno obeŋi oyiji. Ijiara buo fe obeŋi iyyafai aboŋojin, kuyya ayyeli, kuyya asihira hunno ogoli te enyiaŋa.
Ati ijiara ihanie ehanita hunno oyiji, hunno osiruni jio aŋoruo hunna abaŋi 'to Hollum.
Ijiara aŋoruo itaniŋie ollokuai buo fe oniŋie, elle ittiyenie isi.
Abeŋ ni awak aŋoruo ittiyenie kuyya buo fe ilohittohi jio aliawa; ijiara oduai 'liŋ 'liŋ.
Nyio, oyyeuni nyia Adam ahosiere, buo Efa ihalu.
Obiaŋara nyia buo fe Adam linyia inyobi; aŋotte nyia enne inyobi, ania, iyyauniere inyi.
Ati italahuno adi aŋotte te esiuna honyi aduri
Ara nekiana ana ahode: alla awak obo atulo arahan elettok olo eluluŋ heruhok, adaya inyi luŋa egiama onno oyyu 'to bebe.
Hèlaha luŋa elettok olo eluluŋ heruhok owon iko obo epali; ijiara luŋa inyi owon iko aŋotte abotie ijiai
Ijiara luŋa inyi obeŋ ara a harumani kuyya a hebibahani waati. Ati ijiara ara alanyalam elle ilik tua. Ijiara luŋa obeŋ otuhok ataji honyi igurusi.
Ijiara luŋa inyi ottoŋotio ahaŋ honyi onno oyyu, buo fe ittiyanak aduri honyi iniŋiere inyi iko ibaŋari inyi te ekotia 'daŋ.
Alla abeŋ atulo oremik ittoŋotio ahaŋ honyi onno oyyu, aŋai 'tadi oremik inyi ittoŋotio eruhok Hollum?
Ijiara luŋa inyi ara atulo alla abolo eruk, ŋadi ottohoro etadara, ette iŋotonia jihonyi epali, ihuo ninyia oŋotonierek jio Sittan.
Ijiara luŋa aati hutteger ikianai onno oyyu tenyi, oŋida bati isi obeŋi ittarrohojie afure honyi buo fe Sittan obeŋ italohu inyi.
Ijiara buo fe aluak iluluŋ heruhok omijani amanya, hèlaha owoni iko aŋadiafa arrihai, hèlaha orrohoji ta abalu kuyya ta agurusi.
Te egigilo onno obis 'to, ijiara ogottierek nelahode ono neruk ninyia italeyehini.
Ijiara do okemi isi, attati iŋatana isi igiamari, alla abeŋi onyurani obo epali jihosi.
Ijiara buo fe aŋoruo hosi
Ijiara aluahani iluluŋ heruhok owon iko aŋotte abotie ijiai
Nyio, aluak hulle igiamai 'to onno oyyu, abaŋi adi aati isi bebe. Oremehini adi buo fe isi ikiana eram ono eruk hosi jio Kristo Yesu, ta agolon tajia.
Eyihi ni ilari jihoi diya kuak, ati egiorok ni jihoi erre hunia jio,
elle elliŋia ni, oŋida bati imijak aŋai amanyai aati hutta haŋ Hollum, anna ara 'to eluluŋ heruhok Hollum lesuoni. Ara eluluŋ heruhok ania ihuo alalai iko etawoji ono nelahode.
Ittallik tulo irisa jio, agalik eruk, ofioro tulo.
Oleyehino nyia Hollum atulo,
buo Oloholio ette itahutana jio, obis nyia inyi
buo fe ajilohien igonyuni inyi.
Ittittoye nyia eram honyi imisihi,
iruhi nyia aati fau 'daŋ jihonyi,
iyarai nyia inyi lidou.
Ikiana Oloholio sar sar jio, jio oŋitek huttesidi, idehini adi omuk aati neruk hosi; ette iniŋio oloholioo hunno ogesemi 'to ette buo fe ijifatio ettiyenita huno aminiaŋa.
Enyabak agesomok ittiyenie, ettiyenita hunia. Isi hulia aati hullo oye atuajin, ihuo onno osuahi isi ta abilata onno onok 'to.
Ittiyenie aati hulia jio, ipal iyamari buo fe iŋiyere omuk aŋiriasin. Ati oyyeu nyia Hollum aŋiriasin hunia jio, oŋida hia, hulle iruhi 'to buo fe omijani nelahode, oŋiyei ta ahumo.
Oyiji erre 'daŋ hunno oyyeu Hollum; hèlaha ihari obo ariŋ, ati ijiara ifuotuni erre 'daŋ ta ahumo.
Nyio, te ekiana Hollum iko ta amojo hoi ifuotu adi Hollum aŋiyo ania.

Elle isio iyye ettittotia hunia jio eruhok, ira adi iyye a hegiamani oloyijio olo Kristo Yesu. Itahutak adi iyye aboloronia hoi jio ettiyenita huno eruk hohoi iko jio ettiyenita ahode hode, hunne ijifatio iyye.
Ati, alamaja jio ekenita hunna arai asai, hunno obeŋi 'to osiruni ikianari. Ihuhuma ahuan imanyari ihuo awak Hollum.
Oyyu eddiddoŋio huan; ati, te ekotia 'daŋ, oyyu eddiddoŋio oloholio agalik nyio, iyaŋuno inyi nesu ono ahana iko ono moi.
Arai ekenita hunia hode, osiru luŋa iruhori isi.
Efuto buo fe egiama bebe, nyio, eyihi jio Hollum Lesuoni, alla ara 'to a hetalahani waati 'daŋ, agalik ti hia hulle iruhi 'to.
Ittittoye jihosi erre hunia iko ettiyenita hunia.
Hèlaha obo jihosi iyasio iyye ta arahan hoi anyarhaluti, ati ijiara iyye ira etamijani jio eruhok te ekenita hoi, ta amanya hoi, ta abuaran taji hoi, te eruk iko ta alibori hoi.
Oŋitek 'daŋ, oduloi ehenio, ettittoyo iko ettiyenio ekenita hutto Buk Hollum jio aati many afanyari ni.
Hèbasak nesorio loholio onno owon 'to jihoi, ninyia ifuotu iyye to ninyia ikianarik ekianak Hollum teyye, buo fe elettaha heruhok iyabani ahas hosi jihoi.
Ihanie erre hunia, otuhok egigilo hoi 'daŋ jihosi oŋida aati 'daŋ igonyuni abobolororo ono amanya hoi a Kristiani.
Ihuma mijio amanya hoi iko ettiyenio hoi. Oduloi ihanio erre hunia, nyio, elle ihanio iyye ihuo nyia, italuahu adi iyye ahuan hoi iko hia, hulle itayirie 'to jihoi.
Hèriŋ lamaruani, ati ikianai jihonyi ta abaŋi ihuo elle ikiana iyye jio monyohoi. Ihanie jio nyarhalu ihuo alla arai isi, ellarak hoi.
Ihanie jio namaruak ihuo arai isi, honyohoi; buo fe ihanio jio anyarhalu ŋoruo ihuo alla arai isi a haniyarak hoi. Ihanie ihuo nyia ta alibori taji 'daŋ.
Abaŋa ehidahi, hunna arasai 'to luŋa ehidahi.

Buo alla awon ehidak ania iko aduri kuyya aduri ŋarriok honyi, kuyya huno lonyirok honyi, ijiara do isi ihanie egemita huno Kristiani ihaŋ hosi, nyio te ekoi ihuania, ihanie adi isi jio esiok hosi kuyya jio hahanyiok iko hohonyiok hosi erre hunyia ihanie isi jihosi. Ariŋ ania onno omuno Hollum bebe.
Ehidak anna ara 'to luŋa ehidak, buo fe aluahani obeŋ jihonyi, iŋohi inyi eyihina honyi 'daŋ jio Hollum buo fe odulo amojo iko attana inyi, arue iko afanni 'daŋ.
Buo nehidak onno otuhok 'to amanya honyi jio emuniti afu ana, awon inyi anna aye duadi bu hesu inyi.
Ittittohi jihosi ettiyenita hunia, oŋida obo atulo obeŋ orumak obo epali jihosi.
Buo alla abeŋ obo omijio aati haŋ hosi, agalik ti aati hutta haŋ honyi, itahutak jio abeŋ eruk jihonyi. Orroho adi jihonyi agalik jio lia ollo obeŋ 'to iruk.
Hèfonihina obo ehidak jio hua hunne igioronie 'to, arari fe anna allaŋi aŋasi honyi atomuana ille; buo fe nyia owon ta haŋ enyiahi abotie

buo fe omijani jio oyiji ehanita honyi. Ijiara buo fe ara aŋotte enne itaboloru aduri honyi onno oyyu, enne ifuotutta atamonok ihaŋ honyi, enne igiama ta afiahaji jio Kristiani hullomuk, anna ara a haluahani waati hullo owoni 'to iko ettigemita, buo fe iŋohi atua honyi 'daŋ igiamari erre ayijok.
Hègioronia ehidahi hunna harai 'to anyarhalu; nyio, alla adioto itajia hosi iwanari ta haŋ, ette isi ifuatan addi jio Kristo,
ette iyyauna ta abiaŋan ijifatio eruk hosi inyi.
Ittiyenuni isi atuhonia oŋitek hosi te ellutta ihaŋitek waati asai asai; agalik ti amuaŋa iko ajiŋatta jio erre waati, buo fe ikianai erre hunno obeŋi 'to osiruni jihosi ikianari.

Te egigilo hoŋ, ijiara ehidahi hunna harai 'to anyarhalu owoni ta haŋ; ijiara isiuni aduri, buo fe ottoŋotie ahaŋitek hosi onno oyyu, oŋida amiorok hohoi obeŋi orumani obo ekoi ikianari onno orroho to hohoi.
Nyio, ayitoroi omuk ehidahi jio Sittan.
Buo alla awoni ehidahi ihaŋ obo ono Kristiani, ijiara inyi ottoŋotio isi onno oyyu. Hèlaha luŋa inyi ifurok eram hosi jio eluluŋ heruhok, iluahiere ehidahi hunno obeŋ tulo hunia oluahio.
Ijiara luŋa ihumi ibaŋi bebe elettaha hulle iyyahatie 'to eluluŋ heruhok onno oyyu, agalik ti hia, hullo opuloi 'to bebe ettittoyo iko ettiyenio.
Ojio Abuk Hollum jio, “Hèttuhoto etuk 'tamot elle igisa inyi emma” buo fe ojio jio, “Osiru jio egiamani ifuotuniere edumiti honyi.”
Hetayirio etisiahita hunne itisiahinierek elettok heruhok, arari fe alla awoni asuuti arrihai kuyya arriai.
Ihosiere waati 'daŋ, iriŋa hia 'daŋ hulle iyyauni 'to oŋida bati hullomuk abaŋi.
Ihosiere Hollum iko Kristo Yesu buo Ajilohien aliborok, ehum ni iramana iyye jio, oniŋie ettittotia hunia. Jio erre 'daŋ hunne ihanio iyye, hèŋot eram obo atulo ta arrohoji tua kuyya te esiyo.
Hèrruhita eyabana has jio aati ihananiere isi a hegiamak Lamonye. Hèjiŋak jio eyyata waati hullomuk, oduloi alibori.
Hèmata aari ijiai, ati amatuttai obo afino kai oŋida oluak nohe hoi iko eŋuati hunnomuk hunne ittigemio 'to iyye gagaga.
Asalanie eyyata omuk aati 'tel 'tel, buo fe oŋoti eram hosi; buo ofuonni igonyuna eyyata huno hullomuk ihalu.
Ihuo nyia buo fe, asalanie ehanita ayijok 'tel 'tel, duadi hua hunno obeŋi 'to asalanie, ofuonni adi isalanio 'tel 'tel.
Ijiara luŋa hia hulla arai 'to apiti omijani jio, osiru abaŋi jio hiamonyie hosi, oŋida obo atulo obeŋ ittarrohojo afure Hollum iko ettiyenio hohoi.

Ijiara apiti waati hulla arai 'to a Kristiani, obeŋi iyasie hiamonyie hosi, nyio, arai buo fe isi a heruhok. Ati, ijiara tibuo isi ihumi igiama buo fe itabuori atajia jihosi; nyio, arai buo fe hiamonyie hosi hullo orumani 'to ayiji jio egiama ania, a heruhok.
Ittiyenie luŋa buo fe ittittoyo erre hunia.
Lia, elle ittittoyo 'to obo ariŋ onno olufa 'to jio erre hunia, buo fe omesio ekenita huno Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi iko ettiyenita hunne emojori,
ifut etadara jihonyi buo otimo obo ariŋ. Omuyak ahou honyi buo fe ottifia olorisa iko aŋalafa te eram ikenita ijiai. Iyaŋuno eram ania ahaini, ebibuanya, amoro, egigilo onno orroho,
iko aduloro ŋalafa ihiji waati hullo omuyahi hossi, hulla abeŋ nelahode jihosi. Igigiloi isi jio, iyaŋuno ekoi enne emojori esamiti.
Hode iyaŋuno ekoi enne emojori esamiti jihohoi, elle etaremehi atajia jio erre hunno owoni 'to jihohoi.
Anyio riŋ nyia enne eyaŋuno ifau dini? Obeŋ riŋ! Anyio riŋ 'tadi enne eremik iyaru addi jio afau ana? Obeŋ riŋ!
Tania, elle ewon iko aŋiyo buo aboŋojin, ijiara hunia oremehini jihohoi.
Ati hia, hulla awahi 'to asaman, imohi isi jio awoi huno ekemiti iko elohiti gele gele, ette ewahiti asai hunno orrohoji 'to irirehuna isi, ette ipihoro irrohoji, ette itamuhina.
Iyaŋuno amuno gurusi awoi iyyata 'daŋ gele gele. Awahi nyia omuk bebe agurusi, ania, idehinierek isi neruk hosi, ette irumana amijan onno orroho bebe itajia hosi.
Buo jihoi, atulo Hollum, hènyiha jio erre hunia. Ottifiai bebe abisan, abaŋi Hollum, neruk, abuaran taji, adihan iko anyalami.
Okiama bebe arracita ono neruk ania, oŋida ifuotu esiorio ono nesu 'tulaŋ. Nyio, inyi ania amanya ninyia iloŋuniere Hollum iyye to ninyia ipuloniere iyye eruk hoi ihosiere waati arriai.
Ihosiere Hollum, elle isiarak 'to nesu jio erre 'daŋ, iko ihosiere Kristo linyia opulok 'to neruk honyi sar sar jio Pontio Pilato, ehum ni iramana iyye jio,
oniŋie luŋa buo fe igottiere onno oyyu ekenita 'daŋ hunne iramani jihoi many jio Oloŋ onno oleyeri Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi.
Italeyehi adi Hollum oloŋ ania alla attuba asaa nyia; Hollum oloyijo, Elettok alla agalik 'to 'daŋ, Oobu olo obuok.

Inyi hama elle ittallik 'to iye; amanya inyi jio afaŋan enne ittallik tulo ihutonia diya. Hollum olo hobeŋ tulo igonyu, ittallik adi buo fe tulo igonyuna inyi. Ijiara olohuo iko aduaran onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ hatawana jihonyi! Hétara ihuo nyia.
Asara asamak afau ana, hèlaha itadarai kuyya iyihini jio esamiti hunno oremehini ituho. Ati ijiara iyihini jio Hollum, elle isiarak 'to jihohoi te emorot erre ayijok hunne elobiari.
Ihuma iramana isi ijiara ihanie onno oyyu, ijiara ihanie ehanita ayijok arriai, ijiara imoroti buo fe ohori asaŋ hosi iko aati hullomuk.
Te ekoi ania, ihuhumani adi isi esamiti hunno ofuonni 'to irahan etawoji onno ogol jio amanya hosi ono moi, ania ette ifuanna ifuotuna nesu ahode hode.
Timoteyo, ihuma igottiere onno oyyu ariŋ enne isiarani jihoi! Alamaja jio ekiana enne ittarrohojio 'to afure Hollum, iko jio olorisa onno orroho 'to onno ojiori omuk aati jio, “Olofioro.”
Idehini omuk aati neruk hosi te etayirio hosi ekiana ania.
Ijiara ayiji taji Hollum hatawana jihatai 'daŋ.
Ani alia Paulo, elefahata Kristo Yesu ta awahan ono Hollum. Ifahuni nyia ani ittittoyere eram ono nesu ninyia ocorok Hollum, te enoso iko Kristo Yesu.
Esio ni ahumo jio Hollum elle egiama ni jihonyi te egigilo onno olibo ihuo ninyia igiamarik hohonyiok hoŋ jihonyi. Esiarak ni ahumo jio Hollum ta aduloro hoŋ imojo teyye.
Alla agilu ni neyyoo hoi, ette atua hoŋ iwahan bebe igonyuna iyye jio, oŋida bati amuno ifut jihoŋ.
Agilutta buo fe ni elahode ono neruk hoi; neruk ninyia owon 'to jio hahanyihoi Lois iko jio honyohoi Yunis. Amijak ni jio, owon buo fe neruk ania jihoi.
Tania, eramak luŋa ni iyye jio, ijiara esiorio ninyia ifuotu iyye jio Hollum odulo awulori ihuo eema, to ninyia eyabaniere ni ahas hoŋ jihoi.
Nyio, obeŋ Oloholio enne isiarak Hollum jihohoi iyaŋuno abaŋi, inyiak tibuo oloholio ania itufutana jihohoi nagolon, abuaran taji iko ehum ittoŋotio huan onno oyyu.

Hèloriri ikianari eram ono Lamonye hohoi jio aati. Hèloriri buo fe toni, elle efita 'to ibabus te eram Kristo. Nyio; ta agolon enne isiarak Hollum jihoi, ifuotu buo fe ettigemita te eram ono Asayyo Ayijok.

Ta awahan iko ta ayiji taji honyi, italahu nyia inyi hohoi ette iloŋuna hohoi irari a hulonyi, obiaŋara te ehanita hohoi. Many hobeŋi oyyeuni afau iko edou, isiarak nyia inyi jihohoi ayiji taji ania to Kristo Yesu.
Ati ihuania, italeyehini inyi jihohoi ta attuna ono etalahani hohoi Kristo Yesu. Itapuak inyi agolon ono naye buo ette iyaŋuno nesu onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ ta Asayyo Ayijok.
Eram ania atibuo enne ittigemierek ani ihuania. Ati, abeŋ ni eloriri nyio, amijak ni eyyihi ni jio ŋai; amijak buo fe ni luŋa jio, oremik inyi ittoŋotio onno oyyu erre hunyia ihanak inyi ihas hoŋ.
Ogottiere eram ahode hode ninyia ettiyanak ni iyye; ijiara ara etahuti enne ijifatio iyye. Ogolik jio neruk iko abuaran taji hunna arai 'to a hunohoi te enoso iko Kristo Yesu.
Ta agolon ono Loholio Olibo, alla amanya 'to jihohoi, ogottiere erre ayijok hunyia ihanani ihas hoi.
Imijak iyye jio, ihari nani aati 'daŋ hutto ŋati Asia; isi arabotie iko Figelos buo Hermojins.
Ijiara Lamonye omehino jio aati hutta haŋ Onesiforo nyio, itamuno nyia inyi ataji hoŋ enyiahita arriai. Obeŋ nyia inyi iloriri awanan hoŋ ibabus;
buo ninyia afany inyi Roma, ette inyi ittifia nani imasik 'daŋ many orumaniere nani.
Ijiara Lamonye omehino jihonyi jio Noloŋ nyia! Imijak buo fe iyye bebe erre hunyia ihan inyi jihoŋ to Efeso.
Buo jihoi lonyi hoŋ, ijiara ayiji taji anna ara 'to ahonohoi te enoso iko Kristo Yesu, itagol iyye.
Iduhu ettiyenita hunyia itayiru iyye ettittoyo ni ihosiere waati arriai, isiarak isi jio aati ayijok, hullo oremehini buo fe ittittoyo isi jio aati hullomuk.
Ifuotu buo fe luŋa ettigemita ihuo oloyijio oseŋer Kristo Yesu.
Awak oloseŋer elle igiama 'to itamuno ajafit honyi, obeŋ inyi itajiŋak ahuan honyi jio erre waati hullo obeŋi 'to arai oseŋer.
Obeŋ olofeja alla arracari 'to iko aati oremik ifuotuna esiorio alla abeŋ inyi oniŋio efahita huno aŋettio.
Ijiara buo fe luŋa aromoni ollo ofuto 'to egiama itter aŋiyo aamat hunno odeŋu inyi.
Ihuma luŋa igigilo te eram enne ekiana ni ania; nyio, oluak adi iyye Lamonye imijaniere isi 'daŋ.
Igigiloi te eram Yesu Kristo linyia itubuhuni toye, linyia odietuno to woyo Dafide, ihuo ojiori Asayyo Ayijok hunne ettittoyo ni.
Ittigemie buo fe ifiti nani ta aririk ihuo olohoho, te nettittoyo hoŋ Asayyo Ayijok. Ati, ittallihi ifit eram Hollum ta aririk.
Tania, adik ni ettigemita 'daŋ te eram onyimot Hollum, oŋida bati isi orumani etalahuno onno ottu 'to tottolo Kristo Yesu, enne iyaŋuno 'to nakuatan onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ.
Arai ekenita huna hode:
“Elle eye nyia ikonyi,
esu adi buo fe ikonyi;
elohittok adi buo fe ikonyi.
Elle erisa inyi,
orisa adi buo fe inyi hohoi.
Elle ebeŋ eyyu,
odulo inyi ayiji,
nyio, ittallik inyi irisa ŋai inyi.”
Hèlaha obo jio aati hoi oguoro erre hunne eramak ni huna jihoi. Ihosiere Hollum asara isi, hèlaha itarisai te eram ikenita hunno obeŋi 'to iyaŋunie obo ayiji, ati iyaŋunie isi arrohoji jio etayirak.
Ihuma luŋa italeyehina ahuan hoi to hosiere Hollum ihuo egiamani ollo omunoi, ollo obeŋ 'to iloriri te negiama honyi, elle ittiyenio 'to onno oyyu, eram Hollum anna ara 'to hode.
Idehi olorisa onno obeŋ 'to iyaŋuno abaŋi Hollum; nyio, italama inyi aati bebe jio Hollum.
Ara olorisa ania ihuo acagura onno oŋiyo 'to ahuan tulo. Himeneyo iko Fileto, isi hulia aati arrihai hulle ittiyenie 'to erre ihuo hunia.
Idehini isi nekoi ono nelahode, buo ojiori jio, etuk nyia ebuhuna. Ittarroho eram hosi ania eruk ono omuk aati.

Ati osio etawoji ninyia oyyehi Hollum. Igioroni erre huna ihide honyi: “Omijak Lamonye hia, hulla arai 'to a hulonyi; tania, ijiara hia 'daŋ, hullo ojiori 'to jio era isi a hulo Lamonye, idehini luŋa ehanita hunno orrohoji 'to.”

Itua haji anna alat 'to, owoni awoi seniyat iko arranyi arriai. Ihuhumuni omuk to 'yel iko to bilata aboŋ, buo omuk ohololuni to hitoi, buo omuk oyyeuni to hifuoto. Igiamarik omuk to oŋitek eyomita, buo omuk igiamarik erre huttoloŋi.

Ara adi buo fe inyi ihuo nyia jio eruhok. Hia, hullo obeŋi 'to itiboti ahuattek hosi, igiamarik adi isi te ekoi enne ilaman 'to bebe; nyio, igialani isi buo fe isi oyiji a huno Lamonye. Ihuhumanie isi luŋa egemita hirre 'daŋ hunno oyiji 'to.
Tania, idehi ewahiti nyarhalu; ottifotie abisan, neruk, abuaran taji iko elik taji. Arabotie iko hia hullo omojoi jio Lamonye ta alibori tajia, omojoti aluahio jio Lamonye.
Ati, obusak olorisa enne ipal 'to; imijak iyye jio, iyaŋutta inyi aŋalafa.
Hèlaha luŋa apit olo Lamonye, ottifia aŋalafa. Anyalama luŋa jio aati 'daŋ; araha a hettiyanani ollo oyyu 'to, ollo owon 'to iko adihan.
Itabisie aati hullo osuarik 'to iyye ta abijon tua, kuyya hara héyaŋuno Hollum jihosi erue, ette imijana nelahode.
Attati tibuo isi irue, ette irisuna addi jio elohit Sittan, linyia inefu 'to isi ihaniere ewahiti honyi.
Omijana jio, olo adi amanya igolon jio oŋitek esidita.
Arai adi aati a haluok, aŋarujok, a hetadarak, a hagolok hossi, a hamorok waati, a hamiosok hesiok hosi. Ittallihi adi isi jiaran humo, buo fe ihari Hollum.
Obeŋ adi abuaran taji iko amehino jihosi, arai adi isi a hamuaŋak, a hamunok 'lumo, aŋerejak, eharak yiji.
Arai adi isi a hetinyiaŋak waati, awaati hulla amanyai arrusahania, hullo ottoho etadara. Omunoi adi isi ewahiti huattek, buo obiaŋara Hollum.
Itihanie adi isi ahuattek ihuo amojok Hollum, buo ihari agolon honyi. Hènyiha jio aati ihuo hulia.
Ojiŋattai omuk hulosi asik waati imumuniere aŋoruo hunno obeŋi ossi, hunno ottidani ariri huno eyyata iko awoi iwahiti huattek hosi.
Aŋoruo hunno odulori 'to 'tifia ekoi iyiyenuniere obo ariŋ aŋejuk, ati ittallihi isi imijana nelahode.
Ihuo ninyia osuarik Yanne iko Yambere, Mose, ihuo nyia buo fe osuarik aati hulia nelahode. Isi hulia aati hullo omuyahi ossi, hullo obeŋ neruk hosi ara hode.
Ati, obeŋi adi isi iduoŋi obo amaji, nyio, igonyuni adi aati 'daŋ abiaŋan hossi jihosi. Ahuattek hirre hunia hunyia iduoŋi 'to jio Yanne iko Yambere.
Ati, ihum iyye ijifatio ettiyenita hoŋ, amanya hoŋ, erre hunna awak ni jio amanya ana, neruk hoŋ, nabijon taji hoŋ, abuaran taji hoŋ, adihan hoŋ;

aliwari waati nani iko ettigemita hoŋ. Imijak buo fe iyye erre 'daŋ hunyia iduoŋi 'to jihoŋ iborejin gala Antiok, Ikoniom, iko Listra. Arumak nyia ni ettigemita hunno orrohoji 'to bebe, ati italuahu Lamonye nani jihosi 'daŋ.
Ittigemie adi atulo 'daŋ alla awak 'to imanya ta abaŋi Hollum, te enoso honyi iko Kristo Yesu.
Ati orrorrohojarai adi arrohojak hulle itihanie 'to ahuattek. Inyobie adi isi aati, buo fe aati hullomuk inyobie isi.
Buo jihoi, oduloi jio nelahode ninyia ittiyanani jihoi enne ihum iyye iruk. Imijak iyye baŋai ettiyanak hoi,
buo fe many ninyia héra iyye ahito, imijak nyia iyye Egierita hutto Buk Hollum, hunno oremehini 'to isiarana jihoi ofioro hunne iyaŋunie 'to etalahuno te neruk jio Kristo Yesu.
Ofuonni egierita 'daŋ hutto Buk Hollum jio Hollum, buo fe oyiji ittiyeniere nelahode, iriŋiere epalak, itabisaniere epalita iko ittiyeniere amanya onno obis 'to;
jio oŋida atulo elle igiama 'to jio Hollum ottuba iko erre 'daŋ hunna awahi ihaniere egemita 'daŋ hunno oyiji 'to.
Ihosiere Hollum iko Kristo Yesu, hullo ofuonni 'to iŋocio neram hesuok iko ayaak, buo fe ta attuna Kristo ilohittok a hobu, ehum ni ikiana jihoi jio,

ittiyenie eram Hollum. Oduloi ettittoyo inyi (duadi bu obis asaa kuyya obeŋ), itamijananiere aati epalita hosi buo fe iriŋiere isi jio eyyata hosi. Itagolo buo fe atajia hosi buo ittiyenio ta abijon tua.

Ofuonni adi oŋitek hunne iharik aati etayirio ettiyenita hunno obisi 'to. Ijifatie adi isi erre hunna awahi isi buo fe ofuoi iddudduhuno ettiyanak arriai hullo ofuonni 'to iramani jihosi erre hunna awahi ayyaha hosi etayirio.
Oyitoni adi isi oruoŋite jio nelahode, ette sihina ayyaha hosi 'daŋ jio eyabita eberien.
Ati, ihuma ittoŋ ahuan; odiha ettigemio, ihanie egiama ono ettittoni Sayyo Ayijok, otuhok luŋa 'daŋ egemita hoi ihuo apit Hollum.
Alla ara jihoŋ, alum luŋa asaa onno ottohorik ani irari ihuo ehumi; attuba luŋa jihoŋ idiahari amanya afau ana.
Jio arracita ania, akem ni bebe; aŋer ni many isidi, agottiere ni neruk ania

Te etabisanio hoŋ to hosiere Hollum, esiorio ono agalihina enne itila nani ihuania. Olo adi Lamonye, aŋotoni hiram ollo obosi 'to, isiarana esiorio ania jihoŋ jio Oloŋ nyia; obiaŋara jihoŋ hama, ati, jio hia 'daŋ hulle itilai 'to aleyehino honyi.
Okiama luŋa ittuniere jihoŋ kokuak.
Omuno Demas bebe erre afau many idehi nani, ette leten Tesalonika. Alo Krisens, Galasia, buo Tito olo Dalmasia.
Luka hama elle ewon 'to ikoŋ. Ottifieu Marko, ifuanna ikonyi; nyio, oremik inyi nani iluak te egiama.
Efak ni Tikikos ibore gala Efeso.
Elle ittu iyye, asarunie iko akout hoŋ ninyia ediehuno ni Trowas jio Karpos; iyaŋunie buo fe iko abuhi, agalik ati hunne ihuhumi to muhunyo.
Ihuma mijio inyi bebe; nyio, iha nyia inyi bebe bebe asayyo hunyia ettittoyo hohoi.
Tetteri hoŋ iwotiari ilokikoi, obeŋ nyia tulo teger hoŋ; atturohini nyia isi nani 'daŋ. Hèlaha Hollum ihianak epalita hunia jihosi.
Ati, owon nyia Lamonye ikoŋ, ette isiarana jihoŋ agolon iremehiniere ittittoyere asayyo honyi 'daŋ oŋida Alufajak 'daŋ itayiruni. Ania, italuahunierek nani to ye.
Italuahu adi Lamonye nani jio arrohojita 'daŋ, ette iyaru nani onno oyyu jio Olobie honyi ettedou. Hatawana nakuatan jihonyi 'tulaŋ mak!
Arasa nyia Erastos Korinto, buo ni ediehuno Trofimos Miletos nyio, oŋuai nyia inyi.
Okiama luŋa ittuniere jihoŋ hobeŋi ayafajin hacoro afanyi.
Ifuanyai bo Yubulu, Pudens, Lino iko Klaudio; itifonyai buo fe Kristiani hullomuk 'daŋ.
Ijiara Lamonye hatawana jio oloholio hoi.
Hatawana ayiji taji Hollum jihatai 'daŋ.
Ani alia Paulo, egiamani Hollum buo fe ara elefahata Yesu Kristo.
Onyimuni nyia nani buo fe ifahuni iluahiere neruk ono lonyimot Hollum buo fe itahutaniere jihosi nelahode enne ittiyenio neruk hohoi;
anna ara 'to te eyihina jio nesu onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ, ninyia acorok Hollum many berien. Hollum, ollo obeŋ 'to ogesem.
Ania, buo ninyia attu oloŋ anna awak inyi, ette inyi italeyehina asayyo hunia jihoŋ. Isiori nyia isi jihoŋ, buo ni ette ittittoyo isi te elohittok ono Hollum Etalahani hohoi.
Te neruk onno owon 'to jihohoi, egiorok ni awaraga ana jihoi Tito, ira iyye ihuo lonyi hoŋ ahode.
Ijiara Hollum Monye iko Kristo Yesu etalahani hohoi, isiori jihoi ayiji taji iko nelik taji.
Edehi nyia ni iyye Krit jio, oŋida iyye ihuhumak erre hunyia hobeŋi 'to otuhonie, buo fe oŋida inyimu elettaha hulo eluluŋi heruhok jio aborejin gala 'daŋ ihuo eramak nyia ni iyye jio:
ijiara luŋa elettok obeŋ owon iko epali, hèlaha iriaha

Ara elettok iluluŋ heruhok a hattoŋoni igiama Hollum. Hèlaha luŋa inyi owon iko obo epali. Hèlaha inyi itadara kuyya orroho ta ajore, kuyya aharumani, kuyya a hamunoni ŋalafa kuyya buo fe a hamunoni robiyaa.
Ijiara luŋa ifuotutta aati ihaŋ honyi, buo fe ara oloyijio. Ijiara luŋa inyi ihum igigilo onno oyyu, amanya onno obis, amanya onno olibo buo fe ihum ittoŋotio ahuan.

Ijiara luŋa inyi ogottiere asayyo hunna arai 'to hode ihuo ittiyanani nyia jihonyi; oŋida bati inyi oremik iluak aati hullomuk te ettiyenita hunno obisi 'to, buo fe itahutak epali hia hulle ihari 'to ettiyenita hunia.
Nyio, oluaji aati hullo obeŋi abaŋi elettaha; agalik ti aati hunyia ijifatie 'to emojiti Yudei. Itafittaŋie isi aati te ekikiana asai asai.
Ijiara luŋa itaduahini isi nyio, ittarrohoji isi ahaŋitek 'daŋ te ettiyenio erre hunno obeŋi 'to osiruni jihosi ittiyeniere. Ittiyenie isi erre hunia irumaniere arobiyaa.

Obo atulo Krit nyia ikilu ta ahuan honyi jio, “Arai aati Krit toloŋi agesomok, aciaŋi hunna afarai 'to buo fe aŋarujok hulle iboyoji.” Tania, iŋerejanie onno orroho jihosi, oŋida bati isi obisi jio neruk hosi,
ette biaŋan inyiak golihina jio eyabita Yudei iko efahita hunno ofuonni 'to jio aati hulle ihari 'to nelahode.
Olibori erre 'daŋ jio aati hullo olibori atajia; buo obo ariŋ obeŋ olibo jio aati hulle iboti tajia iko jio hullo obeŋi 'to owoni iko neruk; nyio, arrohoji ossi hosi buo fe atuajin hosi oye.
Ojiori isi jio emijak isi Hollum, buo ehanita hosi itahutani jio otimoi isi inyi. Orrohoji isi bebe; omesie isi Hollum, buo fe obeŋi osiruni ihaniere obo ariŋ onno oyyu.
Buo jihoi Tito, ittiyenie luŋa erre hunno obisi 'to.
Isiŋa lamaruak; ijiara ossi hosi afaŋi, ijiara egigilita hosi obisi; ijiara buo fe isi ihumi ittoŋotio ahuattek hosi. Hèlaha luŋa isi itapuahi neruk hosi iko abuaran tajia hosi buo nadihan hosi.

Ihuo nyia buo fe, isiŋa namaruak; ijiara amanyai aŋoruo hunne isiori 'to amanya hosi jio Hollum. Hèlaha arai a hetarrohojak fureta waati kuyya a harumak balu. Ijiara luŋa isi ittiyenie erre hunno oyiji 'to,
oŋida isi ittiyenie aŋoruo anyarhalu itabuoriere atajia jio habiok hosi iko jio aduri hosi.

Ijiara buo fe isi ottoŋotie ahuattek hosi onno oyyu, ijiara anyalami, ijiara arai aŋoruo ayijok, hunno oniŋie 'to habiok hosi; nyio, ŋadi obo atulo ikiana onno orroho te eram sayyo hunno ofuonni 'to jio Hollum.
Ihuo nyia buo fe, ihuma buo fe ittittohina nyarhalu hulla arai 'to aliawa, ijiara ottoŋotie ahuattek hosi onno oyyu.
Oduloi irahan a hetamijani jio aati hullomuk. Ittiyenie luŋa ta ataji onno olibo, hèbala elle ittiyenio iyye.
Ittiyenie te ekenita hunno obisi 'to, hunno obeŋ tulo oremik itipal. Anyahini adi ariri amiorok hoi alla abeŋi isi orumani obo epali ikianari to hohoi.
Ijiara luŋa apiti itamunoye elettaha hosi ta aniŋio hirre 'daŋ hunne iramani jihosi. Hèlaha isi itarraŋai iko elettaha hosi,
kuyya ohoholuni erre hosi. Ati, ijiara luŋa isi itahutani abisan iko ayiji hosi. Oŋida bati aati 'daŋ itahabuye ettiyenio ono Hollum etalahani hohoi te erre 'daŋ hunne ihanie isi.
Nyio, italeyehi Hollum ayiji taji honyi italahuniere aati 'daŋ.
Ettiyenio hohoi ayiji taji ania, ibusaniere emanyiti hunno orrohoji 'to iko ewahiti huno afau ana. Awak inyi hohoi emanya jio afau ana onno oyyu, obeŋ enyobio,
buo etilari, te eyihina Noloŋ eyijo, anna alari akuatan ono Hollum hohoi alla agalik 'to iko ono Yesu Kristo etalahani
Isiarak nyia inyi ahuan honyi to hohoi, italahuniere hohoi jio eyyata 'daŋ jio, oŋida era a waati honyi aliborok, hulla awahi 'to ehanio erre hunno obisi 'to.
Ittiyenie erre hunia; igiamari elohittok ottonohoi itagoliere atajia iko iriŋiere etayirak hoi. Hèlaha obo jihosi iyasio iyye.
Inyiaha iramana aati hatai, ijiara abaŋi elettaha iko gala; ijiara oniŋie isi buo fe ihuhumi ahuattek ihaniere onno oyyu oŋitek 'daŋ.
Iramak isi, hèlaha ittarrohojie afure obo atulo, hèlaha omunoi aŋalafa, ijiara anyalami; ijiara odulori emorot jio aati 'daŋ.

Berien, obeŋi nyia ossi jihohoi; era nyia a hamiosok, a hepalak, apiti jio awoi iwahiti iko emuniti 'daŋ. Etuhok nyia amanya hohoi 'daŋ jio ajujon tajia iko jio ahaini. Oliwarik nyia aati 'daŋ hohoi, buo fe eliwari ahuattek hohoi.
Buo ninyia italeyehini ayiji iko abuaran taji ono Hollum etalahani hohoi,

ette inyi italahuna hohoi; obiaŋara nyia jio to omuk erre ayijok hunne ehan hohoi. Ati, italahu inyi hohoi ta amehino honyi, ta agolon ono Loholio Olibo elle esiorio 'to jihohoi esiuno iko nesu aŋejuk te etaliborio honyi hohoi.
Itufutak nyia Hollum jihohoi Loholio Olibo to Yesu Kristo etalahani hohoi jio,
ta ayiji taji honyi, oŋida bati era ahabisak to hosiere Hollum, ette ifuanna ifuotuna nesu onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ, enne eyihi.
Ara eram ania luŋa hode.
Awak ni oŋida iyye ihum iduloro ekiana erre hunia jio, oŋida bati hulle iruhi 'to jio Hollum igigiloi ituhoniere oŋitek hosi 'daŋ ihaniere erre ayijok, hunno oŋidari buo fe oluahie aati 'daŋ.
Ati, idehina etarisa obojiai, idehina ehenio fureta hohonyiok; idehina ebubuanya iko aŋalafa te eram ono Efahita. Erre asai hunia, obeŋ obo ayiji jihosi.
Alla arroho 'tuŋ, isiarak esariti arrihai jio hia hulle iyaŋunie 'to ebubuanya. Tania, hènyiak ihutonia jihosi.
Omijak jio, omuyahi ossi aati hulia, buo fe eyyata hosi itahutani jio ipali isi.
Orumak luŋa obo ekoi iluahiere Sena, aŋotoni hiram, iko Apolo oŋida isi itterie amomoriya hosi. Hèlaha luŋa obo ariŋ aŋaramahi jihosi.
Ijiara luŋa aati hohoi ittiyenuni ituhoniere oŋitek hosi ihaniere erre ayijok, iluahiere ewahiti hunna arai 'to hode. Hèlaha amanyai asai asai.
Itifonyai aati 'daŋ hullo owon 'to dini. Itifonyak eruhok ihuo hohoi.
Hatawana ayiji taji Hollum jihatai 'daŋ.
Ani alia Paulo, elle efita 'to ibabus te eram Kristo Yesu. Ani alia iko illa hohoi Timoteyo.
Egiorok hohoi awaraga ana jio illa hohoi Felimon egiamani ihuo hohoi
iko jio eluluŋ heruhok onno ottubatio 'to ihaŋ hoi, buo fe jio haniye hohoi Appiya iko Arkipos ollo odik 'to egiama bebe ihuo hohoi.
Ijiara Hollum Monye hohoi iko Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hohoi isiarani jihatai ayiji tajia iko elik tajia.
Esiorio ni ahumo jio Hollum buo fe agilutta iyye, Felimon, alla amojo ni,
nyio, etaniŋu ni abuaran taji hoi aati Hollum 'daŋ iko eruk hoi jio Yesu, Lamonye.
Amojo buo fe ni jio, ijiara etoŋo hohoi arabotie ikoye a heruhok iyaŋuno jihohoi amijana ono ayiji 'daŋ te enoso iko Kristo.
Nyio, illaŋ, iyaŋuno abuaran taji hoi jihoŋ amuno onno obolo iko elik tua! Itamuno iyye aati Hollum 'daŋ.
Te eram ania, aremik duo ni iŋerejanio iyye ihuo lella to Kristo, iramaniere iyye jio, ihanie ihuo ojiori.
Ati ta abuaran taji hoŋ iyye, attana ni iyye 'tana. Ani Paulo, elle ifahu Kristo, buo fe ihuania efita te eram honyi
Ania, attana ni iyye te eram Onesimo, lonyi hoŋ to Kristo. Nyio, anna awanari ni ihuania ibabus, ara ni jihonyi a monye.
Berien ibeŋ nyia iyye igonyu obo ayiji jihonyi
Ihuania, enyiaha ni inyi ajihoi; obuor ataji hoŋ inyi bebe.
Awak duo ni luŋa inyi arasa jihoŋ dini, iluahiere ani imaji hoi buo ni hefita ibabus te eram sayyo ayijok.
Ati abeŋ ni awak irosonia iyye iluahiere ani. Awak ni ijiara iyye ihan ihuo iwak iyye. Tania, ettallik ni ihanio obo ariŋ arari fe elle iruk iyye.
Ara hara inyi ninyia obiaŋari Onesimo awanari jihoi obo kai jio, oŋida bati inyi ottu duloro ikoye.

Ihuania, abeŋ inyi ara apit ijiai, ati agalik inyi apit; ara inyi ella elle emuno bebe to Kristo. Oyyu inyi bebe ta taji hoŋ, ati agalik adi ayiji honyi jihoi bebe; nyio, ara inyi apit hoi buo fe ella hoi to Lamonye.
Tania, elle imijak iyye jio ira iyye ahegiamani ihuo ani, inyiaha ifuotuna inyi ihuo iremik iyye ifuotuna ani.
Elle ihan nyia inyi obo epali jihoi kuyya ohuru obo ariŋ jihoi, igiorok ahoros honyi ahonoŋ.
Ani Paulo, egiorok eram ana ta aani hoŋ: aduma adi ni iyye. (Abeŋ ni awak itagiluna iyye jio, ara amanya hoi a Kristiani toni.)
Aafe, illaŋ, ihana ariŋ ania jihoŋ te eram Lamonye. Itamuno atua hoŋ ihuo ella to Kristo!
Enne egiorori ni ana, amijak ni luŋa jio, ihan adi iyye ariŋ anna awak ni. Amijak ni luŋa jio ihan adi iyye erre allaŋari hunna awak ni.
Oŋida buo fe ihuhumak jihoŋ obo amaji eyirit nyio, eyihi ni jio, te emojiti hatai 'daŋ aŋatani adi ani icohuniere jihatai.
Itifonyai buo fe egiamak ihuo nani; isi bo Marko iko Aristakos, buo Demas iko Luka.
Ijiara ayiji taji ono Yesu Kristo, Lamonye hatawana jihatai 'daŋ.
Berien, ikianatio nyia Hollum jio hohonyiok hohoi te etuhe hekianak honyi, enyiahita arriai iko te ekotia arriai.
Ati jio oŋitek huttehalu huna, ikiana inyi jihohoi tottolo Lonyi honyi. Tenyi, oyyeu nyia Hollum edou iko afau. Onyimu nyia Hollum inyi jio, oŋida erre daŋ ofuoi irahan a hunonyi.

Itahutak tibuo inyi luŋa akuatan Hollum, buo fe orrijio hode iko Hollum. Ogottiere inyi erre daŋ huttedou iko hutta fau te ekiana honyi onno odua 'to. Ninyia italibo inyi aati 'daŋ jio eyyata, itoŋo inyi iŋati iŋet Hollum Laduarani, alla Agalik 'to 'daŋ.
Agalik aduaran Lonyi ono ajilohien, buo fe arahan honyi Olonyi Hollum, agalik bebe elohittok ono ajilohien.
Alali ajilo nyia ollo ojio Hollum jihonyi jio:
“Iyye lonyi hoŋ;
nyio, ahana ara ni a Monyohoi?”
Kuyya, alali nyia ollo ojio inyi jihonyi jio,
“Ara ni a Monyohoi,
buo iyye ira a lonyi hoŋ?”
Buo ninyia ajio Hollum efahu Oloŋeu honyi ifau, iramak nyia inyi jio;
“Ijiara luŋa ajilohien hoŋ 'daŋ itahabuye inyi.”
Ati te eram ajilohien, ojio nyia Hollum jio,
“Oyyeu nyia Hollum ajilohien honyi irari ihuo Oloyyami,
buo fe oyyeu egiamak honyi irari ihuo aŋadiafa hima.”
Buo te eram Lonyi honyi, ojio nyia inyi jio:
“Ira iyye a Hollum, osio adi olobie hoi
Ilohittok adi iyye jio aati hoi
Obuor atua hoi ariŋ onno obis 'to, buo oliwari enne ipal 'to.
Ania, anyimuniere ni iyye, nani Hollum hoi,
ette ni isiarana jihoi amuno anna agalik 'to bebe ono orriahat hoi.”
Ojio buo fe Hollum jio,
“Lamonye, tetteri iyye nyia iyyeu afau,
iyye nyia buo fe ta ahuan hoi iyyeu nedou.
Otuhoroi adi isi 'daŋ, buo iyye idulo 'tulaŋ mak;
imaruahi adi isi ihua aboŋojin.
Ibubun adi iyye isi ihua akout amuarani,
ette iduhara addi ihua aboŋojin amaruak.
Ati ira iyye olosiohol,
buo fe imanya 'tulaŋ mak.”
Hobeŋ Hollum ojio jio obo olo ajilohien honyi jio:
“Itoŋoi tene totto ŋati iŋet hoŋ
many ehananiere ni amiorok hoi
ariŋ enne irriehiniere iyye eejek hoi.”
Haŋai ti ajilohien? Isi oloholioo hulle igiamai 'to jio Hollum. Ifahu Hollum isi iluahiere hia hullo ofuoi 'to italahuno.
Tania, ijiara luŋa ehum igottiere erre hunyia etaniŋu, ŋadi eburusaru addi jihosi.
Itahutani tibuo jio, ara neram ninyia iramani ajilohien jio hohonyiok hohoi hode, buo atulo 'daŋ linyia obeŋ 'to ijifatio kuyya oniŋio eram ania, ifuotu nyia inyi ettigemio onno osiru tenyi.

Eris 'tadi aŋai, elle ebeŋ ehum mijio eram ono etalahuno anna agalik 'to ania? Lamonye, ta ahuan honyi nyia iramu eram ono etalahuno ania. Buo hia, hunyia itayiruni 'to jihonyi, ette iramana jihohoi jio, ara inyi hode.
Ara buo fe Hollum asuut ihuo isi te ehanio honyi ellillihita iko eduariti arriai, buo fe ihiharak esiorita Loholio Olibo ta awahan ottononyi.
Obeŋ nyia Hollum ihanak ajilohien ellettaha afau aŋejuk onno olo 'to ittuna, enne ekiana ana eram honyi.
Ati, igioroni jio obo aŋati Buk Hollum jiojio:
“Ei, Hollum, ara atulo anyio jihoi igigilori tenyi kuyya imijiere inyi onno oyyu?
Ara inyi atulo asai.
Berien kai, isiarak nyia iyye jihonyi agolon onno omuta jio ono ajilohien;
itte ikafana jihonyi akuatan iko olohuo
ette ihanana inyi elettok hirre 'daŋ.”
Te ehanana Hollum atulo elettok hirre 'daŋ, attubanie erre 'daŋ jio elohittok honyi. Ati inuania, ebeŋ egonyu atulo ilohittok jio erre 'daŋ.

Ati egonyu Yesu, linyia isiarani berien kai, agolon onno omuta jio ono ajilohien jio, oŋida luŋa oye te eram waati 'daŋ ta ayiji taji Hollum. Egonyu ihuania akafani jihonyi akuatan iko olohuo ta arumana honyi ettigemio ono naye.

Obis nyia Hollum, layyani hirre 'daŋ, ollo ogottiere 'to isi 'daŋ, itifuotuniere Yesu elohittok anna ara 'to ahononyi ta arumana honyi ettigemio jio; oŋida bati aduri Hollum arriai ifuotuni akuatan arabotie ikonyi. Yesu nyia iyaŋuno jihosi 'daŋ etalahuno.
Italibo inyi aati jio eyyata hosi, buo inyi iko hia hulle italibori ara Monyosi abotie. Inyi onno obiaŋarik ariri jio Yesu iloŋori isi a waati hutta haŋ.
Ikiana inyi jio Hollum jio:
“Eramak adi ni jio aati hoŋ erre hunne ihan iyye;
etahabuyo adi ni iyye jio ettubiti hosi.”
Buo fe ojio jio, “Eyihi adi ni jio Hollum.” Ette fe inyiak jiaran jio, “Ani olo iko aduri hunyia isiarak Hollum jihoŋ.”

Te eloŋo honyi aati huattek aduri honyi, inyi buo fe ninyia ottuniere Yesu irari ihuo isi. Ihan nyia inyi ihuo nyia jio, ta naye honyi, oŋida bati inyi aremik itattur Sittan, ollo owon 'to iko agolon ittohiere.
Ania, italahuniere inyi aati hunyia arai apiti ta amanya hosi daŋ ta abaŋi hosi aye.
Hode, obeŋ nyia Yesu ottu iluahiere ajilohien; ati ottu nyia inyi iluahiere aati hutto woyo Abramo.

Tania, osiru nyia luŋa jihonyi irari ihuo aati honyi te ekotia 'daŋ jio, oŋida bati inyi ara a Hehumani elle ittokon, oloyijio ollo owon 'to iko amehino, te egiama honyi jio Hollum jio, oŋida bati ohohini eyyata waati.
Tania, oremik inyi iluak hia hullo orumani 'to esusuta, nyio, orumak nyia buo fe inyi esusuta iko ettigemita.
Itai Kristiani ihua ani, hunyia buo fe onyimu Hollum, igigiloti to Yesu. Ifahu nyia Hollum inyi irari a Hehumani elle ittokon, olo neruk onno owon 'to ana jihohoi.
Oniŋio nyia Yesu eram Hollum, linyia onyimu 'to inyi, ihuo ninyia oniŋiere Mose igiamari jio aati Hollum
Ati osiru olohuo jio Yesu agalik jio Mose, ihuo onno osiruniere inyi jio aduhoni agalik jio aaji.
Nyio, owoni asik 'daŋ ababo iko aduhok hosi, ati Hollum oyyeu erre 'daŋ.
Ara nyia Mose a hegiamani oloyijio te egiama honyi jio aati Hollum. Iramatta nyia inyi erre hunno olo Hollum ikiana moi.
Ati ara Kristo a Hito oloyijio ollo ottoŋotio 'to aati Hollum. Era a waati honyi, elle edulo etagolio tajia, ebeŋ ehorok.
Tania, ihuo ojio Loholio Olibo jio,
“Ahana, elle itayiruna itai etuk Hollum,
Hètagoloto ossi, ihuo hohonyiok hatai; omesie nyia isi Hollum,
to ninyia okemierek isi inyi ihidiofo.
Ojio nyia Hollum jio okemie nyia isi ani,
duadi bu igonyuni nyia isi erre hunyia ehanio ni aŋasi atomuana aŋuan.
Ania, eloŋojitari ni jihosi ette ni jiaran,
‘Odulori isi amesio ani
buo fe ihari ejifatio efahita hoŋ.’
Ejoria nyia ni, ette ni ittuŋo jio:
‘Ittallihi adi isi ifanyan jio afau anna aremehiniere ni isiaraniere jihosi ayiri!’ ”
Illarak iko haniyarak hoŋ, ihumata mijio; hèlaha obo jihatai owon iko ataji onno orroho, onno obeŋ 'to owon iko neruk, ŋadi iyitonia Hollum lesuoni, oruoŋitek.
Ati, alla ara ekiana otto buk Hollum, onno ojio 'to jio, “Ahana”, to hohoi, oluahiete ahuattek oŋitek daŋ, ŋadi iyyauna ittata iruk agesemi enne iyaŋuno 'to jihatai agolon hossi.
Egiama 'daŋ luŋa arabotie iko Kristo, elle egottiere many isidi, eyihina ninyia owon 'to jihohoi tetteri.
Erre huna, hunyia ojio abuk Hollum jio;
“Ahana, elle itayiruna itai etuk Hollum,
hètagoloto ossi, ihuo hohonyiok hatai,
to ninyia omesierek isi Hollum.”
Haŋai nyia soho hunyia itaniŋuni 'to etuk Hollum, buo arasai mesio inyi? Obiaŋara soho aati 'daŋ hinyia iyaŋuno Mose addi to Masir.
Jio baŋai nyia soho iloŋojita Hollum aŋasi atomuana aŋuan? Obiaŋara nyia soho jio aati hinyia iyyauni 'to, aati hinyia ibibiatai ahuattek hosi ihidiofo?
Eram baŋai nyia soho enne ikiana Hollum, ninyia ojiari inyi jio, “Ittallihi adi isi fanyan jio afau anna aremehiniere ni isiaraniere jihosi ayiri”? Ikiana nyia inyi eram hia hinyia omesie 'to inyi.
Emijak tibuo jio, ittallihi nyia isi jiŋana jio afau ania nyio, obeŋ nyia eruk jihosi.
Ihuania, isiarak Hollum jihohoi ecorit ifuotuniere ayiri ninyia ikiana inyi. Héhumata ti mijio, ŋadi obo tehiji hatai odiak arumana ayiri ania.
Nyio, etayiru nyia Asayyo Ayijok ihuo isi; ati obeŋi nyia asayyo hunyia itayiruni isi, oluahi isi, nyio, obeŋ nyia neruk jihosi.
Efuotu tibuo hohoi, hulle ewon 'to iko neruk, ayiri ania ninyia ocorok Hollum. Oso luŋa ihuo ninyia ojiari inyi jio,
“Ejoria nyia ni, ette ni ittuŋo jio:
‘Ittallihi adi isi fanyan jio afau anna aremehiniere ni isiaraniere jihosi ayiri!’ ”
Ara duadi bu ninyia attubak inyi egemita honyi 'daŋ many jio oloŋ ninyia oyyeuniere inyi afau, ikiana nyia inyi ihuo nyia.
Te eram oloŋ etahattarihi, ikiana obo aŋati Buk Hollum jio: “Iholoŋ etahattarihi, oyiri nyia Hollum jio egemita honyi 'daŋ.”
Jio aŋati ania, inyiak inyi jiaran jio, “Ittallihi adi isi ifanyan jio afau anna aremehiniere ni isiaraniere jihosi ayiri.”
Obeŋi nyia hia, hinyia itteri 'to efuotuna Asayyo Ayijok, orumani ayiri ania nyio, obeŋ nyia eruk jihosi. Buo aŋatani jio omuk ifuotuniere inyi.
Oloŋ ninyia inyiak Hollum inyimuna, enne iloŋoi “Ahana”, inyi itahutak eram ania. Ihalu aŋasi arriai, ikiana nyia inyi eram ania te etuk Dafide jio ekenita hoduo ilietuni to buk Hollum jiojio:
“Ahana, elle itayiruna itai etuk Hollum,
hètagoloto ossi.”
Elle isiarak nyia Yosua jio aati ayiri ninyia ocorok Hollum, obeŋ duo Hollum inyiak ikiana eram obo oloŋ.
Tania, hobeŋ oloŋ onno oyiriarik aati Hollum afany, onno orriama 'to iko oloŋ etahattarihi ninyia oyiriari Hollum.
Atulo 'daŋ ollo onyurak 'to ayiri ninyia ocorok Hollum, oyiri adi jio egiama honyi, ihuo ninyia oyiriari Hollum jio egiama honyi.
Tania, hakiamata luŋa bebe ifuotuniere ayiri ania, ŋadi obo tehiji hohoi okuaharu ihuo hohonyiok hohoi hinyia okuaharai 'to ta abiaŋan eruk jihosi.

Odua ekiana Hollum, ara inyi ihuo ariŋ enne isu 'to; ofi inyi bebe agalik ademi erremit onno owon 'to iko aŋacio arrihai. Orriomoro parras many iboŋi ono oloyiri iko oloholio, many ittulita hoi buo fe many ittulai. Omijak inyi egigilita tulo iko ewahiti hutto taji honyi.
Obeŋ obo ariŋ idima to hosiere Hollum. Asalanie erre 'daŋ ihosiere honyi, omijak inyi isi 'daŋ. Efuo adi luŋa iramana jihonyi erre 'daŋ hunne ehan 'daŋ ababo.
Hagottiette luŋa neruk ottonohoi, nyio, ewon iko Ehumani elle ittokon Agalik, alla afany 'to luŋa ihosiere Hollum; inyi Yesu, Lonyi Hollum.
Ewon iko Ehumani elle ittokon ollo omijak 'to elik ottonohoi. Nyio, okemi nyia inyi te ekotia arriai ihuo hohoi, ati obeŋ nyia inyi iyyau.
Tania, héhutonia ta agolon tajia, iseger ilohittok Hollum ollo owon 'to iko ayiji taji jio oŋida bati efuotu amehino iko ayiji taji onno oremik 'to iluak hohoi jio asaa enne ewahari aluahio.
Onyimuttai ehumak hulle ittaha 'daŋ tehiji waati igiamari jio Hollum, imaji hosi, buo fe isiarattari esiorita iko ehumita te eram ono eyyata.
Oremik ataji honyi imehino jio atimok hulle ipali 'to, nyio, ara inyi ihuo isi.
Inyi buo fe onno oremehiniere inyi isiaraniere ehumita te eram ono eyyata honyi iko huno aati hullomuk.
Obeŋ tulo oremik inyimuna ahuan honyi irari a hehumani elle ittokon; ati, Hollum hama oremik inyimuna inyi, ihuo ninyia onyimuniere inyi Arone.
Ihuo nyia buo fe, obeŋ nyia Yesu onyimu ahuan honyi irari a hehumani elle ittokon; ati Hollum nyia ojio jihonyi jio,
“Iyye Lonyi hoŋ;
ahana ara ni Amonyohoi.”
Buo fe ikiana jio obo aŋati jio,
“Ira adi iyye a hehumani mak,
jio ehumari ono Melkisedek
Duadi bu ara inyi Lonyi Hollum, iyiyenu nyia inyi aniŋio jio ettigemita hunyia orumak inyi.
Ninyia attohu inyi ehanio erre 'daŋ hunyia ojiori oŋida inyi ihan, iyaŋuno nyia inyi etalahuno 'tulaŋ jio hia 'daŋ hullo oniŋie 'to inyi.
Anyimu Hollum inyi irari a hehumani elle ittokon jio ehumari ono Melkisedek
Hobolo ekiana eram ania enne eremik duo ikiana, ati ogol ikukuboniere jihatai, nyio, oddiŋi ossi hatai.
Ihuania, ŋaduo itai isata a hettiyanak, ati, obis inyi luŋa jio obo atulo ittiyeniere jihatai etterita hirre huno asayyo Hollum. Hosiru jihatai amata lee buo obiaŋara aŋiria,
nyio, atulo 'daŋ alla hamata 'to aale, hara olodole; hotimo inyi erre hunno obisi 'to kuyya hunne ipali 'to.
Ati, ara aŋiria ahono aati hulla abolori 'to, hulle ettiyenuni 'to amijana hirre hunno obisi 'to jio hunno orrohoji 'to.

Hèdehina luŋa ettiyenita etterita huno Kristo. Habocioro luŋa jio ettiyenita huno aati hulla abolori 'to. Hèlaha luŋa edidasio erre etterita huno asayyo Hollum idehiniere amanya enne iyaŋuno 'to naye, buo ette iruk jio Hollum.
Hèlaha luŋa edulo ettiyenio eram ono batisimo
Eremik ihanio ihuo nyia, alla aŋatak Hollum.
Enyiahuno 'tadi aŋai aati hulla abusani 'to eruk hosi, oŋida idehini neyyau? Owoni nyia isi berien ifaŋan Hollum; ette iniŋ esiorio ettedou, ette buo fe ifuotuna Loholio Olibo.
Amijani buo fe isi ayiji ono ekiana Hollum, buo fe iniŋi agolon ninyia itteriere Hollum elohittok.
Attati isi busana neruk hosi! Ogol inyiahuniere isi oŋida idehini eyyau nyio, inyiahi isi isihonia Lonyi Hollum ikruce, buo fe itanyahini inyi ariri ihiji waati.
Ajak Hollum afau enne ifuotutta 'to ahide gagaga, ette itaboloruna erre hunno oyiji jio hia hullo oromonierek.
Buo elle itaboloru inyi ekua iko alabali, obeŋ fe obo ayiji jihonyi; iliaha Hollum epitana inyi, ette isuahina.
Illarak iko haniyarak hohoi, duadi bu ekiana hohoi ihuo nyia, emijak hohoi itai bebe. Emijak hohoi jio, inyimuna itai ekoi onno obis 'to anna ara 'to te etalahuno hatai.
Odulo Hollum abisan. Ittallik adi inyi iguoro egiama hatai kuyya abuaran tajia hatai inyi, ninyia itahutana itai ta aluahio hatai Kristiani hullomuk, buo fe hérasati ihanio ihuo nyia.
Ewak hohoi bebe jio, ijiara luŋa itai 'daŋ ababo iduloro awahan bebe many isidi, oŋida bati erre hunne iyihina itai ofuonni irahan hode.
Tania, hèboyojoto; ati, irata ihuo hia, hinyia iruhi 'to buo fe odihuni, ania ifuotunierek isi erre hunyia ocorok Hollum.
Ta abiaŋan tulo agalik Hollum, ittuŋo nyia inyi ta afure honyi ihaniere erre hunyia ocorok inyi jio Abramo, to ninyia
ojiari inyi jio, “Hode, hode, etamuno adi ni iyye. Oluluajarai adi aati hutta haŋ hoi.”
Itilau nyia Abramo dee, many ifuotuniere inyi ariŋ ninyia ocorok Hollum.
Elle ilama atulo, ittuŋo inyi ta afure lia alla agalik 'to inyi, buo ettuŋo ania ette iremehina eram ania 'daŋ.
Ninyia awahari Hollum itahutaniere 'tel 'tel jio hullo ofuoi 'to ifuotuna ariŋ ninyia ocorok inyi, ittuŋo nyia inyi luŋa jio, ettallik inyi itapuak awahan ottononyi.

Ecorit iko ettuŋo Hollum, isi erre arrihai hunia hunne ittallihini 'to iloito; ittallik buo fe Hollum igesemi te eram hosi. Tania, ihumi luŋa itagol hohoi hulle efuhororo 'to jihonyi jio, oŋida bati luŋa ehum igottiere eyihina enne ihanani ihosiere hohoi.

Jio amanya hohoi, ara ariŋ enne eyihi jihonyi, ihuo olohurut enne iriecierek a babur, enne itagolio 'to hohoi. Inyi Yesu, ollo olo 'to many imaji elibo, agalaru aboŋo etihi otto haji emojit enne ittokon ettedou.
Ikiomoro inyi diya, te eram hohoi. Ara inyi mak a hehumani elle ittokon jio ehumari ono Melkisedek

Ara nyia Melkisedek a hobu Salem, buo fe ara a hehumani Hollum Elle Illomohi 'to 'Daŋ. Ninyia acohuno Abramo jio arrem ninyia itatturiere inyi obuok hula aŋuan, arraŋu nyia Melkisedek inyi, ette imimit inyi;

buo Abramo ette isiarana jihonyi aŋati etattomoni ono asaŋ 'daŋ hunyia anyauno inyi. (Ojio etteri woyo hiram ono afure Melkisedek jio, “Hobu olo Abisan”; buo fe anya “Hobu olo Nelik Taji” ta arahan honyi a hobu olo Salem.)

Obeŋi igioroni jio obo imaji jio, owon nyia Melkisedek iko monye, kuyya honye, kuyya hohonyiok, kuyya oloŋ ninyia isiunierek inyi iko ninyia oyeri inyi. Ara inyi ihuo Lonyi Hollum; odulo inyi arahan a hehumani mak.
Ike imijata ti elohittok honyi! Isiarak nyia hohonyi hohoi, Abramo, jihonyi aŋati etattomoni ono asaŋ 'daŋ hunyia anyauno inyi to fere.
Ojiori buo fe efahita jio, ijiara luŋa ehumak hutto woyo ba Lefi omojuttai aŋati etattomoni saŋ jio aati hosi, Israele, duadi bu arai isi buo fe to woyo Abramo.
Obeŋ nyia Melkisedek ara to woyo Lefi, ati ifuotu nyia inyi aŋati etattomoni jio Abramo, ette imimit inyi; atulo, linyia ifuotu 'to ecoriti Hollum.
Emijak 'daŋ jio, agalik emimitani lia, elle imimiti.
Elle ikiana eram ono ehumak hutto woyo ba Lefi, ifuotuttai nyia isi aŋati etattomoni buo ofuoi 'daŋ iye moi; buo Melkisedek ifuotu aŋati etattomoni, atulo elle isu, ihuo ojio abuk Hollum.
Eremik buo fe jiaran jio, isiarak nyia buo fe Lefi (linyia ifuotuni aati hutto woyo honyi aŋati etattomoni), aŋati etattomoni tottolo Abramo.
Nyio, howon nyia Lefi ihoto hohonyi honyi Abramo, to ninyia arraŋuniere Melkisedek, Abramo.

Ifuotuni nyia Israele efahita jio ehumari otto woyo Lefi. Alla abis nyia egiama ono ehumak hutto woyo Lefi, obeŋi duo fe aati inyiahi iwahan obo ehumani jio obo ehumari onno olufa, onno ottu 'to tette ehumari Melkisedek, buo obiaŋara to woyo Arone?
Nyio, alla alufaji ehumak jio huttoloŋi, ijiara buo fe luŋa efahita olufaji.
Ikianai erre hunia te eram obo atulo, ollo ottu 'to jio obo awoyo waati hama; inyi Lamonye hohoi. Hobeŋ obo 'tuŋ jio awoyo ania ara a hehumani.
Omijani aati 'daŋ jio, ottu inyi to woyo Yuda. Obeŋ nyia Mose iliet awoyo ania, to ninyia ikianari inyi eram hehumak.
Asalanio tibuo luŋa eram ania 'tel 'tel; nyio, anyimuni obo ehumani hama alla ara ihuo Melkisedek.
Obeŋi nyia onyimuni inyi ta agolon ono efahita hunno ojiori 'to jio, ijiara luŋa inyi odetuno jio awoyo ana. Ati, onyimuni nyia inyi ta agolon ono nesu onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ.
Inyi onno ojio abuk Hollum jio, “Ira adi iyye mak a hehumani, jio ehumari ono Melkisedek.”
Tania, itapuahi efahita eberien, nyio, obeŋi isi ogoli buo fe ofiahaji.
Nyio, ittallihini nyia efahita Mose itabisana obo ariŋ. Ihuania, isiarani jihohoi eyihina onno oyyu 'to agalik, enne eremihiniere nyihari jio Hollum.
Ofonik nyia Hollum ettuŋo honyi jio eyihina ania. Obeŋ nyia ettuŋo ania to ninyia ifuotunierek aati hullomuk arahan a hehumak.
Ati ifuotu nyia Yesu arahan a hehumani te ettuŋo to ninyia ojiari Hollum jihonyi jio,
“Nani Hollum, ta ahuan hoŋ, ettuŋo,
ettallik ni iloit ahou hoŋ:
‘Ira adi iyye a hehumani 'tulaŋ.’ ”
Itahutak ania jio, Yesu itasiru emuara iko Hollum anna agalik 'to 'daŋ ta ayiji.
Berien, oluaji nyia ehumak, nyio, ittallik nyia aye iŋatana isi idulori a hehumak.
Ati isu Yesu 'tulaŋ, tania, ittallik tulo irutana ehuma honyi.
Inyi luŋa onno oremehiniere inyi italahuniere hia, hullo ofuonni 'to jio Hollum tottolonyi; nyio, isu inyi 'tulaŋ imojori tesi.
Obis luŋa iwanari iko Ehumani elle ittokon ihua alia; ollo olibo, ollo obeŋ 'to owon iko epali kuyya eyyau; elle igeluni addi tehiji heyyak, ette ikafaru ahide dou.

Olufa inyi jio ehumak eberien hulle ittaha, hunyia isiarattai 'to ehumita oŋitek 'daŋ, ahosiere te eram ono eyyata hosi attati te eram ono eyyata waati hullomuk. Isiarak nyia inyi ehumi enyiahi abotie ijiai, to ninyia isiaraniere inyi ahuan honyi ehumi.

Onyimuttai nyia ehumak hulle ittaha te Efahita Mose; aati hulle ittallihini 'to ihanio ariŋ ono oyyu 'to bebe. Ati onyimuni nyia Lonyi te ettuŋo Hollum ninyia ottu 'to ihalu Ifahita. Inyi tibuo alia luŋa ehumani elle ittokon 'tulaŋ, elle ihan 'to ariŋ anna agalik 'to ta ayiji.
Ojio awoyo eram enne ekiana ni ania jio, ewon iko Ehumani elle ittokon, elle itoŋo 'to tetteŋet ono aseger ilohittok ono Hollum Laduarani, ettedou.
Ara inyi a hehumani elle ittokon Imaji Elibo anna Agalik 'to 'Daŋ, otto tua haji musiama anna ara 'to hode, ninyia oduk Lamonye, buo obiaŋara atulo.
Onyimuni ehumak hulle ittaha 'daŋ isioriere esiorita iko aciaŋi ehumita jio Hollum, obis buo fe luŋa jio Ehumani hohoi elle ittokon isiaraniere obo ariŋ jio Hollum.
Alla awon duo inyi ifau dini, obeŋ duo inyi luŋa ara a hehumani, nyio, owoni ehumak hullomuk dini, hullo onyimuni te efahita Yudei isiorie esiorita.

Igiamai isi ihaji musiama anna ara 'to arrijiori buo fe iyyalu aaji musiama ettedou. Orriama inyi ihuo ninyia ajio Mose aduho Aaji Musiama Elibo, iramak nyia Hollum inyi jio, “Ihuma luŋa ihuhumana inyi ihuo ninyia itahutani jihoi to doŋe.”

Ati, isiarani jio Yesu ehuma anna agalik 'to bebe ottonosi, ihuo anna agalihiniere emuara ninyia iyaŋuno inyi ihiji Hollum iko aati honyi. Nyio, owotia emuara ania jio ecoriti hunna agalihini 'to ta ayiji.
Alla abis nyia ecorit etteri, obeŋ duo tulo inyiak iwahan ecorit etarrihi.
Ati onyurak nyia Hollum epali jio aati honyi ojiari inyi jio,
“Oŋitek hunno ofuonni,
hunna alari ni ihaniere ecorit aŋejuk iko aati Israele buo aati Yudea.
Obeŋ adi inyi orriama iko ecorit ninyia ehan ni iko hohonyiok hosi
jio noloŋ ninyia amijiere ni isi onno oyyu, ette iyaŋuno isi addi to Masir.
Obeŋi nyia isi odulori aniŋio ecorit ninyia ehan ni ikosi,
ania ayitoniere ni oruoŋ jihosi.
Ihuania, alo ni ihan ecorit ana iko aati Israele
jio oŋitek huno moi:
Alo adi ni ihanana efahita hoŋ ihossi hosi
buo fe egiorok itajia hosi.
Ara adi ni a Hollum hosi,
buo fe isi arai awaati hoŋ.
Obeŋ adi obo jihosi inyiak ittiyenio aati hutta haŋ hosi,
Kuyya ikiana jio onyihari honyi jio,
‘Omijana Lamonye.’
Nyio, omijani adi isi 'daŋ ani,
itterio jio olofiaha many jio elettok hosi.
Edehi adi ni eyyata hosi
buo fe aguoro epalita hosi.”
Te ekiana Hollum eram ono ecorit aŋejuk ania, itahutak inyi jio imaruak etteri. Buo ariŋ 'daŋ enne imaruak 'to, ara ariŋ asai, iliaha alitohina honyi.
Ottu nyia ecorit etteri iko ekotia hunno omojorik, buo fe owon iko amaji emojit ifau dini.
Osihini nyia aaji musiama; anya nyia aŋati etteri, Amaji Elibo. Itua honyi, owon nyia etawoji 'lomo, atteremeja iko emune enne isiarani jio Hollum.
Ihoruoŋ aboŋo etihi, owon nyia amusiama enne iloŋoi Amaji Elibo anna agalik 'to 'daŋ.

Itua honyi, owon nyia etitiek 'yel onno osuahierek ottogoŋ, buo Asenuk ono Ecorit anna arai egeri honyi ayyel. Itua asenuk ania, owon nyia etebek anna ara ayyel, buo amana owon itua honyi. Itua amusiama ania buo fe, owon nyia atelek Arone anna ayisak abene iko olottobohi hula arrihai hunyia ikiafanierek efahita.

Totto hide Senuk, owoni nyia omuk arrijiorita saŋ hunna anyai Cerubim hunno owoni iko ewwa. Itahutani nyia isi awanan Hollum diya, buo ewwa hosi ihanani abali jio amaji onno ohohittarik eyyata. Ati, obiaŋara asaa ana enne ikukubonierek erre 'daŋ.
Ekoi ania ninyia ihuhumanierek erre hunia 'daŋ. Adahatie ehumak oŋitek 'daŋ jio aŋati etteri ono aaji musiama ihaniere egiama hosi.

Ati, ehumani elle ittokon nyia hama, ojiŋatta iŋati haji musiama etarrihi. Ojiŋatta nyia inyi diya enyiahi abotie ijiai ihiŋa. Iyatta nyia inyi nooto isiaraniere jio Hollum te eram ono eyyata honyi iko te eram eyyata hunne ihani aati ta atimo.
Te ekoi ania, itahutak Loholio Olibo jio, obeŋi adi aŋai ekoi onno olo 'to Imaji Elibo anna Agalik 'to 'Daŋ, buo aaji musiama etteri howon.
Ariŋ ania enne itahutak 'to erre hunno owoni 'to jio oŋitek huna. Itahutak inyi jio, ittallihini esiorita iko aciaŋi ehumita, hunne isiori jio Hollum, italibo atajia hamojok;
nyio, ikianai erre hunia 'daŋ eram ŋiyo iko amata buo etaduarita hunnomuk 'daŋ hunne italiborierek ahuattek. Etaduarita huan hunia ijiai, hunne igiamai many iyaŋuniere Hollum amanya aŋejuk.
Ati, ara Kristo a Hehumani elle ittokon elle iyaŋuno 'to erre ayijok hunna awoni 'to huna dini

Ninyia alari Kristo ihaji musiama, ojiŋak nyia inyi enyiahi abotie ijiai Imaji Elibo anna Agalik 'to 'Daŋ. Obeŋ nyia inyi iyaru nooto hidie kuyya ono attamoti isiaraniere ehumi. Ati iyaru nyia inyi nooto honyi iyaŋuniere jihohoi etalahuno onno osio 'to 'tulaŋ.
Nyio, italibori atulo ihuo ojiori efahita Mose, to nooto hidie kuyya ono attamoti kuyya te enuara ono atawwo olo osuahini ehumi.

Alla ara ti inyi hode, obeŋ 'tadi nooto Kristo iyaŋuno alibori anna agalik 'to bebe? To Oloholio elle isu 'to 'tulaŋ, isiarak nyia Kristo ahuan honyi ehumi onno oyyu 'to bebe jio Hollum. Italibo adi nooto honyi atuajin hohoi jio ehuhumita hunna arai asai jio, oŋida bati egiama jio Hollum lesuoni.

Te eram ania, iyaŋuno Kristo ecorit aŋejuk jio, oŋida bati hia hunyia iloŋu Hollum ifuotuni amuno onno osioi 'to 'tulaŋ, ninyia ocoroni a hunosi. Ta naye honyi, italahunie hia hunyia iyyauni 'to jio oŋitek huno ecorit etteri.
Alla ara eram ono awaraga enne itahutak 'to jio ŋai olo ifuotuna erutaa, ijiara luŋa omijani jio, aye amonye saŋ;
nyio, ittallihi irutana asaŋ buo amonye hesu, arari fe alla aye inyi.
Inyi buo fe ninyia itasirunierek ecorit etteri to nooto.

Nyio, ninyia iramak Mose efahita 'daŋ jio aati 'daŋ, iduhu nyia inyi nooto tawwa iko ono nedie, ette iharruahina iko aari, ette iduhuna agutuny anariet, ette itarana ilosiholoti, ette isabulonia ihoto, ette iruasiere abuk ono efahita iko aati 'daŋ;
ette jiaran, “Nooto ana itagol ecorit ono emuara ninyia awak Hollum luŋa jio ijiara itai iniŋiete.”
Ihuo nyia buo fe, oruas nyia Mose, to nooto, Aaji Musiama Elibo iko asaŋ emojiti 'daŋ.
Hode, ojiori efahita jio, ijiara luŋa italibori arriai hirre 'daŋ to nooto; ittallihini buo fe ihohina eyyata waati alla abeŋ nooto owouno.
Tania, italibori nyia arrijiorita hirre huttedou te ekotia ihuo hunia; buo italibori erre huttedou te ehumita hunno oyiji 'to bebe agalihini hunia.

Obeŋ nyia Kristo ojiŋak jio Amaji Elibo atta fau enne ihuhumu tulo buo fe ara arrijiori Maji Elibo, anna ara 'to hode. Ojiŋak nyia inyi luŋa lidou, amaji anna awanari inyi ihosiere Hollum iluahiere hohoi.
Aŋasi 'daŋ, ojiŋatta nyia ehumani Yudei elle ittokon Imaji Elibo anna Agalik 'to 'Daŋ isiaraniere nooto ciaŋ ehumi. Ati obeŋ nyia Kristo ojiŋak Imaji Elibo isiaraniere ahuan honyi enyiahita arriai.

Elle isiaratta nyia Kristo ahuan honyi ehumi aŋasi 'daŋ, ŋaduo arumak ettigemita enyiahita arriai many tetteri fau. Ati ihuania, attu inyi enyiahi abotie ijiai iyari eyyata addi ta naye honyi, buo esidi fau iliaha.
Oye luŋa atulo 'daŋ enyiahi abotie, ojio teya, ette Hollum iŋot eram hosi.
Ihuo nyia buo fe, isiori nyia Kristo ehumi enyiahi abotie ijiai, iyari addi eyyata waati arriai. Inyiak adi inyi icohuno, obiaŋara iyari addi eyyata, ati italahuniere hia hulle itilai 'to inyi.
Arai Efahita Mose ihuo arrijiorita hirre ayijok hunno ofuonni 'to moi. Obeŋi isi arai a hirre ahode hode, nyio, ittallihi isi ihohina aati jio eyyata ta aduloro isiorio ehumita aŋasi 'daŋ.
Ara duo luŋa enne italibori efahita aati jio eyyata hosi, obeŋ duo tulo inyiak ihawwa te eram ono eyyau; tania, obeŋi duo inyiahi isiorio ehumita aŋasi 'daŋ.
Ati, esiorita hune isiaratai aŋasi 'daŋ itagiluttai aati eyyata hosi.
Nyio, ittallik luŋa nooto ono attamoti iko ono nedie, iduhara addi eyyata.
Te eram ania, ninyia iliaha Kristo attuna lifau, ojio nyia inyi jio Hollum jio:
“Ibeŋ iyye iwak ehumita iko esiorita,
ati isiarak iyye jihoŋ, ahuan hoŋ irari ehumi.
Ibeŋ iyye imuno ehumita ciaŋi hunno osuahini ititiek
kuyya ehumita hunne iduharik addi eyyata.”
Attati Kristo inyiak jiaran, “Jai, Hollum, attu ni,
ihaniere awahan hoi,
ihuo igioroni ibuk hoi to ni.”

Itter nyia Kristo ajiaran jio, “Ibeŋ iyye iwak kuyya imuno esiorita, ehumita, iko aciaŋi hunno osuahini ititiek buo ehumita hunne iduharik addi eyyata.” Ikiana nyia inyi ihuo nyia, duadi bu isiori nyia ehumita hunia 'daŋ ihuo ojiori efahita.
Attati inyi inyiak jiaran jio, “Jai, Hollum, attu ni, ihaniere awahan hoi.” Ania ette Hollum itapuak ehumita eberien 'daŋ, ette itarutana ehumi Kristo imaji hosi.
Italibori hohoi ta aniŋio Kristo Hollum, ette isiarana ahuan honyi ehumi enyiahi abotie ijiai.
Odulori ehumak Yudei 'daŋ ababo ihanio egiama hosi oŋitek 'daŋ, buo fe odulori edasio ehumita huttoloŋi; ati ittallihini luŋa ehumita hunia iduhara addi eyyata.
Ati isiarak nyia Kristo ehumi abotie ijiai enne igiama 'to 'tulaŋ; itoŋo inyi ihuania tetteŋet Hollum.
Itila inyi diya ihuania, many ihananiere Hollum amiorok honyi 'daŋ ebalori hejek honyi.
Te ehumi abotie ijiai, italibo inyi 'tulaŋ hia, hulle igelu inyi a hulo Hollum.
Itahutak buo fe Loloholio Olibo jihohoi eram ania, ninyia ojiari Lamonye jio:
“Alo ni ihan ecorit ana ikosi moi.
Ehanak adi ni efahita hoŋ itajia hosi
buo fe egiorok ihossi hosi.”
