Amijak ni ehanita hoi; amijak ni apulo hoi bebe iko adihan hoi. Amijak ni jio ittallik iyye idihan eyyak, ati ikem nyia iyye aati hullo ojiori 'to isi lefahat, buo obeŋi arai ihuo nyia; itte iyye inyurana agesemi hosi.
Amijak ni adihan iko arumana hoi ettigemita te eram fure hoŋ, buo ibeŋ ihorok.
Ati eloŋojita ni jihoi te eram ana: Idehi iyye ihuania etabuorio taji jihoŋ, ninyia owon 'to jihoi tetteri.

Ogilu amanya hoi ninyia oyyu 'to bebe; hèbeŋ iyye iyyau! Idehi eyyata hoi, ihanie erre hunyia ihanio iyye tetteri. Elle ibeŋ iyye idehi eyyata hoi, attu adi ni jihoi iduhari etawoji 'lomo hoi addi to maji honyi.
Ati eram onno oyyu 'to jihoi ana: Iliwari iyye ehanita waati Nikolaus ihuo ani.
“Jio hia, hulle itatturi 'to egoliti huno neyyau, aŋatak adi ni isi oŋiye eŋija 'yani ono nesu, onno owon 'to iginana Hollum.
“Asayyo huna hunne ifahu lia, alla ara 'to etteri iko ecuŋi, linyia oye 'to ette inyiak isu.
Amijak ni ettigemita iko elociaŋ hoi, ati isam iyye! Amijak ni etisiahita hunne itisiahiniere iyye aati hullo ojiori 'to jio, isi Yudei buo obeŋi arai ahode. Isi hulia, aati hutte iluluŋ Sittan!

Hèbaŋata ettigemio onno olo 'to iduoŋ jihatai. Imijie! Ottu adi Olorroho ibironia omuk jihatai ibabus ikemiere itai. Oŋitek 'tomon, owon adi ettigemio jihatai. Iyihina jihoŋ many iye, nyio, esio adi ni jihatai nesiorio ono nesu.
“Hia, hulle itatturi 'to egoliti huno neyyau, obeŋ adi naye etarrihi
“Igiorok erre huna jio ajilo olo eluluŋ heruhok otto Pergamum jio:
“Asayyo huna hunne ifahu lia, ollo owon 'to iko ademi erremit onno ofi 'to aŋacio arrihai.

Amijak ni amaji enne imanyari iyye, inyi amaji anna awanari aseger ilohittok Sittan; ati igottiere iyye afure hoŋ. Ibeŋ nyia iyye ibusak neruk hoi nani, duadi bu to ninyia ottohiniere Antipas, egiamani hoŋ oloyijio, dinia, imaji anna amanyari Sittan.

Ati owoni omuk erre kai hunne eloŋojitari ni jihoi. Owoni omuk aati ihiji hatai hulle iruhi nettiyenita Balaam, linyia ittiyanak 'to Balak irihori aati Israele iyyau. Isusuhi nyia inyi isi iŋiyere erre hunne isiori jio arrijiorita jiohin, buo fe ihaniere erre somon.
Ihuo nyia buo fe, owoni omuk hulatai hulle iruhi ettiyenita huno lejifak Nikolaus.
Ihuania, idehina eyyata hatai. Elle ibiaŋata itai idehina eyyata hatai, attu adi ni kuak jihatai irriomoniere iko aati hia ta ademi erremit otto hutuk hoŋ.
“Alla awoni ayyaha jihatai, itaniŋiete eram enne ikiana Oloholio jio eluluŋi heruhok!

“Jio hia, hulle itatturi 'to egoliti huno neyyau, esio adi ni aŋiria enne idimani anna anya manaa. Esio adi ni buo fe jihosi amoruo anaboŋ, enne ikiafanierek afure aŋejuk onno obeŋ tulo omijak, arari fe lia elle ifuotu 'to inyi.
“Igiorok erre huna jio ajilo olo eluluŋ heruhok otto Tiatira jio:
“Asayyo huna, hunne ifahu Lonyi Hollum, ollo owulori oŋite ihuo eema, buo eejek honyi opipiahi ihuo abilata onno opoti.
Amijak ni ehanita hoi. Amijak ni abuaran taji hoi, neruk hoi, egiama hoi iko nadihan hoi. Amijak ni jio, igiama iyye agalik ninyia tetteri.

Ati eram ana enne eloŋojitari ni jihatai, ta adihan hatai aŋotte ania, Jesebel, onno ojio 'to jio ara inyi a hekianani Hollum. Te ettiyenita honyi, itisiaba inyi egiamak hoŋ ihaniere erre somon buo fe iŋiyere erre hunne isiarani jio arrijiorita jiohin.
Esiarak nyia ni jihonyi oŋitek idehiniere eyyata honyi, ati, obeŋ inyi iruk edehina erre somon huttononyi.

Tania, abuarak adi ni inyi ijiara ififiata ijotit, buo hia hulle ihanie 'to erre somon ikonyi onyurani ettigemio onno orroho, arari fe elle idehini isi ehanio hirre hunno orrohoji 'to, hunne ihanie isi ikonyi.

Attoho adi ni ejifak honyi, buo eluluŋi heruhok 'daŋ ette imijana jio, ani alia alla amijak 'to egigilita iko ewahiti waati 'daŋ ababo. Esio adi ni jihatai 'daŋ ababo erre hunno osiruni 'to te ehanita hatai.

“Ati jihatai aati Tiatira hullomuk, hulle ibiaŋata 'to ijifatiete nettiyenita hunno orrohoji 'to hunia; itai hulle hèbiaŋata 'to ittiyenuna erre hunne iloŋoi aati hullomuk ‘Erre Sittan hunno oddiŋi 'to’, ajio ni jihatai jio, abeŋ adi ni enyiak ifuanana obo ettigemio jihatai.
Ati ogolihina jio erre hunno owoni 'to jihatai many attuniere ni.

Jio hia, hulle itatturi 'to egoliti huno neyyau, hia hullo odulori 'to many isidi ehanio erre hunna awak ni, attu adi ni isiarana jihosi elohittok ninyia efuotu ni jio Monyoŋ. Esiarak adi ni jihosi agolon ilohittohori ifauhien 'daŋ obeŋ amehino, buo fe ibiboriere isi sar sar ihuo atobuaha.
Esiarak adi ni buo fe jihosi elelef otto taŋatio motie.
“Alla awoni ayyaha jihoi, itaniŋie eram enne ikiana Oloholio jio eluluŋi heruhok!
“Igiorok erre huna jio ajilo olo eluluŋ heruhok otto Sardis jio:
“Asayyo huna, hunne ifahu lia, ollo owon 'to iko oloholioo Hollum huna hattarik iko elelefi hattarik. Amijak ni ehanita hoi; ileyo iyye ihuo elle isu ati ira iyye a hayaani.
Tania odiotoi, itagolo ariŋ anna harasa 'to jihoi hobeŋ onitok. Nyio, egonyu ni jio hobeŋ ariŋ enne ihan iyye ihum ittuba to hosiere Hollum hoŋ.

Ike iyyaha yo igiluna ettiyenita hunyia ifuotu iyye iko hunyia itaniŋu iyye; oniŋie isi, idehi eyyata hoi. Elle ibeŋ iyye idioto, attu adi ni jihoi ihuo olohoho. Itimo adi iyye asaa anna attuniere ni.
Ati owoni omuk aati jihatai dinia hullo hobeŋi itiboti aboŋojin hosi. Osiru adi jihosi idahari ikoŋ ta aboŋojin hunna abuoŋi.

Hia, hulle itatturi 'to egoliti huno neyyau, itiyyefi adi buo fe isi ihuo nyia ta aboŋojin abuoŋi. Abeŋ adi ni efufuso addi afureta hosi to buk ono nesu. To hosiere Monyoŋ iko to hosiere ajilohien honyi, eruhok adi ni sar sar arahan hosi ahuloŋ.
“Alla awoni ayyaha jihoi, itaniŋie eram enne ikiana Oloholio jio eluluŋi heruhok!
“Igiorok erre huna jio ajilo olo eluluŋ heruhok otto Filadelfia:
“Asayyo huna, hunne ifahu lia, ollo olibo 'to buo fe ara ahode. Owon eŋanyit ono Dafide jihonyi. Alla aŋany inyi ekat, ittallik obo ihianana, buo elle ihianak inyi, ittallik obo iŋany.
Amijak ni ehanita hoi iko amutari golon hoi. Ati ihum iyye igottiere ettiyenita hoŋ, buo fe ibeŋ irisa nani. Aŋahi ni jihoi ekat enne ittallik tulo ihianana.

Imijie! Alla ara eram ono eluluŋ waati anna ara 'to ahono Sittan, agesomok hullo ojiori 'to jio, isi Yudei buo obeŋi arai; etarigoŋok adi ni isi ihosiere hejek hatai. Ofuonni adi isi 'daŋ imijana jio obuor ataji hoŋ itai.
Ta agottiere hatai efahi hoŋ ono adihan, amijio adi ni itai onno oyyu jio asaa ono ettigemio, onno ottu 'to ifau 'daŋ, ikemiere aati 'daŋ hutta fau.
Eliaha ni attuna. Ogottiere onno oyyu ariŋ ottonohoi, ŋadi obo atulo ottu ihoruna esiorio enne itahutak 'to etattur hoi egoliti huno neyyau.

Hia, hulle itatturi 'to egoliti huno neyyau, ehanak adi ni isi etawojita Ihaji emojit enne ittokon ono Hollum hoŋ. Obeŋi adi isi ofuoi addi teya. Egiorok adi ni jihosi afure Hollum hoŋ iko afure ono abore gala Hollum hoŋ; Yerusalem aŋejuk, onno ottu adi tedou jio Hollum hoŋ. Egiorok adi buo fe ni jihosi, afure hoŋ aŋejuk.
“Alla awoni ayyaha jihoi, itaniŋie eram enne ikiana Oloholio jio eluluŋi heruhok!
“Igiorok erre huna jio ajilo olo eluluŋ heruhok otto Laudisia jio.
“Asayyo huna, hunno ofuonni jio
Amijak ni ehanita hoi. Ibeŋ iyye ilik kuyya inok. Oyyu duo jihoŋ elle ilik iyye kuyya elle inok iyye.
Ati ta arahan hoi ihuo ariŋ onno ollullu 'to, onno obeŋ 'to ilik kuyya onok, alo ni imitara iyye addi to hutuk hoŋ.
Ijio iyye jio, ‘Asam ni, owoni erre 'daŋ jihoŋ, obeŋ riŋ aŋaramahi nani.’ Ati ibeŋ iyye imijak eratta hoi, amehino hoi, aŋodo iko eŋaturo hoi.

Esiŋ ni iyye jio, inyiaŋu jihoŋ ayyel enne italibori te neema, oŋida bati isam. Inyiaŋu aboŋojin abuoŋi oŋida iyyafak itihoniere eŋaturo hoi enne iyaŋuno 'to ania ariri. Inyiaŋu buo fe obo ayyani hoŋite oŋida ifiotok ihoŋite hoi, oŋida bati imijio.
Eriŋio ni buo fe abahio hia 'daŋ hullo obuor ataji hoŋ. Tania, omunoi ehanio onno oyyu, idehi eyyata hoi.
Imijie! Awotia ni ikat buo ekukuho. Elle itaniŋu obo etuk hoŋ, ette iŋa ekat, ajiŋa adi ni jihonyi, ette iŋiyo ikonyi buo fe inyi eŋiyo ikoŋ.
Jio hia, hulle itatturi 'to egoliti huno neyyau ihuo ninyia etatturiere ni, aŋatak adi ni isi itoŋoi iger hoŋ, iseger ilohittok hoŋ, ihuo enne etoŋori ni ihuania iger Monyoŋ, iseger ilohittok honyi.
“Alla awoni ayyaha jihoi, itaniŋie eram enne ikiana Oloholio jio eluluŋi heruhok!”
Ihalu erre hunia, inyiak obo ariŋ ileyehino jihoŋ ihuo arigia, ette ni igonyuna obo ekat aŋaa lidou.
Attati ni itaniŋuna etuk, ninyia ikiana 'to jihoŋ ahosiere ihuo afuruju, ojio, “Waŋ ihide dini, etahutak adi ni iyye erre hunno ofuoi 'to luŋa iduoŋ ihalu erre hunia.”
Teya teya, ette Oloholio inef ani, ette ni igonyuna aseger ilohittok owon lidou, buo obo atulo itoŋo diya.
Opipiak nyia omom atulo lia ihuo amuoro enne egara iko anna ariet, buo atolohe onno opipiak egara okudak aseger ilohittok ania.

Owoni nyia asegeri ilohittok atomuana arrihai haŋuan hunno okudani aseger ilohittok ania. Itoŋoi nyia lahou atomuana arrihai haŋuan jio asegeri hunia. Iyyafatie nyia isi aboŋojin abuoŋi iko egoriahien 'yeli ihossi hosi.
Ofuonni nyia emedehita iko etirita hilai, buo attorr hutuhe jio aseger ilohittok nyia, buo allomohien hattarik owulori ihosiere honyi. Arai nyia allomohien hunia oloholioo Hollum huna hattarik.
Ihosiere aseger ania buo fe, ifut nyia obo ariŋ ihuo atafar gilas onno olibo lir lir ihua nafalaŋa.
Okudani nyia asaŋ aŋuan hunne isui 'to, aŋacio huno aseger ania. Ifuti nyia asaŋ hunne isui 'to hunia iko oŋite, ihosiere buo fe ihalu.
Iyyalu nyia etteri elemie; buo etarrihi iyyalu attamot hiteŋ; buo etahunihi owon iko omom enne iyyalu omom tulo; buo etaŋuani iyyalu asollir elle iddarrata.
Owoni nyia isi 'daŋ ababo iko ewwa ille ille hunne ifuti iko oŋite 'daŋ totto 'let iko totto tua hiwwa. Odulori nyia isi edolo afanni iko arue 'daŋ jiojio:
“Olibo, olibo, olibo Hollum Lamonye Laduarani,
linyia owon 'to, ollo owon 'to ihuania, ollo olo 'to ittuna.”
Idoloi nyia asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to, edolita huno akuatan iko huno etahabuta buo huno ahumo jio lia elle itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok; lia, elle isu 'to 'tulaŋ 'tulaŋ. Elle idoloi isi ihuo nyia,

buo lahou hula atomuana arrihai haŋuan ette irigoŋo ifau ihosiere lia, linyia itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok, ette itahabuyo inyi, elle isu 'to 'tulaŋ 'tulaŋ. Ibirotiai nyia isi egoriahien hosi ifau ihosiere seger ilohittok, buo ojiori,
“Lamonye iko Hollum hohoi! Osiru jihoi
ifuotuniere akuatan iko olohuo buo aduaran.
Nyio, iyye nyia iyyeu erre 'daŋ,
awanarik isi buo fe isui ta awahan hoi.”
Egonyu nyia ni agagar ta hani iŋet lia, elle itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok. Owoni nyia egierita jio omomite 'daŋ huno agagar ania, ninyia oduanyani te eduanyiti hattarik;
ette ni igonyuna obo ajilo elettok ifiyo woŋ woŋ jio, “Ŋai ollo oremik 'to ifedeheny eduanyiti, ette iwalak agagar ania?”
Ati obeŋ nyia tulo idou kuyya ifau kuyya hutto tua fau
Ayyoo nyia ni onno orroho bebe nyio, obeŋ nyia tulo onyuranio ollo osiru jihonyi iwalahiere agagar ania, ette imi atua honyi.

Attati obo olo lahou jiaran jihoŋ, “Hèluaha! Imijie, Elemie otto woyo Yuda, ollo ohu 'to, ollo odetuno 'to to woyo Dafide; agalik inyi erre 'daŋ. Oremik inyi ifedeheny eduanyiti huna hattarik hunia, ette iwalak agagar ania.”

Attati ni igonyuna Olosobe owotia ihiji maji anna awanari aseger ilohittok, buo asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to iko lahou okudani inyi. Ara nyia Olosobe alia ihuo alla attohori. Owon nyia inyi iko amuarrak hattarik, buo oŋite hattarik; isi hunia oloholioo Hollum huna hattarik hunyia ifahini ifau 'daŋ.
Olo nyia Olosobe, ette iduhuna agagar nyia ta hani iŋet lia linyia itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok.

Ninyia iduhu inyi agagar ania, ette asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to 'daŋ iko lahou hula atomuana arrihai haŋuan irigoŋo ifau ihosiere Olosobe. Owoni nyia isi 'daŋ ababo iko adorri buo arranyi 'yeli hunne ifuti iko ottogoŋ, ninyia ara 'to emojiti waati Hollum.
Idoli nyia isi afure aŋejuk jiojio:
“Osiru jihoi iduhuniere agagar ania,
itte ifedeheny eduanyiti honyi.
Nyio, ottohori nyia iyye; buo to nooto hoi, iyaŋuno nyia iyye jio Hollum,
aati to woi 'daŋ iko ta fauhien 'daŋ.
Ilohittohi adi isi ifau.”
Attati ni inyiak imi, ette ni itayiruna etuhe ajilohien hullo oluaji bebe, bebe, hullo owotia buo okudani ihiji, aseger ilohittok iko asaŋ hunne isui 'to buo lahou.
Idoloi nyia isi woŋ woŋ jiojio:
“Osiru jio Olosobe linyia ottohori
ifuotuniere aduaran, asaman, elofioro, agolon,
olohuo, akuatan iko etahabuyo.”
Etayiru nyia buo fe ni edolo hirre hunno oyyeuni 'daŋ; huttedou, hutta fau, hutto tua fau iko hutto tua hari enne ittokon…erre 'daŋ huno owoni 'to diya. Ojiori nyia isi jio:
“Hatawana 'tulaŋ 'tulaŋ, etahabuyo, olohuo, akuatan iko aduaran jio,
lia elle itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok iko jio Olosobe!”
Itarraŋi nyia asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to jiojio, “
Attati ni igonyuna Olosobe awalak eduanyit etteri jio eduanyiti huna hattarik, ette ni itaniŋuna obo jio asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to iloŋo te etuk anna ara ihuo etiri hilai jio, “Waŋ!”

Ami ni ihuania, ette ni igonyuna obo akusan aboŋ. Oŋuahatio nyia lia, linyia adahari 'to inyi, arraŋ. Isiarani nyia jihonyi egoriai, buo inyi ette leten addi a hetatturoni, irriehiniere amiorok honyi.
Attati Olosobe iwalak eduanyit etarrihi, ette ni itaniŋuna ariŋ etarrihi enne isu 'to ojio jio, “Waŋ!”
Ette obo akusan ariet ittuna. Isiori nyia agolon jio, lia linyia adahari 'to inyi, iyaŋuniere afere lifau jio, oŋida aati hutta fau ottohie ahuattek. Isiori nyia jihonyi ademi erremit enne ittok.

Attati Olosobe iwalak eduanyit etahunihi; ette ni itaniŋuna ariŋ etahunihi enne isu 'to ojio jio, “Waŋ!” Ami ni ihuania, ette ni igonyuna obo akusan emoli. Ottoŋotio nyia lia, linyia adahari 'to inyi, amijan ekemit.

Etayiru nyia ni obo ariŋ ihuo etuk, ottu tehiji hirre huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to, ette jiaran jio, “Iŋohini amoyya huno oloŋ abotie ikilo hifua ometi ijiai, buo fe iŋohini amoyya huno oloŋ abotie ikilohien hunihoi huno efua jatta ijiai. Ati hètarrohojata eŋuro iko amana fino!”
Attati Olosobe iwalak eduanyit etaŋuani; ette ni itaniŋuna ariŋ etaŋuani enne isu 'to ojio jio, “Waŋ!”

Ami ni ihuania, ette ni igonyuna obo akusan ahiddaŋ. Ifurani nyia lia, linyia adahari 'to inyi, Naye. Ijifuno nyia Amaji Hayak inyi nyik nyik. Isiarani nyia jihosi elohittok jio ebuanyit etaŋuani ono afau ittohiere aati ta arrem, ta ahure, ta aŋuai iko ta aciaŋi ahuanyak.
Attati Olosobe iwalak eduanyit etamiyeti; ette ni igonyuna oloholioo hia, hinyia ottohori te ettittoyo hosi asayyo Hollum onno oyyu. Owoni nyia oloholioo hunia iwoyo ititiek ehumi.
Iwuwoŋitai nyia isi jiojio, “Lamonye, Laduarani, olibo buo fe ara ahode! Many baya 'tadi ittu iyye iŋot eram waati hutta fau, inienuniere attohoro hosi hohoi.”
Aharani nyia jihosi 'daŋ ababo aboŋojin abuoŋi, ette iramana isi iyiriari obo kai, many ottubari anamba ono egiamak iko eruhok hullomuk 'daŋ hullo ofuoi ittohoro, ihuo ninyia ottohorik isi.
Oddoddouni nyia elelefi ifau ihua aŋabolo hunne hefolleji 'to hunne ipipuos oyyami onno ohut 'to bebe.
Olitohi nyia edou ihua agagar onno obobinie, buo ette ituhut adoŋiok 'daŋ ababo iko afuli ta masik hosi.
Attati obuok fau iko elettaha, ojio ajafiti oseŋer, asamak, aati hullo ohuji 'to bebe, atulo 'daŋ, apiti iko hullo obeŋi 'to arai apiti, idima inomi iko iwok muruoi hutto doŋiok.
Iloŋoi nyia isi adoŋiok iko amoruoi jiojio, “Okuahiniete jihohoi! Itihonia hohoi to hosiere lia elle itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok iko jio ajore ono Olosobe!
Nyio, afany oloŋ onno ofuarik isi ittigemiere aati 'daŋ. Ŋai adi oremik iwojuna inyi?”
Ihalu eram ania, egonyu ni ajilohien aŋuan owotiai iguli fau huna aŋuan, hulle itihotie oyyamihien huna aŋuan jio ŋadi obo oyyami ohut ifau, kuyya ihari enne ittokon, kuyya ohut obo ayyani.
Attati ni igonyuna obo ajilo ottu tetteduoŋi holoŋ, ollo owon iko emoi Hollum lesuoni; ette iloŋ woŋ woŋ ajilohien hula aŋuan hunyia isiori jihosi aduaran ittarrohojiere afau iko aari enne ittokon.
Ojio nyia ajilo lia jio, “Hètarrohojiata afau, kuyya aari enne ittokon, kuyya ayyani many ehananiere hohoi emoi ihomomite hegiamak hulo Hollum hohoi.”
Iramani nyia jihoŋ anamba ono aati hunyia ihanani emoi Hollum ihomomite hosi, alif esiha abotie iko atomuana aŋuan haŋuan (144,000). Ofuonni nyia isi jio awoi Israele huna 'tomon harrihai:

alif 'tomon harrihai (12,000) jio awoi hunia 'daŋ ababo, to woyo Yuda, to woyo Ruben, to woyo Gad, to woyo Aser, to woyo Naftali, to woyo Manase, to woyo Simion; to woyo Lefi, to woyo Isakar, to woyo Sebulun, to woyo Yosefu, iko to woyo Benyamin.

Ihalu eram ania, ami ni, ette ni igonyuna eluluŋ enne ittok bebe bebe, enne ittallik tulo ihenuna. Ofuonni nyia isi ta fauhien 'daŋ, to woi waati 'daŋ iko jio ekenita waati 'daŋ, ette iwotia ihosiere seger ilohittok iko ihosiere Olosobe. Iyyafatie nyia isi aboŋojin abuoŋi, buo ottoŋotie afore ihas hosi.
Iwuwoŋitai nyia isi jiojio, “Ottu etalahuno jio Hollum hohoi, elle itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok, iko jio Olosobe!”
Owotiai nyia ajilohien 'daŋ hullo okudani aseger ilohittok iko lahou buo asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to. Attati isi iruboho ifau ihosiere seger ilohittok, ette itahabuyo Hollum,
jiojio, “
Attati obo olo lahou ifiyo ani jiojio, “Haŋai aati hulle iyyafatie 'to hulia aboŋojin abuoŋi? Ofuonni isi tai?”
Etarraŋ nyia ni inyi jio, “Lettok, atimo ni; ati imijak iyye.”
Buo inyi ette jiaran jihoŋ, “Isi hulia aati, hulla amiri 'to ettigemio onno orroho 'to bebe. Amoti isi aboŋojin hosi to nooto ono Olosobe, oŋida obuori biny biny.
Inyi anna awattarik isi ihosiere seger ilohittok Hollum, buo fe igiamai jihonyi afanni iko arue 'daŋ. Buo lia, elle itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok, omijio isi onno oyyu, ta awanan honyi ikosi.
Obeŋi adi isi inyiahi niama, kuyya iboto. Obeŋ adi noloŋ kuyya obo anahan onno orroho, ottod isi;

nyio, ara adi Olosobe, ollo owon 'to ihiji maji anna awanari aseger ilohittok, a heyyahani hosi. Inyiamaru adi inyi isi jio olotilihi hari hunne iyaŋunie 'to nesu. Ifufuso adi Hollum neyyoo 'daŋ to hoŋite hosi.”
Ninyia awalak Olosobe eduanyit etahattarihi, oduaru nyia nedou lioo, many ihua anus saa.
Attati ni igonyuna ajilohien hula hattarik hullo owotiai 'to ihosiere Hollum. Isiarani nyia jihosi afurujuhien hattarik.

Teya, ottu nyia obo ajilo hama, ollo oŋuahatio akos 'yel esuahit ottogoŋ, ette iwotia iger ititiek ehumi. Isiarani nyia jihonyi ottogoŋ onno obolo, oŋida ofuanani jio emojiti waati Hollum 'daŋ. Ihumari nyia inyi ottogoŋ ania ihide ititiek ehumi anna ara 'to ayyel, ninyia owon 'to ihosiere seger ilohittok.
Attati afuro ottogoŋ iko emojiti waati Hollum idahan ahide ta has ajilo linyia owotia 'to ihosiere Hollum.
Attati ajilo lia iduhuna akos ono ottogoŋ, ette italluronia neema otto ititiek ehumi, ette iruasuna jio afau ana. Teya, owon nyia attorr hutuhe, etitta iko emedehita hilai buo olokitik.
Attati ajilohien hula hattarik, hullo owoni 'to iko afurujuhien hattarik, ihuhuma ihutari afurujuhien hunia.
Ohut nyia ajilo etteri afuruju honyi, buo afalaŋa iko neema enne iharrua iko nooto ette ijuhuno ifau. Otuk nyia eema ania aŋati etahunihi ono afau, ono ayyani iko amiyaŋ enne egara 'daŋ.
Attati ajilo etarrihi ihut afuruju honyi. Ibironi nyia itua hari enne ittokon, obo ariŋ anna ara ihua adoŋe enne ittok onno osuaharu. Oyito nyia aŋati etahunihi ono aari ania ahoto,
ette erre hunne isui 'to iko ababuri 'daŋ hunno owoni 'to jio aŋati ania ituho.
Attati ajilo etahunihi ihut afuruju honyi, ette obo elelef enne ittok bebe, enne inuaha ihua afattariya, ikuahuno tedou, ette ikuahino iŋati etahunihi ono oworio iko olotilihi.
(Afure elelef ania “Aduaran 'tek 'tek.”) Ette aŋati etahunihi ono ariak 'daŋ iduaran 'tek 'tek, buo arriai waati hunyia amati 'to aari hunia ette iye nyio, aduari aari hunia.

Attati ajilo etaŋuani ihut afuruju honyi. Itiriohi nyia aŋati etahunihi ono noloŋ, ono nayafa iko huno elelefi, ania obiaŋarik etahunihi ŋacio hosi inuahai. Jio aŋati etahunihi ono oloŋ abotie, obeŋ nyia noloŋ onok. Obeŋ nyia buo fe nayafa iko elelefi inuahai jio aŋati etahunihi ono attari.

Attati ni imi, ette ni itayiruna asollir iddarrata ihide dou, buo ikiana woŋ woŋ jiojio, “Eii arrohoji! Arrohoji! Orroho adi bebe jio aati 'daŋ hutta fau alla ahuti afurujuhien hunno ofuoi ajilohien hula hunihoi ihut.”
Attati ajilo etamiyeti ihut afuruju honyi, ette ni igonyuna elelef odou tedou ifau. Isiori nyia jihonyi eŋanyit ono ewure onno obeŋ esidi
Aŋany nyia inyi ewure ania, buo afuro ette ipuhuna teya ihua afuro onno ottu 'to jio eyali enne ittokon. Itik nyia afuro ania noloŋ ette afau 'daŋ iriok.
Attati namaa ittuna ifau to tua furo. Isiarani nyia jihosi ayili onno orriama agolon honyi iko ono etoni.
Iramani nyia isi hèlaha ittarrohojie amiyaŋ kuyya ayyani kuyya obo ariŋ enne isur 'to isur. Ati oremehini isi iriafuna aati hama hullo obeŋi 'to owoni iko emoi Hollum ihomomite hosi.
Obeŋi nyia aŋatani amaa ania ittohori aati hulia, ati, ittigemiere isi ayafajin miyet. Orriama nyia adiaha enne ittigemierek isi iko ediahit hitoni.
Jio ayafajin miyet hua, ottifiai adi aati naye, ati obeŋi adi onyurani inyi. Awahi adi isi iye, ati ofuho adi naye isi.
Ara nyia namaa nyia ihua akusani hunne ihuhumai 'to irumori ifere. Owoni nyia omuk asaŋ ihossi hosi hunna arai ihuo egoriahien 'yel, buo omomite hosi iyyaluni omomite waati,
buo oofir hosi iyyaluni oofir ŋotte, buo aala hosi iyyaluni huno elemie.
Owoni nyia buo fe omuk asaŋ isuhiara hosi ihua abilat emuhita suhe, buo etiri hiwwa hosi ara ihua akusani hunne ipihotie 'to akarlohien arriai hunne iburarai ifere.
Owon nyia amaa ania iko allisara buo ayili ihuo ono etoni. Ta ayili otto 'lisa honyi, oremik nyia inyi ittigem aati ayafajin miyet.
Owon nyia loobu olo amaa ania, inyi ajilo erririani olo newure onno obeŋ esidi. Anya afure honyi te ekiana Ebrei, Abaddon, buo to Grik anya Apolion (onno ojio 'to jio, “Etatturoni”).
Atuhoro arrohoji etabotie. Imijie, arrohojita arrihai hunno hofuoi ifuanna.
Attati ajilo etilleji ihut afuruju honyi, ette ni itaniŋuna netuk ottu to guli huna aŋuan huno etitiek 'yel ehumi, otto hosiere Hollum;
ette jiaran jio ajilo etilleji, “Ohohi ajilohien hula aŋuan hunyia ifitani ilowore enne ittokon ono Yufrets!”
Ania, ette ihohina ajilohien hula aŋuan hulia; hunyia ocoroni a hulo asaa ana, ahulo oloŋ ana, ahulo ayafa ana iko ahulo eeŋa ana, ittohori aŋati etahunihi ono eluluŋ tulo 'daŋ ta fau.
Iramani nyia jihoŋ jio, arai nyia oseŋer hunyia adahini 'to akusani amilioni esiha arrihai (200,000,000).

Ihua ana nyia oleyehinie jihoŋ ihuo arigia, akusani iko aati hulla adahai 'to tesi: iyyafani nyia aati hia isuhiara hosi abilat, hunno odori arieti ihuo eema, buo omuk iyyaluni amoruo onno opipiak emuluyak, buo omuk iyyaluni efuoto amunek. Iyyaluni nyia ossi akusani hunia, ossi lemio. Opuhutta nyia neema iko afuro buo efuoto amunek onno owulo ahima
Ottohori nyia ettigemita huna hunihoi huna, aŋati etahunihi ono eluluŋ tulo 'daŋ ta fau. Ettigemita hunno orrohoji 'to hunia huna; neema, nafuro iko efuoto amunek onno owulo 'to ahima.
Nyio, owon nyia agolon ono akusani hunia ihutuhe iko ilisara hosi. Arai nyia alisara hosi ihua amunuok hunno owoni iko nossi, hunne iriafuttarik isi aati.

Ati obeŋ nyia awoyo tulo 'daŋ, ninyia ofituno 'to jio ettigemita hunia, obusak arrohojita hunyia ihanie isi. Obeŋi nyia isi idehini amojo jio aminiaŋa iko jio arrijiorihien hunna arai 'to ayyel, abilat aboŋi, abilata ihuo efelek, amoruo iko etoi; isi arrijiorihien hunno obeŋi 'to omijie, itayirie kuyya adahai.
Obeŋi nyia buo fe isi idehini ehanita hosi huno attohio, emimuala, asomon kuyya ahoho.
Attati ni igonyuna obo ajilo elle ittok osuu tedou, ollo oburuhanio jio obo edohuo, buo atolohe owon ihou honyi. Ara nyia omom honyi ihuo noloŋ, buo eejek honyi arai ihuo awulori hima.
Oŋuahatio nyia inyi obo agagar ollo odiha alla awalaha ihani honyi, buo akaddak eeju iŋet honyi ihide hari enne ittok buo eeju ihorroŋ ihide fau;
ette iloŋ woŋ woŋ ihuo eguri lemie. Ninyia héloŋ inyi ihuania, ottoi etirita hilai huna hattarik itarraŋ te etitta.
Buo ninyia itayirunie etirita hunia, awak nyia ni igioronia eram hosi. Ati etayiru nyia ni obo etuk ottu tedou onno ojio, “Oduarai erre hunno ojiori etirita huna hattarik; hègiorok!”
Attati ajilo loduo egonyu ni owotia ihari iko ilotifor ikaf aani iŋet honyi attany edou,
ette ilama ta afure Hollum, lesuoni 'tulaŋ 'tulaŋ, layyani idou iko nafau buo aari enne ittokon iko erre hunno owoni 'to jihosi 'daŋ. Ojio nyia ajilo lia jio, “Obeŋ obo elliŋia inyiak iwanan!
Buo alla ahut ajilo etahattarihi afuruju honyi, itasiru adi Hollum egigilo honyi anna agalik 'to ofioro tulo, ihuo iramak nyia inyi jio egiamak honyi, hulla arai a hekianak honyi.”
Attati etuk, noduo etaniŋu ni ikiana tedou, inyiak jiaran jihoŋ jio, “Ilo iduhu agagar anna awalaha 'to, otto hani ajilo ollo owotia 'to ihide hari enne ittokon iko ifau.”
Ania, ette ni leten jio ajilo lia, ette ni imojuna jihonyi agagar ollo odiha 'to lia; buo inyi ette jiaran jihoŋ jio, “Hibe, inya. Odua adi inyi ihohe hoi, buo ofifil ihuo eesio ihutuk hoi.”
Efuotu nyia ni agagar lia ta hani honyi, ette ni inya. Ofifil nyia inyi ihutuk hoŋ ihuo eesio; buo odua 'tek 'tek ihohe hoŋ, ninyia adilo ni.
Attati iramana jihoŋ jio, “Ijiara luŋa iyye inyiak ittittoyo ariŋ onno olo Hollum ikiana jio awoi waati arriai, afauhien arriai, ekenita waati arriai iko jio oobuok arriai.”
Isiarani nyia jihoŋ atelek ekemit, ette iramana ani jio, “Ilo, okiama Aaji emojit enne ittokon ono Hollum iko etitiek ehumi. Ihiana hia, hullo omojoi 'to diya.
Ati hèkiem aloŋon hutteger. Idehi isi, nyio, isiori nyia isi jio,
Efak adi ni asuuti hoŋ hula arrihai, hulle iyyafatie 'to asuwali. Ittittoye adi isi asayyo Hollum jio oŋitek 1,260.”
Asuuti hula arrihai, isi ayyani huŋuro huna arrihai iko etawojita 'lomohien huna arrihai, hunno owotia 'to ihosiere Lamonye fau.
Alla awak obo iriafuna isi, ette neema ipuhuna to hutuhe hosi, ette ituk amiorok hosi. Ihuo nyia, ottohori adi atulo 'daŋ alla awak 'to iriafuna isi.

Owon aduaran jihosi itihiere edou oŋida ahide obeŋ asayo jio oŋitek hunne ittittoyerek isi asayyo Hollum. Owon buo fe aduaran jihosi iloiciere aari huno olotilik ahoto buo fe iyaŋuniere arrohojita 'daŋ lifau ihua awahi isi.
Ibibiatai adi ahuattek hosi bet bet ilofirihi bore gala ehittok, ninyia isihonierek Lamonye hosi. Afure anna ara 'to etahuti ono abore gala ania, inyi Sodom kuyya Masir.
Ofuonni adi aati ta fauhien 'daŋ iko to woi waati 'daŋ, ette iŋiŋiala ahuattek ayaak hulia oŋitek hunihoi iko anus. Obeŋi adi isi aŋatani ayaak hulia onuhani.
Omunoi adi aati hutta fau naye hosi. Ohiai adi isi ta amuno, ette isiorio esiorita jio mottiarak hosi, nyio, ittigemie nyia asuuti hula arrihai hulia aati hutta fau 'daŋ.
Ati ihalu oŋitek hunihoi iko anus, ottu nyia oloyiri ono nesu jio Hollum, ette ihudanio jihosi, ette isi iwotia ahide. Inef nyia abaŋi hia 'daŋ, hunyia igonyuni 'to isi.
Attati ekianak Hollum hula arrihai hulia, itayiruna etuk iloŋo tedou woŋ woŋ jiojio, “Ifuanna ihide dini!” Ette isi idahan lidou te edohuo, buo amiorok hosi omijie.

Ta asaa tonyia, odioto nyia olokitik onno orroho, ette aŋati etattomoni ono abore gala ania iritihoro, ette aati alif hattarik (7,000) ittohino; buo abaŋi ette inef ofitot, ette isi itahabuyo Hollum olo edou.
Atuhoro arrohoji etarrihi, ati, iliaha arrohoji etahunihi attuna!
Attati ajilo etahattarihi ihut afuruju honyi, ette etuhe iwuwoŋita idou jiojio, “Ilohittok Lamonye hohoi jio afau ana, inyi iko
Buo lahou hula atomuana arrihai haŋuan, hulle itoŋoi 'to isegeri ilohittok ihosiere Hollum, ette iruboho ifau, ette itahabuyo Hollum,
jiojio:
“Hollum Lamonye, Laduarani, ollo owon 'to ihuania, linyia buo fe owon 'to berien!
Esio hohoi ahumo jihoi nyio, iduhu iyye elohittok hoi anna agalik 'to
itte itterio elohittok!
Asuaharai atajia huno atimok hoi,
nyio, alum asaa ono ajore hoi,
asaa onno oŋocierek eram hayaak.
Alum asaa isiaraniere esiorio jio egiamak hoi, hulla arai a hekianak hoi,
iko aati hoi 'daŋ hulla abaŋi 'to iyye,
elettaha iko aati asai.
Alum asaa itamuhiniere attok waati hutta fau!”
Attati Aaji emojit enne ittokon ono Hollum ettedou iŋa, buo Asenuk Ecorit ette leyo teya. Owoni nyia diya emedehita iko etirita hilai, attor hutuhe, olokitik iko afalaŋa onno obolo.
Attati obo ariŋ, anna agalik ofioro waati, leyo lidou. Oleyo nyia obo aŋotte enne iyyafatio oloŋ, buo orriehi eejek honyi iyafa, buo iyyafatio egoriai ono elelefi 'tomon harrihai ihou honyi.
Iliaha nyia inyi esio, ette inyi iluaha bebe ta ahuanya hohe honyi.
Teya, inyiak obo ariŋ anna agalik ofioro waati leyo lidou. Oleyo nyia obo
Isuharu nyia inyi aŋati etahunihi ono elelefi huttedou, ta allisa honyi, ette iruasuna ifau. Owotia nyia inyi ihosiere aŋotte nyia nyio, awak nyia inyi ipusara eto linyia ofuoi isiuna.
Attati aŋotte ania isiuna eto 'le, ollo ottu 'to ilohittok jio aati hutta fau 'daŋ, obeŋ amehino. Ati, okuararai nyia leto lia addi, ette iyaru many jio Hollum iko aseger ilohittok honyi.
Buo aŋotte ania ofuhororo ihidiofo, imaji ninyia ihuhumak Hollum tenyi; amaji onno ofuarik imijiere inyi onno oyyu oŋitek 1,260.
Ati itatturi nyia
Opuasari nyia
Attati ni itayiruna obo etuk ikiana woŋ woŋ lidou jiojio, “Ihuania, attu etalahuno iko aduaran buo olobie ono Hollum hohoi! Attu buo fe elohittok ono
Itatturi eruhok inyi to nooto ono Olosobe iko te nelahode enne ittittoye isi. Obeŋi nyia isi abaŋi iyeri.

Iyye nedou, ijiara amuno hatawana jihoi iko jio hia hulla amanyai 'to jihoi! Ati orroho jihatai, nafau iko aari enne ittokon nyio, allu Olorroho jihatai! Ifut ajore jihonyi, nyio, omijak inyi jio iliaha oloŋ enne itawojierek egiama honyi.”
Ninyia amijak

Ati isiarani nyia aŋotte ania ewwa huna arrihai, huno asollir ellettok, oŋida inyi iddarrari teya many imaji honyi otto hidiofo; onno ofuarik imijiere inyi onno oyyu, aŋasi hunihoi iko anus, amaji enne irisari inyi addi jio
Attati
Ati oluak nyia afau aŋotte ania, ette iyama 'dak 'dak, ette iwosonia aari hunyia ifurrunie 'to to hutuk nyamanit.
Ijoria nyia
Owotia nyia
Iyyalu nyia ahuanyani nyia aworu, buo eejek honyi iyyaluni huno obo ahuanyani anna anya beyar
Oso nyia obo ahou honyi ihuo enne iriafuno onno orroho, ati aŋida nyia atoŋoso honyi ania. Illillihai nyia aati fau 'daŋ, ette ijifatio ahuanyani ania.
Itahabuyo nyia atulo 'daŋ
Aŋatani nyia ahuanyani ania imoriere Hollum te etahuoro honyi ahuan honyi, buo fe aŋatani jihonyi ilohittohori ayafajin atomuana aŋuan harrihai.
Attati ahuanyani ania itterio etarrohojio Hollum, afure honyi, amaji anna amanyari inyi iko hia 'daŋ hulla amanyai 'to lidou.
Aŋatani nyia jihonyi irriomoniere iko aati Hollum buo fe itatturiere isi. Aŋatani nyia inyi ilohittohori jio, afauhien 'daŋ, jio ekenita waati 'daŋ iko jio awoi waati 'daŋ.
Itahabuye adi aati hutta fau 'daŋ inyi, arari fe hia hama, hunyia igioronie afureta hosi ibuk ono nesu many hobeŋi oyyeuni afau. Ara abuk ania ahono Olosobe linyia ottohori.
“Alla awoni ayyaha jihoi, itaniŋie yo!
Alla ara jio oŋida anyarai iyye, anyarai adi iyye hode; buo fe alla ara jio oŋida oŋotori iyye, oŋotori adi iyye hode. Awak eram ania luŋa aati Hollum oŋida odulori awanan iko adihan buo eruk.”
Attati ni inyiak igonyuna obo ahuanyani ojiŋu to tua fau. Owon nyia inyi iko amuarrak arrihai ihuo huno aker, buo amala ihua
Igiamari nyia inyi elohittok 'daŋ ono ahuanyani etteri ihosiere honyi. Orosok nyia inyi afau iko aati honyi 'daŋ itahabuyere ahuanyani etteri, ninyia aŋida atoŋoso.
Ihanio nyia ahuanyani etarrihi ania eduariti hunno ogoli bebe. Ihosiere waati 'daŋ, itapuasu nyia inyi eema tedou, ifau.

Inyob nyia ahuanyani ania aati 'daŋ ta fau, te eduariti hunyia aŋatani jihonyi ihaniere ihosiere ahuanyani etteri. Iramak nyia inyi isi ihuhumuniere arrijiori, igiluttari ahuanyani ninyia ottohori ta ademi erremit, buo ette inyiak isu.
Aŋatani nyia ahuanyani etarrihi ihudaniere oloyiri ono nesu jio arrijiori ahuanyani etteri jio, oŋida inyi oremik ikiana, buo fe itattohori aati 'daŋ hullo obeŋi 'to itahabuye inyi.
Orosok nyia ahuanyani ania jio, ijiara ihanani eherit ihani iŋet kuyya ihomom tulo 'daŋ; elettaha iko aati asai, asamak iko alociaŋak, apiti iko hullo obeŋi 'to arai apiti.
Obeŋ nyia tulo oremik inyiaŋa kuyya itinyiaŋa buo obeŋ owon iko eherit ania. Eherit ania, inyi afure ono ahuanyani ania kuyya anamba onno owotia imaji afure ania.
Awak eram ania ofioro. Lia, ollo owon 'to iko ahou, inyi oremik imijana awoyo hiram ono anamba ahuanyani ania nyio, owotia anamba ania imaji fure obo atulo. Anamba honyi, 666.
Etayiru nyia ni obo netuk ottu tedou. Okuat nyia inyi ihuo ecuri hari kuyya ihuo etiri hilai. Itir nyia inyi ihua adorri hunne irribie erribok hosi.

Idoloi nyia aati hula 144,000 afure aŋejuk ihosiere seger ilohittok, ihosiere asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to iko ihosiere lahou. Obeŋ nyia tulo ittiyenu afure enne idoloi isi ania, arari fe isi hama hunyia italahuni ta fau.

Isi hulia, hullo obeŋi 'to itiboti ahuattek hosi te erre ŋoruo. Obeŋ obo jihosi ottir aŋotte. Isi hulia hulle ijifatie 'to Olosobe imasik 'daŋ hunna alari inyi. Italahuni nyia isi tehiji waati 'daŋ. Arai isi etterita isiorita hunyia isiori jio Hollum iko jio Olosobe.
Obeŋi nyia itayiruni obo agesem to hutuhe hosi, nyio, obeŋi nyia isi ipali.

Attati ni igonyuna obo ajilo idarrata ihide dou. Owoni nyia Asayyo Ayijok hunno osioi 'to 'tulaŋ jihonyi, iramaniere jio aati hutta fau 'daŋ, awoi waati 'daŋ, jio ekenita waati 'daŋ iko jio afauhien 'daŋ.

Ikiana nyia inyi woŋ woŋ jio jio, “Abaŋata Hollum buo fe isiatta jihonyi akuatan! Nyio, attu asaa onno oŋociere inyi eram waati 'daŋ. Itahabuyete inyi, ayyani olo nedou iko nafau buo aari enne ittokon iko olotilihi 'daŋ!”

Ijifak nyia buo fe obo ajilo etahunihi jio hula arrihai hulia, ette ikiana woŋ woŋ jiojio, “Hia, hunyia itahabuye 'to ahuanyani iko arrijiori honyi, buo fe ifuotuni eherit honyi ihomomite kuyya ihas hosi,

amati adi buo fe isi abalu Hollum enne iyaŋuno 'to ajore honyi, enne idolok inyi ilamatit te eloŋojita! Ihosiere ajilohien aliborok iko ihosiere Olosobe, ittigemie adi hia 'daŋ hulle ihani 'to ihuo nyia, te eema iko te efuoto onno owulo 'to ahima.
'Tulaŋ 'tulaŋ, odulo adi afuro duk duk ono eema enne ittigemio isi. Afanni iko arue, obeŋ adi ayiri jio hia 'daŋ hulle itahabuye 'to ahuanyani iko arrijiori honyi, buo fe ifuotuni eherit fure honyi.”
Jio aati Hollum, hullo ogottierek 'to efahita honyi buo fe iruhi Yesu, awak eram ania oŋida isi odulori adihan.
Attati ni itaniŋuna obo etuk ottu tedou onno ojio jio, “Igiorok eram ana: Itterio ahana many moi, hotomunohi hia hullo orumani 'to naye te negiama hosi jio Lamonye!”
Itarraŋ Oloholio jio, “Obis hode jio, oyiri adi isi jio afuto hosi, nyio, ofuoi adi ehanita hosi ikiana tesi!”
Attati ni imi, ette ni igonyuna obo edis aboŋ, buo obo ariŋ itoŋo ihide honyi enne iyyalu atulo, enne iyyafatio egoriai 'yel ihou honyi, buo owon iko ademi edeŋit ihani honyi.
Attati ajilo ollobo ijiŋuna to tua haji emojit enne ittokon, ette iloŋo woŋ woŋ jio, “Odioŋori ademi hoi, nyio, alum oloŋ ono adioŋo; aŋida amana atta fau!”
Attati lia, linyia itoŋo 'to ihide idis idioŋori ademi honyi, ette deŋuna amana atta fau.
Attati ni igonyuna ajilo ollobo ojiŋu to tua haji emojit enne ittokon ettedou. Owon nyia buo fe inyi iko ademi edeŋit onno ofi.

Attati ajilo ollobo ijiŋuna te ititiek ehumi; inyi ajilo attoŋoni hima. Ikiana nyia inyi woŋ woŋ jio ajilo linyia owon 'to iko ademi edeŋit onno ofi 'to jiojio, “Iduhu ademi hoi, oŋeru eŋija fino hutto mana fau hunia, nyio, adori isi.”
Ania, ette ajilo lia iŋiarari ademi honyi, ette iŋeruna eŋijiti fino to 'yani hosi, ette ibironia imotit fino ono ajore Hollum.
Omocie nyia eŋijiti fino hunia imotit fino onno owon 'to iller bore gala, ette nooto itihuna te motit fino ania, ette ittittor amaili esiha arrihai. Ara nyia awudori honyi ihuo ayardahien arrihai.

Attati ni igonyuna obo etamijani idou onno ogol enne iyaŋuno ellilliha. Egonyu nyia ni nyia omuk ajilohien hattarik hullo owoni iko ettigemita hattarik, hunna arai 'to esidita, nyio isid ajore Hollum tesi.

Attati ni igonyuna obo ariŋ anna ara ihua atafar gilas enne iharuto iko neema. Owotiai nyia aati iger honyi, buo oŋuahatie adorri hunyia isiarak Hollum jihosi. Isi hulia aati hunyia itatturi 'to ahuanyani iko arrijiori honyi buo fe itatturi lia, linyia ara anamba afure honyi.
Idoloi nyia isi afure ono Mose egiamani Hollum iko afure ono Olosobe onno ojio 'to jio:
“Eii, Hollum Lamonye Laduarani,
obolori ehanita hoi buo fe oyiji bebe!
Hobu olo afauhien
obisi ehanita hoi buo fe arai hode!
Lamonye! Ŋai 'tadi ollo obeŋ 'to abaŋ afure hoi?
Ŋai 'tadi ollo obeŋ 'to itahabuyo afure hoi?
Iyye hama ololibo.
Ofuonni adi afauhien 'daŋ itahabuyo iyye,
nyio, igonyuni isi 'daŋ abisan ono ehanita hoi.”
Ihalu erre hunia, ette ni igonyuna aaji musiama ettedou aŋaa, buo Amaji Elibo owon itua honyi.
Jio amusiama ania, ojiŋuni nyia ajilohien hattarik hullo owoni iko ettigemita hattarik. Iyyafatie nyia isi aboŋojin hunno olibori buo opipiahi, buo fe ottodoni agasi 'yel isuhiara hosi.
Attati obo tehiji asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to isiarana arranyi 'yel hattarik jio ajilohien hula hattarik. Ifuti nyia arranyi hunia iko ajore Hollum ollo osio 'to 'tulaŋ 'tulaŋ.
Ifut nyia afuro, onno ottu 'to jio akuatan iko jio aduaran Hollum, itua haji musiama. Obeŋ nyia tulo oremik jiŋara diya many otuhorik ettigemita hattarik hunyia iyaŋunie ajilohien hula hattarik.
Attati ni itayiruna obo etuk onno okuat ikiana to tua haji musiama jio ajilohien hula hattarik jio, “Ifuatta iluahina arranyi jore Hollum huna hattarik ifau!”

Ania, ette ajilo etteri iluahina arrany honyi attany afau, buo atoŋos hunno orrohoji buo fe omiji bebe ette isur ihuattek waati hunyia owoni 'to iko eherit ono ahuanyani, buo fe ihuattek hia hunyia itahabuye 'to arrijiori honyi.
Attati ajilo etarrihi iluahina arrany honyi itua hari enne ittok, buo aari ette irahan ihuo nooto tulo ayaani, buo asaŋ hutto tua hari ette iye.
Attati ajilo etahunihi iluahina arrany honyi itua oworio iko ilottilihi, buo isi ette irahan a hoto.
Attati ni itayiruna ajilo amijani hari ikiana jiojio,
“Eii, Lolibo! Obis eram enne iŋot iyye; iyye elle iwon 'to ihuania buo fe iwon nyia berien.
Nyio, itawouni nyia isi nooto waati Hollum iko ono ekianak honyi 'daŋ. Ihuania, itamat iyye isi nooto, ihuo osiru tesi!”
Attati ni itayiruna obo etuk ottu tetitiek ehumi onno ojio jio, “Eii, Hollum Lamonye, Laduarani! Obisi eŋotiti hiram hoi buo fe arai ahode!”
Attati ajilo etaŋuani iluahina arrany honyi ihide holoŋ. Aŋatani nyia oloŋ isuahiere aati te enohit honyi onno orroho 'to bebe.
Osuak nyia enohit onno orroho 'to ania aati, ette isi imorio afure Hollum, ollo owon 'to iko aduaran itihotiere ettigemita hunia. Ati obeŋi nyia isi idehini eyyata hosi, ette itahabuyo inyi.
Attati ajilo etamiyeti iluahina arrany honyi iseger ilohittok ono ahuanyani ania, ette obuore ahuanyani ania irahan edumele, ette aati iruta aala hosi te eram diaha onno owon 'to jihosi.
Ta adiaha toŋos hosi, omorie isi Hollum ettedou. Ati, obeŋi nyia isi idehini ehanita hosi hunno orrohoji 'to hunia.
Attati ajilo etilleji iluahina arrany honyi ihari Yufrets enne ittokon, ette itayoho aari ania ihuhumaniere nekoi jio obuok hullo ofuonni 'to teduoŋi holoŋ.

Attati ni igonyuna oloholioo hunihoi hunno orrohoji, hunne iyyaluni eddodduohi. Ojiŋuni nyia eddodduohi hunia to hutuk nyamanit, to hutuk hahuanyani iko to hutuk ekianani enyabani ollo ojio 'to jio ekiana inyi eram Hollum.
Isi hunia oloholioo miniaŋa hunyia, owoni 'to iko agolon ihaniere eduariti. Iluri nyia isi jio oobuok hutta fau 'daŋ, ittuttubaniere isi ifere to Oloŋ enne ittokon ono Hollum, Laduarani.
“Itaniŋiete! Attu adi ni ihuo olohoho. Hotomunoi lia, ollo odulo 'to amijio, buo fe odulo erriria aboŋojin honyi jio ŋadi inyi adaha ihiji waati aŋaturoi, ette ariri inyahina inyi.”
Ottubani nyia oloholioo hunia oobuok 'daŋ jio amaji anna anya Armageddon, te ekiana Ebrei.
Attati ajilo etahattarihi iluahina arrany honyi iloyyami. Itayiruno nyia etuk onno okuat to seger ilohittok otto haji musiama, onno ojio jio, “Atuhuno!”
Owoni nyia diya, emedehita iko etirita hilai, attor hutuhe iko olokitik onno orroho bebe. Hobeŋ obo olokitik ara ihuo ania, many hoyyeuni atulo ifau. Agalik nyia arrohoji ono olokitik ania 'daŋ!

Oguak nyia inyi Babilonia, abore gala ehittok, aŋacio hunihoi, ette buo fe itaritihoro aborejin gala hutta fauhien 'daŋ. Ogilu nyia Hollum Babilonia, abore gala ehittok, ette itamatana inyi abalu te ematit honyi…abalu ono ajore honyi onno orroho 'to bebe.
Olitohini nyia afuli 'daŋ, buo fe adoŋiok 'daŋ ette ituhoro.

Attati afalaŋa onno obolo, iddoddouna tedou jio aati, many omorierek isi Hollum te eram afalaŋa ania; nyio orroho nyia afalaŋa ania bebe. Ara nyia addiŋi falaŋati honyi ihuo akilohien atomuana aŋuan homiyet.

Attati obo tehiji ajilohien hula hattarik, hunyia oŋuahatie 'to arranyi huna hattarik, ittuna ette jiaran jihoŋ, “Waŋ, etahutak adi ni iyye aŋai ofuoi ittigemio esomo onno ohu 'to; abore gala, ehittok, ninyia oduhoni iger hariak arriai.
Ajotorik obuok fau 'daŋ inyi, buo ehanita honyi hunno orrohoji 'to ette itaruma aati ta fau 'daŋ ihuo alla amati isi abalu.”

Iyyafatio nyia aŋotte ania aboŋo erigie iko ariet, buo oburuhak ahuan honyi ta ayyel iko ta amoruoi hunno opipiahi 'to buo asihira hunna arai emuluyak. Oŋuahatio nyia inyi ematit anna ara ayyel, enne ifut iko ehanita somon honyi hunno oŋuoji buo fe iboti.
Igioroni nyia ihomom honyi afure anna agalik awoyo hiram honyi ofioro waati, onno ojio jio: “Ani Babilonia, abore gala ehittok, nonye somok iko erre arrohojak hutta fau 'daŋ.”
Egonyu nyia ni aŋotte ania oruma nooto waati Hollum iko ono aati hunyia ottohori te ejifatio hosi Kristo.
Ellilliha nyia ni bebe, ninyia egonyu ni inyi.

Ania, ifiyere ajilo alia nani jiojio, “Nyio illilliha iyye? Ekukubok adi ni jihoi awoyo hiram ono aŋotte ania, anna agalik 'to ania ofioro waati iko ono ahuanyani anna akafatio 'to ania inyi; onno owon 'to iko ossi hattarik buo amuarrak 'tomon.

Berien, isu nyia ahuanyani ania, ati ihuania abeŋ inyi. Iliaha inyi ajiŋuna to tua iwure onno obeŋ esidi, ette tibuo ifadara inyi. Te eram honyi, illillihai adi aati hutta fau, hia hunyia obeŋi afureta hosi igioronie ibuk ono esuok many tetteri fau. Isu nyia inyi berien, ihuania abeŋ, ati inyiak adi inyi icohuno.
“Awak eram ania atulo elle ilofioro. Ossi huna hattarik, isi adoŋiok hattarik hunne itoŋori aŋotte ania. Isi buo fe oobuok hula hattarik.
Ayei oobuok miyet tehiji oobuok hulia, buo abotie harasa ilohittok; buo ollobo hobeŋ ottu. Alla attu inyi, ottu adi inyi ilohittok oŋitek kaiyo.
Alla ara eram ahuanyani ninyia isu 'to berien, buo abeŋ ihuania, inyi etahattarihi hobuok, ollo ottu 'to irahan oobu etahottohunihi, ollo ofuoi tibuo ifadara.
“Amuarrak huna 'tomon hoduo igonyu iyye, isi oobuok hula 'tomon, hullo hobeŋi 'to ilohobuji. Ati isiarani adi jihosi elohittok ilohobujori asaa abotie, isi arabotie iko ahuanyani.
Owoni isi 'daŋ iko egigilo abotie, buo fe isi isiori agolon iko elohittok hosi 'daŋ jio ahuanyani.
Irumoni adi isi Olosobe. Ati itattur adi Olosobe isi, nyio, inyi Lamonye alla agalik 'to 'daŋ, buo fe a Hobu alla agalik 'to 'daŋ. Arai lejifak honyi eloŋot, olonyimot buo fe ahayijok.”
Ojio nyia buo fe ajilo lia jihoŋ jio, “Oloworio hoduo igonyu iyye itoŋori nonye somok, isi eluluŋi woi waati 'daŋ, jio afauhien 'daŋ.
Buo amuarrak huna 'tomon iko ahuanyani hoduo igonyu iyye, oliwarik adi isi nesomo ania. Iyarai adi isi erre honyi 'daŋ, ette idiaharu inyi aŋaturoi. Ohonyai adi isi inyi, ette isuahina ihima.
Nyio, Hollum nyia ihanak itajia oobuok hulia egigilo arabotie buo fe isiaraniere agolon hosi jio ahuanyani ania. Ihanie adi isi ihuo nyia many itasirunierek ekenita Hollum.
“Aŋotte noduo igonyu iyye, inyi abore gala ehittok enne ilohittohori oobu honyi oobuok 'daŋ hutta fau.”
Ihalu erre hunia, egonyu ni obo ajilo ottu tedou. Owon nyia inyi iko elohittok, buo akuatan honyi ette itafaŋ afau 'daŋ;

ette ikiana woŋ woŋ jiojio, “Akuaharu tibuo inyi! Akuaharu tibuo Babilonia, abore gala ehittok! Amanyarik inyi aminiaŋa, oloholioo hunno orrohoji 'to, awoi heny 'daŋ hunno orrohoji 'to iko hunne iboti 'to.

Nyio, itaruma inyi awoi waati 'daŋ te esomiti honyi hunna agalihini 'to 'daŋ, ihuo enne itamat inyi isi abalu. Ojotorik obuok fau 'daŋ inyi, buo apocok hutta fau ette isaman ta asomon honyi onno orroho 'to.”
Attati ni itayiruna obo etuk hama tedou ojio:
“Aati hoŋ, ifuanna addi to Babilonia!
Hèjiŋana luŋa jio eyyata honyi;
ŋadi ifuatta irumana ettigemita hunno olo inyi irumana!
Nyio, ifuroi eyyata honyi delle many lidou,
agilu buo fe Hollum eyyata honyi.
Ihaniete jihonyi ihuo ihanio inyi jihatai.
Inienuna enyiahita arrihai ehanita 'daŋ hunne ihan inyi jihatai.
Itufutana ilamatit honyi abalu onno odua 'to bebe enyiahita arrihai,
agalik ninyia isiarak inyi jihatai.
Isiatta jihonyi ettigemio iko ejiriŋa onno oremik 'to
te etahuoro honyi ahuan honyi iko ta amanya honyi te etadara.
Nyio odulo nyia ekiana hama jiojio:
‘Etoŋo ni ihuania, a hobu!
Abeŋ ni ara ehidak,
abeŋ ni ajio arumak obo ejiriŋa!’
Te eram ania, orumak adi inyi obo oloŋ ettigemita…
aŋuai, ejiriŋa, iko ahure.
Osuahini adi inyi Ihima,
nyio, odua Hollum Lamonye, ollo oŋot 'to eram honyi.”
Atarihai adi oobuok fau hunyia ojotorik 'to inyi buo fe amanyai ikonyi arabotie te etadara. Oyyooi adi isi elle igonyuni isi afuro hima onno oŋiyo 'to inyi.
Itabaŋi adi ettigemita hunne ifuotu inyi isi, ette isi iwotia alamarai, ette jiaran, “Yii nani! Yii nani! Babilonia, abore gala ehittok onno ohu 'to! Ihuania, attu ettigemio jihoi turunyaŋ!”
Te eram honyi, atarihai adi apocok hutta fau buo oyyooi, nyio, abeŋ tulo inyiak inyiaŋa erre hosi.

Abeŋ tulo inyiaŋu jihosi ayyel, abilata aboŋ, amoruoi hunno opipiahi 'to iko asihira hunna arai emuluyak; aboŋojin hunne igarawaji, hunna arai eregio iko hunno odori; awoi heyek 'daŋ hunno oŋuoji gir gir, erre 'daŋ hunne ihuhumuni to halai tome, to heyek hunno ogoli te enyiaŋa, te efelek, to bilata iko to moruoi hunne ilamani 'to.
Obeŋ nyia tulo inyiaŋu jihosi, awoi riahien iko ayali 'daŋ hunne iyalai; afino, eyali huŋuro, neefua, nemma, nesuŋ, akioro, akusani iko akarlohien, apiti iko aati hullomuk.
Ojiori nyia apocok jihonyi jio, “Abeŋi erre 'daŋ hunyia iwak iyye a hunohoi. Atuhoroi esamiti iko elamanita hoi; ibeŋ adi iyye inyiak irumana isi!”
Itabaŋi adi ettigemita hunne ifuotu abore gala ania apocok hunyia orumani 'to esamiti ta apoco hosi diya. Owotia adi isi alamarai ette iyyoo buo ijiriŋai,

ette jiaran, “Yii nani! Arroho jio abore gala ehittok! Iyyafatio nyia inyi aboŋojin hunne igarawaji, hunna arai eregio iko hunno odori; buo fe oburuhak ahuan honyi ta ayyel iko ta amoruoi hunno opipiahi 'to buo asihira hunna arai emuluyak.
Ati jio turubeny, atuhoroi esamiti honyi 'daŋ ta asaa abotie.”
Owotiai nyia ajafiti hayirok baburi alamarai; isi iko adak baburi buo ayirok baburi iko aati hullomuk 'daŋ, hulla amanyai 'to ta apoco itua hari enne ittok.
Ninyia igonyuni isi afuro hima ninyia oŋiyo 'to Babilonia, ette isi jiaran, “Anani bore gala onno orriamari 'to iko abore gala ehittok ania!”

Opurani nyia isi aboro ihossi hosi, ette iluluo buo fe oyyooi jiojio, “Yii nani! Arroho jio abore gala ehittok! Abore gala ninyia asamarik aati hullo opocoi 'to itua hari enne ittokon ta ababuri, ta asaman ottononyi! Ati, jio turubeny, atuhoroi erre honyi 'daŋ ta asaa abotie!”
Ijiara amuno hatawana lidou, jio aati Hollum, jio lefahat iko jio ekianak Hollum; nyio, aŋotok Hollum epali jihonyi te ehanita honyi jihatai.

Attati obo ajilo ellettok iduhuna amoruo anna ara ihuo nonye hiriai, ette iruoŋonia itua hari enne ittok, ette jiaran, “Ihua ana adi opuasari Babilonia, abore gala ehittok. Obeŋ adi inyi inyiak iwanan.
Teyya, obeŋi adi inyiahi itayiruna erribok dorri, edolok, ahutak cuwali, iko ahutak furuju. Otuhoroi adi buo fe ehuhumak hirre hatai 'daŋ; obeŋi adi erieyo hatai inyiak itayiruno!
Obeŋ adi obo allomo inyiak iwulori jihoi. Obeŋ adi obo ayama inyiak iwanan dinia. Agalihini nyia apocok hoi apocok 'daŋ ta fau. Inyobio nyia iyye aati 'daŋ ta fau ta abuana hoi!”
Itua bore gala hoi, onyurani nyia nooto hekianak Hollum iko ono aati honyi buo ono aati 'daŋ hunyia ottohori ta fau.

Ihalu erre hunia, etayiru ni obo ariŋ ihuo attorr hutuhe ono eluluŋ waati enne ittok ettedou. Iwuwoŋitai nyia isi jiojio, “Hétahabuyete Hollum! Arai etalahuno iko aduaran buo akuatan a huno Hollum hohoi!
Obisi eŋotiti hiram honyi buo fe arai hode! Nyio, aŋotok inyi epali jio ehujo somok ninyia ittarrohojio 'to afau te esomiti honyi. Ittigem Hollum inyi inienuniere nooto ono egiamak honyi.”
Attati isi inyiak iwuwoŋita jiojio, “Hétahabuyete Hollum! 'Tulaŋ 'tulaŋ, adok ahide afuro hima onno oŋiyo 'to abore gala ehittok ania!”
Attati lahou hula atomuana arrihai haŋuan iko asaŋ huna aŋuan hunne isui 'to irigoŋo ifau, ette itahabuyo Hollum, linyia itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok. Ojiori nyia isi jiojio, “
Attati obo etuk itayiruno to seger ilohittok onno ojio jio, “Itahabuyete Hollum hohoi, itai egiamak honyi 'daŋ, itai 'daŋ hulle ibaŋata 'to inyi, ikatai 'daŋ aati asai iko elettaha!”
Attati ni itayiruna obo ariŋ ihuo attor hutuhe ono eluluŋ waati, ihuo ecuri hari kuyya ihuo etiri hilai. Ojiori nyia isi jio, “Hétahabuyete Hollum! Nyio, Hollum hohoi Laduarani, Lamonye, inyi Hobu!
Hamunoti buo fe esahuta! Hétahabuyete akuatan honyi! Nyio, alum ayama ono Olosobe, buo fe oduoti onno olo inyi iyemuna, ihuhum ahuan honyi.
Itiyyafani jihonyi aboŋo enne ilaman buo fe opipiak.” (Itahutak aboŋo ania ehanita waati Hollum hunno obisi 'to.)

Aruboho nyia ni ifau ihosiere hejek honyi itahabuyere inyi, buo inyi ette jiaran jihoŋ, “Hèhanio ihou nyia! Ara ni a hegiamani ihuo iyye, buo fe ihuo eruhok hullomuk 'daŋ, hullo ogottierek 'to elahode ninyia italeyehi Yesu. Itahabuye Hollum!”
Elahode ania nyia itajiŋak ekenita itajia hekianak Hollum.
Attati ni igonyuna edou aŋaa. Owon nyia obo akusan aboŋ diya. Iloŋoi nyia lia, linyia adahari 'to inyi, oloyijio alla ara 'to hode. Obis aŋocio hiram honyi iko erumita honyi.
Owulori nyia oŋite honyi ihuo eema. Iyyafatio nyia inyi egoriahien arriai ihou honyi. Igioroni nyia obo afure jihonyi, onno obeŋ tulo omijak arari fe inyi hama.
Iyyafatio nyia inyi aboŋo onno owon iko nooto. Afure honyi “Ekiana Hollum.”
Ijifani nyia inyi oseŋer huttedou, hunyia adahai 'to ta akusani, buo iyyafani aboŋojin abuoŋi hunne ilamani buo fe opipiahi.

To hutuk honyi, ojiŋu nyia ademi erremit onno ofi 'to, itatturiere afauhien. Ilohittok adi inyi jio afauhien hunia obeŋ amehino. Omot adi inyi eŋijiti fino imotit fino anna ara 'to ajore Hollum Laduarani.
Jio aŋati boŋo enne itihok 'to olohuya honyi, igioro nyia afure ana: “Inyi Hobu alla agalik 'to 'daŋ buo fe ara a Lamonye alla agalik 'to 'daŋ.”
Attati ni igonyuna obo ajilo owotia ihide holoŋ, ette ikiana woŋ woŋ jio aheny 'daŋ hunyia iddarratai 'to ihide idou jiojio, “Ifuanna, ettubanio jio agari Hollum enne ittokon!
Ifuanna ehonya oobuok, ajafiti, oseŋer, akusani iko aati hunyia adaharik 'to isi. Ifuanna ehonya aati 'daŋ; apiti iko hullo obeŋi 'to arai apiti, elettaha iko aati asai.”
Attati ni igonyuna ahuanyani iko oobuok hutta fau buo oseŋer hosi. Ottubanie nyia isi irriomoniere iko lia, linyia adaha 'to ta akusan, buo fe irriomoniere iko oseŋer honyi.

Anyarai nyia ahuanyani ania iko ekianani enyabani ollo ojio 'to jio ekiana inyi eram Hollum, linyia ihanio 'to eduariti ihosiere ahuanyani ania. (Inyob nyia inyi aati hunyia ifuotuni 'to eherit ahuanyani ania iko hia, hunyia itahabuye 'to arrijiori honyi.) Ibironi nyia isi 'daŋ arrihai hesui itua tafar ono efuoto amunek onno owulo 'to ahima.
Buo ottohori oseŋer hosi ta ademi erremit ninyia ojiŋu 'to to hutuk lia, linyia adaha 'to ta akusan. Attati aheny 'daŋ ihonya isi many oyuhorik.
Attati ni igonyuna obo ajilo ottu tedou ollo oŋuahatio eŋanyit ono newure onno obeŋ esidi, buo fe oŋuahatio aririk hunno oddiŋi.
Inefu nyia inyi

Attati ajilo ipuasara inyi itua iwure onno obeŋ esidi, ette ihianana inyi, ette iduanyana rid rid jio ŋadi inyiak inyobio afauhien many ottubarik aŋasi alif abotie. Buo diya, ohohini adi luŋa inyi obo kai.

Attati ni igonyuna asegeri ilohittok iko hia hinyia itoŋoi 'to ihide hosi. Isiori nyia jio aati hulia agolon iŋociere eram waati. Egonyu nyia buo fe ni oloholioo waati hunyia ottohori te ettittoyo hosi elahode ninyia italeyehi Yesu iko ekiana Hollum. Aati hulia hinyia obeŋi 'to itahabuye ahuanyani iko arrijiori honyi, buo fe obeŋi ifuotuni eherit honyi ihomomite hosi kuyya ihas hosi. Inyiahi isi isu, ette ilohittok iko Kristo aŋasi alif abotie.
(Obeŋi nyia ayaak hullomuk ibuhuni many otuhorik aŋasi huna alif abotie.) Etteri itubuhuna hayaak ania.

Hotomunohi buo fe hotoliborohi hia, hulle ihiananie 'to jio nebuhuna ania. Obeŋ naye etarrihi inyiak iwanan iko agolon jihosi. Arai adi isi ahehumak hulo Hollum iko Kristo. Ilohittohi adi isi iko Kristo aŋasi alif abotie.
Alla atuhoi aŋasi huna alif abotie, ohohini adi Sittan to babus.
Ilur adi inyi afau 'daŋ, enne iloŋoi Gok iko Magok, inyobiere atulo 'daŋ ta fau. Ottubak adi inyi atulo 'daŋ ifere. Oluaji adi isi ihua asuluŋayo otto otifor hari enne ittokon.
Isarrari adi isi afau 'daŋ, ette ikolonia amaji onno ottubarik aati Hollum iko abore gala onno obuor ataji honyi. Ati, ottu adi neema tedou, ette ituk isi.

Teya, iruoŋoni nyia Olorroho, linyia inyobio 'to aati, itua tafar hima iko itua hifuoto amunek onno owulo 'to ahima, amaji ninyia ibironierek ahuanyani iko ekianani enyabani ollo ojio 'to jio ekiana inyi eram Hollum. Diya, ittigemio adi isi 'tulaŋ 'tulaŋ, afanni iko arue 'daŋ.
Attati ni igonyuna aseger ilohittok enne ittok onno obuor, buo obo atulo itoŋo diya. Ofuhororoi nyia nafau iko nedou to hosiere honyi, ette biaŋan inyiak leyo.

Egonyu nyia buo fe ni ayaak; elettaha iko aati asai, owotiai ihosiere seger ilohittok. Aŋai nyia abuhi; attati buo fe iŋa abuk onnobo. Abuk ono nesu nyia ania. Oŋoti nyia eram hayaak ihuo oremehini te ehanita hosi hunne igioroni jio abuhi hunia.
Attati aari enne ittokon iŋatana ayaak honyi; ette buo fe aye iko amaji hayaak iŋatana ayaak hosi. Oŋoti nyia neram hosi 'daŋ ihuo oremehini te ehanita hosi.
Attati ibironia aye iko amaji hayaak itafar hima. (Ara atafar hima ania, aye etarrihi.)
Ibironi nyia buo fe jio atafar hima ania, aati 'daŋ hunyia obeŋi afureta hosi igioronie jio abuk ono nesu.
Attati ni igonyuna abore gala elibo, Yerusalem aŋejuk, ottu jio Hollum tedou. Ihuhum nyia inyi ahuan honyi ihuo oduoti onno ofuoi iyama, onno olo 'to iruaŋanio iko ayamani honyi.
Etayiru nyia ni etuk onno okuat ikiana to seger ilohittok jiojio, “Ihuania, awon ahaŋ Hollum ihiji waati! Itoŋo adi inyi ikosi, arai adi isi a waati honyi. Owon adi Hollum ta ahuan honyi ikosi.
Ifufuso adi inyi eyyoo 'daŋ to hoŋite hosi. Obeŋ adi naye, obeŋ adi buo fe eyyoo kuyya adiaha; nyio, atuhoroi erre eberien.”

Attati lia, linyia itoŋo 'to iseger ilohittok jiaran, “Ihuania, ehan ni erre 'daŋ aŋejuho!” Ojio nyia buo fe inyi jihoŋ jio, “Igiorok erre huna, nyio, arai ekenita hunia hode, oremehini buo fe iyihina jihosi.”
Attati inyi jiaran, “Atuho! Ani osiere iko ecuŋi, etteri iko esidi. Jio lia elle iboto 'to, etamatak adi ni inyi aari otilik enne iyaŋuno 'to nesu, abeŋ etaduma.
Lia, elle itatturi 'to egoliti huno neyyau, ifuotu adi inyi ecoriti huna; ara adi ni a Hollum honyi, buo inyi ara a hito hoŋ.

Ati jio abaŋak, eharak iruk, epalak, attok waati, asomok, emimualak, arotok, etahabuok rijiorihien iko agesomok 'daŋ…amaji hosi adi atafar ono efuoto amunek onno owulo 'to ahima; inyi ania naye etarrihi.”

Ottu nyia obo olo ajilohien hula hattarik, linyia owon 'to iko arranyi hattarik hunne ifuti iko ettigemita hattarik esidita, ette jiaran jihoŋ, “Waŋ. Etahutak adi ni iyye Oduoti onno hobeŋ oyemuni, ŋoruoi Olosobe.”
Inef nyia Oloholio nani, ette ajilo alia iyaru ani ihide obo adoŋe onno ohodo bebe; ette itahutana jihoŋ Yerusalem, Abore Gala Elibo, onno ottu jio Hollum tedou.
Itafaŋ nyia akuatan Hollum inyi. Opipiak nyia inyi ihuo amoruo enne egara, buo olibo lir lir ihua nafalaŋa.

Owon nyia abore gala ania iko eliati onno oduhi ta amoruoi. Obolo nyia eliati ania buo fe ohodo. Owon nyia inyi iko akoli 'tomon harrihai. Irririai nyia ajilohien hulia akoli hunia abotie abotie. Igioroni nyia jio akoli hunia 'daŋ ababo, afure abotie jio awoi waati Israele huna 'tomon harrihai.
Owoni nyia akoli, hunihoi tetteduoŋi holoŋ, hunihoi totto sumal, hunihoi totto junub, buo hunihoi tettedorroi holoŋ.
Oduhoni nyia abore gala ania jio amoruoi 'tomon harrihai etawojita. Imoruoi hunia 'daŋ ababo, igioroni nyia afureta Lefahat hula 'tomon harrihai hulo Olosobe.
Oŋuahatio nyia ajilo linyia ikiana 'to jihoŋ, atelek ekemit anna ara ayyel ikemiere abolori abore gala ania iko akoli honyi buo eliati honyi.

Orriamari nyia aŋacio honyi huna aŋuan 'daŋ, buo fe elatit honyi orriama iko ahodori honyi. Ninyia akem ajilo alia abore gala ania, ara nyia ahodori honyi ihuo amaili alif abotie iko esiha miyet (1500), buo fe elatit honyi ara 'daŋ ihuo nyia.
Attati buo fe ajilo alia ikem eliati bore gala ania. Ara nyia ahodori
Oduhi nyia eliati ta amoruo enne egara, buo oduhi abore gala ta ayyel onno obeŋ iharrua iko obo ariŋ, onno olibo lir lir ihua agilas.
Italamani nyia etawojita iliati abore gala ania ta afacani moruoi 'daŋ hunno opipiahi. Ara nyia amoruo etteri egara, buo etarrihi emuluyak, buo etahunihi aboŋ, buo etaŋuani elube,

buo etamiyeti amerie, buo etilleji ariet, buo etahattarihi olojasi, buo etahottohunihi emuluyak enne iharrua iko egara, buo etahottoŋuani amunek, buo etattomoni egara ihuo aŋaboli, buo etattomoni habotie amugie, buo etattomoni harrihai ara erigie.

Arai nyia ekatin huna 'tomon harrihai asihira 'tomon harrihai. Oduhi nyia ekatin hunia 'daŋ ababo ta asihirati; buo oduhi olofirihi abore gala ania ta ayyel onno obeŋ iharrua iko obo ariŋ, onno olibo lir lir ihua agilas.
Abeŋ nyia ni egonyu aaji emojit enne ittokon jio abore gala ania; nyio, Hollum Lamonye, Laduarani, iko Olosobe, isi nyia arai aaji honyi emojit enne ittokon.
Obeŋ nyia abore gala ania inyiak iwahan oloŋ kuyya ayafa nyio, afaŋ nyia akuatan Hollum jihonyi, buo Olosobe ara allomo honyi.
Amanyai adi aati hutta fau te efaŋit abore gala ania. Iyaŋunie adi oobuok hutta fau esamiti hosi diya.
Odulori adi ekatin abore ania aŋaa afanni 'daŋ, nyio, obeŋ arue adi teyya.
Iyaŋunie adi ahujon iko esamiti fauhien 'daŋ jio abore gala ania.
Ati obeŋi adi aŋatani obo ariŋ enne ibot ojiŋak diya, ara duo bu lia elle ihanio 'to erre hunna aŋariji kuyya ogesem; arari fe hia hama, hunyia igioronie afureta hosi ibuk ono nesu, ono Olosobe.
Attati ajilo alia itahutana jihoŋ olowore, onno opipiak ihua agilas, ono aari hunne iyaŋunie 'to nesu. Oŋeru nyia aari ania to seger ilohittok ninyia itoŋori Hollum iko Olosobe,

ette iŋioron tehiji lofirik abore gala ania. Isuri nyia ayyani huno nesu ilotifori aari ania 'daŋ. Te eeŋa, oŋijattai nyia ayyani hunia enyiahita 'tomon harrihai; ayafa abotie, eŋijit abotie. Arai nyia abene hosi etaŋidarita waati hutta fau.
Obeŋ adi obo ariŋ enne ipitak Hollum inyiak iwanan itua abore gala ania.
Itua abore gala ania, owon adi aseger ilohittok ono Hollum iko Olosobe. Itahabuye adi egiamak Hollum inyi,
buo fe igonyuni inyi. Igioroni adi afure Hollum ihomomite hosi.
Diya, obeŋ adi arue, buo fe aati hulla amanyai 'to diya obeŋi inyiahi iwahan allomo kuyya oloŋ. Nyio, ara adi Hollum Lamonye, afaŋan hosi. Ilohittohi adi isi 'tulaŋ, 'tulaŋ.

Attati ajilo lia jiaran jihoŋ, “Arai ekenita hunia 'daŋ ahode, buo fe oremehini iyihina jihosi. Hollum Lamonye, elle isiarak 'to Oloholio honyi jio ekianak honyi, inyi nyia ifahu ajilo honyi itahutaniere egiamak honyi erre hunne iliahai 'to luŋa eduoŋ.”
Ojio Yesu jio, “Itayirie, eliaha ni attuna! Hotomunoi lia, ollo ogottiere 'to ekenita Hollum hutto tua abuk ana!”

Ani alia Yoane, elle etayiru 'to buo fe egonyu erre hunia. Ninyia etayiru ni buo fe egonyu isi, ette ni iruboho ifau ihosiere hejek ajilo linyia itahutak 'to erre hunia jihoŋ. Ajio nyia ni etahabuyo inyi.

Ati iramak nyia inyi nani jio, “Hèhanio ihuo nyia! Ara ni a hegiamani ihuo iyye; buo fe ihuo illarak hoi ekianak Hollum, kuyya ihuo hia 'daŋ, hullo ogottierek 'to ekenita hutto tua abuk ana. Itahabuye Hollum!”
Attati ajilo lia jiaran jihoŋ jio, “Hèdimatio ekenita Hollum hutto tua abuk ana, nyio, iliaha asaa onno ofuarik isi 'daŋ iduoŋ.
Ijiara luŋa etarrohojani, odulo etarrohojo; buo ebuatani, odulo luŋa ehanio erre hunne iboti 'to. Ijiara luŋa abisani, odulo ehanio onno obis; buo fe ololibo odulo luŋa alibori.”
Attati Yesu jiaran jihoŋ, “Itayirie, eliaha ni attuna! Eyaŋuno adi ni esiorita hoŋ, isiaraniere jio hia 'daŋ ababo ihuo oremehini te ehanita hosi.
Ani osiere iko ecuŋi, etteri iko esidi.”
Hotomunohi hia hullo omoti 'to aboŋojin hosi; nyio, osiru jihosi iŋiyere eŋija 'yani huno nesu, buo fe ijiŋari itua bore gala ania, tettekatin.
Ati, arasai adi epalak illet; isi iko emimualak, asomok, attok waati, etahabuok rijiorihien, iko aati 'daŋ hullo omunoi 'to agesemi iko erre gesem.
“Ani Yesu, linyia efak 'to ajilo hoŋ iramaniere erre huna jihatai, hutte iluluŋi heruhok. Adetuno ni to woyo Dafide. Ani elelef otto taŋatio motie, anna afaŋ 'to 'tel 'tel.”
Attati Oloholio iko oduoti anna ayemuni jiaran, “Waŋ!”
Ijiara hia 'daŋ hulle itayiruni 'to eram ania ojiori luŋa, “Waŋ!”
Elle iboto iyye, waŋ! Elle iwak iyye aari hunne iyaŋunie 'to nesu, amata; obeŋi itadumie.
Asar ni atulo 'daŋ elle itayiru 'to ekenita Hollum hutto tua abuk ana jio: alla afonik obo omuk erre jio ekenita hunia, ofonik adi buo fe Hollum jihonyi ettigemita hunne igioroni ibuk ana.
Elle iduha obo atulo omuk ekenita addi, jio ekenita Hollum hutto tua abuk ana, iyimo adi buo fe Hollum inyi eŋija 'yani ono nesu iko iwanari Ibore Gala Elibo, hunne ikiana abuk ana, eram hosi.
Ikiana nyia lia, linyia iramak 'to erre huna 'daŋ jio, “Hode, eliaha ni attuna!”
Hétera ihuo nyia. Yesu Lamonye, waŋ!
Ijiara ayiji taji Yesu Lamonye, hatawana jihatai 'daŋ ababo
